GP12nardp1_u:4361: pāṣaṇḍaḥ sa hi vijñeyaḥ sarvadharmabahiṣkṛtaḥ // NarP_1,25.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:4365: ṣaṣṭe vā satpame vāpi aṣṭame vāpi kārayet // NarP_1,25.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:4366: jāte putre pitā snātvā sacailaṃ jātakarma ca /
GP12nardp1_u:4369: annena kārayedyastu sa caṇḍāla samo bhavet // NarP_1,25.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:4373: na dadyānnāma viprenda tathā ca viṣathamākṣaram // NarP_1,25.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:4375: satpame cāṣṭame vāpi kuryād gṛhyoktamārgataḥ // NarP_1,25.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:4377: kartavyaḥ pādakṛcchro vai caule tvarddhaṃ prakalpayet // NarP_1,25.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:4388: sāṃtapanadvayaṃ caiva kṛtvā karma samācaret // NarP_1,25.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:4390: rmauñjī viprasya vijñeyā dhanurjyā kṣattriyasya tu // NarP_1,25.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:4392: viprasya coktamaiṇeyaṃ rauravaṃ kṣatriyasya tu // NarP_1,25.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:4395: bailvaṃ vaiśyasya vijñeya tatpramāṇaṃ śṛṇuṣva me /
GP12nardp1_u:4396: viprasya keśamānaṃ syādālalāṭaṃ nṛpasya ca // NarP_1,25.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:4398: tathā vāsāṃsi vakṣaghyāmi viprādīnāṃ yathākramam // NarP_1,25.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:4399: kaṣāyaṃ caiva māñjiṣṭaṃ hāridraṃ ca prakīrtitam /
GP12nardp1_u:4400: upanīto dvijo vipra paricaryāparo guroḥ // NarP_1,25.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:4405: naṣṭe bhraṣṭe navaṃ mantrāddhṛtvā bhraṣṭaṃ jale kṣipet /
GP12nardp1_u:4408: bhavatpūrvaṃ brāhmaṇasya bhavanmadhyaṃ nṛpasya ca // NarP_1,25.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:4424: abhivādanaśīlaḥ syād vṛddheṣu ca yathākramam // NarP_1,25.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:4426: ādhyātmikā diduḥkhāni nivārayati yo guruḥ // NarP_1,25.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:4432: pāṣaṇḍaṃ patitaṃ vrātyaṃ tathā nakṣaghatrajīvinam // NarP_1,25.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:4434: unmattaṃ ca śaṭhaṃ dhūrttaṃ dhāvantamaśuciṃ tathā // NarP_1,25.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:4438: bhartṛnghīṃ puṣpiṇīṃ jārāṃ sūtikāṃ garbhapātinīm // NarP_1,25.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:4441: pratyekaṃ tu namaskāro hṝnti puṇyaṃ purākṛtam /
GP12nardp1_u:4442: śrāddhaṃ vrataṃ tathā dānaṃ devatābhyārcanaṃ tathā // NarP_1,25.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:4443: yajñaṃ ca tarpaṇaṃ caiva kurvantaṃ nābhivādayet /
GP12nardp1_u:4444: kṛte 'bhivādane yastu na kuryā tprativādanam // NarP_1,25.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:4445: nābhivādyaḥ sa vijñeyo yayā śūdrastathaiva saḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:4447: tasya pādau ca saṃgṛhya adhīyīta vicakṣaṇaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:4452: pariveṣaṃ gate sūrye śrotriye gṛhamāgate // NarP_1,25.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:4454: saṃdhyāyāṃ garjite meghe hyakāle parivarṣaṇe // NarP_1,25.48 //
GP12nardp1_u:4456: manvādiṣu ca devarṣe yugādiṣu caturṣvapi // NarP_1,25.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:4458: tṛtīyā prādhave śuklā bhādre kṛṣṇā traghayodaśī // NarP_1,25.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:4459: kārttike navamī śuddhā māghe pañcadaśī tithiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:4467: kārtikī phaālgunī caighatrīṃ jyaiṣṭhī pañcadaśī sitā /
GP12nardp1_u:4472: galagrahe durddine ca nādhīyīta kadācanā // NarP_1,25.57 //
GP12nardp1_u:4476: anadhyāye tu yo 'dhīte taṃ vidyādvrahmaghātakam // NarP_1,25.59 //
GP12nardp1_u:4477: na taṃ saṃbhāṣayedviprana tena saha saṃvaset /
GP12nardp1_u:4480: anadhītya tu yo vedamanyatra kurute śramam // NarP_1,25.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:4484: nityaṃ naimittikaṃ kāmyaṃ yaccānyatkarma vaidikam // NarP_1,25.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:4488: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde smārtācāreṣu varṇāśramadharmeṣvadhyayanādidharmanirupaṇaṃ nāma pañcaviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:4493: adhītya gurave dattvā dakṣiṇāṃ saṃviśedvṛham // NarP_1,26.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:4495: dvijaḥ samudvahetkanyāṃ suśīlāṃ dharma cāriṇīm // NarP_1,26.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:4507: atikṛṣṇāṃ raktavarṇāṃ dhūrtāṃ naivodvahe dvudhaḥ // NarP_1,26.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:4508: sadā rodanaśīlāṃ ca pāṇḍurābhāṃ ca kutsitām /
GP12nardp1_u:4513: garvitāṃ bakavṛttiṃ ca sarvathā nodvahedvudhaḥ // NarP_1,26.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:4515: pragalbhāṃ vāguṇāṃ jñātvā sarvathā tāṃ parityajet // NarP_1,26.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:4516: bharttṛputreṣu yā nārī sarvadā niṣṭhurā bhavet /
GP12nardp1_u:4517: parānukūlinī yā ca sarvathā tāṃ parityajet // NarP_1,26.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:4519: pūrvaḥ pūrvo varo jñeyaḥ pūrvābhāve paraḥ paraḥ // NarP_1,26.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:4522: brāhmeṇa ca vivāhena vaivāhyo vai dvijottamaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:4525: abhāveṣu tu pūrveṣāṃ kuryādeva parānbudhaḥ // NarP_1,26.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:4529: dhārayedvaiṇavaṃ daṇḍaṃ sodakaṃ ca kamaṇḍalum // NarP_1,26.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:4533: parānnaṃ naiva bhuñjīta paravādaṃ ca varjayet // NarP_1,26.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:4535: na saṃhatābhyāṃ hastābhyāṃ kaṇḍūyedātmanaḥ śiraḥ // NarP_1,26.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:4539: nāroheduṣṭrayānaṃ ca śuṣkavādaṃ ca varjayet // NarP_1,26.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:4540: anya striyaṃ na gacchecca paiśunyaṃ parivarjayet /
GP12nardp1_u:4543: asūyāṃ matsaratvaṃ ca divāsvāpaṃ ca varjayet // NarP_1,26.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:4545: svakaṃ nāma svanakṣatraṃ mānaṃ caivātigopayet // NarP_1,26.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:4546: na durjanaiḥ saha vase nnāśāstraṃ śṛṇuyāttathā /
GP12nardp1_u:4547: āsavadyūtagīteṣu dvijastu na rartiṃ caret // NarP_1,26.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:4548: ārdrāsthi ca tathocchiṣṭaṃ śūdraṃ ca patitaṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:4549: sarpaṃ ca bhaṣaṇaṃ spṛṣṭvā sacailaṃ snānamācaret // NarP_1,26.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:4550: citiṃ ca citikāṣṭaṃ ca yūpaṃ cāṇḍālameva ca /
GP12nardp1_u:4551: spṛṣṭvā devalakaṃ caiva savāsā jalamāviśet // NarP_1,26.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:4559: tāṃbūlamaśuciṃ nādyāttathā suptaṃ na bodhayet // NarP_1,26.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:4561: na vāmahastenaikena pibedvakreṇa vā jalam // NarP_1,26.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:4565: darśe ca paurṇamāsyāṃ ca yāgaṃ kuryādyathāvidhi // NarP_1,26.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:4569: darśe ca pretapakṣe ca śrāddhaṃ kuryādgṛhī dvijaḥ // NarP_1,26.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:4570: manvādiṣu mṛdāhe ca aṣṭakāsu ca nārada /
GP12nardp1_u:4571: nāvadhānye samāyāte gṛhī śrāddhaṃ samācaret // NarP_1,26.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:4573: puṇyakṣetreṣu tīrtheṣu gṛhī śrāddhaṃ samācaret // NarP_1,26.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:4574: yajño dānaṃ tapo homaḥ svādhyāyaḥ pitṛtarpaṇam /
GP12nardp1_u:4575: vṛthā bhavati tatsarvamūrddhapuṇḍraṃ vinā kṛtam // NarP_1,26.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:4576: urddhapuṇḍraṃ ca tulasīṃ śrāddhe necchanti kecana /
GP12nardp1_u:4580: sadā cāraparā ye tu teṣāṃ viṣṇuḥ prasīdati /
GP12nardp1_u:4581: viṣṇau prasannatāṃ yāte kimasādhyaṃ dvijottama // NarP_1,26.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:4582: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde smārttadhermaṣu vedādhyayanādikasya gṛhasthadharmasya ca nirupaṇaṃ nāma ṣaḍviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:4585: yadrūtāṃ sarvapāpāni naśyantyeva na saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,27.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:4593: tathā vṛkṣasya cchāyāyāṃ kāntāre vahnisannidhau // NarP_1,27.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:4595: brāhmaṇānāṃ samīpe ca tathā goguruyoṣitām // NarP_1,27.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:4597: evamādiṣu deśeṣu malamūtraṃ na kārayet // NarP_1,27.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:4598: śauce yatnaḥ sadā kāryaḥ śaucamūlo dvijaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:4600: śaucaṃ tu dvividhaṃ proktaṃ brāhmamābhyāntaraṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:4603: na mūṣakādikhanitāṃ phaālotkṛṣṭāṃ tathaiva ca // NarP_1,27.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:4605: śaucaṃ kuryātprayatnena samādāya śubhāṃ mṛdam // NarP_1,27.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:4606: liṅge mṛdekā dātavyā tisro vā meḍhrayordvayoḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:4608: ekā liṅge gude pañca daśa vāme tathobhayoḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:4609: satpa tisraḥ pradātavyāḥ pādayormṛttikāḥ pṛthak // NarP_1,27.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:4614: āture niyamo nāsti mahāpadi tathaiva ca /
GP12nardp1_u:4619: evaṃ śaucaṃ tu nirvartya paścādvai susamāhitaḥ // NarP_1,27.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:4632: āyurbalaṃ yaśo varcaḥ prajāḥ paśuvasūni ca /
GP12nardp1_u:4633: brahma prajñāṃ ca medhāṃ ca tvanno dhehi vanaspate // NarP_1,27.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:4641: jihvāmullikhya tābhyāṃ tu dalubhyāṃ niyatendriyaḥ // NarP_1,27.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:4643: tataḥ snānaṃ prakurvīta nadyādau vimale jale // NarP_1,27.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:4645: praṇamya tatra tīrthāni āvāhya ravimaṇḍalāt // NarP_1,27.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:4648: gaṅge ca yamune caiva godāvari sarasvati /
GP12nardp1_u:4651: āgacchantu mahābhāgāḥ snānakāle sadā mama // NarP_1,27.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:4652: ayodhyā mathurā māyā kāśīṃ kāñcī hyavantikā /
GP12nardp1_u:4653: purī dvārāvatī jñeyā satpaitā mokṣadāyikāḥ // NarP_1,27.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:4657: paridhāyāhataṃ dhautaṃ dvitīyaṃ parivīya ca // NarP_1,27.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:4659: īśānābhimukho vipra gāyatryācamya vai dvija // NarP_1,27.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:4661: tatastu vāriṇātmānaṃ veṣṭayitvā samukṣya ca // NarP_1,27.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:4665: vinyasya hṛdaye tāraṃ bhūḥ śirasyatha vinyaset // NarP_1,27.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:4667: bhūrbhuvaḥ svastathātrāstraṃ dikṣu tālatrayaṃ nyaset // NarP_1,27.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:4669: āgaccha varade devi tryakṣare brahmavādini // NarP_1,27.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:4675: tāraṃ ca vyāhṛtīḥ satpa tripadāṃ ca samuccaran // NarP_1,27.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:4676: śiraḥ śikhāṃ ca saṃpūrya kubhayitvā virecayet /
GP12nardp1_u:4679: āpaḥ punantu madhyāhne sāyamagniścameti ca // NarP_1,27.48 //
GP12nardp1_u:4681: sumutriyā na ityuktvā nāsāspṛṣṭajalena ca // NarP_1,27.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:4683: ṛtaṃ ca satyametena kṛtvā caivādhamarṣaṇam // NarP_1,27.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:4685: tataḥ sūryāya vidhivadgandhaṃ puṣpaṃ jalāñjalim // NarP_1,27.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:4692: brahmaṇī caturānanākṣavalayā kumbhaṃ karaiḥ srukstravau bibhrāṇā tvaruṇendukāntivadanā ṛgrūpiṇī bālikā /
GP12nardp1_u:4693: haṃsārohaṇakelikhaṇkhaṇmaṇerbibārcitā bhūṣitā gāyatrī paribhāvitā bhavatu naḥ saṃpatsamṛddhyai sadā // NarP_1,27.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:4694: rudrāṇī navayauvanā trinayanā vaiyāghnacarmāṃbarā khaṭvāṅgatraghiśikhākṣasūtravalayābhītiśriyai cāstu naḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:4696: dhyeyā sā ca sarasvatī bhagavatī pītāṃbarālaṅkṛtā śyāmā śyāmatanurjaroparilasadgātrāñcitā vaiṣṇavī /
GP12nardp1_u:4697: tārkṣyasthā maṇinūpurāṅgadalasadgraiveyabhūṣojjvalā hastālaṅkṛtaśaṅkhacakrasugadāpahmāśriyai cāstu naḥ // NarP_1,27.57 //
GP12nardp1_u:4703: gṛhasthasya sattāraḥ syājjapya evaṃvidho mune // NarP_1,27.60 //
GP12nardp1_u:4704: tato japtvā yathāśakti savitre vinivedya ca /
GP12nardp1_u:4705: gāyatryai ca savitre ca prakṣipedañjalidrūyam // NarP_1,27.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:4706: tato visṛjya tāṃ vipra uttare iti mantrataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:4709: prātarādeḥ paraṃ karma kuryādapi vidhānataḥ // NarP_1,27.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:4712: āturāṇāṃ tu rogadyaiḥ pānthānāṃ ca sakṛnmatam /
GP12nardp1_u:4715: śarvaryāḥ prathame yāme tāni kuryādyathākramam // NarP_1,27.66 //
GP12nardp1_u:4717: pāṣaṇḍaḥ sa hi vijñeyaḥ sarvadharmabahiṣkṛtaḥ // NarP_1,27.67 //
GP12nardp1_u:4737: dvijānāṃ bhojyamaśrī yātpātraṃ naiva parityajet // NarP_1,27.77 //
GP12nardp1_u:4738: saṃsthāpya svāsame pādau vastrārddhaṃ paridhāya ca /
GP12nardp1_u:4739: mukhena vamitaṃ bhuktvā surāpītyucyate budhaiḥ // NarP_1,27.78 //
GP12nardp1_u:4741: pratyakṣaṃ lavaṇaṃ caiva gomāṃsaśīti gadyate // NarP_1,27.79 //
GP12nardp1_u:4743: śabda na kārayedviprastaṃ kurvannārakī bhavet // NarP_1,27.80 //
GP12nardp1_u:4753: putreṣu bhāryāṃ niḥkṣipya vanaṃ gacchetsahaiva vā // NarP_1,27.85 //
GP12nardp1_u:4758: varjaye dgrāmajātāni puṣpāṇi ca phalāni ca /
GP12nardp1_u:4759: aṣṭau grāsāṃśca bhuñjīta na kuryādrātribhojanam // NarP_1,27.88 //
GP12nardp1_u:4761: vyavāyaṃ varjayeccaiva nidrālasye tathaiva ca // NarP_1,27.89 //
GP12nardp1_u:4765: yadā manasi vairāgyaṃ jātaṃ sarveṣu vastuṣu // NarP_1,27.91 //
GP12nardp1_u:4771: samaḥ śatrau ca mitre ca tathā mānāpamānayoḥ // NarP_1,27.94 //
GP12nardp1_u:4777: japecca praṇavaṃ nityaṃ jitātmā vijitendriyaḥ // NarP_1,27.97 //
GP12nardp1_u:4787: nirguṇaṃ paramaṃ dhyāyedātmānaṃ parataḥ param // NarP_1,27.102 //
GP12nardp1_u:4789: sahasraśīrṣaṃ devaṃ ca sadā dhyāyejjitendriyaḥ // NarP_1,27.103 //
GP12nardp1_u:4791: sa yāti paramānandaṃ paraṃ jyotiḥ sanātanam // NarP_1,27.104 //
GP12nardp1_u:4793: sa yāti paramaṃ sthānaṃ yatra gatvā na śocayati // NarP_1,27.105 //
GP12nardp1_u:4795: nārāyaṇaparā yānti tadviṣṇaḥ paramaṃ padam // NarP_1,27.106 //
GP12nardp1_u:4796: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde sadācāreṣu gṛhasthaāvānaprasthayatidharmnirupaṇaṃ nāma satpaviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:4799: yacchrutvā sarvapāpebhyo mucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,28.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:4801: adhaḥ śāyī brahmacārī niśi viprānnimantrayet // NarP_1,28.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:4804: adhvānaṃ kalahaṃ krodhaṃ vyavāyaṃ ca dhuraṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:4805: śrāddhakarttā ca bhoktā ca divāsvāpaṃ ca varjayet // NarP_1,28.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:4806: śrāddhe nimantrito yastu vyavāyaṃ kurute yadi /
GP12nardp1_u:4816: ete niyojitavyā vai śrāddhe viprā munīśvara /
GP12nardp1_u:4819: kuṣṭī ca kunakhī caiva laṃbakarṇaḥ kṣatavrataḥ // NarP_1,28.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:4821: kuvādī parirvattā ca tathā devalakaḥ khalaḥ // NarP_1,28.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:4825: kuṇḍaśca golakaścaiva hyayājyānāṃ ca yājakaḥ // NarP_1,28.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:4838: tataḥ prātaḥ samutthāya prātaḥ kṛtyaṃ samāpya ca /
GP12nardp1_u:4841: sa kālaḥ kutapastatra pitṝṇāṃ dattamakṣayam // NarP_1,28.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:4842: aparāhnaḥ pitṝṇāṃ tu dattaḥ kālaḥ svayaṃbhuvā /
GP12nardp1_u:4843: tatkāla eva dātavyaṃ kavyaṃ tasmāddvijottamaiḥ // NarP_1,28.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:4845: rākṣasaṃ taddhi vijñeyaṃ pitṝṇāṃ nopatiṣṭati // NarP_1,28.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:4846: kāvyaṃ prattaṃ tu sāyāhne rākṣasaṃ tadbhavedapi /
GP12nardp1_u:4847: dātā narakamānpoti bhoktā ca narakaṃ vrajet // NarP_1,28.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:4849: viddhāparāhni kāyāṃ tu śrāddhaṃ kāryaṃ vijānatā // NarP_1,28.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:4851: pūrvā kṣaye tu karttavyā vṛdvau kāryā tathottarā // NarP_1,28.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:4853: tithiḥ sāyāhnagā yatra parā kāvyasya viśrutā // NarP_1,28.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:4855: naitanmataṃ hi sarveṣāṃ kāvyadāne munīśvara // NarP_1,28.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:4859: ubhau ca viśvedevārthaṃ pighatrarthaṃ trīnyathāvidhi // NarP_1,28.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:4863: vaiśyasya vartulaṃ jñeyaṃ śūdrasyābhyābhyukṣaṇaṃ bhavet // NarP_1,28.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:4865: ātmānaṃ vā niyuñjīta na vipraṃ vedavarjitam // NarP_1,28.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:4868: brāhmaṇānāṃ tu madhye ca dvāradeśe tathaiva ca /
GP12nardp1_u:4869: apahatā ityṛcā vai karttā tu vikirettilān // NarP_1,28.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:4871: dattveti bhūyo dadyacca daive kṣaṇapratīkṣaṇam // NarP_1,28.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:4873: annadāne caturthī syāccheṣāḥ saṃpuddhayaḥ smṛtāḥ // NarP_1,28.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:4876: yavosīti ti yavān kṣitpvā gandhapuṣpe ca vāgyataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:4878: yā divyā iti mantreṇa dadyādarghyaṃ samāhitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:4883: śannodevyā jalaṃ kṣiptvā tilosīti tilānkṣaghipet // NarP_1,28.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:4885: yā divyā iti mantreṇa dadyādarghyaṃ ca pūrvavat // NarP_1,28.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:4889: agnau kariṣya ityuktvā tebhyo 'nujñāṃ samāharet // NarP_1,28.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:4891: kuruṣva kriyatāṃ veti kurviti brūyureva ca // NarP_1,28.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:4893: sāmāya ca pitṛmate svadhā nama itīrayet // NarP_1,28.48 //
GP12nardp1_u:4894: agnaye kavyavāhanāya svadhā nama itīha vā /
GP12nardp1_u:4897: agnyabhāve tu viprasya pāṇau homo vidhīyate // NarP_1,28.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:4898: yathācāraṃ prakurvīta pāṇāvagnau ca vā dvija /
GP12nardp1_u:4900: saṃdhāyāgniṃ tataḥ kāryaṃ kṛtvā taṃ visṛjetkṛtī /
GP12nardp1_u:4903: kṣayāhe caiva saṃprātpe svasyāgnirdūrago yadi // NarP_1,28.53 //
GP12nardp1_u:4906: yadyagnau juhuyādvāpi pāṇau vā sa hi pātakī /
GP12nardp1_u:4907: upāsanāgnā dūrasthe kecidicchanti vai dvijāḥ // NarP_1,28.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:4912: ye yatra vihitāḥ śrāddhe sāvadhānāṃ bhavantu te /
GP12nardp1_u:4913: iti saṃprārthayeddevānye devāsa ṛcā nu vai // NarP_1,28.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:4915: amūrtānāṃ mūrtānāṃ ca pitṝṇāṃ dītpatejasām // NarP_1,28.59 //
GP12nardp1_u:4919: tataste brāhmaṇāḥ sarve bhuñjīranvāgyatā dvijāḥ // NarP_1,28.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:4921: yathaācāra pradeyaṃ ca madhunāṃsādikaṃ tathā // NarP_1,28.62 //
GP12nardp1_u:4923: yadi pātraṃ tyajetko 'pi brāhmaṇaḥ śrāddhayojitaḥ // NarP_1,28.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:4925: bhañjāneṣu ca vipreṣu hyanyonyaṃ saṃspuśedyadi // NarP_1,28.64 //
GP12nardp1_u:4931: trimadhu trisuparṇaṃ ca pāvamānaṃ yajūṃṣi ca // NarP_1,28.67 //
GP12nardp1_u:4935: brāhmaṇeṣu ca bhukteṣu vikiraṃ vikṣipettathā // NarP_1,28.69 //
GP12nardp1_u:4936: śeṣamannaṃ vadeccaiva madhusūktaṃ ca vai japet /
GP12nardp1_u:4937: svayaṃ ca pādau prakṣaghālya samyagācamya nārada // NarP_1,28.70 //
GP12nardp1_u:4941: acālayitvā pātraṃ tu svasti kurvanti ye dvijāḥ // NarP_1,28.72 //
GP12nardp1_u:4945: dadyācca dakṣiṇāṃ śaktyā tāṃbūlaṃ gandhasaṃyutam // NarP_1,28.74 //
GP12nardp1_u:4948: bhoktā ca śrāddhakṛttasyāṃ rajanyāṃ maithunaṃ tyajet /
GP12nardp1_u:4953: paitṛkena tu sūktena homaṃ kuryādvicakṣaṇaḥ // NarP_1,28.78 //
GP12nardp1_u:4955: snātvā ca vidhivadvipra kuryādvā tilataparṇam // NarP_1,28.79 //
GP12nardp1_u:4958: paredyuḥ śrāddhakṛnmartyo yo na tarpayate pitṝn /
GP12nardp1_u:4959: tatkulaṃ nāśamāyāti brahmahatyāṃ ca vindati // NarP_1,28.81 //
GP12nardp1_u:4960: śrāddhaṃ kurvanti ye martyāḥ śraddhāvanto munīśvara /
GP12nardp1_u:4961: na teṣāṃ saṃtaticchedaḥ saṃpannāste bhavanti ca // NarP_1,28.82 //
GP12nardp1_u:4962: pitṝnyañjati yeṃ śrāddhe taistu viṣṇuḥ prapūjitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:4965: yakṣāśca siddhā manujā harireva sanātanaḥ // NarP_1,28.84 //
GP12nardp1_u:4967: tasmāddātā ca bhoktā ca sarvaṃ viṣṇuḥ sanātanaḥ // NarP_1,28.85 //
GP12nardp1_u:4968: yadasti vipra yannāsti dṛśyaṃ cādṛśyameva ca /
GP12nardp1_u:4969: sarvaṃ viṣṇumayaṃ jñeyaṃ tasmādanyanna vidyate // NarP_1,28.86 //
GP12nardp1_u:4973: karttā kārayitā caiva sarvaṃ viṣṇuḥ sanātanaḥ // NarP_1,28.88 //
GP12nardp1_u:4975: kathitaḥ kurvatāmevaṃ pāpaṃ sadyo vilīyate // NarP_1,28.89 //
GP12nardp1_u:4976: ya idaṃ paṭhate bhaktyā śrāddhakāle dvijottamaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:4978: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde śrāddhakriyāvarṇanaṃ nāmāṣṭāviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:4982: śrautaṃ smārttaṃ vrataṃ dānaṃ yaccānyatkarma vaidikam /
GP12nardp1_u:4983: anirṇītāsu tithiṣu na kiñcitphalati dvija // NarP_1,29.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:4987: nāgaviddhā tu yā ṣaṣṭī śivaviddhā tu satpamī // NarP_1,29.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:4989: darśaṃ ca paurṇamāsīṃ ca satpamīṃ pitṛvāsaram // NarP_1,29.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:4991: kṛṣṇapakṣe pūrvaviddhāṃ satpamīṃ ca caturdaśīm // NarP_1,29.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:4993: vratādīnāṃ tu sarveṣāṃ śuklapakṣo viśiṣyate // NarP_1,29.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:4995: asaṃbhave vratādīnāṃ yadi paurvāhnikī tithiḥ // NarP_1,29.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:5001: arddharātrādadho yā tu nakṣatravyāpinī tithiḥ // NarP_1,29.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:5005: arddharātradvaye syātāṃ nakṣatraṃ ca tithiryadi // NarP_1,29.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:5006: kṣaye pūrvā praśastā syādrṛddhau kāryā tathottarā /
GP12nardp1_u:5011: tataḥ syustithayaḥ puṇyāḥ karmānuṣṭānato divā // NarP_1,29.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:5014: tasyāṃ tu tadvataṃ kāryaṃ saiva kāryā vicakṣaṇaiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:5021: vṛṣabhe vṛścike caiva siṃhe kumbhe tathaiva ca // NarP_1,29.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:5023: tulāyāṃ caiva meṣe ca pūrvataḥ paratastathā // NarP_1,29.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:5025: kanyāyāṃ mithune caiva mīne dhanuṣi ca dvija // NarP_1,29.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:5031: dṛṣṭacandrā sinīvālī naṣṭacandrā kuhūḥ smṛtā // NarP_1,29.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:5036: kṣaye pūrvā tu karttavyā vṛddhau kāryā tathottarā /
GP12nardp1_u:5048: tatrecchayā ca saṃgrāhyā pūrvā vātha parāthavā /
GP12nardp1_u:5054: paredyureva viprendra sadyaḥ kālo vidhīyate // NarP_1,29.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:5056: sadyaḥ kālaḥ paredyuḥ syājjñeyamevaṃ tithikṣaye // NarP_1,29.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:5060: dvādaśī ca trayodaśyāmasti cetsā parā smṛtā // NarP_1,29.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:5062: traghayodaśī ca rātryante tatra vakṣyāmi nirṇayam // NarP_1,29.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:5063: pūrvā gṛhasthaiḥ sā kāryyā hyuttarā yatibhistathā /
GP12nardp1_u:5064: gṛhasthāḥ siddhimicchanti yato mokṣaṃ yatīśvarāḥ // NarP_1,29.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:5065: dvādaśyāṃ tu kalāyāṃ vā yadi labhyeta pāraṇā /
GP12nardp1_u:5067: śulke vā yadi vā kṛṣṇe bhavedekādaśīdvayam /
GP12nardp1_u:5068: gṛhasthānāṃ tu pūrvoktā yatīnāmuttarā smṛtā // NarP_1,29.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:5071: viddhāpyekādaśī grāhyā parato dvādaśī na cet /
GP12nardp1_u:5072: aviddhāpi niṣiddhaiva parato dvādaśī yadi // NarP_1,29.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:5076: dvādaśī ca trayodaśyāṃ nāsti vā vidyate 'thavā // NarP_1,29.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:5080: dvādaśī ca trayodaśayāmasti tatra kathaṃ bhavet // NarP_1,29.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:5084: dvādaśī ca trayodaśyāmasti tatraiva cāpare // NarP_1,29.53 //
GP12nardp1_u:5085: upoṣyā dvādaśī śuddhā sarvaireva na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:5086: kecidāhuśca pūrvāṃ tu tanmataṃ na samañjasam // NarP_1,29.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:5088: pāraṇaṃ copavāsaṃ ca na kuryātputravāngṛhī // NarP_1,29.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:5092: nādyādvai yadi bhuñjīta surāpena samo bhavet // NarP_1,29.57 //
GP12nardp1_u:5094: prāyaścittaṃ muniśreṣṭha karttavyaṃ tatra yājñikaiḥ // NarP_1,29.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:5096: āpyāyasva ṛcā caiva somapāsta iti dvija // NarP_1,29.59 //
GP12nardp1_u:5100: yaḥ karoti vratādīni tasya syādakṣayaṃ phalam // NarP_1,29.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:5102: tasmāddharmaparā yānti tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam // NarP_1,29.62 //
GP12nardp1_u:5105: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde tithyādinirṇayo nāma ekonatriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:5110: tatsarvaṃ niṣphalaṃ proktaṃ rākṣasaiḥ parisevitam // NarP_1,30.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:5115: brahmahā ca surāpī ca steyī ca gurutalpagaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:5122: taddravyaṃ dhvajadaṇḍe tu dhṛtvā vanacaro bhavet // NarP_1,30.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:5128: yadi vanyairna jīveta grāme bhikṣāṃ samācaret // NarP_1,30.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:5132: gonimittaṃ dvijārthaṃ vā prāṇānvāpi parityajet // NarP_1,30.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:5139: hatvā tu vipramātraṃ ca caretsaṃvatsaraṃ vratam /
GP12nardp1_u:5141: dviguṇaṃ kṣatriyasyoktaṃ triguṇaṃ tu viśaḥ smṛtam /
GP12nardp1_u:5142: brāhmaṇaṃ hṝnti yaḥ śūdrastaṃ muśalyaṃ virdurbudhāḥ // NarP_1,30.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:5143: rājñaiva śikṣā kartavyā iti śāsteṣu niścayaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:5144: brāhmaṇīnāṃ vadhe tvarddhaṃ pādaḥ syātkanyakāvadhe // NarP_1,30.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:5146: hatvā tu kṣatriyaṃ vipraḥ ṣaḍabdaṃ kucchramācaret // NarP_1,30.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:5147: saṃvatsaraṃ trayaṃ veśyaṃ śūrdraṃ hatvā tu vatsaram /
GP12nardp1_u:5148: dīkṣitasya striyaṃ hatvā brāhmaṇī cāṣṭavatsarān // NarP_1,30.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:5150: prāvaścittaṃ vidhānaṃ tu sarvatra munisattama // NarP_1,30.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:5152: gauḍī paiṣṭī ca mādhvī ca vijñeyā trividhā surā // NarP_1,30.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:5154: kṣīraṃ ghṛtaṃ vā gomūtrameteṣvanyatamaṃ mune // NarP_1,30.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:5158: tāmreṇa vāthaṃ pātreṇa tatpītvā maraṇaṃ vrajet // NarP_1,30.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:5160: ajñānādātmabuddyā tu surāṃ pītvā dvijaścaret // NarP_1,30.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:5166: tālaṃ ca pānasaṃ caiva drākṣaṃ khārjūrasaṃbhavam // NarP_1,30.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:5168: gauḍī mādhvī surā madyamevamekādaśa smṛtāḥ // NarP_1,30.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:5172: samakṣaṃ vā parokṣaṃ vā balāccauyaṇa vā tathā // NarP_1,30.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:5174: suvarṇasya pramāṇaṃ tu manvādyaiḥ paribhāṣitam // NarP_1,30.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:5184: guruṇāṃ yajñakatṝṇāṃ dhārmiṣṭānāṃ tathaiva ca // NarP_1,30.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:5186: kṛtānutāpo dehe ca saṃpūrṇe lepayed dhṛtam // NarP_1,30.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:5188: brahmasvaṃ kṣatriyo hṛtvā paścāttāpamavāpya ca // NarP_1,30.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:5198: gaurasarṣapamānaṃ tu hṛtvā hema vicakṣaṇaḥ // NarP_1,30.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:5202: hema kṛṣṇalamātraṃ tu hṛtvā sāṃtapanaṃ caret // NarP_1,30.48 //
GP12nardp1_u:5210: hatvā ca rajataṃ vidvānkuryāccāndrāyaṇaṃ mune // NarP_1,30.52 //
GP12nardp1_u:5221: haste gṛhītvā muṣkaṃ tu gacchandvai naiṛtīṃ diśam /
GP12nardp1_u:5222: gacchanmārgai sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ na kadācidvicārayet // NarP_1,30.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:5228: kārīṣavahninā dagdhaḥ śuddhiṃ yāti dvijottama // NarP_1,30.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:5234: gatvā śūdvāṃ gurorbhāryāṃ trivarṣaṃ vratamācaret // NarP_1,30.64 //
GP12nardp1_u:5236: pitṛvyabhāryāmatha mātulānīṃ putrīṃ ca gacchedyadi kāmamugdhaḥ // NarP_1,30.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:5240: dinatraye gate vahnidagdhaḥ śudhyeta nānyathā // NarP_1,30.67 //
GP12nardp1_u:5241: cāñjālīṃ puṣkasīṃ caiva snuṣāṃ ca bhaginīṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:5242: mitrastriyaṃ śiṣyapatnīṃ yastu vai kāmato vrajet // NarP_1,30.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:5254: kṛtvā saṃgaṃ tu ṣaṇmāsaṃ careccāndrāyaṇadvayam // NarP_1,30.74 //
GP12nardp1_u:5256: etacca triguṇaṃ proktaṃ jñānātsaṃge yathākramam // NarP_1,30.75 //
GP12nardp1_u:5257: maṇḍūkaṃ nakulaṃ kākaṃ varāhaṃ mūṣakaṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:5258: mārjārājāvikaṃ śvānaṃ hatvā kukkuṭakaṃ tathā // NarP_1,30.76 //
GP12nardp1_u:5260: jatpakṛcchraṃ karivadhe parākaṃ govadhe smṛtam // NarP_1,30.77 //
GP12nardp1_u:5264: śuṣkakāṣṭatṛṇānāṃ ca drumāṇāṃ ca guḍasya ca // NarP_1,30.79 //
GP12nardp1_u:5266: ṭiṭṭibhaṃ cakravākaṃ ca haṃsaṃ kāraṇḍavaṃ tathā // NarP_1,30.80 //
GP12nardp1_u:5268: śukaṃ cāṣaṃ balākaṃ ca śiśumāraṃ ca kacchapam // NarP_1,30.81 //
GP12nardp1_u:5272: rajasvalāṃ ca cāṇḍālaṃ mahāpātakinaṃ tathā // NarP_1,30.83 //
GP12nardp1_u:5274: spṛṣṭvā sacailaṃ snāyīta ghṛtaṃ saṃprāśeyattathā // NarP_1,30.84 //
GP12nardp1_u:5278: snānadānajapādau ca bhojanādau ca nārada // NarP_1,30.86 //
GP12nardp1_u:5287: prāyaścittaṃ tu teṣāṃ ca kuryādevaṃ yathāvidhi /
GP12nardp1_u:5292: mahāpātakayukto vā yukto vā sarvapātakaiḥ // NarP_1,30.93 //
GP12nardp1_u:5293: vimukta eva pāpebhyo jñeyo viṣṇuparo yataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:5295: yastu saṃsmarate martyaḥ sa muktaḥ pāpakoṭibhiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:5296: smṛto vā pūjito vāpi dhyātaḥ praṇamito 'pi vā // NarP_1,30.95 //
GP12nardp1_u:5298: saṃparkādyadi vā mohādyastu pūjayate harim // NarP_1,30.96 //
GP12nardp1_u:5302: mānuṣaṃ durlabhaṃ janma prāpyate yairmunīśvara // NarP_1,30.98 //
GP12nardp1_u:5307: paraṃ mokṣaṃ labheścaiva pūjite tu janārdane /
GP12nardp1_u:5311: labdhvemāṃ mānuṣīṃ vṛttiṃ rere darpaṃ tu mā kṛthāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:5312: saṃtyajya kāmaṃ krodhaṃ ca lobhaṃ mohaṃ madaṃ tathā // NarP_1,30.103 //
GP12nardp1_u:5313: parāpavādaṃ nindāṃ ca bhajadhvaṃ bhaktito harim /
GP12nardp1_u:5316: yāvannāyāti maraṇaṃ yāvannāyāti vai jarā // NarP_1,30.105 //
GP12nardp1_u:5324: bhaktyā yajati yo viṣṇuṃ mahāpātakavānapi // NarP_1,30.109 //
GP12nardp1_u:5325: so 'pi yāti paraṃ sthānaṃ yatragha gatvā na śocati /
GP12nardp1_u:5326: sarvatīrthāni yajñāśca sāṃgā vedāśca sattama // NarP_1,30.110 //
GP12nardp1_u:5328: kiṃ vai vedairmakhaiḥ śāstraiḥ kiṃvā tīrthaniṣevaṇaiḥ // NarP_1,30.111 //
GP12nardp1_u:5330: yajanti ye viṣṇumanantamṛrtiṃ nirīkṣya cākāragataṃ vareṇyam /
GP12nardp1_u:5331: vedāntavedyaṃ bhavarogavaidyaṃ te yānti martyāḥ padamacyutasya // NarP_1,30.113 //
GP12nardp1_u:5333: jyotiḥ svarupaṃ paramacyutākhyaṃ smṛtvā samabhyeti naraḥ sakhāyam // NarP_1,30.114 //
GP12nardp1_u:5334: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde prāyaścittavidhirnāma ghatriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:5343: ye narā dānaśīlāstu te yānti sukhino dvija /
GP12nardp1_u:5344: dharmaśūnyā narā yānti duḥkhena bhṛśamarditāḥ // NarP_1,31.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:5346: kradanto vistaraṃ dīnāḥ pāpino yānti tatpathi // NarP_1,31.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:5350: kvacidvai dāvarupeṇaḥ tīkṣṇadhārāḥ śilāḥ kvacit // NarP_1,31.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:5354: śarkarāśca tathā loṣṭāḥ sūcītulyāśca kaṇṭakāḥ // NarP_1,31.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:5356: kvacivdyāvrāśca garjante vardhante ca kvacijjvarāḥ // NarP_1,31.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:5362: vahṝntaścāyasāṃ bhāraṃ śiśrāgreṇa prayānti vai // NarP_1,31.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:5364: karṇābhyāṃ ca tathā kecidvahṝnto yānti pāpinaḥ // NarP_1,31.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:5368: śocantaḥ svāni karmaṇi jñānājñānakṛtāni ca // NarP_1,31.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:5369: ye tu nārada dharmiṣṭhā dānaśīlā subuddhayaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:5371: annadāstu munuśreṣṭha bhuñjantaḥ svādu yānti vai /
GP12nardp1_u:5384: anaḍuddo muniśreṣṭha yānāruḍhaḥ prayāti vai // NarP_1,31.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:5386: tāṃbūlado naro yāti prahṛṣṭor dhamamandiram // NarP_1,31.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:5388: sa yāti parituṣṭātmā pūjyamāno divisthitaiḥ // NarP_1,31.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:5395: evaṃ dharmaparā yānti sukhaṃ dharmasya mandiram /
GP12nardp1_u:5400: manuṣathya janma yaḥ prāpya sukṛtaṃ na karoti ca // NarP_1,31.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:5401: sa eva pāpināṃ śreṣṭha ātmaghātaṃ karoti ca /
GP12nardp1_u:5402: anityaṃ prāpya mānuṣyaṃ nityaṃ yastu na sādhayet // NarP_1,31.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:5406: sarveṣu prāṇinaḥ śreṣṭhāsteṣu vai buddhijīvinaḥ // NarP_1,31.34 //

GP12nardp1_u:5863: na gṛhṇāti na tyajati vāyumantarbahiḥ sthitam /
GP12nardp1_u:5864: viddhi tacchūnyakaṃ nāma prāṇāyāmaṃ yathāsthitam // NarP_1,33.126 //
GP12nardp1_u:5866: anyathā khalu jāyante mahārogā bhayaṅkarāḥ // NarP_1,33.127 //
GP12nardp1_u:5870: samāmāhṛtya nigṛhṇāti pratyāhārastu sa smṛtaḥ // NarP_1,33.129 //
GP12nardp1_u:5874: mūḍhātmānaṃ ca taṃ vidyāddhyānaṃ cāsya na sidhyati // NarP_1,33.131 //
GP12nardp1_u:5888: dhyānaṃ kṛtvā muhurttaṃ vā paraṃ mokṣaṃ labhennaraḥ // NarP_1,33.138 //
GP12nardp1_u:5892: tena dhyānena tuṣṭātmā harirmokṣaṃ dadāti vai // NarP_1,33.140 //
GP12nardp1_u:5894: dhyānaṃ dhyeyaṃ dhyātṛbhāvaṃ yathā naśyati nirbharam // NarP_1,33.141 //
GP12nardp1_u:5899: yogī samādhyavasthāyāṃ na śṛṇoti na paśyati /
GP12nardp1_u:5900: na jighrati na spṛśati na kiñcadvakti sattama // NarP_1,33.144 //
GP12nardp1_u:5906: tannāśe nirmalaṃ brahma prakāśayati paṇḍitaṃ // NarP_1,33.147 //
GP12nardp1_u:5910: paśyanti yajjñānavidāṃ variṣṭāḥ parātparasmātparamaṃ pavitram // NarP_1,33.149 //
GP12nardp1_u:5914: ānandaṃ nirmalaśāntaṃ paraṃ brahmeti gīyate // NarP_1,33.151 //
GP12nardp1_u:5916: avikāramajaṃ śuddhaṃ paraṃ brahmeti gīyate // NarP_1,33.152 //
GP12nardp1_u:5925: vācyaṃ tu paramaṃ brahma vācakaḥ praṇavaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:5928: tadabhyāsena saṃyuktāḥ paraṃ mokṣaṃ labhanti ca // NarP_1,33.158 //
GP12nardp1_u:5937: iti śrībṛnnāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde yoganirupaṇaṃ nāma trayastriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:5942: yasya tuṣyati sarveśastasya bhaktiśca śāśvatam // NarP_1,34.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:5947: bhaja sarvātmanā vipra yadi muktimabhīpsasi // NarP_1,34.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:5948: ripavastaṃ na hiṃsanti na bādhante grahāścatam /
GP12nardp1_u:5949: rākṣasāśca na cekṣante naraṃ viṣṇuparāyaṇam // NarP_1,34.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:5952: pādau tau saphalau puṃsāṃ yau viṣṇugṛhagāminau /
GP12nardp1_u:5953: tau karau laphalau jñeyau viṣṇupūjāparau tu yau // NarP_1,34.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:5954: te netre suphale puṃsāṃ paśyato ye danārdanam /
GP12nardp1_u:5955: sā jihvā procyate sadbhirharināmaparā tu yā // NarP_1,34.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:5957: tattvaṃ gurusamaṃ nārita nata devaḥ keśavātparaḥ // NarP_1,34.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:5958: satyaṃ vacmihitaṃ vācmi sāraṃ vacmi punaḥ punaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:5962: tanmanaḥ saṃyutaṃ viṣṇau sā vāṇī yatparāyaṇā /
GP12nardp1_u:5965: ākāśamadhyagaṃ devaṃ bhaja nārada saṃtatam // NarP_1,34.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:5966: sthānaṃ na śakyate yasya svarupaṃ vā kadācana /
GP12nardp1_u:5975: parabrahmamayo devaḥ suṣutpa iti gīyate // NarP_1,34.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:5979: vartate yasya tasyaiva tuṣyate jagatāṃ patiḥ // NarP_1,34.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:5982: satkathāyāṃ ca ramate satkathāṃ ca karoti yaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:5983: satsaṅgo nirahaṃ kārastasya prīto ramāpatiḥ // NarP_1,34.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:5985: karoti satataṃ yastu tasya prīto hyadhokṣajaḥ // NarP_1,34.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:5987: tasyāstuṣṭo jagannātho dadāti svapadaṃ mune // NarP_1,34.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:5991: mā kuruṣva hyahaṅkāraṃ vidyullolaśriyā vṛthā // NarP_1,34.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:5994: kiṃ na paśyasi devarṣe hyāyuṣārddhaṃ tu nidrayā /
GP12nardp1_u:5995: hataṃ ca bhojanādyaiśca kiyadāyuḥ samāhṛtam // NarP_1,34.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:6000: mā vināśaṃ vraja mune magnaḥ saṃsāragahvare /
GP12nardp1_u:6003: kimarthaṃ śāśvatadhiyā kuryātpāpaṃ naro vṛthā // NarP_1,34.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:6005: viśvāso nātra karttavyo niścitaṃ mṛtyusaṃkule // NarP_1,34.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:6014: mānuṣyaṃ durlabhaṃ prāpya yo hariṃ nārcayetsakṛt /
GP12nardp1_u:6016: durlabhaṃ prāpya mānuṣyaṃ nārcayanti ca ye harim /
GP12nardp1_u:6017: teṣāmatīva mūrkhāṇāṃ vivekaḥ kutra tiṣṭhati // NarP_1,34.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:6025: tathaḥā carācaraṃ viśvaṃ viṣṇāviva pralīyate // NarP_1,34.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:6028: janmano maraṇaṃ nṝṇāṃ janma vai mṛtyusādhanam /
GP12nardp1_u:6029: ubhe te nikaṭe viddhi tannāśo harisevayā // NarP_1,34.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:6030: dhyātaḥ smṛtaḥ pūjito vā praṇato vā janārdanaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6033: yaṃ samabhyarcya viprarṣe mokṣabhāgī bhavennaraḥ // NarP_1,34.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:6035: harināmni sthite lokaḥ saṃsāre parivarttate // NarP_1,34.48 //
GP12nardp1_u:6047: bhūyo bhūyo hitaṃ vacmi bhujamuddhṛtya nārada /
GP12nardp1_u:6054: narakāṇāṃ sādhanaṃ ca tasmāttadapi saṃtyajet // NarP_1,34.57 //
GP12nardp1_u:6058: viṣṇau sthite jagannāthe na bhajanti madoddhatāḥ // NarP_1,34.59 //
GP12nardp1_u:6060: saṃsārasāgare magnāḥ kathaṃ pāraṃ prayānti hi // NarP_1,34.60 //
GP12nardp1_u:6062: naśyanti sakalā rogāḥ satyaṃ satyaṃ vadāmyaham // NarP_1,34.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:6064: itīrayanti ye nityaṃ te vai sarvatra vanditāḥ // NarP_1,34.62 //
GP12nardp1_u:6065: adyāpi ca muniśreṣṭa brahmādyā api devatāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6066: yatprābhāvaṃ na jānanti taṃ yāhi śaraṇaṃ mune // NarP_1,34.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:6068: hṛtpadmasaṃsthitaṃ viṣṇuṃ na vijānanti nārada // NarP_1,34.64 //
GP12nardp1_u:6070: hariḥ śraddhāvatāṃ tuṣyenna dhanairna ca bāndhavaiḥ // NarP_1,34.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:6076: haripūjāratānāṃ tu bhavatyena na saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,34.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:6084: cauryeṇa rakṣitamiva viddhi lokeṣu niścitam // NarP_1,34.72 //
GP12nardp1_u:6088: hari bhakti yutā daivī taddhīnā hyāsurī mahā // NarP_1,34.74 //
GP12nardp1_u:6090: śreṣṭhāḥ sarvatra vikhyātā yato bhaktiḥ sudurlabhā // NarP_1,34.75 //
GP12nardp1_u:6092: kāmādirahitā ye ca teṣāṃ tuṣyati keśavaḥ // NarP_1,34.76 //
GP12nardp1_u:6095: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde haribhaktilakṣaṇaṃ nāma catustriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:6098: paṭhatāṃ śuṇvatāṃ sadyaḥ pāparāśiḥ praṇaśyati // NarP_1,35.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:6109: karmaṇā manasā vācā yo yajedbhaktito harim /
GP12nardp1_u:6110: sa yāti paramaṃ sthānaṃ sarvalokottamottamam // NarP_1,35.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:6114: yasya śravaṇamātreṇa vācimedha phalaṃ labhet // NarP_1,35.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:6121: tapasāṃ vikrayaṃ cakre vratānāṃ vikrayaṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:6123: kālena gacchatā vipra jātau tasya sutāvubho /
GP12nardp1_u:6137: jīryanti jīryataḥ keśāḥ dantā jīryanti jīryataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6138: cakṣuḥśrotre ca jīryete tṛṣṇekā taruṇāyate // NarP_1,35.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:6140: balaṃ hataṃ ca jarasā tṛṣṇā taruṇatāṃ gatā // NarP_1,35.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:6141: kaṣṭāśā varttate yasya sa vidrānatha paṇḍitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6145: balaṃ tejoḥ yaśaśvaiva vidyāṃ mānaṃ ca vṛddhatām /
GP12nardp1_u:6146: tathaiva satkule janma āśā hatyativegataḥ // NarP_1,35.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:6150: avamānādikaṃ duḥkhaṃ na jānanti kadāpyaho // NarP_1,35.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:6152: śarīramapi jīrṇaṃ ca jarasāpahataṃ balam // NarP_1,35.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:6154: evaṃ niścitya viprendra dharmamārga rato 'bhavat // NarP_1,35.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:6156: svayaṃ tu bhāga dvitaya svārjitārthādapāharat // NarP_1,35.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:6160: annādīnāṃ ca dānāni gaṅgātīre cakāra saḥ // NarP_1,35.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:6162: nāranārāyaṇa sthānaṃ jagāma tapase vanam // NarP_1,35.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:6167: śiṣyaiḥ parivṛtaṃ tatra muniṃ jānanti saṃjñakam /
GP12nardp1_u:6168: gṛṇantaṃ paramaṃ brahma tejorāśiṃ dadarśa ha // NarP_1,35.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:6174: vinayāvanato bhūtvā provāca vadatāṃ varam // NarP_1,35.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:6182: bhaja viṣṇuṃ paraṃ nityaṃ smara nārāyaṇaṃ prabhum /
GP12nardp1_u:6183: parāpavādaṃ paiśunyaṃ kadācidapi mā kṛthāḥ // NarP_1,35.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:6186: kāmaṃ krodhaṃ ca lobhaṃ ca mohaṃ ca madamatsarau /
GP12nardp1_u:6188: asūyāṃ paranindāṃ ca kadācidapi mā kuru /
GP12nardp1_u:6190: dayāṃ kuruṣva bhuteṣu śuśrūṣāṃ ca tathā satām /
GP12nardp1_u:6191: tvayā kṛtāṃśca dharmānvai mā prakāśaya pucchatām // NarP_1,35.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:6201: mārgaśobhāṃ ca dīpaṃ ca viṣṇorāyatane kuru // NarP_1,35.52 //
GP12nardp1_u:6205: vedāntapaṭhanaṃ caiva pratyahaṃ kuru śaktitaḥ // NarP_1,35.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:6211: ko 'haṃ mama kriyā keti svayameva vyaktintayat // NarP_1,35.57 //
GP12nardp1_u:6212: mama janma kathaṃ jātaṃ rūpaṃ kīdṛgvidhaṃ mama /
GP12nardp1_u:6218: ko 'haṃ mama kriyā kā ca mama janma kathaṃ vada // NarP_1,35.60 //
GP12nardp1_u:6220: satyaṃ satyaṃ mahābhāgaṃ cittaṃ bhrātaṃ suniścitam /
GP12nardp1_u:6223: ahṝṅkāro manodharma ātmano nahi paṇḍita // NarP_1,35.62 //
GP12nardp1_u:6224: punaśca ko 'hamityuktaṃ vedamāle tvayā tu yat /
GP12nardp1_u:6225: mama jātyādi śūnyasya kathaṃ nāma karomyaham // NarP_1,35.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:6229: avicchinnasvabhāvasya kathyate ca kathaṃ kriyā // NarP_1,35.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:6231: anantasya kriyā caiva kathaṃ janma ca kathyate // NarP_1,35.66 //
GP12nardp1_u:6235: jñāne tvanāhate siddhe sarvaṃ brahmamayaṃ bhavet // NarP_1,35.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:6241: guruṃ praṇamya jānanti sadā dhyānaparo 'bhavat // NarP_1,35.71 //
GP12nardp1_u:6246: iti śrībṛhannārādīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde jñānanirūpaṇa nāma pañcatriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:6249: yajñamālī sumālī ca tayoḥ karmādhunocyata // NarP_1,36.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:6251: dhanaṃ dvidhā kaniṣṭasya bhāgamekaṃ dadau tadā // NarP_1,36.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:6252: sumālī ca dhanaṃ sarvaṃ vyasanābhirakataḥ sadā /
GP12nardp1_u:6253: apādānā dibhiścaiva nāśayāmāsa bho dvija // NarP_1,36.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:6269: ādade svayamarddhaṃ ca dadāvarddhaṃ yavīyase // NarP_1,36.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:6274: bhrātrā dattaṃ dhanaṃ tañca sumālī nāśayanmune /
GP12nardp1_u:6277: rājñāpi bādhito vipraprapede nirjanaṃ vanam // NarP_1,36.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:6289: yajñamālī sumālī ca hyekakāle mṛtāvubhau // NarP_1,36.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:6291: hariḥ saṃpreṣayāmāsa vimānaṃ pārṣadā vṛtam // NarP_1,36.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:6301: krośantaṃ ca sudantaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā manasi vivyathe // NarP_1,36.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:6305: asau sumālī bhrātā te pāpātmeti samabruvan // NarP_1,36.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:6307: manasā duḥkhamāpannaḥ punaḥ papraccha nārada // NarP_1,36.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:6309: tadupāyaṃbadadhvaṃ me yūyaṃ hi mamabāndhavāḥ // NarP_1,36.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:6311: satāṃ sāptapadī maitrī satsatāṃ tripadī tathā // NarP_1,36.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:6312: satsatāmapi ye saṃtasteṣāṃ maitraghī pade pade // NarP_1,36.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:6313: tasmānme bāndhavā yūyaṃ māṃ netuṃ samupāgatāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6314: yato 'yaṃ mama bhrātāpi mucyate tadihocyatām // NarP_1,36.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:6322: purā tvaṃ vaiśyajātīyo nāmnā viśvaṅghabharaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6323: tvayā kṛtāni pāpāni ahantyagaṇitāni vai // NarP_1,36.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:6327: tadā vṛṣṭirabhūttatra tatsthānaṃ paṅkilaṃ hyabhūta // NarP_1,36.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:6331: daṃśitaścaiva sarpeṇa prāptaṃ pañcatvameva ca // NarP_1,36.42,1 //
GP12nardp1_u:6333: viprajanma tvayā prāptaṃ hari bhaktistathācalā // NarP_1,36.42,2 //
GP12nardp1_u:6335: vasādya jñānamāsādya paraṃ mokṣaṃ gamiṣyasi // NarP_1,36.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:6337: upāyaṃ tava vakṣyāmastaṃ nibodha mahāmate // NarP_1,36.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:6341: tatphalaṃ pradadau tasmai bhrātre pāpavimuktaye // NarP_1,36.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:6343: babhūva yamadūtāstu taṃ tyaktvā prapalāyitāḥ // NarP_1,36.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:6345: tadā sumālī svaryānamāruhya mumude mune // NarP_1,36.48 //
GP12nardp1_u:6355: sthitvā bhūmiṃ punaḥ prāpya vipratvaṃ samupāgataḥ // NarP_1,36.53 //
GP12nardp1_u:6359: tatra snātaśca gaṅgāyāṃ dṛṣṭvā viśveśvaraṃ prabhum // NarP_1,36.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:6363: akāmādapi ye viṣṇoḥ sakṛtpūjāṃ prakurvate // NarP_1,36.57 //
GP12nardp1_u:6370: śuśrūṣāniratā yānti pāpino 'pi parāṃ gatim // NarP_1,36.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:6371: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde viṣṇusevāprabhāvo nāma ṣaṭtriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:6374: kasya no jāyate prītiḥ śrotuṃ harikathāmṛtam // NarP_1,37.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:6377: sakṛdvā na namedyastu viṣṇuṃ pāpaharaṃ nṛṇām /
GP12nardp1_u:6380: śmaśānasadṛśaṃ taddhi kadācidapi no viśet // NarP_1,37.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:6383: yo vā ko vāpi viprendra vipradveṣaparāyaṇaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6384: samarcayati govindaṃ tatpūjā viphalā bhavet // NarP_1,37.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:6386: sā pūjaiva mahābhāga pūjakānāśu hṝnti vai // NarP_1,37.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:6392: dṛḍhabhaktimatāṃ viṣṇau pāpabuddhiḥ kathaṃ bhavet // NarP_1,37.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:6394: kṣayaṃ yāti kṣaṇādeva teṣāṃ syātpāpadhīḥ katham // NarP_1,37.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:6396: caṇḍālā api vai śreṣṭhā haribhaktiparāyaṇāḥ // NarP_1,37.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:6402: sa snātaḥ sarvatīrtheṣu viṣṇoḥ priyataro bhavet // NarP_1,37.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:6406: ye prapannā mahātmānasteṣāṃ muktirhi śāśvatī // NarP_1,37.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:6416: na teṣāṃ śakyate vaktuṃ saṃkhyā vatsarakoṭibhiḥ // NarP_1,37.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:6422: chaditaṃ hemakalaśairdṛṣṭvā vyādho mudaṃ yayau // NarP_1,37.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:6428: cauryāntarāyakartāraṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā lubdhako mune // NarP_1,37.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:6432: hṝntuṃ kṛtamatiṃ vyādhamuttaṅkaḥ prekṣya cābravīt // NarP_1,37.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:6434: bho bho sādho vṛthā māṃ tvaṃ haniṣyasi nirāgasam /
GP12nardp1_u:6435: mayā kimaparāddhaṃ te tadvadasva mahāmatte // NarP_1,37.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:6437: nahi saumya vṛthā ghnanti sajjanā api pāpinaḥ // NarP_1,37.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:6439: virodhaṃ nahi kurvanti sajjanāḥ śāntacetasaḥ // NarP_1,37.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:6441: tamuttamaṃ naraṃ prāhurviṣṇoḥ priyataraṃ sadā // NarP_1,37.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:6443: chede 'pi candanataruḥ surabhayati mukhaṃ kuṭhārasya // NarP_1,37.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:6444: aho vidhiḥ subalavānbā dhate bahudhā janān /
GP12nardp1_u:6446: aho niṣkāraṇaṃ loke bādhante bahudhā janān /
GP12nardp1_u:6454: ante tatsarvamutsṛjya eka eva prayati vai // NarP_1,37.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:6455: mama mātā mama pitā mama bhāryā mamātmajāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6456: mamedamiti jantūnāṃ mamatā bādhate vṛthā // NarP_1,37.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:6460: mṛtamagnimukhe hutvā ghṛtānnaṃ bhuñjate hi te // NarP_1,37.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:6461: gacchantaṃ paralokaṃ ca naraṃ tu hyanutiṣṭataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6462: dharmādharmauṃ na ca dhanaṃ na putrā na ca bāndhavāḥ // NarP_1,37.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:6465: vṛthaiva vyākulā lokā dhanādānāṃ sadārjane // NarP_1,37.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:6467: iti niścitabuddhīnāṃ na cintā bādhate kvacit // NarP_1,37.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:6469: tasmājjanma ca mṛtyuṃ ca daivaṃ jānāti nāparaḥ // NarP_1,37.48 //
GP12nardp1_u:6470: yatra kutra sthitasyāpi yadbhāvyaṃ tadbhaved dhruvam /
GP12nardp1_u:6471: lokastu tatra vijñāya vṛthāyāsaṃ karoti hi // NarP_1,37.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:6474: arjitaṃ ca dhanaṃ sarvaṃ bhuñjate bāndhavāḥ sadā /
GP12nardp1_u:6477: gulikaḥ prāñjaliḥ prāha kṣamasveti punaḥ punaḥ // NarP_1,37.52 //
GP12nardp1_u:6480: mayā kṛtā ni pāpāni mahānti subahūni ca /
GP12nardp1_u:6481: tāni sarvāṇi naṣṭāni viprendra tava darśanāt // NarP_1,37.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:6483: kathaṃ me niṣkṛtir bhūyo yāmi kaṃ śaraṇaṃ vibhoḥ // NarP_1,37.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:6485: atrāpi pāpajālāni kṛtvā kāṃ gatimāpnuyām // NarP_1,37.56 //
GP12nardp1_u:6486: aho mamāyuḥ kṣayameti śīghraṃ pāpānyanekāni samarjjitāni /
GP12nardp1_u:6487: prātikriyā naiva kṛtā mayaiṣāṃ gatiśca kā syānmamajanma kiṃ vā // NarP_1,37.57 //
GP12nardp1_u:6488: aho vidhiḥ pāpaśatā kulaṃ māṃ kiṃ sṛṣṭavānpāpataraṃ ca śaśvat /
GP12nardp1_u:6489: kathaṃ ca yatpāpaphalaṃ hi bhokṣye kiyatsu janmasvahamugrakarmā // NarP_1,37.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:6492: uttaṅkaḥ patitaṃ prekṣya lubagdhakaṃ taṃ dayāparaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6502: prāpito 'smi tvayā tasmāttadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam // NarP_1,37.64 //
GP12nardp1_u:6504: tasmānnato 'smi te vidvanmatkṛtaṃ tatkṣamasva ca // NarP_1,37.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:6506: pradakṣiṇātrayaṃ kṛtvā namaskāraṃ cakāra saḥ // NarP_1,37.66 //
GP12nardp1_u:6512: vareṇa tenoktaṅko 'pi prapede paramaṃ padam // NarP_1,37.69 //
GP12nardp1_u:6519: pādodakasya māhātmyaṃ dṛṣṭvā tuṣṭāva bhaktitaḥ // NarP_1,38.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:6522: cakrābjaśārṅgīsidharaṃ mahāntaṃ smṛtārtinighnaṃ śaraṇaṃ prapadye // NarP_1,38.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:6523: yannibhijābja prabhavo vidhātā sṛjatyamuṃ lokasamuñcayaṃ ca /
GP12nardp1_u:6524: yatkrodhajo hṝnti jagañca rudrastamādidevaṃ praṇato 'smi viṣṇum // NarP_1,38.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:6526: vedāntavedyaṃ pukuṣaṃ purāṇaṃ taijonidhiṃ viṣṇumahaṃ prapannaḥ // NarP_1,38.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:6528: jñānaikavedyo bhagavānanādiḥ prasīdatāṃ vyaṣṭisa praṣṭirupaḥ // NarP_1,38.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:6530: nityaḥ prapannārti haraḥ parātmā dayāṃbudhirme varadastu bhaghūyāt // NarP_1,38.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:6532: tvameva tatsarvamanantasāraṃ tvattaḥ paraṃ nāsti yataḥ parātman // NarP_1,38.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:6534: nirañjanaṃ nirmalamaprameyaṃ paśyanti santaḥ paramārthasaṃjñam // NarP_1,38.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:6536: tathaiva sarveṣvara eka eva pradṛśyate bhinna ivārivalātmā // NarP_1,38.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:6538: ta eva māyārahitāstadeva pasaayanti sarvātmakamātmarupam // NarP_1,38.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:6550: indriyāṇi mano buddhiḥ sattvaṃ tejo balaṃ dhṛtiḥ // NarP_1,38.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:6554: ye prapannā mahātmānasteṣāṃ muktirhi śāśvatī // NarP_1,38.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:6555: varaṃ vareṇyaṃ varadaṃ purāṇaṃ sanātanaṃ sarvagataṃ samastam /
GP12nardp1_u:6556: nato 'smi bhūyo 'pi nato 'smi bhūyo 'pi nato 'smi bhūyaḥ // NarP_1,38.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:6558: yannāma duṣkarmanivāraṇāyacaya tamaprameyaṃ puruṣaṃ bhajāmi // NarP_1,38.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:6566: viṣṇusaṃjñaṃ jagaddhāma tamasmi śaraṇaṃ gataḥ // NarP_1,38.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:6567: yaṃ bhajanti kriyāniṣṭāyaṃ paśyanti ca yoginaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6568: pūjyātpūjyataraṃ śāntaṃ gato 'smi śaraṇaṃ prabhum // NarP_1,38.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:6569: yaṃ na paśyanti vidvāṃso ya etadvyāvya tiṣṭati /
GP12nardp1_u:6575: sarvajñaṃ sarvagaṃ śāntaṃ sarvāntayā miṇaṃ harim /
GP12nardp1_u:6576: jñānātmakaṃ jñānanidhiṃ jñānasaṃsthaṃ vibhuṃ bhaje // NarP_1,38.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:6582: yaḥ pāti lokānparipūrṇabhāvastamaprameyaṃ śaraṇaṃ prapadye // NarP_1,38.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:6583: sahasraśīrṣaṃ ca sahasrapādaṃ sahasrabāhuḥ ca sahasranetram /
GP12nardp1_u:6588: vijñānabhedaṃ pratipannakalpaṃ na vāṅmayaṃ prāṇamayaṃ bhajāmi // NarP_1,38.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:6589: na yasya rūpaṃ na balaprabhāvo na yasya karmāṇi na yatpramāṇam /
GP12nardp1_u:6590: jānanti devā kamalodbhavādyastoṣyāmyahaṃ taṃ kathamātmarūpam // NarP_1,38.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:6591: saṃsārasidhau patitaṃ kadaryaṃ mohākulaṃ kāmaśatena baddham /
GP12nardp1_u:6592: akīrtibhājaṃ piśunaṃ kṛtaghnaṃ sadāśuciṃ pāparataṃ pramanyum /
GP12nardp1_u:6593: dayāṃbudhe pāhi bhayākulaṃ māṃ punaḥ punastvāṃ śaraṇaṃ prapadye // NarP_1,38.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:6607: varaṃ vṛṇuṣva vatseti provāca munipuṅgavam // NarP_1,38.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:6608: asādhyaṃ nāsti kiñcitte prasanne mayi sattama /
GP12nardp1_u:6610: punaḥ praṇamya taṃ prāha devadevaṃ janārddanam // NarP_1,38.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:6611: kiṃ māṃ mohayasīśa tvaṃ kimanyairdeva me varaiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6613: kīṭeṣu pakṣiṣu mṛgeṣu sarīsṛpeṣu rakṣaḥ piśācamanujeṣvapi yatra tatrajajātasya me bhavatu keśava te prasāddāttvayyeva bhaktiracalāvyabhicāraṇī ca // NarP_1,38.48 //
GP12nardp1_u:6614: evamastviti lokeśaḥ śaṅkhaprāntena saṃspṛśan divyajñānaṃ dadau tasmai yogināmapidurlamabhagham // NarP_1,38.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:6615: puḥ stuvantaṃ viprendraṃ devadevo janārddanaḥ idamāha smitamukho hastaṃ tacchirasi nyasan // NarP_1,38.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:6618: tvayā kṛtamidaṃ stotraṃ yaḥ paṭhetsatataṃ naraḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6627: āvāpa duravāpaṃ vai tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam // NarP_1,38.56 //
GP12nardp1_u:6628: pūjito namito vāpi saṃsmṛto vāpi mokṣadaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6633: so 'pi sarvāghanirmuktaḥ prayāti bhavanaṃ hareḥ // NarP_1,38.59 //
GP12nardp1_u:6634: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde viṣṇumāhātmyaṃ nāmāṣṭatriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:6639: śṛṇvatāṃ vadatāṃ caiva tadbhaktānāṃ viśeṣataḥ // NarP_1,39.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:6643: durvṛttā vā suvṛttā vā tebhyo nityaṃ namonamaḥ // NarP_1,39.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:6646: dṛṣṭaḥ smṛtaḥ pūjito vā dhyātaḥ praṇamito 'pi vā /
GP12nardp1_u:6649: cintayedyo harernāma tasmai nityaṃ namo namaḥ // NarP_1,39.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:6651: yeṣāṃ muktiḥ karasthaiva yogināmapi durlabhā // NarP_1,39.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:6653: vadatāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ caiva sarvapāpa praṇāśanam // NarP_1,39.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:6660: sa tatra nṛpaśārdūlaḥ sadā saṃmārjane rataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6672: tanme vada mahābhāga kiṃ tvayā viditaṃ phalam // NarP_1,39.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:6676: tathāpi kiṃ mahābhāga etayoḥ satatodyataḥ // NarP_1,39.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:6677: sarvātmanā mahāpuṇyaṃ nareśa vidita ca yat /
GP12nardp1_u:6678: tad brūhi me guhyatamaṃ prītirmayi tavāsti cet // NarP_1,39.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:6687: piśuno niṣṭhuraścaiva hyapaṇyānāṃ ca vikrayī // NarP_1,39.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:6690: sa kadāciddharthaṃ tu pṛthivyāṃ paryaṭan dvijaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6692: tasminmṛte tasya bhāryā nāmnā bandhumatī mune /
GP12nardp1_u:6693: kāmacāraparā sā tu parityaktā ca bandhubhiḥ // NarP_1,39.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:6697: gāvaśca viprā bahavo nihatā mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ // NarP_1,39.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:6701: kadācitkāmasaṃtapto gantu kāmo ratiṃ striyaḥ // NarP_1,39.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:6702: śūnyaṃ viṣṇugṛhaṃ dṛṣṭvā praviṣṭaśca striyā saha /
GP12nardp1_u:6703: niśi rāmopabhogārthaṃ śayitaṃ tatra kāminā // NarP_1,39.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:6709: evaṃ sthite viṣṇugṛhe hyāgatāḥ purapālakāḥ // NarP_1,39.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:6710: jāro 'yamiti māṃ tāṃ ca hatavantaḥ prasahya vai /
GP12nardp1_u:6711: āvāṃ nihatya te sarve nivṛttāḥ purakṣakāḥ // NarP_1,39.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:6717: tatra sthitvā brahmakalpaśataṃ sāgraṃ dvijottama // NarP_1,39.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:6719: tataśca bhūmibhāgeṣu devayogeṣu vai kramāt // NarP_1,39.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:6723: bhaktyā kurvanti ye saṃtasteṣāṃ puṇyaṃ na vedyaham // NarP_1,39.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:6725: yatiṣye parayā bhaktyā hyahaṃ jātismaro yataḥ // NarP_1,39.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:6729: bhaktibhadbhiḥ praśāntaiśca kiṃ punaḥ samyagarcanāt // NarP_1,39.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:6734: anityā bāndhavāḥ sarve vibhavo naiva śāśvataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6735: nityaṃ sannihito mṛtyuḥ kartavyo dharmasaṃgrahaḥ // NarP_1,39.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:6736: ajño loko vṛthā garvaṃ kariṣyati mahoddhataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6743: sarvabhūtadayā vāpi sulabhā yasya kasya cit // NarP_1,39.53 //
GP12nardp1_u:6745: durlabhaṃ prāpyaṃ mānuṣyaṃ na tathā gamayed budhaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6749: bhrātarāśraya govindaṃ mā vilaṃbaṃ kuru priya /
GP12nardp1_u:6750: āsannameva nagaraṃ kṛtāntasya hi dṛśyate // NarP_1,39.57 //
GP12nardp1_u:6754: ye prapannā mahātmānaste kṛtārthā na saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,39.59 //
GP12nardp1_u:6760: pānīyaṃ vā phalaṃ vāpi sa eva bhagavatpriyaḥ // NarP_1,39.62 //
GP12nardp1_u:6761: viṣṇubhaktiparāṇāṃ tu śuśrūṣāṃ kurvate tu ye /
GP12nardp1_u:6763: ye yañjati spṛhāśūnyā haribhaktān hariṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:6764: ta eva bhuvanaṃ sarvaṃ puṃnati svāṅghripāṃśunā // NarP_1,39.64 //
GP12nardp1_u:6767: pūjyamānā ca tulasī yasya tiṣṭati veśmani /
GP12nardp1_u:6770: na bādhante grahāstatra bhūtavetāla kādayaḥ // NarP_1,39.67 //
GP12nardp1_u:6776: sāṃgā vedāstathā sarve viṣṇorūpaṃ prakīrtitam // NarP_1,39.70 //
GP12nardp1_u:6778: te 'pi yānti paraṃ sthānaṃ sarvakarmanibarhaṇam // NarP_1,39.71 //
GP12nardp1_u:6779: iti bṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathama pāde viṣṇumāhātmyaṃ nāma ekonacatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:6781: ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi vibhūtiṃ vaiṣṇavīṃ mune /
GP12nardp1_u:6782: yāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ kīrtayatāṃ sadyaḥ pāpakṣayo bhavet // NarP_1,40.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:6789: atītabrahmaṇaḥ kalpe sṛṣṭiḥ kīdṛgvidhā prabho // NarP_1,40.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:6790: indrastu kīdṛśaḥ prokto vivudhāḥ kīdṛśāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6791: teṣāṃ ca kīdṛśaṃ karma yathāvadvaktumarhasi // NarP_1,40.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:6793: na jñāyate mayā śakra pūrvedyuścaritaṃ vidheḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6796: yo vijānāti taṃ te 'dya kathayāmi niśāmaya // NarP_1,40.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:6797: sudharma iti vikhyātaḥ kaścidāste pure tava /
GP12nardp1_u:6799: sa vā eta dvijānāti kathayāmi niśāmaya /
GP12nardp1_u:6803: dṛṣṭvā yathārhaṃ devarṣe pūjayāmāsa sādaram // NarP_1,40.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:6812: dānena vā tapobhirvā kathametādṛśaḥ prabho // NarP_1,40.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:6817: ekasmin divase śakra manavaśca caturdaśa // NarP_1,40.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:6819: indrāṇāṃ caiva sarveṣāṃ manvādīnāṃ ca vāsava // NarP_1,40.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:6820: tulyatā tejasā lakṣmyā prabhāveṇa balena ca /
GP12nardp1_u:6821: teṣāṃ nāmāni vakṣyāmi śṛṇuṣva susamāhitaḥ // NarP_1,40.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:6828: bhautyaścaturdaśaḥ prokta ete hi manavaḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6839: amitābhādayo devāḥ ṣaṣṭhe 'pi ca tathā śṛṇu /
GP12nardp1_u:6840: āryādyā vibudhāḥ proktāsteṣā mindro manojavaḥ // NarP_1,40.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:6848: vihṝṅgṝmādyā devāśca teṣāmindro vṛṣaḥ smṛtaḥ // NarP_1,40.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:6850: krabhuvanāmā ca devendro harinābhāstathā surāḥ // NarP_1,40.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:6853: caturdaśe cākṣupādyā devā indraḥ śuciḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6854: evaṃ te manavaḥ proktā indrā devāśca tattvataḥ // NarP_1,40.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:6857: karttāro bahavaḥ saṃti tatsaṃkhyāṃ vetti kovidaḥ // NarP_1,40.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:6858: mayi sthite brahmaloke brahmāṇāṃ bahavo gatāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6859: teṣāṃ saṃkhyā na saṃkhyātu śakto 'smyadya dvijottama // NarP_1,40.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:6863: tataḥ paraṃ gamiṣyāmi karmabhūmiṃ śṛṇuṣva me // NarP_1,40.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:6864: mayā kṛtaṃ purā karma vakṣyāmi tava suvrata /
GP12nardp1_u:6866: ahamāṃsa purā śakra gṛdhraḥ pāpo viśeṣataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6873: gataḥ pradakṣiṇā kāraṃ viṣṇostanmandiraṃ prabho // NarP_1,40.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:6875: mama cāpi śunaścāpi dattāvanparamaṃ padam // NarP_1,40.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:6877: saṃprāptaṃ vibudhaśreṣṭha kiṃ punaḥ samyagarcanāt // NarP_1,40.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:6884: kathaṃ bhavatyugrabhavasya bandhastatsaṅgalubdhā yadi muktibhājaḥ // NarP_1,40.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:6885: ye mānavāḥ pratidinaṃ parimuktasaṅgā nārāyaṇaṃ garuḍavāhanamarcayanti /
GP12nardp1_u:6886: te sarvapāpanikaraiḥ parito vimuktā viṣṇoḥ padaṃ śubhataraṃ pratiyānti hṛṣṭāḥ // NarP_1,40.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:6887: ye mānavā vigatarāgaparāvarajñā nārāyaṇaṃ suraguruṃ satataṃ smaranti /
GP12nardp1_u:6888: dhyānena tena hatakilbiṣacetanāste mātuḥ payodhararasaṃ na punaḥ pibanti // NarP_1,40.52 //
GP12nardp1_u:6890: te vā puṃnati ca jaganti śarīrasaṃgāt saṃbhāṣaṇādapi tato harireva pūjyaḥ // NarP_1,40.53 //
GP12nardp1_u:6892: tatraiva sakalaṃ bhadraṃ yathā nimne jalaṃ dvija // NarP_1,40.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:6896: pṛjyasya muniśreṣṭha paraṃ śreyo bhaviṣyati // NarP_1,40.56 //
GP12nardp1_u:6897: pūjayanti hariṃ ye tu niṣkāmāḥ śuddhamānasāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6898: teṣāṃ viṣṇuḥ prasannātmā sarvānkāmān prayacchati // NarP_1,40.57 //
GP12nardp1_u:6903: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge prathamapāde viṣṇumāhātmye catvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:6905: ākhyātaṃ bhavatā sarvaṃ mune tattvārtha kovida /
GP12nardp1_u:6911: tathā vināsamāyāti dharṃma eva mahītale // NarP_1,41.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:6912: kṛtaṃ tretā dvāparaṃ ca kaliśceti caturyugam /
GP12nardp1_u:6915: kālato veditavyāni ityuktaṃ tattvā darśibhiḥ // NarP_1,41.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:6917: tataśca dvāparaṃ prāhuḥ kalimantyaṃ viduḥ kramāt // NarP_1,41.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:6919: nāsankṛtayuge vipra sarve devasamāḥ smṛtāḥ // NarP_1,41.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:6920: sarve hṛṣṭāśca dharmiṣṭā na tatra krayavikrayau /
GP12nardp1_u:6921: vedānāṃ ca vibhāgaśca na yuge kṛtasaṃjñake // NarP_1,41.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:6933: haristu raktātāṃ yāti kiñcitkleśānvitā janāḥ // NarP_1,41.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:6936: dvipādo vartate dharmo dvāpare ca munīśvara /
GP12nardp1_u:6943: adharmasya prabhāveṇa kṣīyante ca prajāstathā // NarP_1,41.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:6945: kecitpuṇyaratān dṛṣṭvā asūyāṃ vipra kurvate // NarP_1,41.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:6947: dharmaḥ kaliyuge prāpte pādenaikena vartate // NarP_1,41.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:6949: yaḥ kaścidapi dharmātmā yajñācārānkaroti ca // NarP_1,41.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:6951: naraṃ dharmarataṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve 'sūyāṃ prakurvate // NarP_1,41.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:6955: prajāścālpāyuṣaḥ sarvā bhaviṣyanti kalau yuge // NarP_1,41.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:6958: kaliṃ vistarato brūhi tvaṃ hi dharmavidāṃ varaḥ // NarP_1,41.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:6960: kimāhārāḥ kimācārāḥ bhaviṣyanti kalau yuge // NarP_1,41.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:6967: ghore kaliyuge prāpte dvijā vedaparāṅmukhāḥ // NarP_1,41.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:6971: adharmalolupāḥ sarvale tathā vaitaṃhikā narāḥ // NarP_1,41.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:6972: ataḥ svalpāyuṣaḥ sarve bhaviṣyanti kalau yuge /
GP12nardp1_u:6975: vyātkrameṇa prajāḥ sarvā mniyante pāpatatparāḥ // NarP_1,41.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:6978: śūdratulyā bhaviṣyanti sarve varṇā kalau yuge /
GP12nardp1_u:6979: uttamā nīcatāṃ yānti nīcāścottamatāṃ tathā // NarP_1,41.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:6984: dviṣanti pitaraṃ putrā bhartāraṃ ca striyo 'khilāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:6987: ghore kaliyuge vipra sarve pāparatā janāḥ // NarP_1,41.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:6990: pṛthvī niṣphalatāṃ yāti bījaṃ puṣpaṃ vinaśyati /
GP12nardp1_u:6994: sādhūnāṃ vidhavānāṃ ca vittānya paharanti ca /
GP12nardp1_u:6995: na vratāni cariṣyanti brāhmaṇā dravyalolupāḥ // NarP_1,41.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:6997: dvijāḥ kurvanti daṃbhārthaṃ pitṛśrāddhādikāḥ kriyāḥ // NarP_1,41.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:6999: dugdhalobhanimittena goṣu prītiṃ ca kurvate // NarP_1,41.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:7000: na kurvanti tathā viprāḥ snānaśaucādikāḥ kriyāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7003: na kasyāpi mano vipra viṣṇubhaktiparaṃ bhavet // NarP_1,41.48 //
GP12nardp1_u:7006: dānahīnā narāḥ sarve ghore kaliyuge mune /
GP12nardp1_u:7033: bhaviṣyanti narā vipra kalau cādharmabāndhavāḥ // NarP_1,41.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:7035: ghore kaliyuge vipra pañcavarṣā prasūyate // NarP_1,41.64 //
GP12nardp1_u:7041: nidāṃ kurvanti satataṃ pitṛmātṛsuteṣu ca // NarP_1,41.67 //
GP12nardp1_u:7045: prapuṣyanti vṛthaivāmī na vicārya ca duṣkṛtam // NarP_1,41.69 //
GP12nardp1_u:7047: dharmakārye rataṃ caiva vṛthāviśraṃbhiṇo janāḥ // NarP_1,41.70 //
GP12nardp1_u:7049: śūdrā bhaikṣyaratāścaiva teṣāṃ śuśrūṣaṇe dvijāḥ // NarP_1,41.71 //
GP12nardp1_u:7050: na śiṣyo na guruḥ kaścinna putro lana pitā tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:7051: na bhāryā na patiścaiva bhavitāro 'tra saṃkare // NarP_1,41.72 //
GP12nardp1_u:7052: kalau gate bhaviṣyanti dhanāḍhyā api yācakāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7057: śūdravṛttyaiva jīvanti narakārhā dvijā mune // NarP_1,41.75 //
GP12nardp1_u:7063: kalau sarve bhaviṣyanti svalpabhāgyā bahuprajāḥ // NarP_1,41.78 //
GP12nardp1_u:7071: nidhāya hṛdyakarmaṇi prerayanti vacaḥ śubham // NarP_1,41.82 //
GP12nardp1_u:7078: yadā dvijā bhaviṣyanti tadā vṛddhiṃ kalirvrajet // NarP_1,41.86 //
GP12nardp1_u:7079: yadā prajā na yakṣyanti na hoṣyanti dvijātayaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7082: sarvadharmeṣu naṣṭeṣu yāti niḥśrīkatāṃ jagat // NarP_1,41.88 //
GP12nardp1_u:7083: evaṃ kaleḥ svarūpaṃ te kathitaṃ viprasattama /
GP12nardp1_u:7085: tataḥ paraṃ kṛtayuge tretāyuge tretāyāṃ dhyānameva ca /
GP12nardp1_u:7088: dvāpare yañca māsena hyahorātreṇa tatkalau // NarP_1,41.91 //
GP12nardp1_u:7090: yadāpnoti tadāpnoti kalau saṃkīrtya keśavam // NarP_1,41.92 //
GP12nardp1_u:7091: ahorātraṃ harernāma kīrtayanti ca ye narāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7092: kurvanti haripūjāṃ vā na kalirbādhate ca tān // NarP_1,41.93 //
GP12nardp1_u:7093: namo nārāyaṇāyeti kīrtayanti ca ye narāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7094: niṣkāmā vā sakāmā vā na kalirbādhate ca tān // NarP_1,41.94 //
GP12nardp1_u:7095: harināmaparā ye tu ghore kaliyuge dvija /
GP12nardp1_u:7096: ta eva kṛtakṛtyāśca na kalirbādhate hi tān // NarP_1,41.95//.
GP12nardp1_u:7098: ta eva śivatulyāśca nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // NarP_1,41.96 //
GP12nardp1_u:7100: ghore kaliyuge prāpte viṣṇuṃ dhyāyanna sīdati // NarP_1,41.97 //
GP12nardp1_u:7106: itīrayanti ye nityaṃ nahi tānbādhate kaliḥ // NarP_1,41.100 //
GP12nardp1_u:7108: iti jalpanti ye vāpi kalistānnāpi bādhate // NarP_1,41.101 //
GP12nardp1_u:7110: itthaṃ vadanti ye vipra te kṛtārthā na saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,41.102 //
GP12nardp1_u:7112: iti vāpyuñcarantīha na ca teṣāṃ kalerbhayam // NarP_1,41.103 //
GP12nardp1_u:7114: ghore kaliyuge vipra haribhaktastu durlabhā // NarP_1,41.104 //
GP12nardp1_u:7127: aho hariparā ye tu kalau ghore bhayaṅkare /
GP12nardp1_u:7128: te subhāgyā mahātmānaḥ satsaṃgara hitā api // NarP_1,41.111 //
GP12nardp1_u:7130: satyaṃ samastakarmāṇi yānti saṃpūrṇatāṃ dvija // NarP_1,41.112 //
GP12nardp1_u:7138: evaṃ sa nārado viprāḥ sanakena prabodhitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7142: prakāśitaṃ jagajjyotiḥ paraṃ brahma sanātanam // NarP_1,41.117 //
GP12nardp1_u:7147: tasmādyena yathā brahma pratītaṃ bodhitena tu /
GP12nardp1_u:7152: brahmannahaṃ dhyānaparo bhaveyaṃ sanandanaṃ pṛccha yathābhilāṣam /
GP12nardp1_u:7159: pralaye ca kamabhyeti tanme brūhi sanandana // NarP_1,42.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:7161: sabhūmiḥ sāgnipavano loko 'yaṃ kena nirmitaḥ // NarP_1,42.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:7163: śaucāśaucaṃ kathaṃ teṣāṃ dharmādharmavidhiḥ katham // NarP_1,42.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:7164: kīdṛśo jīvatāṃ jīvaḥ kva vā gacchanti ye mṛtāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7165: asmāllokādamuṃ lokaṃ sarvaṃ śaṃsatu me bhavān // NarP_1,42.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:7173: kathaṃ muktiśca saṃsārājjāyate tasya mānada // NarP_1,42.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:7175: sevyasevakabhāvena vartete iti tau sadā // NarP_1,42.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:7177: lokānāṃ ramaṇaḥ so 'yaṃ nirguṇaśca nirañjanaḥ // NarP_1,42.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:7181: jīvo jīvatvamullaṅghya kathaṃ brahma samanvayāt // NarP_1,42.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:7183: evaṃ sa bhagavānpṛṣṭo bharadvājena saṃśayam // NarP_1,42.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:7186: mānaso nāma yaḥ pūrvo viśruto ve maharṣibhiḥ // NarP_1,42.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:7189: yataḥ sṛṣṭāni bhūtāni jāyante ca mriyanti ca /
GP12nardp1_u:7190: so 'mṛjatprathamaṃ devo mahāntaṃ nāma nāmataḥ // NarP_1,42.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:7194: tatastejo mayaṃ divyaṃ padmaṃ sṛṣṭaṃ svayaṃbhuvā // NarP_1,42.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:7197: brahmā vai sa mahātejā ya ete pañca dhātavaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7198: śailāstasyāsthisaṃdhāstu medo masiṃ ca medinī // NarP_1,42.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:7201: agnīṣomau ca candrākārai nayane tasya viśrute /
GP12nardp1_u:7202: nabhaścordhvaśirastasya kṣitiḥ padau bhujau diśaḥ // NarP_1,42.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:7204: sa eṣa bhagavānviṣṇurananta iti viśrutaḥ // NarP_1,42.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:7207: tataḥ samabhavadviśvaṃ pṛṣṭo 'haṃ yadiha tvayā // NarP_1,42.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:7210: kānyatra parimāṇāni saṃśayaṃ chindhi tattvataḥ // NarP_1,42.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:7213: ramyaṃ nānāśrayākīrṇaṃ yasyāṃ to nādhigamyate // NarP_1,42.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:7215: tatra devāḥ svayaṃ dīptā bhāskarābhāgnivarcasaḥ // NarP_1,42.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:7216: te cāpyantaṃ na paśyanti nabhasaḥ prathitaujasaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7228: paṭhanti caiva munayaḥ śāstreṣu vividheṣu ca /
GP12nardp1_u:7229: trailokye sāgare caiva pramāṇaṃ vihitaṃ yathā // NarP_1,42.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:7230: adṛśyo yastvagamyo yaḥ kaḥ pramāṇa mudīrayet /
GP12nardp1_u:7231: siddhānāṃ devatānāṃ ca parimītā yadā gatiḥ // NarP_1,42.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:7234: yadā tu divyaṃ yadrūpaṃ hrasate varddhate punaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7239: puṣkaro yadi saṃbhūto jyeṣṭaṃ bhavati puṣkaram /
GP12nardp1_u:7240: brahmāṇaṃ pūrvajaṃ cāha bhavānsaṃdeha eva me // NarP_1,42.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:7245: tasya madhye sthito lokānsṛjatyeṣa jagadvidhiḥ // NarP_1,42.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:7247: prajāvisargaṃ vividhaṃ kathaṃ sa sṛjati prabhuḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7251: saṃrakṣaṇārthaṃ bhūtānāṃ sṛṣṭaṃ prathamato jalam // NarP_1,42.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:7253: yatprāṇāḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ varddhante yena ca prajāḥ // NarP_1,42.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:7255: pṛthivī parvatā meghā mūrtimantaśca ye pare /
GP12nardp1_u:7259: kathaṃ vā medinī sṛṣṭetyatra me saṃśayo mahān // NarP_1,42.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:7264: tyaktāhārāḥ sparddhamānā divyaṃ virṣaśataṃ dvijāḥ // NarP_1,42.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:7266: divyā sarasvatī tatra saṃbabhūva nabhastalāt // NarP_1,42.48 //
GP12nardp1_u:7284: bhūmiryo niriyaṃ jñeyā yasyāḥ sarvaṃ prasūyate // NarP_1,42.57 //
GP12nardp1_u:7286: ya ete dhātavaḥ pañca rakṣyā yānasṛjatprabhuḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7294: pṛthivī cātra saṃghātaḥ śarīraṃ pāñcabhautikam // NarP_1,42.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:7296: śrotre ghrāṇo rasaḥ sparśo dṛṣṭiścendriyasaṃjñitāḥ // NarP_1,42.62 //
GP12nardp1_u:7299: sthāvarāṇāṃ na dṛśyante śarīre pañca dhātavaḥ // NarP_1,42.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:7301: vṛkṣāṇāṃ nopalabhyante śarīre pañca dhātavaḥ // NarP_1,42.64 //
GP12nardp1_u:7302: va śṛṇvanti na paśyanti na gandharasavedinaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7303: na ca sparśaṃ hi jānanti te kathaṃ pañca dhātavaḥ // NarP_1,42.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:7309: ūṣmato mlāyate parṇaṃ tvakphalaṃ puṣpameva ca /
GP12nardp1_u:7310: mlāyate śīryate cāpi sparśastenātra vidyate // NarP_1,42.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:7316: arogāḥ puṣpitāḥ saṃti tasmājjighranti pādapāḥ // NarP_1,42.71 //
GP12nardp1_u:7318: jīvaṃ paśyāmi vṛkṣāṇāmacaitanyaṃ na vidyate // NarP_1,42.72 //
GP12nardp1_u:7321: jaṅgamānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ śarīre paṃñca dhātavaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7322: pratyekaśaḥ prabhidyante yaiḥ śarīraṃ viceṣṭate // NarP_1,42.74 //
GP12nardp1_u:7323: tvak ca māṃsaṃ tathāsthīni majjā snāyuśca pañcamaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7327: śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ tathāsyaṃ ca hṛdayaṃ koṣṭameva ca /
GP12nardp1_u:7329: śleṣmā pittamatha svedo vasā śoṇitameva ca /
GP12nardp1_u:7330: ityāpaḥ pañcadhā dehe bhavanti prāṇināṃ sadā // NarP_1,42.78 //
GP12nardp1_u:7339: nirhārī saṃhataḥ snigdho rukṣo viśada eva ca // NarP_1,42.82 //
GP12nardp1_u:7341: jyotiḥ paśyati cakṣurbhyaḥ sparśaṃ vetti ca vāyunā // NarP_1,42.83 //
GP12nardp1_u:7342: śabdaḥ sparśaśca rūpaṃ ca rasaścāpi guṇāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7343: rasajñānaṃ tu vakṣyāmi tanme nigadataḥ śṛṇu // NarP_1,42.84 //
GP12nardp1_u:7347: śabdaḥ sparśaśca rūpaśca triguṇaṃ jyotirucyate // NarP_1,42.86 //
GP12nardp1_u:7348: jyotiḥ paśyati rūpāṇi rūpaṃ ca bahudhā smṛtam /
GP12nardp1_u:7351: kaṭhinaścikkaṇaḥ ślakṣṇaḥ picchilo mṛdu dāruṇaḥ // NarP_1,42.88 //
GP12nardp1_u:7357: eṣa saptavidhaḥ prokto guṇa ākāśasaṃbhavaḥ // NarP_1,42.91 //
GP12nardp1_u:7361: vāyavyastu guṇaḥ sparśaḥ sparśaśca bahudhā smṛtaḥ // NarP_1,42.93 //
GP12nardp1_u:7362: uṣṇaḥ śītaḥ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ snigdho viśada eva ca /
GP12nardp1_u:7363: tathā kharo mṛduḥ ślakṣṇo lavurgurutaro 'pi ca // NarP_1,42.94 //
GP12nardp1_u:7368: āpyāyante ca te nityaṃ dhātavastaistu dhātubhiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7371: pārthivaṃ dhātumāsādya yathā ceṣṭayate balī // NarP_1,42.98 //
GP12nardp1_u:7373: prāṇo mūrddhani vāgnau ca vartamāno viceṣṭate // NarP_1,42.99 //
GP12nardp1_u:7374: sa jantuḥ sarvabhūtātmā puruṣaḥ sa sanātanaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7375: mano buddhirahṝṅkāro bhūtāni viṣayaśca saḥ // NarP_1,42.100 //
GP12nardp1_u:7376: evaṃ tviha sa sarvatra prāṇaistu paripālyate /
GP12nardp1_u:7377: pṛṣṭatastu samānena svāṃ svāṃ gatimupāśritaḥ // NarP_1,42.101 //
GP12nardp1_u:7391: ūṣmā cāgirīti jñeyo yo 'nnaṃ pacati dehinām // NarP_1,42.108 //
GP12nardp1_u:7393: sa ūrdhvamāgamya punaḥ samutkṣipati pāvakam // NarP_1,42.109 //
GP12nardp1_u:7395: nābhimūle śarīrasya sarve prāṇāśca saṃsthitāḥ // NarP_1,42.110 //
GP12nardp1_u:7398: eṣa mārgo 'pi yogānāṃ yena gacchanti tatpadam /
GP12nardp1_u:7402: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge dvitīyapāde bhṛgubharadvājasaṃvāde jagadutpattivarṇanaṃ nāma dvicatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:7405: śvasityābhāṣate caiva tato jīvo nirarthakaḥ // NarP_1,43.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:7410: yadi vāthumayo jīvaḥ saṃśleṣo yadi vāyunā /
GP12nardp1_u:7412: saṃśleṣo yadi vā tena yadi tasmātpraṇaśyati /
GP12nardp1_u:7414: kṛpe vā salilaṃ dadyātpradīpaṃ vā hutāśane /
GP12nardp1_u:7415: kṣipraṃ praviśya naśyeta yathā naśyatyasau tathā // NarP_1,43.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:7421: pīḍite 'nyatare hyeṣāṃ saṃghāto yāti pañcatām // NarP_1,43.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:7423: kiṃ khedayati vā jīvaḥ kiṃ śṛṇoti bravīti ca // NarP_1,43.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:7425: yo dattvā mriyate jantuḥ sā gauḥ kaṃ tārayiṣyati // NarP_1,43.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:7426: gauścapratigrahītā ca dātā caiva samaṃ yadā /
GP12nardp1_u:7427: ihaiva vilayaṃ yānti kutasteṣāṃ samāgamaḥ // NarP_1,43.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:7429: agninā copayuktasya kutaḥ saṃjīvanaṃ punaḥ // NarP_1,43.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:7430: chinnasya yadi vṛkṣasya na mūlaṃ pratirohati /
GP12nardp1_u:7431: jīvanyasya pravartante mṛtaḥ kva punareṣyati // NarP_1,43.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:7435: ta nivartaya sarvajña yatastvāmāśrito hyaham // NarP_1,43.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:7440: na prāṇāḥ santi jīvasya dattasya ca kṛtasya ca /
GP12nardp1_u:7441: yāti dehāntaraṃ prāṇī śarīraṃ tu viśīryate // NarP_1,43.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:7448: gatiryasya pramāṇaṃ vā saṃsthānaṃ vā na vidyate // NarP_1,43.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:7452: gatiryasya pramāṇaṃ vā saṃsthānaṃ vā na vidyate /
GP12nardp1_u:7457: prāṇāndhārayate hyagniḥ sa jīva upadhāryatām // NarP_1,43.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:7460: patitaṃ yāti bhūmitvamayanaṃ tasya hi kṣitiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7461: jagamānāṃ hi sarveṣāṃ sthāvarāṇāṃ tathaiva ca // NarP_1,43.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:7470: śarīre prāṇināṃ jīvaṃ vettubhicchāmi yādṛśam // NarP_1,43.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:7472: bhidyamāne śarīre tu jīvo naivopalabhyate // NarP_1,43.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:7474: śarīre mānase duḥkha kastāṃ vedayate rujam // NarP_1,43.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:7475: śṛṇoti kathitaṃ jīvaḥ karṇābhyāṃna śṛṇoti tat /
GP12nardp1_u:7476: maharṣe manasi vyagre tasmājjīvo nirarthakaḥ // NarP_1,43.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:7478: manasi vyākule cakṣuḥ paśyannapi na paśyati // NarP_1,43.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:7479: na paśyati na cāghrāti na śṛṇoti na bhāṣate /
GP12nardp1_u:7480: na ca smarśamasau vetti nidrāvaśagataḥ punaḥ // NarP_1,43.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:7481: hṛṣyati kruddhyate ko 'tra śocatyudvijate ca kaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7482: icchati dhyāyati dveṣṭi vākyaṃ vācayate ca kaḥ // NarP_1,43.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:7485: sa vetti gandhāṃśca rasāñchutīśca sparśaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca guṇāṃśca ye 'lye // NarP_1,43.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:7487: saveti duḥkhāni sukhāni cātra tadviprayogāttu na vetti deham // NarP_1,43.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:7488: yadā na rūpaṃ na sparśo noṣyabhavaśca pāvake /
GP12nardp1_u:7489: tadā śānte śarīrāgnau dehatyāgena naśyati // NarP_1,43.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:7491: tatrātmā mānaso brahmā sarvabhūteṣu lokakṛt // NarP_1,43.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:7493: tasminyaḥ saṃśrito dehe hyabbinduriva puṣkare // NarP_1,43.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:7495: tamorajaśca sattvaṃ ca viddhi jīvaguṇānimām // NarP_1,43.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:7496: acetanaṃ jīvaguṇaṃ vadanti sa ceṣṭate ceṣṭayate ca sarvam /
GP12nardp1_u:7497: ataḥ paraṃ kṣetravido vadanti prāvartayadyo bhuvanāni sapta // NarP_1,43.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:7498: na jīvanāśo 'sti hi dehabhede mithyaitadāhurmuna ityabuddhāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7499: jīvastu dehāntaritaḥ prayāti daśārddhatastasya śarīrabhedaḥ // NarP_1,43.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:7504: cittasya hi prasādena hitvā karma śubhāśubham /
GP12nardp1_u:7510: tataḥ satyaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca tathā brahma ca śāśvatam /
GP12nardp1_u:7511: ācāraṃ caiva śaucaṃ ca svargāya vidadhe prabhuḥ // NarP_1,43.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:7516: cāturvarṇyasya varṇena yadi varṇo vibhidyate // NarP_1,43.53 //
GP12nardp1_u:7518: tvantaḥ kṣarati sarveṣāṃ kasmādvarṇo vibhajyate // NarP_1,43.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:7522: na viśeṣo 'sti varṇānāṃ sarvaṃ brahmamayaṃ jagat /
GP12nardp1_u:7523: brahmaṇā pūrvasṛṣṭaṃ hi karmaṇā varṇatāṃ gatam // NarP_1,43.56 //
GP12nardp1_u:7527: svadharṃmannānutiṣṭanti te dvijā vaiśyatāṃ gatāḥ // NarP_1,43.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:7529: kṛṣṇāḥ śaucapāribhrāṣṭāste dvijāḥ śūdratāṃ gatāḥ // NarP_1,43.59 //
GP12nardp1_u:7533: brahma caiva purā sṛṣṭaṃ yena jānanti tadvidaḥ // NarP_1,43.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:7538: brāhmaṇaḥ kena bhavati kṣatriyo vā dvijottama /
GP12nardp1_u:7539: vaiśyaḥ śūdraśca viprarṣe tadbrūhi vadatāṃ vara // NarP_1,43.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:7544: nityavratī satyaparaḥ sa vai brāhmaṇa ucyate // NarP_1,43.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:7546: tapasyāṃ dṛśyate yatra sa brāhmaṇa iti smṛtaḥ // NarP_1,43.66 //
GP12nardp1_u:7548: dānādānaratiryastu sa vai kṣatriya ucyate // NarP_1,43.67 //
GP12nardp1_u:7550: vedādhyayanasaṃpannaḥ sa vaiśya iti saṃjñitaḥ // NarP_1,43.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:7552: tyaktavedastvanācāraḥ sa vai śūdra iti smṛtaḥ // NarP_1,43.69 //
GP12nardp1_u:7553: śūdre caitadbhavellakṣma dvije tacca na vidyate /
GP12nardp1_u:7554: na vai śūdro bhavecchūdro brāhmaṇo brāhmaṇo na ca // NarP_1,43.70 //
GP12nardp1_u:7561: tyāge yasya hutaṃ sarvaṃ sa tyāgī sa ca buddhimān // NarP_1,43.74 //
GP12nardp1_u:7571: nivedādeva nirvāṇaṃ na ca kiñcidviccitayet // NarP_1,43.79 //
GP12nardp1_u:7573: śauce tu satataṃ yuktaḥ sadācārasamanvitaḥ // NarP_1,43.80 //
GP12nardp1_u:7575: satyaṃvrataṃ tapaḥ śaucaṃ satyaṃ visṛjate prajā // NarP_1,43.81 //
GP12nardp1_u:7576: satyena dhāryate lokaḥ svaḥ satyenaiva gacchati /
GP12nardp1_u:7577: anṛtaṃ tamaso rūpaṃ tamasā nīyate hyadhaḥ // NarP_1,43.82 //
GP12nardp1_u:7579: suduṣprakāśa ityāhurnarakaṃ tama eva ca // NarP_1,43.83 //
GP12nardp1_u:7581: tatrāpyevaṃvidhā loke vṛttiḥ satyānṛte bhavet // NarP_1,43.84 //
GP12nardp1_u:7586: sukhaṃ hyanityaṃ bhūtānāmiha loke paratra ca /
GP12nardp1_u:7587: rāhugrastasya somasya yathā jyotsnā na bhāsate // NarP_1,43.87 //
GP12nardp1_u:7588: tathā tamobhibhūtānāṃ bhūtānāṃ naśyate sukham // NarP_1,43.88 //
GP12nardp1_u:7589: tatkhalu dvividhaṃ sukhamucyacate śarīraṃ mānasaṃ ca /
GP12nardp1_u:7590: iha khalvamuṣmiṃśca loke vastupravṛttayaḥ sukhārthamabhidhīyante nahītaḥ paratrāparvagaphalādviśiṣṭataramasti /
GP12nardp1_u:7594: na tadupagṛhṇīmo na hyeṣāmṛṣīṇāṃ mahati sthitānām // NarP_1,43.90 //
GP12nardp1_u:7595: aprāpya eṣa kāmya guṇaviśeṣo na cainamabhiśīlayanti /
GP12nardp1_u:7596: tapasi śrūyate trilokakṛdbrahmā prabhurekākī tiṣṭati brahmacārī na kāmasukhoṣvātmānamavadadhāti // NarP_1,43.91 //
GP12nardp1_u:7597: api ca bhagavānviśveśvara umāpatiḥ kāmamabhivartamānamanaṅgatvena samamanayat // NarP_1,43.92 //
GP12nardp1_u:7598: tasmādbhūmau na tu mahātmabhirañjayati gṛhīto na tveṣa tāvadviśiṣṭo guṇaviśeṣa iti // NarP_1,43.93 //
GP12nardp1_u:7599: naitadbhagavataḥ pratyemi bhavatā tūktaṃ sukhānāṃ paramāḥ striya iti lokapravādo hi dvividhaḥ phalodayaḥ sukṛtātsukhamavāpyate 'nyathā duḥkhamiti
GP12nardp1_u:7601: atrocyate anṛtātkhalu tamaḥ prādurbhūtaṃ tatastamograstā adharmamevānuvartante na
GP12nardp1_u:7606: śārīraṃ mānasaṃ nāsti na jarā na ca pātakam /
GP12nardp1_u:7607: nityameva sukhaṃ svarge sukhaṃ duḥkhamihobhayam // NarP_1,43.96 //
GP12nardp1_u:7609: pṛthivī sarvabhūtānāṃ janitrī tadvidhāḥ striyaḥ // NarP_1,43.97 //
GP12nardp1_u:7613: hutena śāmyate pāpaṃ svādhyāye śāntiruttamā // NarP_1,43.99 //
GP12nardp1_u:7615: dānaṃ tu dvividhaṃ prāhuḥ paratrārthamihaiva ca // NarP_1,43.100 //
GP12nardp1_u:7618: yādṛśaṃ dīyate dānaṃ tādṛśaṃ phalamaśnute // NarP_1,43.101 //
GP12nardp1_u:7620: kiṃ kasya dharmacaraṇaṃ kiṃ vā dharmasya lakṣaṇam /
GP12nardp1_u:7627: teṣāṃ sve sve samācārāstanme vaktumihārhasi // NarP_1,43.104 //
GP12nardp1_u:7629: pūrvameva bhagavatā brahmaṇā lokahitamanutiṣṭatā dharmasaṃrakṣaṇārthamāśramāścatvāro 'bhinirddiṣṭāḥ // NarP_1,43.105 //
GP12nardp1_u:7637: iti gārhasthyaṃ khalu dvitīyamāśramaṃ vadanti // NarP_1,43.107 //
GP12nardp1_u:7639: samāvṛtānāṃ sadācārāṇāṃ sahadharmacaryaphalārthināṃ gṛhāśramo vidhīyate // NarP_1,43.108 //
GP12nardp1_u:7641: vā brahmarṣinirmitena vā adbhiḥ sāgaragatena vā dravyaniyamābhyāsadaivataprasādopalabdhena
GP12nardp1_u:7642: vā dhanena gṛhastho gārhasthyaṃ vartayet // NarP_1,43.109 //
GP12nardp1_u:7643: taddhi sarvāśramaṇāṃ mūlamudāharanti gurukulanivāsinaḥ parivrājakā ye 'nye saṃkalpitavrataniyamadharmānuṣṭāninasteṣāmapyantarā
GP12nardp1_u:7645: vānaprasthānāṃ ca dravyopaskāra iti prāyaśaḥ khalvete sādhavaḥ sādhupathyodanāḥ svādhyāyaprasaṃginastīrthābhigamanadeśadarśanārthaṃ pṛthivīṃ paryaṭanti // NarP_1,43.111 //
GP12nardp1_u:7649: sa dattvā duṣkṛtaṃ tasmai puṇyamādāya gacchati // NarP_1,43.113 //
GP12nardp1_u:7650: api cātra yajñakriyābhirdevatāḥ prīyante nivāpena pitaro vidyābhyāsaśravaṇadhāraṇena ṛṣayaḥ apatyotpādanena prajāpatiriti // NarP_1,43.114 //
GP12nardp1_u:7663: vānaprasthāḥ khalvapi dharmamanusarantaḥ puṇyāni tīrthāni nadīprastravaṇāni svabhakteṣvaraṇyeṣu mṛgavarāhamahiṣa śārdūlavanagajākīrṇeṣu tapasyante anusaṃcaranti // NarP_1,43.120 //
GP12nardp1_u:7680: na tasya sarvabhūtebhyo bhayamutpadyate kvacit // NarP_1,43.125 //
GP12nardp1_u:7682: viprastu bhaikṣopagatairhavirbhiścitā gninā saṃvrajate hi sokān // NarP_1,43.126 //
GP12nardp1_u:7684: anindhanaṃ jyotiriva praśāntaṃ sa brahmalokaṃ śrayate dvijātiḥ // NarP_1,43.127 //
GP12nardp1_u:7685: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge dvitīyapāde bhṛgubharadvājasaṃvāde brāhmaṇācāranirūpaṇaṃ nāma tricatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:7691: puṇyaḥ kṣemyaśca kāmyaśca sa paro loka ucyate // NarP_1,44.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:7694: sa svargasadṛśo deśaḥ tatra hyuktāḥ śubhā guṇāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7695: kāle mṛtyuḥ prabavati spṛśanti vyādhayo na ca // NarP_1,44.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:7697: nānyo hi vadhyate tatra dravyeṣu ca na vismayaḥ // NarP_1,44.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:7698: paro hyadharmo naivāsti saṃdeho nāpi jāyate /
GP12nardp1_u:7699: kṛtasya tu phalaṃ tatra pratyakṣamupalabhyate // NarP_1,44.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:7705: sukhitā duḥkhitāḥ kecinnirdhanā dhanino pare // NarP_1,44.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:7706: iha śramo bhayaṃ mohaḥ kṣudhā tīvrā ca jāyate /
GP12nardp1_u:7708: yastadvedo bhayaṃ prājñaḥ pāpmanā na sa lipyate /
GP12nardp1_u:7713: iha cintā bahuvidhā dharmādharmasya karmaṇaḥ // NarP_1,44.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:7719: ihasthāstatra jāyante ye vai puṇyakṛto janāḥ // NarP_1,44.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:7723: ihaiva parivarttante na ca yāntyuttarāṃ diśam // NarP_1,44.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:7727: dharmādharmauṃ hi lokasya yo vai vetti sa buddhimān // NarP_1,44.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:7730: yadadhyātmaṃ yathā caitattanme brūhi tapodhana // NarP_1,44.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:7733: tadvyākhyāṃsyāmi te tāta śreyaskaratamaṃ sukham // NarP_1,44.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:7735: yajjñātvā puruṣo loke prītiṃ saukhyaṃ ca vindati // NarP_1,44.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:7739: yataḥ sṛṣṭāni tatraiva tāni yānti layaṃ punaḥ // NarP_1,44.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:7741: prasārya ca yathāṅgāni kūrmaḥ saṃharate punaḥ // NarP_1,44.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:7742: tadvad bhūtāni bhūtātmā sṛṣṭāni harate punaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7744: akarotteṣu vai samyak taṃ tu jīvo na paśyati /
GP12nardp1_u:7745: śabdaḥ śrotraṃ tathā khāni trayamākāśayonijam // NarP_1,44.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:7746: vāyoḥ sparsastathā ceṣṭā tvakcaiva tritayaṃ smṛtam /
GP12nardp1_u:7747: rūpaṃ cakṣustathā pākastrividhaṃ teja ucyate // NarP_1,44.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:7748: rasāḥ kledaśca jihvā ca trayo jalaguṇāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7749: ghreyaṃ ghrāṇaṃ śarīraṃ ca ete bhūmiguṇāstrayaḥ // NarP_1,44.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:7750: mahābhūtāni pacaiva ṣaṣṭaṃ ca mana ucyate /
GP12nardp1_u:7753: śrotraṃ vai śravaṇārthāya sparśanāya ca tvak smṛtā // NarP_1,44.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:7760: tamo rajaśca sattvaṃ ca te 'pi bhāvāstadāśritāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7761: etāṃ buddhiṃ naro buddhā bhūtānāgatiṃ gatim // NarP_1,44.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:7767: yena paśyati tañcakṣuḥ śṛṇoti śrotramucyate // NarP_1,44.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:7769: tvacā sparśayati sparśaṃ buddhirvikriyate sakṛt // NarP_1,44.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:7773: puruṣe tiṣṭatī buddhistriṣu bhāveṣu vartate // NarP_1,44.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:7775: na sukhena na duḥkhena kadācidapi vartate // NarP_1,44.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:7776: evaṃ narāṇāṃ manasi triṣu bhāveṣu vartate /
GP12nardp1_u:7781: indriyāṇi hi sarvāṇi pravartayati sā sadā // NarP_1,44.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:7782: prītiḥ sattvaṃ rajaḥ śokastamaḥ krodhastu te trayaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7783: ye ye ca bhāvā loke 'sminsarve pyeteṣu vai triṣu // NarP_1,44.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:7785: indriyāṇi ca sarvāṇi vijetavyāni dhīmatā // NarP_1,44.48 //
GP12nardp1_u:7788: sāttvikī rājasī caiva tāmasī ceti mānada /
GP12nardp1_u:7791: tava yatprītisaṃyuktaṃ kāye manasi vā bhavet // NarP_1,44.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:7797: praharṣaḥ prītirānandaḥ sukhaṃ vā śāntacittatā // NarP_1,44.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:7799: atuṣṭiḥ paritāpaśca śoko lobhastathā kṣamā // NarP_1,44.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:7804: manaḥ svaniyataṃ yasya sa sukhī pretyaceha ca /
GP12nardp1_u:7806: sṛjatehi guṇāneka eko na sṛjate guṇān /
GP12nardp1_u:7807: maśakoduṃbarau vāpi saṃprayuktau yathā sadā // NarP_1,44.59 //
GP12nardp1_u:7809: pṛthagbhūtau prakṛtyā tau sapraṃyuktau ca sarvadā // NarP_1,44.60 //
GP12nardp1_u:7810: yathā matsyo jalaṃ caiva saṃprayukto tathaiva tau /
GP12nardp1_u:7811: na guṇā vidurātmānaṃ sa guṇānvetti sarvaśaḥ // NarP_1,44.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:7812: paridraṣṭā guṇānāṃ tu saṃstraṣṭā manyate tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:7815: sṛjate hi guṇānsattvaṃ kṣetrajñaḥ paripaśyati // NarP_1,44.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:7817: āśrayo nāsti sattvasya kṣetrajñasya ca kaścana // NarP_1,44.64 //
GP12nardp1_u:7818: sattvaṃ manaḥ saṃsṛjate na guṇānvai kadācana /
GP12nardp1_u:7819: raśmīṃsteṣāṃ sa manasā yadā samyaṅniyacchati // NarP_1,44.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:7821: tyaktvā yaḥ prākṛtaṃ karma nityamātmaratirmuniḥ // NarP_1,44.66 //
GP12nardp1_u:7823: yathā vāricaraḥ pakṣī salilena na lipyate // NarP_1,44.67 //
GP12nardp1_u:7827: bhāvayuktyā prayuktastu sa nityaṃ sṛjate guṇān // NarP_1,44.69 //
GP12nardp1_u:7835: malināḥ prāṇnuyuḥ śuddhiṃ yathā pūrṇāṃ nadīṃ narāḥ // NarP_1,44.73 //
GP12nardp1_u:7837: mahānadyā hi pārajñastapyate na taranyathā // NarP_1,44.74 //
GP12nardp1_u:7838: na tu tapyati tattvajñaḥ kulajñastu taratyuta /
GP12nardp1_u:7839: evaṃ ye viduradhyātmaṃ kaivalyaṃ jñānamuttamam // NarP_1,44.75 //
GP12nardp1_u:7840: evaṃ buddhā naraḥ sarvo bhūtānāmagatiṃ gatim /
GP12nardp1_u:7841: avekṣya ca śanairbuddhyā labhate ca śamaṃ tataḥ // NarP_1,44.76 //
GP12nardp1_u:7842: trivargo yasya viditaḥ prekṣya yaśca vimuñcati /
GP12nardp1_u:7846: etad buddhā bhaved buddhaḥ kimanyad buddhalakṣaṇam /
GP12nardp1_u:7847: vijñāya taddhi manyante katakṛtyā manīṣiṇaḥ // NarP_1,44.79 //
GP12nardp1_u:7848: na bhavati viduṣāṃ tato bhayaṃ yadaviduṣāṃ sumahadbhayaṃ bhavet /
