GP12nardp1_u:7849: nahi gatiradhikāsti kasyacitsati hi guṇepravadatyatulyatām // NarP_1,44.80 //
GP12nardp1_u:7851: nāpriyaṃ tadubhayaṃ kutaḥ priyaṃ tasya tajjanayatīha kurvataḥ // NarP_1,44.81 //
GP12nardp1_u:7853: tatra paśya kuśalānna śocate jāyate yadi bhayaṃ padaṃ sadā // NarP_1,44.82 //
GP12nardp1_u:7859: yaṃ jñātvā śāśvatīṃ siddhiṃ gacchantīha maharṣayaḥ // NarP_1,44.84 //
GP12nardp1_u:7860: yathā svanuṣṭitaṃ dhyānaṃ tathā kurvanti yoginaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7865: asaṃgānya vidhādīni manaḥ śāntikarāṇi ca // NarP_1,44.87 //
GP12nardp1_u:7868: śabdaṃ na vindecchrotreṇa tvacā sparśaṃ na vedayet /
GP12nardp1_u:7869: rūpaṃ na cakṣuṣā vindyājjihvayā na rasāṃstathā // NarP_1,44.89 //
GP12nardp1_u:7877: eṣa dhyānapathaḥ pūrvo bhayā samanuvarṇitaḥ // NarP_1,44.93 //
GP12nardp1_u:7881: evamevāsya cittaṃ ca bhavati dhyānavartmani // NarP_1,44.95 //
GP12nardp1_u:7883: punarvāyupathaṃ bhrāntaṃ mano bhavati vāyuvat // NarP_1,44.96 //
GP12nardp1_u:7891: sahasā vāriṇā siktā na yānti paribhāvanāḥ // NarP_1,44.100 //
GP12nardp1_u:7892: kiñcit snigdhaṃ yathā ca syācchuṣkaṃ cūrṇamabhāvitam /
GP12nardp1_u:7897: pūrvaṃ dhyānapathe sthāpya nityayogena śāmyati // NarP_1,44.103 //
GP12nardp1_u:7898: na tatpuruṣakāreṇa na ca daivena kenacit /
GP12nardp1_u:7901: gacchanti yogino hyovaṃ nirvāṇaṃ tu nirāmayam // NarP_1,44.105 //
GP12nardp1_u:7905: eṣa te prasavo vidvan jagataḥ saṃprakīrtitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7906: nikhilena mahāprājña kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotumicchasi // NarP_1,44.107 //
GP12nardp1_u:7913: na ca me jāyate tṛptirbhūyobhūyo 'pi śṛṇvataḥ // NarP_1,45.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:7915: tathā kathaya sarvajña mokṣadharmaṃ sadāśritam // NarP_1,45.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:7921: tasya śmaśāna mācāryā vasati satataṃ gṛhe /
GP12nardp1_u:7923: sa teṣāṃ pretyabhāve ca pretya jātau viniścaye /
GP12nardp1_u:7932: sa manye tena rūpeṇa vikhyāpayati hi svayam // NarP_1,45.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:7941: tasya pañcaśikhaḥ śiṣyo mānuṣyā payasā bhṛtaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7943: tasyaḥ putratvamāgatya sriyāḥ sa pibagati stanau /
GP12nardp1_u:7944: tataśca kāpileyatvaṃ lebhe buddhiṃ ca naiṣṭikīm // NarP_1,45.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:7947: sāmātyo janako jñātvā dharmajño jñāninaṃ mune /
GP12nardp1_u:7955: yadarthaṃ dharmasaṃsargaḥ karmaṇāṃ ca phalo dayaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:7960: ātmānaṃ manyate mohāttadasamyak paraṃ matam // NarP_1,45.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:7966: pratyakṣo hyāgamo bhinnaḥ kṛtānto vā na kiñcana // NarP_1,45.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:7968: anyojīvaḥ śarīrasya nāstikānāṃ mate sthitaḥ // NarP_1,45.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:7974: amūtasya hi mūrtena sāmānyaṃ nopalabhyate // NarP_1,45.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:7975: avidyā karma tṛṣṇā ca kecidāhuḥ punarbhavam /
GP12nardp1_u:7976: tasminnaṣṭe ca dagdhe ca citte maraṇadharmiṇi // NarP_1,45.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:7980: evaṃ sati ca kā prīhirjñānavidyātapobalaiḥ // NarP_1,45.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:7984: yathā hi muśalairhanyuḥ śarīraṃ tatpunarbhavet // NarP_1,45.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:7990: indriyāṇi mano vāyuḥ śoṇitaṃ māṃsamasthi ca // NarP_1,45.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:7994: iti samyaṅ manasyete bahavaḥ saṃti hetavaḥ // NarP_1,45.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:8000: arthāstathā hṝnti sukhāvahāṃśca lihata ete bahavopaśuṣkāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8001: mahattaraṃ duḥkhamabhiprapannā hitvāmiṣaṃ mṛtyuvaśaṃ prayānti // NarP_1,45.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:8003: vihāya yo gacchati sarvameva kṣaṇena gatvā na nivartate ca // NarP_1,45.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:8005: itīdamālakṣya ratiḥ kuto bhavedvināśināpyasya na śama vidyate // NarP_1,45.48 //
GP12nardp1_u:8009: bhagavanyadi na pretya saṃjñā bhavati kasyacit /
GP12nardp1_u:8010: evaṃ sati kimajñānaṃ jñānaṃ vā kiṃ kariṣyati // NarP_1,45.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:8012: apramattaḥ pramatto vā kiṃ viśeṣaṃ kariṣyati // NarP_1,45.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:8013: asaṃsargo hi bhūteṣu saṃsargo vā vināśiṣu /
GP12nardp1_u:8014: kasmai kriyata kalpeta niścayaḥ ko 'tra tattvataḥ // NarP_1,45.52 //
GP12nardp1_u:8022: dhātavaḥ pañcadhā toyaṃ khe vāyurjyotiṣo dharā // NarP_1,45.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:8024: ākāśaṃ vāyurūṣmā ca sneho yaścāpi pārthivaḥ // NarP_1,45.56 //
GP12nardp1_u:8026: jñānamūṣmā ca vāyuśca trividhaḥ kāyasaṃgrahaḥ // NarP_1,45.57 //
GP12nardp1_u:8029: śravaṇaṃ sparśanaṃ jihvā dṛṣṭirnāsā tathaiva ca /
GP12nardp1_u:8033: śabdaḥ sparśaśca rūpaṃ ca mūrtyarthameva te trayaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8036: tamāhuḥ paramaṃ śuddhiṃ buddhirityavyayaṃ mahat // NarP_1,45.62 //
GP12nardp1_u:8039: anātmeti ca yadṛṣṭaṃ tenāhaṃ na mametyapi /
GP12nardp1_u:8044: nityaṃ mithyāvinītānāṃ kleśo duḥkhāvaho tamaḥ // NarP_1,45.66 //
GP12nardp1_u:8045: dravyatyāge tu karmāṇi bhogatyāge vratāni ca /
GP12nardp1_u:8046: sukhatyāgā tapo yogaṃ sarvatyāge samāpanā // NarP_1,45.67 //
GP12nardp1_u:8048: viprahāṇāya duḥkhasya durgatirhi tathā bhavet // NarP_1,45.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:8050: basaṣaṣṭāni vakṣyāmi pañca karmedriyāṇi tu // NarP_1,45.69 //
GP12nardp1_u:8055: karṇo śabdaśca cittaṃ ca trayaḥ śravaṇasaṃgrahe /
GP12nardp1_u:8056: tathā sparśe tathā rūpe tathaiva rasagandhayoḥ // NarP_1,45.72 //
GP12nardp1_u:8060: trividhā vedānā yeṣu prasṛtā sarvasādhinī // NarP_1,45.74 //
GP12nardp1_u:8067: imāṃ ca yo veda vimokṣabuddhimātmānamanvicchati cāpramattaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8068: na lipyate karmapalairaniṣṭaiḥ patraṃ viṣasyeva jalena siktam // NarP_1,45.78 //
GP12nardp1_u:8070: yadā hyasau duḥkhasaukhye jahāti muktastadāgryāṃ gatimetyaliṅgaḥ // NarP_1,45.79 //
GP12nardp1_u:8072: kṣīṇe ca puṇye vigate ca pāpe tanornimitte ca phale vinaṣṭe // NarP_1,45.80 //
GP12nardp1_u:8075: tathā vimuktaḥ prajahāti duḥkhaṃ vidhaavaṃsate loṣṭamivādimṛcchan /
GP12nardp1_u:8076: yathā ruruḥ śṛṅgamatho purāṇaṃ hitvā tvacaṃ vāpyurago yathā ca // NarP_1,45.82 //
GP12nardp1_u:8078: matsyaṃ yathā vāpyudake patantamutsṛjya pakṣī nipatatsaśaktaḥ // NarP_1,45.83 //
GP12nardp1_u:8079: tathā hyasau duḥkhasaukhye vihāya muktaḥ parārddhyā gatimetyaliṅgaḥ // NarP_1,45.84 //
GP12nardp1_u:8081: nikhilamabhisamīkṣya niścitārthaḥ paramasukhī vijahāra vītaśokaḥ // NarP_1,45.85 //
GP12nardp1_u:8082: api ca bhavati maithilena gītaṃ nagaramupāhitamagninābhivīkṣya /
GP12nardp1_u:8083: na khalu mama hi dahyate 'tra kiñcitsvayamidamāha kila sma bhūmipālaḥ // NarP_1,45.86 //
GP12nardp1_u:8084: imaṃ hi yaḥ paṭhati vimokṣaniścayaṃ mahāmune satatamavekṣate tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:8085: upadravānanubhaghavate hyaduḥ khitaḥ pramucyate kapilamivaitya maithilaḥ // NarP_1,45.87 //
GP12nardp1_u:8086: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne dvitīyapāde pañcacatvāriṃśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:8089: punaḥ papraccha taṃ prītyā sanandanamudāradhīḥ // NarP_1,46.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:8092: prabrūhi tanmune mahyaṃ prapannāya dayānidhe // NarP_1,46.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:8099: tatprāptihetujñānaṃ ca karma coktaṃ mahāmune // NarP_1,46.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:8104: dve brahmaṇī veditavye śabdabrahma paraṃ ca yat /
GP12nardp1_u:8106: dve vidye veditavye cetyāha cātharvaṇī śrutiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8111: vyāpyaṃ vyāptaṃ yataḥ sarvaṃ taṃ vai paśyanti sūrayaḥ // NarP_1,46.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:8113: śrutivākyoditaṃ sūkṣmaṃ tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam // NarP_1,46.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:8123: tenāgamapitā sraṣṭā gakāro 'yaṃ tathā mune // NarP_1,46.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:8133: vetti vidyāmavidyāṃ ca sa vācyo bhagavāniti // NarP_1,46.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:8138: khāṇḍikyaṃ janakaṃ prāha pṛṣṭaḥ keśidhvajaḥ purā /
GP12nardp1_u:8140: bhūteṣu vasate soṃ'tarvasaṃtyatra ca tāni yat /
GP12nardp1_u:8141: dhātā vidhātā jagatāṃ vāsudevastataḥ prabhuḥ // NarP_1,46.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:8142: sa sarvabhūtaprakṛtiṃ vikāraṃ guṇādidoṣāṃśca mune vyatītaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8147: paraḥ parāṇāṃ sakalā na yatra kleśādayaḥ saṃti parāvareśe // NarP_1,46.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:8150: sa jñāyate yena tadastadoṣaṃ śuddhaṃ paraṃ nirmalameva rūpam /
GP12nardp1_u:8157: na māṃsacakṣuṣā draṣṭuṃ brahmabhūtaḥ sa śakyate // NarP_1,46.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:8163: janakāya purā yogaṃ tathāhaṃ kathayāmi te // NarP_1,46.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:8177: ekadā vartamānasya yāge yogavidāṃ vara // NarP_1,46.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:8178: tasya dhenuṃ jaghānograḥ śārdūlo vijane vane /
GP12nardp1_u:8179: tato rājā hatāṃ jñātvā dhenuṃ vyāghreṇa cartvijaḥ // NarP_1,46.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:8183: śunakaṃ pṛccha rājendra veda sa vetsyati // NarP_1,46.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:8184: sa gatvā tamapṛcchañca so 'pyāha nṛpatiṃ mune /
GP12nardp1_u:8185: na kaśerurnacaivāhaṃ na cānyaḥ sāṃprataṃ bhuvi // NarP_1,46.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:8186: vettyeka eva tvacchatruḥ khāṇḍikyo yo jitastvayā /
GP12nardp1_u:8187: sa cāha taṃ vrajāmyeṣa praṣṭumātmaripuṃ mune // NarP_1,46.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:8188: prāpta eva mayā yajñe yadi māṃ sa haniṣyati /
GP12nardp1_u:8189: prāyaścittaṃ sa cetpṛṣṭo vadiṣyati ripurmama // NarP_1,46.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:8192: vanaṃ jagāma yatrāste khāṇḍikyaḥ sa mahīpatiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8198: mṛgānāṃ vada pṛṣṭeṣu mūḍha kṛṣṇājinaṃ na kim // NarP_1,46.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:8199: yeṣāṃ matvā vṛthā cogrāḥ prahitāḥ śitasāyakāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8200: sa tvāmahaṃ haniṣyāmi na me jīvanvimokṣyase // NarP_1,46.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:8204: na tvāṃ hṝntuṃ vicāryataitkopaṃ bāṇaṃ ca muñca vā /
GP12nardp1_u:8205: tataḥ sa mantribhiḥ sārddhamekānte sapurohitaḥ // NarP_1,46.53 //
GP12nardp1_u:8208: hate 'tra pṛthivī sarvā tava vaśyā bhaviṣyati /
GP12nardp1_u:8209: khāṇḍikyaścāha tānsarvāneva meva na saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,46.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:8210: hate tu pṛthivī sarvā mama vaśyā bhaviṣyati /
GP12nardp1_u:8216: praṣṭavyaṃ yattvayā sarvaṃ tatpṛccha tvaṃ vadāmyaham /
GP12nardp1_u:8217: tataḥ prāha yathāvṛttaṃ homadhenuvadhaṃ mune // NarP_1,46.59 //
GP12nardp1_u:8218: tataśca taṃ sa papraccha prāyaścittaṃ hi tadrūtam /
GP12nardp1_u:8219: sa cācaṣṭa yathānyāyaṃ mune keśidhvajāya tat // NarP_1,46.60 //
GP12nardp1_u:8225: pūjitā ṛtvijaḥ sarve sadasyā mānitā mayā // NarP_1,46.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:8227: yathāhaṃ martyalokasya mayā sarvaṃ vicaṣṭitam // NarP_1,46.64 //
GP12nardp1_u:8228: aniṣpannakriyaṃ cetastathā na mama kiṃ yathā /
GP12nardp1_u:8229: itthaṃ tu cintayanneva saṃmāra sa mahīpatiḥ // NarP_1,46.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:8231: sa jagāma tato bhūyo rathamāruhya pārthivaḥ // NarP_1,46.66 //
GP12nardp1_u:8235: ahaṃ tu nāpakārāya prāptaḥ khāṇḍikya mā krudhaḥ // NarP_1,46.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:8237: niṣpādito mayā yāgaḥ samyak tvadupadeśataḥ // NarP_1,46.69 //
GP12nardp1_u:8239: ityukto mantrayāmāsa sa bhūyo mantribhiḥ saha // NarP_1,46.70 //
GP12nardp1_u:8243: prāhasya tānāha nṛpaḥ sa khāṇḍikyo mahāpatiḥ // NarP_1,46.72 //
GP12nardp1_u:8246: paramārthaḥ kathaṃ ko 'tra yūyaṃ nātra vicakṣaṇāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8247: ityuktvā samupetyaiṃnaṃ sa tu keśidhvajaṃ nṛpam // NarP_1,46.74 //
GP12nardp1_u:8251: yadi ceddīyate mahyaṃ bhavatā guruniṣkrayaḥ // NarP_1,46.76 //
GP12nardp1_u:8254: na prārthitaṃ tvayā kasmānmama rājyamakaṇṭakam // NarP_1,46.77 //
GP12nardp1_u:8257: keśidhvaja nibodha tvaṃ mayā na prārthitaṃ yataḥ // NarP_1,46.78 //
GP12nardp1_u:8261: yatrāśaktasya me doṣo naivāstyapakṛte tvayā // NarP_1,46.80 //
GP12nardp1_u:8265: na yācñā kṣatrabandhūnāṃ dharmāyaitatsatāṃ matam // NarP_1,46.82 //
GP12nardp1_u:8270: ahaṃ ca vidyayā mṛtyuṃ tartukāmaḥ karomi vai // NarP_1,46.84 //
GP12nardp1_u:8272: tadidaṃ te mano diṣṭyā vivekaiścaryatāṃ gatam // NarP_1,46.85 //
GP12nardp1_u:8280: kalevaropabhogyaṃ hi gṛhakṣetrādikaṃ ca yat // NarP_1,46.89 //
GP12nardp1_u:8282: itthaṃ ca putrapautreṣu taddehotpāditeṣu ca // NarP_1,46.90 //
GP12nardp1_u:8286: mṛṇmayaṃ hi yathā gehaṃ lipyate vai mṛdaṃ bhasā // NarP_1,46.92 //
GP12nardp1_u:8289: āpyāyate yadi tataḥ puṃso garvo 'tra kiṅkṛtaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8294: mohaśrame śamaṃ yāte svacchāntaḥkaraṇaḥ pumān // NarP_1,46.96 //
GP12nardp1_u:8298: jalasya nāgninā saṃgaḥ sthālīsaṃgāttathāpi hi // NarP_1,46.98 //
GP12nardp1_u:8303: kleśānāṃ ca kṣayakaraṃ yogādanyanna vidyate // NarP_1,46.101 //
GP12nardp1_u:8304: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne dvitīyapāde ṣaṭcatvāriṃśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:8309: tad brūhi tvaṃ mahābhāga yogaṃ yogaviduttama /
GP12nardp1_u:8313: yatra sthito na cyavate prāpya brahmalayaṃ muniḥ // NarP_1,47.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:8321: tasyā brahmaṇi saṃyogo yoga ityabhidhīyate // NarP_1,47.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:8323: yasya yogaḥ sa vai yogī mumukṣuramidhīyate // NarP_1,47.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:8331: seveta yogī niṣkāmo yigitāṃ svamano nayan // NarP_1,47.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:8333: kurvvīta brahmaṇi tathā parisminpravaṇaṃ manaḥ // NarP_1,47.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:8339: prāṇāyāmaḥ sa vijñeyaḥ sabījo 'bīja eva ca // NarP_1,47.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:8346: vaśyatā paramā tena jāyate niścalā tmanām /
GP12nardp1_u:8351: kathyatāṃ me mahābhāga cetaso yaḥ śubhāśrayaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8355: rūpaṃ mūrtamamūrtaṃ ca paraṃ cāparameva ca // NarP_1,47.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:8357: brahmākhyā karmasaṃjñā ca tathā caivobhayātmikā // NarP_1,47.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:8370: na tadyogayujā śakyaṃ nṛpa cintayituṃ yataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8371: tataḥ sthūlaṃ hare rūpaṃ cintyaṃ yañcakṣugocaram // NarP_1,47.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:8373: maruto vasavo rudrā bhāskārāstārakā grahāḥ // NarP_1,47.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:8375: manuṣyāḥ paśavaḥ śailāsamudrāḥ sarito drumāḥ // NarP_1,47.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:8376: bhūpa bhūtānyaśeṣāṇi bhūtānāṃ ye ca hetavaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8384: yeyaṃ kṣetrajñaśaktiḥ sā ceṣṭitā nṛpa karmajā /
GP12nardp1_u:8385: asārabhūte saṃsāre proktā tatra mahāmate // NarP_1,47.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:8387: tayā tirohitatvāttu śaktiḥ kṣetrajña saṃjñitā // NarP_1,47.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:8399: amṛrtaṃ brahmaṇo rūpaṃ yatsadityucyate budhaiḥ // NarP_1,47.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:8406: tadrūpaṃ viśvarūpāya cintyaṃ yoga yujā nṛpa /
GP12nardp1_u:8411: kurvīta saṃsthitaṃ sādhu vijñeyā śuddhalakṣaṇā // NarP_1,47.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:8414: anye tu puruṣavyāghra cetaso ye vyāpā8yāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8417: eṣā vai dhāraṇā jñeyā yañcitaṃ tatra dhāryate // NarP_1,47.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:8418: tatra mūrttaṃ hare rūpaṃ yādṛk cintyaṃ narādhipa /
GP12nardp1_u:8431: tāvadyāvad dṛḍhībhūtā tatraiva nṛpa dhāraṇā // NarP_1,47.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:8433: nāpayāti yadā cittātsiddhāṃ manyeta tāṃ tadā // NarP_1,47.62 //
GP12nardp1_u:8444: vijñānaṃ prāpakaṃ prāpye paraṃ brahmaṇi pārthiva /
GP12nardp1_u:8447: niṣpādya muktikāryaṃ vai kṛtakṛtyo nivartate // NarP_1,47.69 //
GP12nardp1_u:8451: ātmano brahmaṇābhedaṃ saṃmataṃ kaḥ kariṣyati // NarP_1,47.71 //
GP12nardp1_u:8460: paramārthastva saṃlāpyo vacasāṃ gocaro na yaḥ // NarP_1,47.75 //
GP12nardp1_u:8465: ājagāma puraṃ brahmaṃstataḥ keśidhvajo nṛpaḥ // NarP_1,47.77 //
GP12nardp1_u:8474: etatte kathitaṃ sarvaṃ yanmāṃ tvaṃ paripṛṣṭavān /
GP12nardp1_u:8479: tathāpi me mano bhrāntaṃ na sthitiṃ labhateṃ'jasā // NarP_1,48.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:8487: yaṃ śrutvā tvanmano bhrāntamāsthānaṃ labhate bhūśam // NarP_1,48.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:8489: ārṣabho yasya nāmnedaṃ bhārataṃ khaṇḍamucyate // NarP_1,48.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:8497: tatrāsau tāpaso tāpaso bhūtvā viṣṇorārādhanaṃ mune // NarP_1,48.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:8499: nityaṃ prātaḥ samāplutya nirmale 'bhali nārada // NarP_1,48.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:8505: sacaikadā mahābhāgaḥ snātvā prātaḥ samāhitaḥ // NarP_1,48.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:8507: athājagāma tattīraṃ jalaṃ pātuṃ pipāsitā // NarP_1,48.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:8509: tataḥ samabhavattatra pītaprāye jale tayā // NarP_1,48.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:8516: munīndra sā tu hariṇī nipapāta mamāra ca /
GP12nardp1_u:8517: hariṇīṃ tāṃ vilokyātha vipannāṃ nṛpatāpasaḥ // NarP_1,48.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:8519: cakārānudinaṃ cāsau mṛgapotasya vai nṛpaḥ // NarP_1,48.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:8520: poṣaṇaṃ puṣyamāṇaśca sa tena vavṛdhe mune /
GP12nardp1_u:8526: āsīñcetaḥ samāsaktaṃ na tathā hyacyute mune /
GP12nardp1_u:8529: kiṃ vṛkaibhakṣito vyāghnaiḥ kiṃ siṃhena nipātitaḥ // NarP_1,48.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:8533: kālena gacchatā so 'tha kālaṃ cakre mahīpatiḥ // NarP_1,48.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:8536: mṛgo babhūva sa mune tādṛśīṃ bhāvanāṃ gataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8541: tatra cotsṛṣṭadeho 'sau jajñe jātismaro dvijaḥ // NarP_1,48.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:8547: na papāṭha guruproktaṃ kṛtopanayanaḥ śrutam // NarP_1,48.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:8548: na dadarśa ca karmāṇi śāstrāṇi jagṛhe na ca /
GP12nardp1_u:8553: saṃmānena parāṃ hāniṃ yogarddheḥ kurute yataḥ // NarP_1,48.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:8555: tasmāñcareta vai yogī satāṃ dharmamadūṣayan // NarP_1,48.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:8559: bhuṅkte kulmāṣavaṭakān śākaṃ tranyaphalaṃ kaṇān // NarP_1,48.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:8567: sa rājā śibikārūḍho gantuṃ kṛtamatirdvija // NarP_1,48.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:8569: śreyaḥ kimatra saṃsāre duḥkhaprāye nṛṇāmiti // NarP_1,48.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:8577: vilokya nṛpatiḥ so 'tha viṣamaṃ śibikāgatam // NarP_1,48.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:8579: punastathaiva śibikāṃ vilokya viṣamāṃ hasan // NarP_1,48.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:8585: kimāyāsasaho na tvaṃ pīvā nāsi nirīkṣyase // NarP_1,48.52 //
GP12nardp1_u:8587: nāhaṃ pīvā na caivoḍhā śibikā bhavato mayā /
GP12nardp1_u:8588: na śrānto 'smi na cāyāso voḍhānyo 'sti mahīpate // NarP_1,48.53 //
GP12nardp1_u:8591: śramaśca bhāro dvahane bhavatyeva hi dehinām // NarP_1,48.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:8593: pratyakṣaṃ bhavatā bhūpa yaddṛṣṭaṃ mama tadvada /
GP12nardp1_u:8595: tvayoḍhā śibikā ceti tvayyadyāpi ca saṃsthitā /
GP12nardp1_u:8596: mithyā tadapyatra bhavān śṛṇotu vacanaṃ mama // NarP_1,48.56 //
GP12nardp1_u:8597: bhūmau pādayugaṃ cātha jaṅghe pādadvaye sthite /
GP12nardp1_u:8603: ahaṃ tvaṃ ca tathānye ca bhūtairuhyāśca pārthiva /
GP12nardp1_u:8607: ātmā śuddho 'kṣaraḥ śānto nirguṇaḥ prakṛte paraḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8610: tadāpi bāliśo 'si tvaṃ kayā yuktyā tvayeritam // NarP_1,48.63/
GP12nardp1_u:8612: śibikeyaṃ yadā skandhe tadā bhāraḥ samastvayā // NarP_1,48.64 //
GP12nardp1_u:8616: soḍhavyaḥ sumahānbhāraḥ katamo nṛpa te mayā // NarP_1,48.66 //
GP12nardp1_u:8621: so 'pi rājāvatīryorvyāṃ tatpādau jagṛhe tvaran // NarP_1,48.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:8623: bho bho visṛjya śibikāṃ prasādaṃ kuru me dvija /
GP12nardp1_u:8624: kathyatāṃ ko bhavānatra jālmarupadharaḥ sthitaḥ // NarP_1,48.69 //
GP12nardp1_u:8626: tatsarvaṃ kathyatāṃ vidvanmahyaṃ śuśrūṣave tvayā // NarP_1,48.70 //
GP12nardp1_u:8632: sarvasyaiva hi bhūpāla jantoḥ sarvatra kāraṇam /
GP12nardp1_u:8638: vaktuṃ na śakyate śrotuṃ tanmameccā pravartate // NarP_1,48.75 //
GP12nardp1_u:8639: yo 'sti yo 'hamiti brahmankathaṃ vaktuṃ na śakyate /
GP12nardp1_u:8640: ātmanyeva na doṣāya śabdo 'hamiti yo dvijā // NarP_1,48.76 //
GP12nardp1_u:8653: tadadā hi ko bhavānko 'hamityetadviphalaṃ vacaḥ // NarP_1,48.82 //
GP12nardp1_u:8654: tvaṃ rājā śibikā ceyaṃ vayaṃ vāhāḥ puraḥ sarāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8655: ayaṃ ca bhavato loko na sadetannṛpocyate // NarP_1,48.83 //
GP12nardp1_u:8657: kva vṛkṣasaṃjñā vai tasyā dārusaṃjñāthavā nṛpa // NarP_1,48.84 //
GP12nardp1_u:8658: vṛkṣārūḍho mahārājo nāyaṃ vadati te janaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8659: na ca dāruṇi sarvastvāṃ bravīti śibikāgatam // NarP_1,48.85 //
GP12nardp1_u:8663: kva jātaṃ chatramityeṣa nyāyastvayi tathā mayi // NarP_1,48.87 //
GP12nardp1_u:8666: pumānna devo na naro na paśurna ca pādapaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8669: tathānyaśca nṛpetthaṃ tanna satyaṃ kalpanāmayam // NarP_1,48.90 //
GP12nardp1_u:8671: pariṇāmādisaṃbhūtaṃ tadvastu nṛpa tañca kim // NarP_1,48.91 //
GP12nardp1_u:8672: tvaṃ rājā sarvasokasya pituḥ putro ripo ripuḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8673: patnyāḥ patiḥ pitā sūnoḥ kastvaṃ bhūpa vadāmyaham // NarP_1,48.92 //
GP12nardp1_u:8674: tvaṃ kimetacciraḥ kiṃ tu śirastava tatho daram /
GP12nardp1_u:8675: kimu pādādikaṃ tvetannaiva kiṃ te mahīpate // NarP_1,48.93 //
GP12nardp1_u:8677: ko 'hamityatra nipuṇaṃ bhūtvā cintaya pārthiva // NarP_1,48.94 //
GP12nardp1_u:8679: pṛthakūcaraṇaniṣpādyaṃ śakyaṃ tu nṛpate katham // NarP_1,48.95 //
GP12nardp1_u:8686: śrute tasminbhramantīva manaso mama vṛttayaḥ // NarP_1,49.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:8688: bhavatā darśitaṃ vipra tatparaṃ prakṛtermahat // NarP_1,49.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:8689: nāhaṃ vahāmi śibikāṃ śibikā mayi na sthitā /
GP12nardp1_u:8692: pravartante guṇāścaite kiṃ mameti tvayoditam // NarP_1,49.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:8696: praṣṭumabhyudyato gatvā śreyaḥ kintvatra saṃśaye // NarP_1,49.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:8698: tenaiva paramārthārthaṃ tvayi cetaḥ pradhāvati // NarP_1,49.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:8706: bhūyaḥ pṛcchasi kiṃ śreyaḥ paramārthena pṛcchasi /
GP12nardp1_u:8709: putrānicchati rājyaṃ ca śreyastasyaiva tannṛpa // NarP_1,49.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:8713: ātmā dhyeyaḥ sadā bhūpa yogayuktaistathā paraiḥ // NarP_1,49.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:8714: śreya stasyaiva saṃyogaḥ śreyo yaḥ paramātmanaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8716: saṃtyatra paramārthāstu na tvete śrūyatāṃ ca me /
GP12nardp1_u:8717: dharmo 'yaṃ tyajate kiṃ tu paramārtho dhanaṃ yadi // NarP_1,49.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:8720: paramārthabhūtaḥ so 'nyasya paramārtho hi naḥ pitā /
GP12nardp1_u:8721: evaṃ na paramārtho 'sti jagatyatra carācare // NarP_1,49.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:8724: paramārthā bhavantyatra na bhavanti ca vai tataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8727: yattu niṣpādyate kāryaṃ mṛdā kāraṇabhūtayā // NarP_1,49.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:8730: niṣpādyate kriyā yā tu sā bhavitrī vināśinī /
GP12nardp1_u:8733: tadevāpaladaṃ karma paramārtho mato mama // NarP_1,49.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:8741: eko vyāpī samaḥ śuddho nirguṇa prakṛteḥ paraḥ // NarP_1,49.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:8751: śṛṇvatra bhūpa prāgvṛttaṃ yadgītamṛbhuṇā bhavet // NarP_1,49.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:8759: devikāyāstaṭe vīra nāgaraṃ nāma vai puram // NarP_1,49.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:8763: divye varṣasahasre tu samatīte 'sya tatpuram // NarP_1,49.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:8770: bho vipravarya bhoktavyaṃ yadatra bhavato gṛhe // NarP_1,49.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:8771: tatkathyatāṃ kadanneṣu na prītiḥ satataṃ mama /
GP12nardp1_u:8776: kadannāni dijaitāni miṣṭamannaṃ prayaccha me // NarP_1,49.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:8779: gṛhe śālini madgehe yatkiñcidati śobhanam // NarP_1,49.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:8781: ityuktā tena sā patnī miṣṭamannaṃ dvijasya tat // NarP_1,49.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:8786: api te paramā tṛptirutpannā puṣṭireva // NarP_1,49.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:8787: api te mānasaṃ svasthamāhāreṇa kṛtaṃ dvija /
GP12nardp1_u:8788: kva nivāsī bhavānvipra kva vā gantuṃ samudyataḥ // NarP_1,49.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:8792: na me kṣudhā bhavettṝptiḥ kasmānmāṃ dvija pṛcchati /
GP12nardp1_u:8793: vahninā pārthivenādau dagdhe vai kṣurāpīśvaḥ // NarP_1,49.52 //
GP12nardp1_u:8795: kṣuttṛṣṇe dehadharmākhye na mamaite yato dvija // NarP_1,49.53 //
GP12nardp1_u:8799: kva nivāsastavetyuktaṃ kva gantāsi ca yattvayā // NarP_1,49.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:8803: so 'haṃ gantā na cāgantā naikadeśaniketanaḥ // NarP_1,49.57 //
GP12nardp1_u:8804: tvaṃ cānye ca na ca tvaṃ tvaṃ nānye naivāhamapyaham /
GP12nardp1_u:8805: miṣṭanne miṣṭamityeṣā jihvā sā me kṛtā tava // NarP_1,49.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:8810: mṛṇmayaṃ hi mṛdā yadvadgṛhaṃ liptaṃ sthirībhavet /
GP12nardp1_u:8811: pārthivo 'yaṃ tathā dehaḥ pārthivaiḥ paramāṇubhiḥ // NarP_1,49.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:8813: guḍaḥ phalānīti tathā pārthivāḥ paramāṇavaḥ // NarP_1,49.62 //
GP12nardp1_u:8815: tanmanaḥ śamanālabi kāryaṃ prāpyaṃ hi muktaye // NarP_1,49.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:8819: naṣṭo mohastavākarṇya vacāṃsyetāni me dvija // NarP_1,49.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:8823: eka evamidaṃ viddhi na bhedi sakalaṃ jagat /
GP12nardp1_u:8827: pūjitaḥ parayā bhaktyānicchitaḥ prayayau vibhuḥ // NarP_1,49.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:8830: nagarasya bahiḥ so 'tha nidāghaṃ dṛṣṭavān munim /
GP12nardp1_u:8835: uvāca kasmādekāntaṃ sthīyata bhavatā dvija // NarP_1,49.72 //
GP12nardp1_u:8838: pravivakṣau pure ramye tenātra sthīyate mayā // NarP_1,49.73 //
GP12nardp1_u:8841: kathyatāṃ me dvijaśreṣṭha tvamabhijño mato mama // NarP_1,49.74 //
GP12nardp1_u:8846: etau hi gajarājānau dṛṣṭau hi yugapanmayā /
GP12nardp1_u:8849: jñātumicchāmyahaṃ ko 'tra gajaḥ ko vā narādhipaḥ // NarP_1,49.77 //
GP12nardp1_u:8852: vāhyavāhakasaṃbandhaṃ ko na jānāti vai dvija // NarP_1,49.78 //
GP12nardp1_u:8855: adhaḥ sattvavibhāgaṃ kiṃ kiṃ corddhamabhidhīyate // NarP_1,49.79 //
GP12nardp1_u:8857: ityuktvā sahasāruhya nidāghaḥ prāha taṃ ṛbhum /
GP12nardp1_u:8858: śrayatāṃ kathayāmyeṣa yanmāṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi // NarP_1,49.80 //
GP12nardp1_u:8860: avabodhāya te brahmandṛṣṭānto darśito mayā // NarP_1,49.81 //
GP12nardp1_u:8863: tadevaṃ tvaṃ samācakṣva katamastvamahaṃ tathā // NarP_1,49.82 //
GP12nardp1_u:8868: yathācāryasya tena tvāṃ manye prāptamahaṃ gurum // NarP_1,49.84 //
GP12nardp1_u:8875: evamuktvā dadau vidyāṃ nidāghaṃ sa ṛbhurguruḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8883: ekaḥ samastaṃ yadihāsti kiñcittadacyuto nāsti paraṃ tato 'nyat /
GP12nardp1_u:8884: so 'haṃ sa ca tvaṃ sa ca sarvametadātmāṃsvayaṃ bhātyapabhedamohaḥ // NarP_1,49.91 //
GP12nardp1_u:8890: yathā pṛṣṭaṃ tvayā brahmaṃstathā te gaditaṃ mayā /
GP12nardp1_u:8895: asaṃtuṣṭa iva prāha bhrātaraṃ taṃ sanandanam // NarP_1,50.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:8898: tathāpi nātmā prīyeta śṛṇvanharikathāṃ muhuḥ // NarP_1,50.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:8900: siddhiṃ sumahatīṃ prāpto nirviṇṇo 'vāntaraṃ bahiḥ // NarP_1,50.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:8902: na jāyate kathaṃ prāpto jñānaṃ vyāsātmajaḥ śiśuḥ // NarP_1,50.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:8907: yāṃ śrutvā brahmatattvajño jāyate mānavo mune // NarP_1,50.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:8908: na hāyanairna palitairna vittena na bandhubhiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8909: ṛṣayaścakrire dharmaṃ yo 'nūcānaḥ sa no mahān // NarP_1,50.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:8912: tanme karma samācakṣva śrotuṃ kautūhalaṃ mama // NarP_1,50.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:8916: śikṣā kalpo vyākaraṇaṃ niruktaṃ jyotiṣaṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:8923: aṅgānāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ brūhi vedānāṃ cāpi vistarāt /
GP12nardp1_u:8929: vedānāṃ vedavidbhistu tacchṛṇuṣva vadāmi te // NarP_1,50.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:8930: ārcikaṃ gāthikaṃ caiva sāmikaṃ ca svarāntaram /
GP12nardp1_u:8936: mantro hīnaḥ svarato varṇato vā mithyāprayukto na tamarthamāha /
GP12nardp1_u:8937: sa vāgvajro yajamānaṃ hirnāsti yathendraśatruḥ svarato 'parādhāt // NarP_1,50.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:8938: uraḥ kaṇṭhaḥ śiraścaiva sthānāni trīṇi vāṅkye /
GP12nardp1_u:8941: na ca śakto 'si vyaktastu tathā prāvacanā vidhiḥ // NarP_1,50.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:8943: ṛgvede sāmavede ca vaktavyaḥ prathamaḥ svaraḥ // NarP_1,50.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:8949: mandraḥ kruṣṭo munīśvara etānkurvanti sāmagāḥ // NarP_1,50.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:8952: ete viśeṣataḥ proktāḥ svarā vai sārvavaidikāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8954: sāmavede tu vakṣyāmi svarāṇāṃ caritaṃ yathā /
GP12nardp1_u:8957: pavitraṃ pāvanaṃ puṇyaṃ yathā tubhyaṃ prakīrtitam // NarP_1,50.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:8965: svargābhrāñcaiva gāndhāro grāmasthānāni trīṇi hi // NarP_1,50.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:8966: svarāṇāṃ ca viśeṣeṇa grāmarāgā iti smṛtāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8969: nadī viśālā sumukhī citrā citravatī mukhā // NarP_1,50.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:8970: balā cāpyatha vijñeyā devānāṃ sapta mūrchanāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8971: āpyāyinī viśvabhṛtā candrā hemā kapardinī // NarP_1,50.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:8972: maitrī ca bārhatī caiva pitṝṇāṃ sapta mūrchanāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8974: aśvakrāntā tu gāndhāre tṛtīyā mūrcchanā smṛtā /
GP12nardp1_u:8975: madhyame khalu sauvīrā hṛṣikā pañcame svare // NarP_1,50.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:8976: dhaivate cāpi vijñeyā mūrchanā tūttarā matā /
GP12nardp1_u:8977: niṣāde rajanīṃ vidyādṛṣīṇāṃ sapta mūrchanāḥ // NarP_1,50.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:8979: pitṝṇāṃ mūrcchānāḥ sapta tathā yakṣā na saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,50.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:8980: ṛṣīṇāṃ mūrchanāḥ sapta yāstvimā laukikāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:8981: ṣaṅjaḥ prīṇāti vai devānṛṣīnprīṇāti carṣabhaḥ // NarP_1,50.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:8985: gānasya tu daśavidhā guṇavṛttistu tadyathā // NarP_1,50.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:8986: raktaṃ pūrṇamalaṅkṛtaṃ prasannaṃ vyaktaṃ vikruṣṭaṃ ślakṣṇaṃ samaṃ sukumāraṃ madhuramiti
GP12nardp1_u:8987: guṇāstatra raktaṃ nāma veṇuvīṇāsvarāṇāmekībhāvaṃ raktamityucyate pūrṇaṃ nāma svaraśrutipūraṇācchandaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:8988: pādākṣaraṃ saṃyogātpūrṇamityucyate alaṅkṛtaṃ nāmorasi śirasi kaṇṭhayuktamityalaṅkṛtaṃ
GP12nardp1_u:8992: ślakṣṇamityucyate samaṃ nāmāvāpanirvāpapradeśe pratyantarasthānānāṃ samāsaḥ samamityucyate
GP12nardp1_u:8993: sukumāraṃ nāma mṛdupadavarṇasvarakuhagaraṇayuktaṃ sukumāramityucyate madhuraṃ nāma
GP12nardp1_u:9007: pacamo madhyamaḥ ṣaṅja ityete brāhmaṇāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:9012: nipatati madhyamarāge sa niṣādaṃ ṣāṅjavaṃ vidyāt // NarP_1,50.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:9018: dhaivataḥ kaṃpito yatra sa ṣaṅgayāma īritaḥ // NarP_1,50.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:9020: taṃ tu sādhāritaṃ vidyātpañcamasthaṃ tu kaiśikam // NarP_1,50.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:9021: kaiśikaṃ bhāvayitvā tu svaraiḥ sarvaiḥ samantataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:9025: geti geyaṃ viduḥ prājñā dheti kārupravādanam /
GP12nardp1_u:9026: veti vādyasya saṃjñeyaṃ gandharvasya prarocanam // NarP_1,50.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:9027: yaḥ sāmagānāṃ prathamaḥ sa veṇormadhyamaḥ svaraḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:9028: yo dvitīyaḥ sa gāndhārastṛtīyastvṛṣabhaḥ smṛtaḥ // NarP_1,50.59 //
GP12nardp1_u:9029: caturthaḥ ṣaṅja ityāhuḥ pañcamo dhaivato bhavet /
GP12nardp1_u:9030: ṣaṣṭho niṣādo vijñeyaḥ saptamaḥ pañcamaḥ smṛtaḥ // NarP_1,50.60 //
GP12nardp1_u:9031: ṣaṅjaṃ mayūro vadati gāvo raṃbhanti carṣabham /
GP12nardp1_u:9032: ajāvike tu gāndhāraṃ kraiñco vadati madhyamam // NarP_1,50.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:9034: aśvastu dhaivataṃ vakti niṣaādaṃ vakti kuñjaraḥ // NarP_1,50.62 //
GP12nardp1_u:9040: ṣaṅbhiḥ saṃ jāyate yasmāttasmātṣaṅja iti smṛtaḥ // NarP_1,50.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:9044: vāti gandhavahaḥ puṇyo gāndhārastena hetunā // NarP_1,50.67 //
GP12nardp1_u:9049: dhaivataṃ ca niṣādaṃ ca varjayitvā tu tāvubhau /
GP12nardp1_u:9053: somena gīto gāndhāro viṣṇunā madhyamaḥ svaraḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:9056: ādyaṃsya daivataṃ brahmā ṣaṅjasyāpyucyate budhaiḥ // NarP_1,50.73 //
GP12nardp1_u:9058: gāvaḥ praṇīte tuṣyanti gāndhārastena hetunā // NarP_1,50.74 //
GP12nardp1_u:9066: dāravī gātravīṇā ca dve vīṇe gānajātiṣu // NarP_1,50.79 //
GP12nardp1_u:9067: sāmanī gātravīṇā tu tasyāstvaṃ śṛṇu lakṣaṇam /
GP12nardp1_u:9068: gātravīṇā tu sā proktā yasyāṃ gāyanti sāmaṅgāḥ // NarP_1,50.80 //
GP12nardp1_u:9070: hastau tu saṃyatau dhāryauṃ jānubhyāmuparisthitau // NarP_1,50.81 //
GP12nardp1_u:9076: viralā nāṅgulīḥ kuryānmūle caitāṃ na saṃspṛśet // NarP_1,50.84 //
GP12nardp1_u:9077: aṅguṣṭhāgreṇa tā nityaṃ madhyame parvaṇi spṛśet /
GP12nardp1_u:9080: trirekhā yasya dṛśyate siddhiṃ tatra vinirdiśet // NarP_1,50.86 //
GP12nardp1_u:9082: parvāntaraṃ sāmasu ca ṛkṣu kuryāttilāntaram // NarP_1,50.87 //
GP12nardp1_u:9088: kūrmo 'gāni ca saṃhṛtya cetodṛṣṭiṃ diśanmanaḥ // NarP_1,50.90 //
GP12nardp1_u:9092: samyakpracārayedvākyaṃ hastena ca mukhena ca // NarP_1,50.92 //
GP12nardp1_u:9095: samaṃ sāmāni gāyeta vyomni svena gātiryathā /
GP12nardp1_u:9096: yathā sucaratāṃ mārgo mīnānāṃ nopalabhyate // NarP_1,50.94 //
GP12nardp1_u:9098: yathā dadhini sarpiḥ syātkāṣṭastho vā yathānalaḥ // NarP_1,50.95 //
GP12nardp1_u:9104: svaraḥ sthānāccyuto yastu svaṃ sthānamativartate // NarP_1,50.98 //
GP12nardp1_u:9106: abhyāsārthe drutāṃ vṛttiṃ prayogārthe tu madhyamām // NarP_1,50.99 //
GP12nardp1_u:9110: kruṣṭasya mūrddhani sthānaṃ lalāṭe prathamasya tu // NarP_1,50.101 //
GP12nardp1_u:9114: aṅguṣṭasyottame vruṣṭo hyaṅguṣṭaṃ prathamaḥ svaraḥ // NarP_1,50.103 //
GP12nardp1_u:9116: anāmikāyāṃ ṣaṅgastu kaniṣṭāyāṃ tu dhaivataḥ // NarP_1,50.104 //
GP12nardp1_u:9119: mandro hi mandībhūtastu parisvāra iti smṛtaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:9120: kruṣṭena devā jīvanti prathamena tu mānuṣāḥ // NarP_1,50.106 //
GP12nardp1_u:9125: sarvāṇi khalu bhūtāni dhāryante sāmikaiḥ svaraiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:9127: śrutīnāṃ yo viśeṣajño na sa ācārya ucyate /
GP12nardp1_u:9128: dīptā mandre dvitīya ca pracaturthe tathaiva ca // NarP_1,50.110 //
GP12nardp1_u:9129: atisvare tṛtīye ca kruṣṭe tu karuṇā śrutiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:9130: śrutayo yā dvitīyasya mṛdumadhyāyatāḥ smṛtāḥ // NarP_1,50.111 //
GP12nardp1_u:9131: tāsāmapi tu vakṣyāmi lakṣaṇāni pṛthak pṛthak /
GP12nardp1_u:9132: āyatātvaṃ bhavennīce mṛdutā tu viparyaye // NarP_1,50.112 //
GP12nardp1_u:9133: sve svare madhyamātvaṃ tu tatsamīkṣya prayojayet /
GP12nardp1_u:9134: dvitīye viratā yā tu kruṣṭaśca parato bhavet // NarP_1,50.113 //
GP12nardp1_u:9135: dīptāṃ tāṃ tu vijānīyātprāthamyena mṛduḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:9136: atraiva viratā yā tu caturthena pravartate // NarP_1,50.114 //
GP12nardp1_u:9139: taṃ ca hrasve ca dīrghe ca na cāpi ghuṭisajñake /
GP12nardp1_u:9144: dīptāmudātte jānīyāddīptāṃ ca svarite viduḥ // NarP_1,50.118 //
GP12nardp1_u:9148: ata ūrdhvaṃ pravakṣyāmi ācikasya svaratrayam // NarP_1,50.120 //
GP12nardp1_u:9150: ya evodātta ityuktaḥ sa eva svaritātparaḥ // NarP_1,50.121 //
GP12nardp1_u:9154: sa tu saptavidho jñeyaḥ svaraḥ pratyayadarśanāt // NarP_1,50.123 //
GP12nardp1_u:9155: padena tu sa vijñeyo bhavedyo yatra yādṛśaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:9166: jātyaḥ kṣaipro 'bhinihita stairavyañjana eva ca // NarP_1,50.129 //
GP12nardp1_u:9170: sapakāraṃ savaṃ vāpi hyakṣaraṃ svaritaṃ bhavet // NarP_1,50.131 //
GP12nardp1_u:9171: na codāttaṃ puro yasya jātyaḥ svāraḥ sa ucyate /
GP12nardp1_u:9182: svare cetsvaritaṃ yatra vivṛtā yatra saṃhitā // NarP_1,50.137 //
GP12nardp1_u:9184: tānyaḥ svāraḥ sa jātyena śrutyagre kṣaipra ucyate // NarP_1,50.138 //
GP12nardp1_u:9192: ikārānte pade pūrva ukāre parataḥ sthite // NarP_1,50.142 //
GP12nardp1_u:9194: ikārānte pade caivokāradvayaṃ pare pade // NarP_1,50.143 //
GP12nardp1_u:9196: trayo dīrghāstu vijñeyā ye ca saṃdhyakṣareṣu vai // NarP_1,50.144 //
GP12nardp1_u:9197: manyā yathā na indrābhyāṃ śeṣā hrasvāḥ prakīrtitāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:9202: na rephe vā hakāre vā dvirbhāvo jāyate kvacit // NarP_1,50.147 //
GP12nardp1_u:9203: na ca vargadvitīyeṣu na caturthe kadācana /
GP12nardp1_u:9204: caturthaṃ tu tṛtīyena dvitīyaḥ prathamena tu // NarP_1,50.148 //
GP12nardp1_u:9205: ādyamantyaṃ ca madhyaṃ ca svārākṣareṇa pīḍayet /
GP12nardp1_u:9206: anantyaśca bhavetpūrvo hyantaśca parato yadi // NarP_1,50.149 //
GP12nardp1_u:9214: saṃyogo yatra dṛśyeta rvyañjanaṃ virate pade // NarP_1,50.153 //
GP12nardp1_u:9216: saṃyoge svaritaṃ yatra udvātaḥ pratanaṃ tathā // NarP_1,50.154 //
GP12nardp1_u:9220: anusvāraḥ padāntaśca kramajaṃ pratyaye svake // NarP_1,50.156 //
GP12nardp1_u:9223: yaśabda iti vijñeyo yo 'nyaḥsaya iti smṛtaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:9229: yannīcaṃ nīcameva tadyatpracayasthaṃ tadapi nīcam // NarP_1,50.160 //
GP12nardp1_u:9231: priyaṃ dūtaṃ ghṛtaṃ cittamatiśabdastu nīcataḥ // NarP_1,50.161 //
GP12nardp1_u:9236: dvau varuṇau vasvarata uduttamantvaṃ varuṇadhāra caurudhārāmurudhāresvadohate /
GP12nardp1_u:9237: mātrikaṃ vā dvimātraṃ vā svaryate yadihākṣaram /
GP12nardp1_u:9238: tasyāditor'ddhamātraṃ vai śeṣaṃ tu parato bhavet /
GP12nardp1_u:9249: vivṛtayaścatasro vai vijñeyā iti me matam // NarP_1,50.168 //
GP12nardp1_u:9250: akṣarāṇāṃ niyogena tāsāṃ nāmāni me śṛṇu /
GP12nardp1_u:9253: catasṛṇāṃ vivṛtīnā mantaraṃ mātrikaṃ bhavet // NarP_1,50.170 //
GP12nardp1_u:9257: nakārānte padā pūrve svare ca parataḥ sthite /
GP12nardp1_u:9260: arddhamātrā tu pūrvasya rajyate tvaṇumātrayā // NarP_1,50.174 //
GP12nardp1_u:9262: repho raṅgaśca lopaśca sānusvaro 'pi vā kvacit // NarP_1,50.175 //
GP12nardp1_u:9264: mṛduścaiva dvimātraśca dadhanvāṃ iti nidarśanam // NarP_1,50.176 //
GP12nardp1_u:9266: evaṃ raṅgaḥ prayoktavyo nāradaitanmataṃ mama // NarP_1,50.177 //
GP12nardp1_u:9268: caturṇāṃ padajātīnāṃ padāntā daśa kīrtitāḥ // NarP_1,50.178 //
GP12nardp1_u:9269: svara uccaḥ svaro nīcaḥ svaraḥ svarita eva ca /
GP12nardp1_u:9270: vyañjanā na tu vartante yatra tiṣṭati sa svaraḥ // NarP_1,50.179 //
GP12nardp1_u:9272: maṇivadvyañjanaṃ vidyātsūtra vañca svaraṃ viduḥ // NarP_1,50.180 //
GP12nardp1_u:9279: saṃdhyakṣare pare saṃdhau prāptasuptau yavau yadi /
GP12nardp1_u:9281: ūṣmāntaṃ virate yatra saṃbhāvo bhavati kvacit /
GP12nardp1_u:9282: vivṛttiryā bhavettatra svarākhyāṃ tāṃ vinirddiśet // NarP_1,50.185 //
GP12nardp1_u:9289: chandomānaṃ ca vṛttaṃ ca pādasthānaṃ trikāraṇam /
GP12nardp1_u:9293: ṛvarṇe tu pṛthagrephaḥ pratyayastu vṛthā bhaveta /
GP12nardp1_u:9295: ūṣmaṇaiva hi saṃyukta ṛkāro yatra pīḍyate /
GP12nardp1_u:9296: guruvarṇaḥ sa vijñeyastṛcaṃ cātra nidarśanam // NarP_1,50.192 //
GP12nardp1_u:9297: ṛṣabhaṃ ca gṛhītaṃ ca bṛhaspatiṃ pṛthivyāṃ ca /
GP12nardp1_u:9298: nirṛtipañcamā hyatra ṛkārā nātra saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,50.193 //
GP12nardp1_u:9304: śaṣaseṣu vivṛtāṃ tu hakāre saṃvṛtāṃ viduḥ // NarP_1,50.196 //
GP12nardp1_u:9306: ikāraṃ cāpyukāraṃ grastadoṣaṃ tathaiva ca // NarP_1,50.197 //
GP12nardp1_u:9308: atha sāntika ca naṅmasānusvāraṃ ghuṭataṃ ca // NarP_1,50.198 //
GP12nardp1_u:9311: yasyā lakṣaṇamuktaṃ yā tvanyā sā smṛtā vipulā // NarP_1,50.199 //
GP12nardp1_u:9314: vivṛttir yatra dṛśyate svārasyaivāgrataḥ sthitaḥ // NarP_1,50.201 //
GP12nardp1_u:9318: madhyodāttaṃ svaritaṃ dvirudāttamityetā aṣṭau padasaṃjñāḥ // NarP_1,50.203 //
GP12nardp1_u:9319: agniḥ somaḥ pravo vīryaṃ haviṣā svarvanaspatiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:9320: antarmadhyamayotāmyudamanunipātya ādyātsvaritamupasarge dvirnnīcamākhyāta iti svaritātparāṇi yāni syurddhārāpakṣarāṇi tu /
GP12nardp1_u:9322: pracayo yatra dṛśyeta tatra hanyātsvaraṃ budhaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:9323: svaritaḥ kevalo yatra mṛdustatra nipātayet // NarP_1,50.205 //
GP12nardp1_u:9324: pañcavidhamācāryakaṃ nāma sukhaṃ nyāsaḥ karaṇaṃ pratijñoccāraṇā /
GP12nardp1_u:9325: atrocyate śreyaḥ khalu vaiśyāḥ pratijñātoccāraṇā yasya kasyacidvarṇasya karaṇaṃ nopalabhyate pratijñā tatra voḍhavyākaraṇaṃ hi tadātmakam //
GP12nardp1_u:9327: sāmasu nibhṛtaṃ karaṇaṃ svarasaukṣmyānnaiva jānīyuḥ // NarP_1,50.207 //
GP12nardp1_u:9329: jīrṇo hāraḥ prabuddhaḥ khalūṣasinbrahma cintayet // NarP_1,50.208 //
GP12nardp1_u:9335: sarve kaṇṭakinaḥ puṇyāḥ kṣīriṇaśca yaśasvinaḥ // NarP_1,50.211 //
GP12nardp1_u:9336: tenāsya karaṇe saukṣmyaṃ mādhuryaṃ copa jāyate /
GP12nardp1_u:9341: pītvā madhuṃ ghṛtaṃ caiva śucirbhūtvā tato vadet // NarP_1,50.214 //
GP12nardp1_u:9348: na tasya parimokṣo 'sti pāpāheriva kilbiṣāt // NarP_1,50.217 //
GP12nardp1_u:9350: susvareṇa svavakreṇa prayuktaṃ brahma rājati // NarP_1,50.218 //
GP12nardp1_u:9351: na takālo na laṃboṣṭo na ca sarvānunāsikaḥ // NarP_1,50.218 //
GP12nardp1_u:9354: sa tu varṇānprayuñjīta detoṣṭhaṃ yasya śobhanam // NarP_1,50.220 //
GP12nardp1_u:9355: pañcavidyāṃ na gṛhṇanti caṇḍā stabdhāśca ye narāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:9356: alasāśca sarogāśca yeṣāṃ ca visṛtaṃ manaḥ // NarP_1,50.221 //
GP12nardp1_u:9358: śanairadhvasu varteta yojanānna paraṃ vrajet // NarP_1,50.222 //
GP12nardp1_u:9367: añjanasya kṣayaṃ dṛṣṭvā valmīkasya tu saṃcayam /
GP12nardp1_u:9374: nahi vādyārthināṃ nidrā ciraṃ netreṣu tiṣṭati // NarP_1,50.230 //
GP12nardp1_u:9378: rākṣasībhya iva sribhyaḥ sa vidyāmadhigacchati // NarP_1,50.232 //
GP12nardp1_u:9379: na śaṭhāḥ prānpuvantyarthānna klibā na ca māninaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:9380: na ca lokaravā dīnā na ca svasvapratīkṣakāḥ // NarP_1,50.233 //
GP12nardp1_u:9384: athavā vidyayā vidyā hyanyathā nopapadyate // NarP_1,50.235 //
GP12nardp1_u:9386: vandhyeva yauvanavatī na tasya sāphalyavati bhavati // NarP_1,50.236 //
GP12nardp1_u:9388: jñātvā vedāṅgamādyaṃ tu brahmabhūyāya kalpate // NarP_1,50.237 //
GP12nardp1_u:9389: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne dvitīyapāde pañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:9395: nakṣatrakalpe nirdiṣṭaṃ jñātavyaṃ tadihāpi ca // NarP_1,51.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:9396: vedakalpe vidhānaṃ tu ṛgādī nāṃ munīśvara /
GP12nardp1_u:9405: viśeṣaḥ pṛthageteṣāṃ sthitaḥ śaṅkhāntareṣu ca // NarP_1,51.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:9407: vakṣyāmi te dvijaśreṣṭha sāvadhānatayā śṛṇu // NarP_1,51.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:9410: kṛtvā proktāni karmāṇi tadvarddhvāni karoti yaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:9416: rekhāḥ proktāśca yāstisraḥ kartavyāstāḥ samā dvija /
GP12nardp1_u:9417: nyūnādhikā na karttavyā ityeva paribhāṣitam // NarP_1,51.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:9420: vandhyā duṣṭā ca dīnāṅgī mṛtavatsā ca yā bhavet /
GP12nardp1_u:9421: yajñārthaṃ gomayaṃ tasyā nāharediti bhāṣitam // NarP_1,51.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:9423: taṣāṃ praharaṇārthāya mataṃ proddharaṇaṃ dvija // NarP_1,51.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:9426: āpo devagaṇāḥ sarve tathā pitṛgaṇā dvija /
GP12nardp1_u:9429: śubhade mṛṇmaye pātre prokṣyādbhistaṃ nidhāyapayet // NarP_1,51.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:9433: tebhyaḥ saṃrakṣaṇārthāya brahmāṇaṃ taddiśi nyaset // NarP_1,51.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:9435: yajamānaḥ pūrvataḥ syurdvijāḥ sarve 'pi nārada // NarP_1,51.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:9436: dyūte ca vyavahāre ca yajñakarmaṇi cedbhavet /
GP12nardp1_u:9439: ṛtvijāṃ niyamo nāsti yathālābhaṃ samarcayet // NarP_1,51.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:9440: dve paritre tryaṅgule staḥ prokṣiṇī caturaṅgulā /
GP12nardp1_u:9443: sruvaṃ ṣaḍaṅgula proktaṃ srucaṃ sārddhatrayāṅgulam // NarP_1,51.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:9446: yāni kāni ca tīrthāni samudrāḥ saritastathā /
GP12nardp1_u:9448: vedikā vasrahīnā ca nagrā saṃprocyate dvija /
GP12nardp1_u:9449: paristīryya tato darbheḥ paridadhyādimāṃ budhaḥ // NarP_1,51.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:9457: sruve ca sarvakarmāṇi śubhānyapyaśubhāni ca // NarP_1,51.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:9459: agre dhūtena vaidhavyaṃ madhyaṃ caiva prajākṣayaḥ // NarP_1,51.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:9460: mūle ca mriyate hotā tasmāddhāryaṃ vicārya tat /
GP12nardp1_u:9461: agniḥ sūryaśca somaśca viriñciranilo yamaḥ // NarP_1,51.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:9465: anilo vṛddhidaḥ prokto yamo mṛtyuprado mataḥ // NarP_1,51.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:9467: pūrvaṃ tu sarvaśākhaṃ syātpañcaśākhaṃ tathāparam // NarP_1,51.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:9469: palāśaścaiva vijñeyāḥ sruve caiva tathā sruci // NarP_1,51.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:9472: śūdrāṇāṃ patitānāṃ ca kharādīnāṃ ca nārada /
GP12nardp1_u:9477: puṣkalāni tu catvāri pūrṇapātraṃ vidurbudhāḥ // NarP_1,51.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:9478: homakāle tu saṃprāpte na dadyādāsanaṃ kvacit /

GP12nardp1_u:9863: atanīñcātānīdataniṣyatkrīṇāti cikrāya kretā kreṣyati krīṇātviti ca /

GP12nardp1_u:9923: rātrī vimbī ca kadrūścāviṣṭvau vājasaneyinaḥ // NarP_1,53.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:9929: hiraṇyayena naraṃ ca parame vyomanityapi // NarP_1,53.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:9931: yajadhvainamemasi ca snātvī gatvā pacāsthabhauḥ // NarP_1,53.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:9935: dadhartyādyā svavadbhiśca sasūveti ca dhiṣva ca // NarP_1,53.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:9961: anudātteta akhyātā bhādyutāttā itaḥ syamāt // NarP_1,53.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:9963: sadasraya udāttetaḥ kucādvedā udātta it // NarP_1,53.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:9975: bhvādyā ete ṣaḍadhikaṃ sahasraṃ dhātavo matāḥ // NarP_1,53.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:9977: svariteto dviṣādyāstu catvāro dhātavo matāḥ // NarP_1,53.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:9981: parasmaipadinaḥ proktā ṣumukhāḥ sapta dhātavaḥ // NarP_1,53.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:9984: ṣṭuñekastu samā khyātaḥ smṛte nārada śābdikaiḥ // NarP_1,53.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:9994: dādayo dhātavo vedāḥ parasmaipadino matāḥ // NarP_1,53.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:9998: ghṛmukhā dvādaśa tathā parasmaipatino matāḥ // NarP_1,53.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:10002: oditaḥ pūṅmukhāḥ sapta ātmanedapino matāḥ // NarP_1,53.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:10006: mṛṣādyāḥ svaritetastu dhātavaḥ pañca kīrtitāḥ // NarP_1,53.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:10008: rādhoḥ karmaka evātra vṛddhau svādicurādike // NarP_1,53.52 //
GP12nardp1_u:10012: catvāriśacchataṃ cāpi divādau dhātavo matāḥ // NarP_1,53.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:10020: vraścādaya udāttetaḥ proktāḥ pañcādhikaṃ śatam // NarP_1,53.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:10024: pṛṅ mṛṅ cātmanebhāṣau ṣaṭ parasmaipade ripeḥ // NarP_1,53.60 //
GP12nardp1_u:10027: svaritetaḥ ṣaṭ tataśca proktā milamukhā mune /
GP12nardp1_u:10035: tato dvau kīrtitau vipra dhātavo daśa śābdikaiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:10042: curādyā dhātavo ñyantā ṣaṭrtriṃśadadhikaḥ śatam // NarP_1,53.69 //
GP12nardp1_u:10044: carcādyā ādhṛṣīyāstu pyantā vā parikīrtitāḥ // NarP_1,53.70 //
GP12nardp1_u:10046: padādyāstu daśa proktā dhātavo hyātmanepade // NarP_1,53.71 //
GP12nardp1_u:10047: sūtrādyā aṣṭa cāpyatra ñyantā proktā manīṣibhiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:10052: stomādyāḥ ṣoḍaśa tathā andatasyaṃ nidarśanam // NarP_1,53.74 //
GP12nardp1_u:10057: saṃkṣepo 'yaṃ samuddiṣṭo vistarastatra tatra ca // NarP_1,53.76 //
GP12nardp1_u:10059: vṛṅvṛñbhyāṃ ca vinaikāco 'janteṣu nihatāḥ smṛtāḥ // NarP_1,53.77 //
GP12nardp1_u:10071: cādyā nipātā gavayaḥ prādyā digdeśakālajāḥ // NarP_1,53.83 //
GP12nardp1_u:10072: śabdāḥ proktā hyanekārthāḥ sarvaliṅgā api dvija /
GP12nardp1_u:10075: śabdāḥ siddhā vaidikāstu laukikāścāpi nārada // NarP_1,53.85 //
GP12nardp1_u:10081: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇa pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne dvitīyapāde niruktalakṣaṇanirūpaṇaṃ nāma tripañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:10106: ekaṃ daśa śataṃ caiva sahasrāyutalakṣakam // NarP_1,54.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:10108: niravarva ca mahāpadmaṃ śaṅkurjaladhireva ca // NarP_1,54.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:10109: atyaṃ madhyaṃ parārddhaṃ ca saṃjñā daśaguṇottarāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:10110: kramādutkramato vāpi yogaḥ kāryottaraṃ tathā // NarP_1,54.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:10116: tatkṛtiṃ ca tyajedvipra mūlena vibhajetpunaḥ // NarP_1,54.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:10119: procyate viṣamaṃ tvādyaṃ same dve ca tataḥ param /
GP12nardp1_u:10125: lavā lavaghnāśca harā haraghnā hi savarṇanam /
GP12nardp1_u:10133: chedaṃ cāpi lavaṃ vidvanparivartya harasya ca /
GP12nardp1_u:10134: śeṣaḥ kāryo bhāgahāre kartavyo guṇanāvidhiḥ // NarP_1,54.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:10135: hārāṃśayoḥ kṛtī varge ghanau ghanavidhau mune /
GP12nardp1_u:10136: padasiddhyai pade kuryādathoravaṃ sarvataśca ravam // NarP_1,54.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:10137: chedaṃ guṇaṃ guṇaṃ chedaṃ vargaṃ mūlaṃ padaṃ kṛtim /
GP12nardp1_u:10138: ṛṇaṃ svaṃ svamṛṇaṃ kuryādṛśye rāśiprasiddhaye // NarP_1,54.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:10139: atha svāṃśādhikone tu lavāḍhyo no haro haraḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:10146: eko 'sya vargo dalitaḥ saiko rāśiḥ paro mataḥ // NarP_1,54.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:10150: eṣīsyānāmubhe vyakte gaṇite vyaktameva ca // NarP_1,54.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:10152: dṛṣṭasya ca guṇārddho na yutaṃ vargīkṛtaṃ guṇaḥ // NarP_1,54.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:10154: bhaktaṃ tathā mūlaguṇaṃ tābhyāṃ sādhyotha vyaktavat // NarP_1,54.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:10158: bahurāśivadhaṃ bhakte phalaṃ svalpavadhena ca // NarP_1,54.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:10164: kṣepā miśrahatāḥ kṣepoyogabhaktāḥ phalāni ca // NarP_1,54.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:10167: vyastaṃ gacchataṃ phalaṃ yadguṇavargaṃ bhacahi tat /
GP12nardp1_u:10168: vyekaṃ vyekaguṇāptaṃ ca prādhnaṃ mānaṃ guṇottare // NarP_1,54.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:10172: rāśyorantaravargeṇa dvighne ghāte yute tayoḥ // NarP_1,54.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:10181: vyāsadhnaṃ prabhajedvipra jyā kāśaṃ jāyate sphuṭā /
GP12nardp1_u:10208: tāvatyeva niśā tasya viprendra parikīrtitā // NarP_1,54.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:10248: yojanāni śatānyaṣṭau bhūkarṇauṃ dviguṇāḥ smṛtaḥ // NarP_1,54.83 //
GP12nardp1_u:10258: iṣṭanāḍīguṇā bhuktiḥ ṣaṣṭyā bhaktā kalādikam // NarP_1,54.88 //
GP12nardp1_u:10259: gate śoddhyaṃ tathā yojyaṃ gamye tātkāliko grahaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:10270: grahaṃ saṃśodhya mandoñcattathā śīghnādviśodhya ca // NarP_1,54.94 //
GP12nardp1_u:10282: jyāṃ prohya śeṣaṃ tattvatāśvi hṝntaṃ tadvivaroddhṛm // NarP_1,54.100 //
GP12nardp1_u:10296: śai'yakoṭiphalaṃ kendre makarādau dhanaṃ smṛtam // NarP_1,54.107 //
GP12nardp1_u:10297: saṃśodhyaṃ tu trijīvāyāṃ karkādau koṭijaṃ phalam /
GP12nardp1_u:10300: saṃśodhyaṃ tu trijīvāyāṃ karkādau koṭijaṃ phalam // NarP_1,54.109 //
GP12nardp1_u:10303: labdhasya cāpaṃ liptādi phalaṃ śaidhryamidaṃ smṛtam /
GP12nardp1_u:10304: etadādau kujādīnāṃ caturthe caiva karmaṇi // NarP_1,54.111 //
GP12nardp1_u:10306: śairdhyaṃ mādyaṃ punarmāndyaṃ śairghyaṃ catvāryanukramāt // NarP_1,54.112 //
GP12nardp1_u:10307: ajā dikendre sarveṣāṃ māndye śairghye ca karmaṇi /
GP12nardp1_u:10308: dhanaṃ grahāṇāṃ liptādi tulādāvṛṇameva tat // NarP_1,54.113 //
GP12nardp1_u:10312: karkādau taddhanaṃ tatra makarādāvṛṇaṃ smṛtam // NarP_1,54.115 //
GP12nardp1_u:10333: tithayaḥ śuklapratipado dvighnāḥ saikā na gāhatāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:10334: śeṣaṃ bavo bālavaśca kaulavastaitilo garaḥ // NarP_1,54.126 //
GP12nardp1_u:10342: tanmadhye timinā rekhā kartavyā dakṣiṇottata // NarP_1,54.130 //
GP12nardp1_u:10352: prohya śaṅkukṛte mūlaṃ chāyā śekuviparyayāt // NarP_1,54.135 //
GP12nardp1_u:10358: laṃbākṣajye tayośchāye laṃbākṣau dakṣimau sadā // NarP_1,54.138 //
GP12nardp1_u:10364: digbhedopakramaḥ śeṣastasya jyā trijyayā hatā // NarP_1,54.141 //
GP12nardp1_u:10383: bhāgayuktaṃ ca hīnaṃ ca vyayanāṃśaṃ tanuḥ kuje /
GP12nardp1_u:10385: bhānau kṣayadhane kṛtvā madhyalagnaṃ tadā bhavet /
GP12nardp1_u:10390: arkaṃ vidhurvidhuṃ bhūbhā chādayatyathā channakam // NarP_1,54.154 //
GP12nardp1_u:10415: dṛṣṭvā hyādau kheṭabiṃbaṃ dṛgauñcye laṃbamīkṣya ca // NarP_1,54.166 //
GP12nardp1_u:10417: aste sāvayavā jñeyā gataiṣyāstithayo budhaiḥ // NarP_1,54.167 //
GP12nardp1_u:10431: tayute maṇḍale krāntyau tulyatve vai dhṛtābhidhaḥ // NarP_1,54.174 //
GP12nardp1_u:10437: yadi syādadhikā bhānoḥ krānteḥ pāto gatastadā // NarP_1,54.177 //
GP12nardp1_u:10438: nyūnā cetsyāttadā bhāvī vāmaṃ yugmapadasya ca /
GP12nardp1_u:10439: yadānyatvaṃ vidhoḥ krāntiḥ kṣepāccedyadi śuddhyati // NarP_1,54.178 //
GP12nardp1_u:10458: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne dvitīyapāde jyotiṣavarṇanaṃ nāma catuḥpañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:10471: śeṣā dinākhyāstūbhayaṃ timiḥ krūraḥ saumyaḥ pumān // NarP_1,55.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:10481: nṛpādaḥ kīṭapaśavo balāḍhyāḥ kendragāḥ kramāt // NarP_1,55.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:10483: raktaḥ śvetaḥ śukanibhaḥ pāṭalo dhūmrapāṇḍurau // NarP_1,55.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:10484: citraḥ kṛṣṇaḥ pītapiṅgau babhruḥ svacchaḥ prabhākriyāt /
GP12nardp1_u:10487: jīvo jñānaṃ sukhaṃ śukraḥ kāmo duḥkhaṃ dineśajaḥ // NarP_1,55.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:10488: nṛpau ravīndū netāsṛk kumāro jñaḥ kavījyakau /
GP12nardp1_u:10489: sacivo sūryajaḥ preṣyo mato jyotirvidāṃ varaiḥ // NarP_1,55.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:10494: klibau budhārkī śukrendū sriyau śeṣā narāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:10496: kavījyau kujasūryauṃ ca vedo jño varṇapāḥ kramāt /
GP12nardp1_u:10500: vasraṃ sthalaṃ navaṃ vahnikahataṃ madyadaṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:10509: jīvo jīvajñau sitajñau vyarkā vyārāḥ kramādamī // NarP_1,55.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:10515: dikṣu saumyejyayoḥ sūryārayoḥ saure sitābjayoḥ // NarP_1,55.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:10519: krūrāḥ kṛṣṇe site saumyāḥ mataṃ kālabalaṃ budhaiḥ // NarP_1,55.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:10521: pāpāstu balinaḥ saumyā vivakṣāḥ kaṇṭakopage // NarP_1,55.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:10523: svāṃśe pāpāḥ parāṃśasthāḥ saumyālagnaṃ viyonijam // NarP_1,55.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:10526: pārśve kukṣī tvapānāṅghrī meḍhramuṣkau tathā sphijau /
GP12nardp1_u:10527: pucchaṃ catuṣpadāṅgeṣu meṣādyā rāśayaḥ smṛtāḥ // NarP_1,55.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:10534: sthalāṃbu ca patiḥ kheṭo lagnādyāvanmite gṛhe /
GP12nardp1_u:10535: tāvanta eva takhaḥ sthalajā jalajāstathā // NarP_1,55.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:10536: antaḥsārā ravau saure durbhagāḥ kṣīriṇo vidhau /
GP12nardp1_u:10537: bhaume kaṇṭakino vṛkṣā ījye jñe saphalāphalau // NarP_1,55.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:10539: aśubharkṣe śubhaḥ kheṭaḥ śubhaṃ vṛkṣaṃ kubhūmijam // NarP_1,55.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:10543: pāpayuktekṣite dyūne ruṣā prītyā śubhagrahaiḥ // NarP_1,55.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:10547: vyayakhago yuktau caikadṛṣṭyā nṛtyupradau tayoḥ // NarP_1,55.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:10549: mātṛṣvasṛpitṛvyākhyau vā padmeji same śubhau // NarP_1,55.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:10550: pāpadṛṣṭe śubhe kṣīṇe tuṅge vā lagnageyame /
GP12nardp1_u:10553: yadā tadā garbhayutā nārī mṛtyumavāpnuyāt // NarP_1,55.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:10561: gurvakārai viṣamasthau vā yuñjanma pravadettadā // NarP_1,55.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:10566: mitho ravīndūrjñārkī vā paśyataḥ samagaṃ raviḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:10567: vakro vāṅgavidhū oje jajñau yugmaujasaṃsthitau // NarP_1,55.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:10569: same sitendū ojasthā jñārāṅgojyā nṛvīkṣitau // NarP_1,55.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:10588: vyayejo vāmanayanaṃ dakṣaṃ sūryo vināśayet // NarP_1,55.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:10589: neṣṭā yogāḥ śubhairdṛṣṭāḥ pāpāḥ syurnātra saṃśayaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:10596: mandeṅgasthe kujeste ca jñosphuji madhyage vidhau // NarP_1,55.69 //
GP12nardp1_u:10598: sūryastaddṛṣṭigo vāpi jñeyo jyotirvidāṃ varaiḥ // NarP_1,55.70 //
GP12nardp1_u:10600: kośādatau tu yamalau jāyete munisattama // NarP_1,55.71 //
GP12nardp1_u:10602: lagnaminduṃ ca sārkenduṃ na paśyati yadā guruḥ // NarP_1,55.72 //
GP12nardp1_u:10606: pūrṇa iṇḍhau svabheśejñe śubhe muvyaṃvuje tanau // NarP_1,55.74 //
GP12nardp1_u:10607: dyūnasthe vā vidhau yāteṅganā nārī prasūyate /
GP12nardp1_u:10608: abdhāṅgamanbhagaḥ pūrṇe jyo vā paśyati nārada // NarP_1,55.75 //
GP12nardp1_u:10617: bhāsamāne sare mārge sthire svarkṣāṃśage gṛhe /
GP12nardp1_u:10619: gurudṛṣṭe tu dīrghāyuḥ paraṃ ca prāpyate punaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:10624: tarugehe śubhe nīce naikasthadṛṣṭau lagnenduḥ // NarP_1,55.83 //
GP12nardp1_u:10626: mandarkṣāṃśe vidhau turye mandadṛṣṭe 'bjage 'pi vā // NarP_1,55.84 //
GP12nardp1_u:10628: śīrṣe pṛṣṭodaye janma tadvadeva vinirdiśet // NarP_1,55.85 //
GP12nardp1_u:10630: jīrṇoddhṛtaṃ gṛhaṃ mande sṛji dagdhaṃ na vā vidhau // NarP_1,55.86 //
GP12nardp1_u:10632: citrayuktaṃ navaṃ śukre dṛḍhe ramye gurau gṛham // NarP_1,55.87 //
GP12nardp1_u:10634: vṛṣe paścānmṛge siṃhe dakṣiṇe vasatirbhavet // NarP_1,55.88 //
GP12nardp1_u:10643: śiṃśnāpāte ca vṛṣaṇau jaghane jānunī tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:10646: svarkṣāṃśe sthirayukte tu naija āgantuko 'nyathā // NarP_1,55.94 //
GP12nardp1_u:10652: caturasraḥ piṅgadṛk ca paittiko 'lpakaco raviḥ // NarP_1,55.97 //
GP12nardp1_u:10653: vṛto vātakaphī prājño mandavāk śubhadṛk śaśī /
GP12nardp1_u:10664: na ceddṛṣṭastadā mṛtyurjātasya bhavati dhruvam // NarP_1,55.103 //
GP12nardp1_u:10665: kṣīṇe 'bje vyayage pāpairlagnāṣṭasthaiḥ śubhā na cet /
GP12nardp1_u:10676: lagne ravau tu śasreṇa savīryāsadbhiraṣṭagaiḥ // NarP_1,55.109 //
GP12nardp1_u:10677: karkendvījyayute lagne kendre saumye ca bhārgave /
GP12nardp1_u:10682: svaccobje svarkṣagaiḥ saumyaiḥ savīryeṅgādhipe tanau // NarP_1,55.112 //
GP12nardp1_u:10694: kavījyayoge saumyābjau lagne mṛtyau ca sveṣavaḥ // NarP_1,55.118 //
GP12nardp1_u:10696: sūryādhika bale paiṇḍaṃ nisargāñca vidhorbale // NarP_1,55.119 //
GP12nardp1_u:10698: gobjāstattvatithī sūryāstithiḥ svargā nakhāḥ kramāt // NarP_1,55.120 //
GP12nardp1_u:10700: piṇḍe nisarge ravocce no grahaḥ ṣaṭbhālpako yadā /
GP12nardp1_u:10702: aṃśonāḥ śantrubhe kāryā grahaṃ vakragatiṃ vinā /
GP12nardp1_u:10711: śeṣe ṣaṣṭyā hate bhakte hāreṇa ghaṭikādikam // NarP_1,55.127 //
GP12nardp1_u:10713: bhajedvarṣāṇi śeṣe tu guṇite dvādaśādibhiḥ // NarP_1,55.128 //
GP12nardp1_u:10719: yadaikālyaṃ tadāstāṃśāḥ svāgryāptonā ca bhūrguṇaḥ // NarP_1,55.131 //
GP12nardp1_u:10723: śeṣaṃ dviśatabhaktaṃ syurmāsāḥ śeṣā dinādikam // NarP_1,55.133 //
GP12nardp1_u:10729: lagnārkacandramadhye tu yo balī taddaśā purā // NarP_1,55.136 //
GP12nardp1_u:10730: tataḥ kendrādigānāṃ tu dvitryādau sabalasya ca /
GP12nardp1_u:10737: turyāṣṭagasya tu svargā guṇakāḥ parikīrtitāḥ // NarP_1,55.140 //
GP12nardp1_u:10745: jīvikādiphalaṃ sarvaṃ daśāyāṃ tasya yojayet // NarP_1,55.144 //
GP12nardp1_u:10749: yasyāṣṭavargajaṃ cāpi phalaṃ pūrṇaśubhaṃ bhavet // NarP_1,55.146 //
GP12nardp1_u:10753: neṣṭamutkaṭamiṣṭaṃ tu svalpaṃ jñātvā balaṃ vadet // NarP_1,55.148 //
GP12nardp1_u:10755: sthire neṣṭaṣṭamadhyā ca horāyāstryaṃ śakaiḥ phalam // NarP_1,55.149 //
GP12nardp1_u:10758: prāgdhvāṅkṣā bandhu mṛtyāya tayordyūne raviḥ svabhāt /
GP12nardp1_u:10765: kendrāṣṭāyāntya ijyādvā jñajyāyāstatra sve kaveḥ // NarP_1,55.154 //
GP12nardp1_u:10775: sātryaṅke san raveḥ śukrāddhīkhago digbhavārigaḥ // NarP_1,55.159 //
GP12nardp1_u:10801: sitāsṛjo gurau karke sārāje lagnage nṛpāḥ // NarP_1,55.172 //
GP12nardp1_u:10809: dhīsthau gurvidukavayo bhūmau ratryage budhairnṛpaḥ // NarP_1,55.176 //
GP12nardp1_u:10811: kavikṣau tulayuramasthau vai bhūpaḥ kīrtimānbhavent // NarP_1,55.177 //
GP12nardp1_u:10815: siṃher'ke meṣalagne 'je mṛge bhaume ghaṭe 'ṣṭame // NarP_1,55.179 //
GP12nardp1_u:10817: pātālage dharmage 'bje śubhadṛṣṭe yute mune // NarP_1,55.180 //
GP12nardp1_u:10824: sukhe guruḥ kheravīndūyamo lagne bhave karai /
GP12nardp1_u:10843: bhālā kendrasthitaiḥ saumyaiḥ pāpaiḥsarpa udāhṛtaḥ // NarP_1,55.193 //
GP12nardp1_u:10847: dātā samṛddho dāmāsthaḥ pāśajo dhanaśīlayuk // NarP_1,55.195 //
GP12nardp1_u:10853: taujaḥ sakīrtiḥ sukhabhāk mānavo bhavati dhruvam // NarP_1,55.198 //
GP12nardp1_u:10854: tyāgī yajvātmavān yūthe hiṃsro guhyādhipaḥ śaraiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:10855: śaktau nīco 'laso niḥsvo daṇḍe priyaviyogabhāk // NarP_1,55.199 //
GP12nardp1_u:10857: durudharā caiva vidhau jñeyaḥ kemudrumo 'nyathā // NarP_1,55.200 //
GP12nardp1_u:10865: samando dhātukuśalaṃ tathā bhāḍaṃvidaṃ mune // NarP_1,55.204 //
GP12nardp1_u:10871: saśukre dyūtakrarheyo nṛtī dyūti samandake // NarP_1,55.207 //
GP12nardp1_u:10873: sabhārgavesamande lubdhakaḥ krūro naro bhavati nārada // NarP_1,55.208 //
GP12nardp1_u:10875: kavau sa mandamandākṣā va vaniśrayavittavān // NarP_1,55.209 //
GP12nardp1_u:10882: mando vā janmapaṃ naṣṭaṃ tathā ca mandakāgaṇe /
GP12nardp1_u:10883: bhaumārkāṃśe sauradṛṣṭe candre vā dīkṣito bhavet // NarP_1,55.213 //
GP12nardp1_u:10886: brāhmo dhanīmṛge bhogī raudre hiṃstraḥ śaṭho 'ghakṛt /
GP12nardp1_u:10887: dānto rogī śubho 'dityāṃ puṣyaryajanmā kaviḥ sukhī // NarP_1,55.215 //
GP12nardp1_u:10888: dhūrtaḥ śaṭhaḥ kṛtaghno 'hau pāpaḥ sarvāśano bhavet /
GP12nardp1_u:10889: patre bhogī dhanī bhakto dātā priyavacā bhage // NarP_1,55.216 //
GP12nardp1_u:10890: dhanī bhogīnaroryamarkṣe steno dhṛṣṭo ghṛṇī kare /
GP12nardp1_u:10891: citrāṃbaraḥ sudṛktvāṣṭre na ca dharmadayāparaḥ // NarP_1,55.217 //
GP12nardp1_u:10892: dvīśe lubdhaḥ paṭuḥ krodhī maḍhaiyo āṭhanovideśagaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:10893: śākre dharmaparastuṣṭo mūle mānī dhanī sukhī // NarP_1,55.218 //
GP12nardp1_u:10894: āpye mānī dṛṣṭo vaiśve namraśca dhārmikaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:10895: karṇe dhanī sukhī khyāto dātā śūro dhanī vasau // NarP_1,55.219 //
GP12nardp1_u:10897: budhne vaktā sukhī kāntaḥ pauṣṇe śūro dhanī śuciḥ // NarP_1,55.220 //
GP12nardp1_u:10898: kāmī śūraḥ kṛtajño 'je kāntastyāgī kṣamī vṛṣe /
GP12nardp1_u:10899: yugme srīdyūtaśāsrajñaḥ sraiṇo hrasvaḥ svabhe vidhau // NarP_1,55.221 //
GP12nardp1_u:10900: srīdviṭ krodhī harau mānī vikrāntaḥ sthiradhīḥ sukhī /
GP12nardp1_u:10901: dharmī ślakṣṇaḥ sudhīḥ ṣaṣṭe prājñaḥ prāṃśurdhanī ghaṭe // NarP_1,55.222 //
GP12nardp1_u:10902: rogī pūjyaḥ kṣatī kārairpye kaviḥ śilpījyabhe dhanī /
GP12nardp1_u:10906: khyātaḥ srīdviṭ dhanī tīkṣṇojñaḥ kaviḥ śaiṇḍiko dhanī /
GP12nardp1_u:10907: pūjyo lubdho 'dhanasakho meṣādau bhāskare janau // NarP_1,55.224 //
GP12nardp1_u:10908: niḥsvor'kabhe bhūmiputre bhūmiputre dhanī cāndre svabhedanaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:10909: baudhe kṛtajño jaive tu khyātaḥ śaukre 'nyadārikaḥ // NarP_1,55.225 //
GP12nardp1_u:10916: sārthaḥ prājñaḥ samaḥ khyātiḥ srīji'torkādibhe mṛgau /
GP12nardp1_u:10935: kaviḥ sukhī budhāṃśe tu naṭacaurajñaśilpinaḥ // NarP_1,55.238 //
GP12nardp1_u:10937: krodhī nidhīśo mātyo vā nṛpo hiṃsro suto hareḥ // NarP_1,55.239 //
GP12nardp1_u:10938: jīvāṃśe hāsyavidyodhā balī mantrī ca dhārmikaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:10941: vargottame khe parabhe pala muktaṃ śubhaṃ kramāt // NarP_1,55.241 //
GP12nardp1_u:10942: puṣṭaṃ madhyaṃ laghu jñeyaṃ yadi cāṃśapatirbalī /
GP12nardp1_u:10945: meṣe dhanī taimirakaḥ siṃhe rātryandha eva ca // NarP_1,55.243 //
GP12nardp1_u:10948: trige budho vikramī ca vimukhaḥ pīḍito bhuvi /
GP12nardp1_u:10952: lābhe bahudhano mānī patito kho 'vyaye ravau /.
GP12nardp1_u:10953: mūkodho badhiraḥ preṣyo jege khāñcājage dhanī // NarP_1,55.247 //
GP12nardp1_u:10959: kṣudrāeṃ'gahīno vyayage candre proktaṃ phalaṃ budhaiḥ // NarP_1,55.250 //
GP12nardp1_u:10962: vidvān dhanī ca pravaraḥ paṇḍitaḥ sacivoriyuk /
GP12nardp1_u:10969: alaso lagnage mande dharmātsvoñcagate nṛpaḥ // NarP_1,55.255 //
GP12nardp1_u:10977: nṛpaśca mitrabhāstheṣu kheṭe vrekādiṣu kramāt // NarP_1,55.259 //
GP12nardp1_u:10979: khyāto mahodyamī cātitejā dhīmāndhanī balī // NarP_1,55.260 //
GP12nardp1_u:10992: tejasvī ca naraḥ khāye triṃśāṃse sṛjisaṃsthite /
GP12nardp1_u:10993: āmayī vā svabhāryāyāṃ viṣamaḥ pāradārikaḥ // NarP_1,55.267 //
GP12nardp1_u:11002: sukhejño cāru ceṣṭāṅgau candrārkkaucetkujādigau mūlatrikoṇasvarkṣocce kaṇṭhasthāstu ca ye grahāḥ // NarP_1,55.272 //
GP12nardp1_u:11004: śubhaṃ vargottame janma vesisthāne vasadgṛhaiḥ // NarP_1,55.273 //
GP12nardp1_u:11008: praveśe bhāskarakujau bhṛgvījyo madhyagau tathā // NarP_1,55.275 //
GP12nardp1_u:11009: candrārkī phala dāvantye sadā jñaḥ phaladāyakaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:11012: ravau bhīner'kajaḥ srīghnaḥ putrasthastu tathā kujaḥ // NarP_1,55.277 //
GP12nardp1_u:11020: pāpe dhīsthe vidhau kṣīṇajanmā sutakalatriṇaḥ // NarP_1,55.281 //
GP12nardp1_u:11022: tau cetseṃdusriyā sārddhaṃ puṃścalo jāyate naraḥ // NarP_1,55.282 //
GP12nardp1_u:11024: nṛsriyo stu śubhairdṛṣṭau tau dvau pariṇatāṅgakau // NarP_1,55.283 //
GP12nardp1_u:11030: karkālyaṃ śagate kendre pāpayukte tu guhyaruk // NarP_1,55.286 //
GP12nardp1_u:11032: candre khe 'stāṅgate bhaume vikalo veśiger'kaje // NarP_1,55.287 //
GP12nardp1_u:11036: saumyā dṛṣṭā na vāyatridhīgatāḥ pāpakhecarāḥ // NarP_1,55.289 //
GP12nardp1_u:11038: lagne gurau dyune mande vātarogādito bhavet // NarP_1,55.290 //
GP12nardp1_u:11039: sukhe 'ste vā kuje jīve lagne vārkiyutodaye /
GP12nardp1_u:11040: kujena vātmaje dyūne saṃjñeṃ'tye 'bje ca sonmadaḥ // NarP_1,55.291 //
GP12nardp1_u:11046: puñjanau tu phalaṃ puṇyasrīṇāṃ yogyaṃ vadecca tat // NarP_1,55.294 //
GP12nardp1_u:11054: bālyaduṣṭā tathā dāsī sādhvī māyāvatī tvarā // NarP_1,55.298 //
GP12nardp1_u:11057: duṣṇavāk punarbhūḥ saguṇā vijñā khyātā sphujidgrṛhe /
GP12nardp1_u:11058: baudhe samā yā klīvā ca satī guṇavatī calā // NarP_1,55.300 //
GP12nardp1_u:11060: vācāṭā kulaṭā siṃhe rāgī pundhīragamyatā // NarP_1,55.301 //
GP12nardp1_u:11062: dāsī nīcaratā sādhvī mānde duṣṭā napatyakā // NarP_1,55.302 //
GP12nardp1_u:11064: dṛggaiḥ mithoṃśe śukrārkī śaukre cedvā ghaṭāṃśake // NarP_1,55.303 //
GP12nardp1_u:11066: śūnye kāpuruṣo dyūne bale klīvo na sadṛśi // NarP_1,55.304 //
GP12nardp1_u:11068: tatsṛṣṭā madage sūrye strībālavidhavā kuje // NarP_1,55.305 //
GP12nardp1_u:11072: mithoṃśagaiḥ sitārau tu kuruto 'nyaratāṃ striyam // NarP_1,55.307 //
GP12nardp1_u:11074: saurārarkṣe lagnagate seṃduśukre tu vandhakī // NarP_1,55.308 //
GP12nardp1_u:11077: mandarkṣe vāṃśake dyūne vṛddhau mūrkhaḥ patiḥ striyāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:11078: strīlolaḥ krodhanaḥ kauje baudhe vidvāṃśca naipuṇaḥ // NarP_1,55.310 //
GP12nardp1_u:11082: jñedvoḥ kalāsu nipuṇā sukhitā ca guṇānvitā // NarP_1,55.312 //
GP12nardp1_u:11086: vaidhavyaṃ ca mṛtistasyā svayaṃsatsvarthageṣu tu // NarP_1,55.314 //
GP12nardp1_u:11104: mṛtyuścātha mṛge candre karke mande jalodarāt // NarP_1,55.323 //
GP12nardp1_u:11108: striyāṃ sapāpe 'bje dyūne site meṣe ravau tanau // NarP_1,55.325 //
GP12nardp1_u:11109: maraṇaṃ strīkṛte gehe hyatha turye kuje ravau /
GP12nardp1_u:11138: svoccasthoṃ'ge vyaye saumyabhāge mokṣo balānyataḥ // NarP_1,55.340 //
GP12nardp1_u:11139: ādhāne janmā jñāne tu vṛkṣatāṃ lagnato vadet /
GP12nardp1_u:11166: cipiṭāsyo hi saṃvīto nausthaḥ ratryarthaṃvrajañjale // NarP_1,55.354 //
GP12nardp1_u:11167: śvā naro jaṃbukaṃ gṛdhraṃ gṛhītvā rauti śālmalau /
GP12nardp1_u:11184: bhāṇḍī romaścavāḥ śyāmaḥ kirīṭī phalayantradhṛk // NarP_1,55.363 //
GP12nardp1_u:11191: iti śrīnāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge dvitīyapāde bṛhadupākhyāne jātakanirūpaṇannāma pañcapañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:11194: caitraśuklapratipadi yo vāraḥ sa nṛpaḥ smṛtaḥ // NarP_1,56.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:11198: adhamo ravijo vācyo jñātvā caiṣāṃ balābalam // NarP_1,56.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:11208: śubhor'kaḥ śiśire tāmraḥ kuṅkumābhā vasaṃtike // NarP_1,56.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:11214: śaśaraktanibhe bhānau saṃgrāmo na cirādbhuvi // NarP_1,56.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:11217: arke śyāme kīṭabhayaṃ bhasmābhe rāṣṭrajaṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:11240: yāmyaśṛṅgonnato neṣṭaḥ śubhaḥ śukle pipīlikā // NarP_1,56.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:11244: kujādyairnihate śṛṅge maṇḍale vā yathākramam // NarP_1,56.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:11250: kuje trayodaśe ṛkṣe vakrite vā caturdaśe // NarP_1,56.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:11264: triṣūttarāsu rohiṇyāṃ nairṛte śravaṇe mṛge // NarP_1,56.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:11297: dvibhāṭajodimāstasya pañcamaikādaśāstrimādhavaḥ śubhado jyeṣṭo nṛṇāṃ madhyaphalapradaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:11298: śucirmadhyo nabhaḥ śreṣṭho bhādraḥ śreṣṭhaḥ kvacinnaraḥ // NarP_1,56.53 //
GP12nardp1_u:11300: śubhapradau pauṣamādhau madhyamau phaālguno madhuḥ // NarP_1,56.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:11302: śucirmadhyo nabhaḥ śreṣṭho bhādraḥ śreṣṭhaḥ kvacinnara // NarP_1,56.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:11314: hṛdayeśasya nidhanaṃ śubhaṃ syātsaṃyutaiḥ śubhaiḥ // NarP_1,56.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:11316: iti dvijātimadhyāṃ tu gonṛpastrīsukhaṃ mahat // NarP_1,56.62 //
GP12nardp1_u:11325: saumya mārge ca tisṛṣu caranvīthiṣu bhārgavaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:11328: pūrvasyāṃ diśi meghastu śubhadaḥ pitṛpañcake // NarP_1,56.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:11332: undayāstamanaṃ yāti tadā jalamayī mahī // NarP_1,56.70 //
GP12nardp1_u:11341: mukhe caikaṃ gude dve ca trīṇi ke nayane dvayam /
GP12nardp1_u:11342: hṛdaye pañca ṛkṣāṇi vāmahaste catuṣṭayam // NarP_1,56.75 //
GP12nardp1_u:11343: vāmapāde tathā trīṇi dakṣiṇe trīṇe bhāni ca /
GP12nardp1_u:11345: rogo lābhastathā hānirlābhaḥ saukhyaṃ ca bandhanam /
GP12nardp1_u:11346: āyāsaḥ śreṣṭhayātrā ca dhanalābhaḥ kramātphalam // NarP_1,56.77 //
GP12nardp1_u:11350: amṛtyutāṃ gatastatra kheṭastatra kheṭatve parikalpitaḥ // NarP_1,56.79 //
GP12nardp1_u:11354: parveśāstu tathā satyadevā khyāditaḥ kramāt // NarP_1,56.81 //
GP12nardp1_u:11357: tadvadeva phalaṃ saumye śleṣmapīḍā ca parvaṇi /
GP12nardp1_u:11372: no śaktā lakṣituṃ devāḥ kiṃ punaḥ prākṛtā janāḥ // NarP_1,56.90 //
GP12nardp1_u:11374: śubhāśubhānyaiḥ kālasya grāhayāmo hi lakṣaṇam // NarP_1,56.91 //
GP12nardp1_u:11380: nakṣatrasaṃsthitā divyā bhaumā ye bhūmisaṃsthitāḥ // NarP_1,56.94 //
GP12nardp1_u:11399: vikacākhyā gurusutā veṣṭā yāmye sthitā api /
GP12nardp1_u:11404: śukrajā ṛkṣasadṛśāḥ ke tavaḥ śubhadāyakāḥ // NarP_1,56.106 //
GP12nardp1_u:11410: cāndramārkṣaṃ gurormānamiti mānāni vai navaḥ // NarP_1,56.109 //
GP12nardp1_u:11422: aṅgirāḥ śrīmukho bhāvo yuvā dhātā tathaiva ca // NarP_1,56.115 //
GP12nardp1_u:11430: paribhāvī pramādī ca ānando rākṣaso 'nalaḥ // NarP_1,56.119 //
GP12nardp1_u:11440: tatkālaṃ grahacāraṃ ca samyak jñātvā phalaṃ padet // NarP_1,56.124 //
GP12nardp1_u:11442: ahaḥ surāṇāṃ tadrātriḥ karkādyaṃ dakṣiṇāyanam // NarP_1,56.125 //
GP12nardp1_u:11444: madhādau maṅgalaṃ karma vidheyaṃ cottarāyaṇe // NarP_1,56.126 //
GP12nardp1_u:11446: mādhādi māsau dvau dvau ca ṛtavaḥ śiśirādayaḥ // NarP_1,56.127 //
GP12nardp1_u:11448: varṣā śaraśca hemantaḥ karkādvai dakṣiṇāyane // NarP_1,56.128 //
GP12nardp1_u:11449: cāndro darśīvadhiḥ sauraḥ saṃkrātyā sāvano dineḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:11452: nabhasya iṣa ūrjaśca sahāścaiva sahasyakaḥ // NarP_1,56.130 //
GP12nardp1_u:11454: yasminmāse paurṇamāsī yena dhiṣṇena saṃyutā // NarP_1,56.131 //
GP12nardp1_u:11456: tatpakṣau daiva pitrākhyau śuklakṛṣṇau tathāpare // NarP_1,56.132 //
GP12nardp1_u:11457: śubhāśubhe karmaṇi ca praśastau bhavataḥ sadā /
GP12nardp1_u:11466: aṣṭamī dvādaśī ṣaṣṭī caturthī ca caturdaśī // NarP_1,56.137 //
GP12nardp1_u:11469: tyājyāḥ syustāsu tithiṣu kramātpañca ca sarvadā /
GP12nardp1_u:11470: amāvāsyā ca navamī hitvā viṣamasaṃjñikā // NarP_1,56.139 //
GP12nardp1_u:11472: ṣaṣaaṭyāṃ tailaṃ tathāṣṭamyāṃ māsaṃ kṣauraṃ kalestithau // NarP_1,56.140 //
GP12nardp1_u:11474: derśe ṣaṣṭyāṃ pratipadi dvādaśyāṃ pratiparvasu // NarP_1,56.141 //
GP12nardp1_u:11476: vyatīpāte ca saṃkrāntāvekādaśyāṃ ca parvasu // NarP_1,56.142 //
GP12nardp1_u:11478: yaḥ karoti daśamyāṃ ca snānamāmalakairnaraḥ // NarP_1,56.143 //
GP12nardp1_u:11481: amāyāṃ ca navamyāṃ ca saptamyāṃ ca kulakṣayaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:11482: yā paurṇimā divā candramatī sānumatī smṛtā // NarP_1,56.145 //
GP12nardp1_u:11490: caitre bhādrapade caiva tṛtīyā śuklasaṃjñitā // NarP_1,56.149 //
GP12nardp1_u:11492: māghe ca saptamī śuklā nabhasye tvasitāṣṭamī // NarP_1,56.150 //
GP12nardp1_u:11494: āṣāḍhe kārtike māsi jyaṣṭe caitre ca paurṇimā // NarP_1,56.151 //
GP12nardp1_u:11496: bhādre kṛṣṇatrayodaśyāṃ maghāminduḥ kare raviḥ // NarP_1,56.152 //
GP12nardp1_u:11499: tithirvāratraye tvekā hyadhikā dve ca nindite /
GP12nardp1_u:11500: sūryāstamanaparyantaṃ yasminvāre tu yā tithiḥ // NarP_1,56.154 //
GP12nardp1_u:11504: raviḥ sthiraścaraścandraḥ krūro vakrokhilo budhaḥ // NarP_1,56.156 //
GP12nardp1_u:11506: abhyakto bhānuvāre yaḥ sa naraḥ kleśavānbhavet // NarP_1,56.157 //
GP12nardp1_u:11508: jīve naivaṃ site hānirmande sarvasamṛddhayaḥ // NarP_1,56.158 //
GP12nardp1_u:11512: tatkarma balahīnasya duḥkhenāpi na siddhyāti // NarP_1,56.160 //
GP12nardp1_u:11516: dūrvāvarṇo vudho jīvaḥ pītaśvetastu bhārgavaḥ // NarP_1,56.162 //
GP12nardp1_u:11534: adhomukhaṃ tu navakaṃ bhānau tatra vidhīyate // NarP_1,56.171 //
GP12nardp1_u:11538: tiryaṅmukhākhyaṃ navakaṃ bhānau tatra vidhīyate // NarP_1,56.173 //
GP12nardp1_u:11542: ūrddhāsyaṃ navakaṃ bhānāṃ proktamatra vidhīyate // NarP_1,56.175 //
GP12nardp1_u:11546: sādhāraṇaṃ dvidaivatyaṃ vahnibhaṃ ca prakīrtitam // NarP_1,56.177//
GP12nardp1_u:11556: darśāṣṭabhyāṃ caturdaśyāṃ paśūnāṃ na kadācana // NarP_1,56.182 //
GP12nardp1_u:11560: agre vṛddhyai trayaṃ lakṣmye saumyapārśve ca pañcakam // NarP_1,56.184 //
GP12nardp1_u:11562: śriyai puṣṭyai trayaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ syāccakre lāṅgalāhvaye // NarP_1,56.185 //
GP12nardp1_u:11566: gale trayaṃ kajjalāya vṛddhyai ca dvādaśodare // NarP_1,56.187 //
GP12nardp1_u:11568: nābhau vahniḥ pañcakaṃ yadvījoptāviti cintayet // NarP_1,56.188 //
GP12nardp1_u:11592: krūraviddho yuto vāpipuṣyo yadi balānvitaḥ // NarP_1,56.200 //
GP12nardp1_u:11598: yā dṛśyante dīptatārāḥ svagaṇe yogatārakāḥ // NarP_1,56.203 //
GP12nardp1_u:11621: vyāgaghāte nava śūle tu pañca nāḍyo hi garhitāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:11625: tatra ravārjūrike cakre kathitaṃ mūrdhni bhaṃ nyaset /
GP12nardp1_u:11633: parītā viparītā vā viṣyirneṣṭā tu maṅgale /
GP12nardp1_u:11634: mukhe pañcagale caikā vakṣasyekādaśa smṛtaḥ // NarP_1,56.221 //
GP12nardp1_u:11635: nābhau catasraḥ ṣaṭ kaṭyāṃ tisraḥ pucchākhyanājikāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:11637: kaṭyāmunmattatā nābhau cyutiḥ pucche dhruvaṃ jayaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:11641: aryamā bhagasaṃjñaśca vijñeyā daśa pañca ca /
GP12nardp1_u:11649: yeṣu ṛkṣeṣu yatkarma kathitaṃ nikhilaṃ ca tat /
GP12nardp1_u:11650: taddaivatye muhūrte 'pi kāryaṃ yātrādikaṃ sadā // NarP_1,56.229 //
GP12nardp1_u:11652: śūlo 'ṣṭame ca daśame śāniraṣṭādaśe tataḥ // NarP_1,56.230 //
GP12nardp1_u:11660: dhiṣṇye tāvati satyatra duṣṭayogaḥ patatyasau // NarP_1,56.234 //
GP12nardp1_u:11675: hastarkṣaṃ ca khārvidau candrabhaṃ dasrabhaṃ kuje /
GP12nardp1_u:11676: saumye mitrabhamācāryaṃ tiṣyaḥ pauṣṇaṃ bhṛgoḥ sute // NarP_1,56.242/
GP12nardp1_u:11679: jayāsaumye gurau riktā śanaupūrṇeti no śubhāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:11680: nandā tithiḥ śukravāre saumye bhadrā kuje jayā // NarP_1,56.244 //
GP12nardp1_u:11681: riktā mande gurorvāre pūrṇā siddhāhvayā amī /
GP12nardp1_u:11683: ṣaṣṭī gurau tṛtīyā jñe 'ṣṭamī śukre śanaiścare /
GP12nardp1_u:11684: navamī pañcamī bhaume dagdhayogāḥ prakīrtitāḥ // NarP_1,56.246 //
GP12nardp1_u:11686: budhe śraviṣṭāryamabhe gurau jyeṣṭā bhṛgordine // NarP_1,56.247 //
GP12nardp1_u:11695: anuktānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ ghorādyāḥ sukhadāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:11704: bhuśuḍī ca gadākhaḍgau daṇḍa iṣaavāsatomarau // NarP_1,56.256 //
GP12nardp1_u:11706: annaṃ ca pāyasaṃ bhaikṣyaṃ sayūṣaṃ ca payo dadhi // NarP_1,56.257 //
GP12nardp1_u:11710: catuḥ pāde tilenāge suptaḥ krāntiṃ karoti hi // NarP_1,56.259 //
GP12nardp1_u:11711: dharmāyurvṛṣṭiṣu samaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ naṣṭaṃ phalaṃ kramāt /
GP12nardp1_u:11712: āyudhaṃ vāhanāhārau yajjātīyaṃ janasya ca // NarP_1,56.260 //
GP12nardp1_u:11714: andhakaṃ mandasaṃjñaṃ ca madhyasaṃjñaṃ sulocanam // NarP_1,56.261 //
GP12nardp1_u:11720: medhyā viṣuvati proktāḥ puṇyanāḍyastu ṣoḍaśa // NarP_1,56.264 //
GP12nardp1_u:11724: naraḥ prāpnoti tadrāśau śītāṃśoḥ sādhvasādhu ca // NarP_1,56.266 //
GP12nardp1_u:11728: vratodvāhādikeṣveva dvayaṃ neṣṭaṃ tu tatkramāt // NarP_1,56.268 //
GP12nardp1_u:11737: tryāyāriṣu kujaḥ śreṣṭho janmanā cenna vidhyate /
GP12nardp1_u:11749: niṣphalau tau grahau svena śatruṇā ca vilokitau /
GP12nardp1_u:11750: nīcarāśigataḥ svasya śatroḥ kṣetragato 'pi vā // NarP_1,56.279 //
GP12nardp1_u:11754: maṇirmuktāphalaṃ vidrumākhyaṃ maraka taṃ tathā // NarP_1,56.281 //
GP12nardp1_u:11756: dūryyaṃ bhāskarādīnāṃ tuṣṭya dhāryaṃ yathākramam // NarP_1,56.282 //
GP12nardp1_u:11761: janma saṃpadvipat kṣema pratyariḥ sādhako vadhaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:11762: mitraṃ paramamitraṃ ca janmabhāttu punaḥ puna // NarP_1,56.285 //
GP12nardp1_u:11764: śākaṃ guḍaṃ ca lavaṇaṃ satilaṃ kāñcanaṃ kramāt // NarP_1,56.286 //
GP12nardp1_u:11766: kṛṣṇe balavatī tārā śuklapakṣe balū śaśī /
GP12nardp1_u:11784: kanyā lagne vidheyaṃ ca pauṣṭikākhilamaṅgalam // NarP_1,56.295 //
GP12nardp1_u:11786: tulāyāmakhilaṃ karma tulābhārāśrite ca yat // NarP_1,56.296 //
GP12nardp1_u:11804: ante tucchaphale lagne sarvasminnevameva hi // NarP_1,56.305 //
GP12nardp1_u:11806: kalpyāmadindau balini saptame balino grahāḥ // NarP_1,56.306 //
GP12nardp1_u:11812: lagnodbhavaṃ phalaṃ dhatte dhanātīto dvitīyakam // NarP_1,56.309 //
GP12nardp1_u:11816: doṣādduṣṭo hi kālastamapi mārṣṭuṃ pitāmahaḥ // NarP_1,56.311 //
GP12nardp1_u:11821: rugṇā patipriyā duḥkhī putriṇī bhogamī tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:11824: tārakā na hitā māsā madhūrjaśucipauṣakāḥ // NarP_1,56.315 //
GP12nardp1_u:11829: ādyā niśaścatasrastu tyājyā hyapi samāḥ paraiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:11833: prasiddhe prathame garbhe tṛtīye vā dvitīyake /
GP12nardp1_u:11834: māse puṃsavanaṃ kāryaṃ sīmantaṃ ca yathā tathā // NarP_1,56.320 //
GP12nardp1_u:11835: caturthe māsi ṣaṣṭe vāpyaṣṭame vā tadīśvare /
GP12nardp1_u:11844: sīmantinīṃ vā tadgarbhaṃ balī hṝnti na saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,56.325 //
GP12nardp1_u:11852: candrātārābalopete divase ca śiśoḥ pituḥ // NarP_1,56.329 //
GP12nardp1_u:11854: ṣaṣṭe māsyaṣṭame vāpi puṃsāṃ strīṇāṃ tu pañcame // NarP_1,56.330 //
GP12nardp1_u:11855: saptame māsi vā kāryaṃ navānnapraśanaṃ śubham /
GP12nardp1_u:11860: pūrvārddhe saumyakheṭena saṃyukte vīkṣitepi vā // NarP_1,56.333 //
GP12nardp1_u:11874: abhyakte sandhyayornāre niśi bhuktvā na vāhave // NarP_1,56.340 //
GP12nardp1_u:11875: notkaṭe bhūṣite naiva yāne na navame 'hni ca /
GP12nardp1_u:11881: navame saptame vāpi pañcame divase 'pi vā /
GP12nardp1_u:11884: āśiṣo vācanaṃ kāryaṃ puṇyaṃ puṇyāṅganādibhiḥ // NarP_1,56.345 //
GP12nardp1_u:11890: rājñā mekādaśe maiñjībandhanaṃ dvādaśe viśām // NarP_1,56.348 //
GP12nardp1_u:11902: upanīto balāḍhyaśca jyeṣṭhe vidhividāṃ varaḥ // NarP_1,56.354 //
GP12nardp1_u:11903: śuklapakṣe dvitīyā ca tṛtīyā pañcamī tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:11904: trayodaśī ca daśamī saptamī vratabandhane // NarP_1,56.355 //
GP12nardp1_u:11913: vārau tu madhyamau caiva vrate 'nyau ninditau matau /
GP12nardp1_u:11914: tridhā vibhajya divasaṃ tatrādau karma daivikam // NarP_1,56.360 //
GP12nardp1_u:11915: dvitīye mānuṣaṃ kāryaṃ tṛtīye ḥṃśe ca paitṛkam /
GP12nardp1_u:11916: svanīcage tadaṃśe vā svāribhe vā tadaṃśake // NarP_1,56.361 //
GP12nardp1_u:11918: svādhiśatrugṛhasthe vā tadaṃśasthe 'tha vā vratī // NarP_1,56.362 //
GP12nardp1_u:11920: svoccasaṃsthe tadaṃśe vā svarāśau rāśige gaṇe // NarP_1,56.363 //
GP12nardp1_u:11921: śākheśe vā gurau śukre kendrage vā trikoṇage /
GP12nardp1_u:11923: paramoccagate jīve śākheśe vātha vā sate /
GP12nardp1_u:11926: gurau bhṛgau vā śākheśe vidyādhanasamanvitaḥ // NarP_1,56.366 //
GP12nardp1_u:11928: śaākhādhipatilagnaṃ ca durlabhaṃ tritayaṃ vrate // NarP_1,56.367 //
GP12nardp1_u:11934: lagne tu nidhane saumyaiḥ saṃyute vā nirīkṣite // NarP_1,56.370 //
GP12nardp1_u:11946: na karoti śiśuṃ niḥsvaṃ sarvataḥ kṣayarogiṇam // NarP_1,56.376 //
GP12nardp1_u:11952: caturthī vā śubhāḥ proktā aṣṭāvete galagrahāḥ // NarP_1,56.379 //
GP12nardp1_u:11965: ghūmrāye maraṇaṃ siṃhe jayaḥ śuni ca rogitā /
GP12nardp1_u:11966: dhanalābho vṛṣe 'tyantaṃ duḥkhī bhavati gardabhe // NarP_1,56.386 //
GP12nardp1_u:11973: sthito dhvaje vṛṣāye vā naṣṭācetpūrvato vraṇam /
GP12nardp1_u:11980: pratipatparvariktā mā cāṣṭamī ca dinatrayam // NarP_1,56.393 //
GP12nardp1_u:11983: sukhaṃ tatrāpi bhāminyāṃ śīlavatyāṃ sthitaṃ tataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:11984: tasyāḥ sacchīlarlā dhastu sulagnavaśataḥ khalu // NarP_1,56.395 //
GP12nardp1_u:11994: mṛtaputrātha vā kanyā kulaṭā vā na saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,56.400 //
GP12nardp1_u:11998: vīkṣitāḥ pṛcchatāṃ nṝṇāṃ kanyālābho bhavettadā // NarP_1,56.402 //
GP12nardp1_u:12004: pāpadṛṣṭo 'tha vā randhre na saṃbandho bhavettadā // NarP_1,56.405 //
GP12nardp1_u:12012: tadā kuryātpitā tasyāḥ pradānaṃ prītipūrvakam // NarP_1,56.409 //
GP12nardp1_u:12014: varāya ca rūpavatīṃ kanyāṃ dadyādyavīyasīm // NarP_1,56.410 //
GP12nardp1_u:12015: saṃpūjya prārthayitvā ca śacīṃ devīṃ guṇāśrayām /
GP12nardp1_u:12020: evaṃvidhāṃ kumārīṃ tāṃ pūjānte prārthayediti // NarP_1,56.413 //
GP12nardp1_u:12022: vivāhe bhāgyamārogyaṃ putralābhaṃ ca dehi me // NarP_1,56.414 //
GP12nardp1_u:12026: madhyamā kārtiko mārgaśīrṣo vai ninditāḥ pare // NarP_1,56.416 //
GP12nardp1_u:12028: vivāho devatānāṃ ca pratiṣṭāṃ copanāyanam // NarP_1,56.417 //
GP12nardp1_u:12030: na gurau siṃharāśisthe siṃhāṃśakagatepi vā // NarP_1,56.418 //
GP12nardp1_u:12032: buddhaḥ pañcadinaṃ pakṣaṃ guruḥ pakṣaṃ ca sarvataḥ // NarP_1,56.419 //
GP12nardp1_u:12035: na janmamāse janmarkṣe na janmadivase 'pi ca /
GP12nardp1_u:12040: nākhile tridinaṃ neṣṭaṃ tridyuspṛk ca kṣayaṃ tathā // NarP_1,56.423 //
GP12nardp1_u:12042: saṃdhyāyāṃ tridinaṃ tadvanniśīthe sapta eva ca // NarP_1,56.424 //
GP12nardp1_u:12044: vyatīpātaṃ vaidhṛtiṃ ca saṃpūrṇaṃ parighārddhakam // NarP_1,56.425 //
GP12nardp1_u:12048: cetpūjā yatnataḥ kāryā durbala grahayostayoḥ // NarP_1,56.427 //
GP12nardp1_u:12052: tithirekaguṇā vāro dviguṇastriguṇaṃ ca bham // NarP_1,56.429 //
GP12nardp1_u:12054: tato manahūrto balavāṃstato lagnaṃ balādhikam // NarP_1,56.430 //
GP12nardp1_u:12056: tato navāṃśo balavāndvādaśāṃśo balī tataḥ // NarP_1,56.431 //
GP12nardp1_u:12066: tṛtīyaḥ pāpaṣaḍvargo bhṛguḥ ṣaṣṭaḥ kujo 'ṣṭamaḥ // NarP_1,56.436 //
GP12nardp1_u:12079: evaṃ tau na yutau dṛṣṭau mutyurvadhvāḥ karagrahe /
GP12nardp1_u:12080: tyājyāḥ sūryasya saṃkrānteḥ pūrvataḥ paratastathā // NarP_1,56.443 //
GP12nardp1_u:12084: uccage śubhasaṃyukte tallagnaṃ sarvadā tyajet // NarP_1,56.445 //
GP12nardp1_u:12086: śubhatrayayutaṃ lagnaṃ na tyajettuṅgago yadi // NarP_1,56.446 //
GP12nardp1_u:12093: ugraṃ ca saṃdhitritayaṃ gaṇḍātaṃ trividhaṃ mahat /
GP12nardp1_u:12100: uccage nīcage vāpi mitrabhe śatrurāśige // NarP_1,56.453 //
GP12nardp1_u:12104: sūryeṇa saṃyute candre dāridyaṃ bhavati sphuṭam // NarP_1,56.455 //
GP12nardp1_u:12106: daurbhāgyaṃ guruṇā yukte sāpatyaṃ bhārgaveṇa tu // NarP_1,56.456 //
GP12nardp1_u:12108: ketunā saṃyute candre nityaṃ kaṣṭaṃ daridratā // NarP_1,56.457 //
GP12nardp1_u:12112: svoccago vā svarkṣago vā mitra kṣetragatopi vā // NarP_1,56.459 //
GP12nardp1_u:12116: sa rāśiḥ śubhasaṃyukto lagnaṃ vā śubhasaṃyutam // NarP_1,56.461 //
GP12nardp1_u:12118: daṃpatyordvādaśaṃ lagnaṃ rāśirvā yadi lagnagaḥ // NarP_1,56.462 //
GP12nardp1_u:12138: yāvacca śaśinā bhuktvā muktabhaṃ dagdhakāṣṭavat // NarP_1,56.472 //
GP12nardp1_u:12142: krūraviddhaṃ yutaṃ dhiṣṇyaṃ nikhilaṃ naiva maṅgalam // NarP_1,56.474 //
GP12nardp1_u:12144: ete navāṃśāḥ śubhadā vṛṣabhasyāṃśakāḥ khalu // NarP_1,56.475 //
GP12nardp1_u:12146: anye navāṃśā na grāhyā yataste kunavāṃśakāḥ // NarP_1,56.476 //
GP12nardp1_u:12157: bṛhaspatiḥ kendragataḥ śukro vā yadi vā budhaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12158: eko 'pi doṣanicayaṃ haratyeva na saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,56.482 //
GP12nardp1_u:12159: tiryakpañcorddhūgāḥ pañca rekhā dve dve ca koṇayoḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12162: purataḥ pṛṣṭator'kādyā dinarkṣaṃ lattayanti yat // NarP_1,56.484 //
GP12nardp1_u:12166: saurāṣṭre sālvadeśe tu lattitaṃ bhaṃ vivarjayet // NarP_1,56.486 //
GP12nardp1_u:12168: bāhlike kurudeśe cānyasmindeśe na dūṣaṇam // NarP_1,56.487 //
GP12nardp1_u:12170: madhyadeśe vivarjyāni na dṛṣṭānītareṣu ca // NarP_1,56.488 //
GP12nardp1_u:12173: doṣaduṣṭaṃ sadā kālaṃ sannimārṣṭuṃ na śakyate /
GP12nardp1_u:12174: api dhāturato grāhyaṃ doṣālpatvaṃ guṇādhikam // NarP_1,56.490 //
GP12nardp1_u:12188: uttamaṃ madhyamaṃ bhinnaṃ rāśyaikatvaṃ yayostayoḥ // NarP_1,56.497 //
GP12nardp1_u:12191: dvitīye madhyamaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ tṛtīye navake nṛbham /
GP12nardp1_u:12202: dvirdādaśe trikoṇe ca na kadācitṣaḍaṣṭake // NarP_1,56.504 //
GP12nardp1_u:12219: prācyā na ca kaliṅgānāṃ mukhyaṃ godhūlikaṃ smṛtam /
GP12nardp1_u:12228: na caikajanyayoḥ puṃsorekajanye tu kanyake // NarP_1,56.517 //
GP12nardp1_u:12230: divājātastu pitaraṃ rātrau tu jananīṃ tathā // NarP_1,56.518 //
GP12nardp1_u:12232: sutaḥ sutā vā niyataṃ śvasuraṃ hṝnti mūlajaḥ // NarP_1,56.519 //
GP12nardp1_u:12234: jyeṣṭāntyapādajau jyeṣṭaṃ bālo hṝnti na bālikā // NarP_1,56.520 //
GP12nardp1_u:12236: saindrī dhavāgrajaṃ hṝnti devaraṃ tu dvidaivajā // NarP_1,56.521 //
GP12nardp1_u:12240: saṃtyajya hyatiśukre 'pi yātrā vaivāhikī śubhā // NarP_1,56.523 //
GP12nardp1_u:12245: dineṣu yasya devasya yā titistatra tasya ca /
GP12nardp1_u:12252: śubhalagne śubhāṃśe ca kartturna nidhanodaye // NarP_1,56.529 //
GP12nardp1_u:12254: pañcāṣṭake śubhe lagne naidhane śuddhisaṃyute // NarP_1,56.530 //
GP12nardp1_u:12259: caturthe sukhadāḥ saumyāḥ krūrāḥ kheṭāśca duḥkhadāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12260: glānidāḥ pañcame krūrāḥ saumyāḥ putrasukhapradāḥ // NarP_1,56.533 //
GP12nardp1_u:12261: ṣaṣṭe śubhāḥ śatrudāḥ syuḥ pāpāḥ śabrukṣayaṅkarāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12262: vyādhidāḥ saptame pāpāḥ saumyāḥ śubhaphalapradāḥ // NarP_1,56.534 //
GP12nardp1_u:12264: dharme pāpā ghnanti saumyāḥ śubhadā maṅgalapradāḥ // NarP_1,56.535 //
GP12nardp1_u:12270: guṇādhikatare lagne doṣaḥ svalpataro yadi // NarP_1,56.538 //
GP12nardp1_u:12275: sitaṃ raktaṃ ca haritaṃ kṛṣṇavarṇaṃ yathākramam /
GP12nardp1_u:12276: madhuraṃ kaṭukaṃ tiktaṃ kaṣāyakarasaṃ kramāt // NarP_1,56.541 //
