GP12nardp1_u:12280: atyantavṛddhiradhike hīne hāniḥ same samam // NarP_1,56.543 //
GP12nardp1_u:12282: prātardṛṣṭe jale vṛddhiḥ samaṃ paṅke kṣayaḥ kṣaye // NarP_1,56.544 //
GP12nardp1_u:12288: āyāmeṣu caturdikṣu prāgādiṣu ca satsvapi // NarP_1,56.547 //
GP12nardp1_u:12300: paścime dakṣiṇe vāpi kapāṭaṃ sthāpayedgṛhe // NarP_1,56.553 //
GP12nardp1_u:12312: akārādiṣu bhāgṣu dikṣu prāgādiṣu kramāt // NarP_1,56.559 //
GP12nardp1_u:12315: sādhyavargaḥ puraḥ sthāpya pṛṣṭataḥ sādhakaṃ nyaset /
GP12nardp1_u:12316: vyatyaye nāśanaṃ tasya ṛṇamadhyaṃ dhanācchubham // NarP_1,56.561 //
GP12nardp1_u:12318: vibhejetsaptabhiḥ śeṣaṃ sādhakasya dhanaṃ tadā // NarP_1,56.562 //
GP12nardp1_u:12322: viṣamāyaḥ śubhaghāyaiva samāyo nirdhanāya ca // NarP_1,56.564 //
GP12nardp1_u:12324: ātmakṣayaḥ saptamarkṣe bhavatyeva hi bhartṛbhāt // NarP_1,56.565 //
GP12nardp1_u:12334: sabalo mukhagehānāmeṣa doṣo na vidyate // NarP_1,56.570 //
GP12nardp1_u:12336: gṛhamadhye hastamātre garte nyāsāya vinyaset // NarP_1,56.571 //
GP12nardp1_u:12343: śakuṃ tridhā vibhajyāndyaṃ caturasraṃ tataḥ param /
GP12nardp1_u:12344: aṣṭāsraṃ ca tṛtīyāsau manvasraṃ mṛdumavraṇam // NarP_1,56.575 //
GP12nardp1_u:12350: śubhekṣite 'tha vā yukte lagne śaṅkuṃ vinikṣipet // NarP_1,56.578 //
GP12nardp1_u:12355: tāḥ punaḥ ṣaḍvidhāḥ śālāḥ pratyekaṃ daśaṣaḍvidhāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12356: dhruvaṃ dhānyaṃ jayaṃ nandaṃ kharaḥ kāntaṃ manoramam // NarP_1,56.581 //
GP12nardp1_u:12357: sumukhaṃ durmukhaṃ krūraṃ śatruṃ svarṇapradaṃ kṣayam /
GP12nardp1_u:12358: ākrandaṃ vipulākhya ca vijayaṃ ṣoḍaśaṃ gṛham // NarP_1,56.582 //
GP12nardp1_u:12366: pratīcyāṃ bhojanagṛhaṃ vā yavyāṃ dhānyamadiram // NarP_1,56.586 //
GP12nardp1_u:12372: dhvajo dhūmrotha siṃhaḥ śvā saurameyaḥ kharo gajāḥ // NarP_1,56.589 //
GP12nardp1_u:12382: pāñcālamānaṃ vaidehaṃ kauravaṃ ca kujanyakam // NarP_1,56.594 //
GP12nardp1_u:12388: avantimānaṃ viprāṇāṃ gāndhāraṃ kṣatriyasya ca // NarP_1,56.597 //
GP12nardp1_u:12392: paśuśālāśca śālānāṃ dhvajāyepyatha vā gaje // NarP_1,56.599 //
GP12nardp1_u:12402: sūryaḥ śaśī mṛgākāśau vāyuḥ pūṣā ca nairṛtiḥ // NarP_1,56.604 //
GP12nardp1_u:12408: ekāntarā syuḥ prāgādyāḥ parito brahmaṇaḥ smṛtāḥ // NarP_1,56.607 //
GP12nardp1_u:12410: mitrotha rājayakṣmā ca tathā pṛthvīdharāhvayaḥ // NarP_1,56.608 //
GP12nardp1_u:12414: tanmadhye viṃśatirbāhyā dvipadāste tu sarvadā // NarP_1,56.610 //
GP12nardp1_u:12415: aryamā ca vivasvāṃśca mitraḥ pṛthvī dharāhvayaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12416: brahmaṇaḥ pārito dikṣu catvārastripadāḥ smṛtāḥ // NarP_1,56.611 //
GP12nardp1_u:12422: tāmbūlaṃ ca tataḥ kartā prārthayedvāstupūruṣam // NarP_1,56.614 //
GP12nardp1_u:12426: dadyāttadagre viprebhyo bhojanaṃ ca svaśaktitaḥ // NarP_1,56.616 //
GP12nardp1_u:12428: ārogyaṃ putralābhaṃ ca dhanaṃ dhānyaṃ labhennaraḥ // NarP_1,56.617 //
GP12nardp1_u:12432: gṛhaṃ na praviśedevaṃ vipadāmākaraṃ hi tat // NarP_1,56.619 //
GP12nardp1_u:12438: yātrā śuklapratipadi nirddhanāya kṣayāya ca // NarP_1,56.622 //
GP12nardp1_u:12441: na mandendudine prācīṃ na vrajeddakṣiṇaṃ gurau /
GP12nardp1_u:12448: digrāśayastu kramaśo meṣādyāśca punaḥ punaḥ // NarP_1,56.627 //
GP12nardp1_u:12450: lagnastho bhāskaraḥ prācyāṃ diśi yāturlalāṭagaḥ // NarP_1,56.628 //
GP12nardp1_u:12454: lagnātsaptamagaḥ sauriḥ pratīcyāṃ tu lalāṭagaḥ // NarP_1,56.630 //
GP12nardp1_u:12460: tasya bhaṅgaprado rājñasta dvargo 'pi vilagnagaḥ // NarP_1,56.633 //
GP12nardp1_u:12464: pratiśukrakṛtaṃ doṣaṃ hṝntuṃ śaktā grahā na hi // NarP_1,56.635 //
GP12nardp1_u:12466: eteṣāṃ pañcagotrāṇāṃ pratiśukro na vidyate // NarP_1,56.636 //
GP12nardp1_u:12468: dvijakṣobhe nṛpakṣobhe pratiśukro na vidyate // NarP_1,56.637 //
GP12nardp1_u:12476: yāne sthirodaye neṣṭo bhavyayuktekṣitaḥ svayam // NarP_1,56.641 //
GP12nardp1_u:12480: tābhyāṃ tayorikendreṣu yātuḥ śatrukṣayo bhavet // NarP_1,56.643 //
GP12nardp1_u:12482: śubhavārgotha vā lagne yātuḥ śatrukṣayastadā // NarP_1,56.644 //
GP12nardp1_u:12484: tayorīśasthite rāśau yātuḥ śatrukṣayo bhavet // NarP_1,56.645 //
GP12nardp1_u:12488: mūrtiḥ kośo dhanvinaśca vāhanaṃ mantrasaṃjñakam // NarP_1,56.647 //
GP12nardp1_u:12492: na nighnato hi vyāpāraṃ saumyāḥḍha puṣṇantyariṃ vinā // NarP_1,56.649 //
GP12nardp1_u:12493: śukro 'staṃ ca na puṣṇāti mūrtiṃ mṛtyuṃ ca candramāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12502: yoge 'pi yāyināṃ kṣemamadhiyoge jayo bhavet // NarP_1,56.654 //
GP12nardp1_u:12510: lagne śukre ravau lābhe candre bandhusthite yadā // NarP_1,56.658 //
GP12nardp1_u:12512: svoccasaṃsthe site lagne svocce candre ca lābhage // NarP_1,56.659 //
GP12nardp1_u:12514: trikoṇe kendragāḥ saumyāḥ krūrāstryāyārigā yadi // NarP_1,56.660 //
GP12nardp1_u:12518: trikhaḍāyeṣu mandārau balavantaḥ śubhā yadi // NarP_1,56.662 //
GP12nardp1_u:12520: svoñcasthe lagnage jīve candre lābhagate yadi // NarP_1,56.663 //
GP12nardp1_u:12521: gato rājā ripūnhati pinākī tripuraṃ yathā /
GP12nardp1_u:12524: jīvaṃ lagnagate śukre kendre vāpi trikoṇage // NarP_1,56.665 //
GP12nardp1_u:12526: lagnage jñe śubhe kendre dhiṣṇye copakule gataḥ // NarP_1,56.666 //
GP12nardp1_u:12528: śubhi trikoṇe kendrasthe lābhe candre 'thavā ravī // NarP_1,56.667 //
GP12nardp1_u:12529: śatrūnhanti gato rājā hyandhakāraṃ yathā raviḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12530: svakṣetrage śubhe kadre trikoṇoyagate gataḥ // NarP_1,56.668 //
GP12nardp1_u:12532: indau svasthe gurau kendre mantraḥ sapraṇavo gataḥ // NarP_1,56.669 //
GP12nardp1_u:12536: śubhe kendre trikoṇasthe candre vargottame gataḥ // NarP_1,56.671 //
GP12nardp1_u:12538: mitrabhe 'tha gurau kendre trikoṇasthe 'tha vā site // NarP_1,56.672 //
GP12nardp1_u:12539: śatrūnhṝnti gato rājā bhujaṅgān garuḍo yathā /
GP12nardp1_u:12542: ye nṛpā yāntyarīñjetuṃ teṣāṃ yogairnṛpāhvayaiḥ // NarP_1,56.674 //
GP12nardp1_u:12549: asamāpte na kurvīta yātrāṃ martyo jijīviṣuḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12551: vastrādeḥ skhalite krodhe durukte na vrajennṛpaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12554: sajjikā paramānnaṃ ca kāñjika ca payo dadhi // NarP_1,56.680 //
GP12nardp1_u:12556: kulmāṣāṃśca tilānnaṃ ca dadhi kṣaudraṃ ghṛtaṃ payaḥ // NarP_1,56.681 //
GP12nardp1_u:12557: mṛgamāṃsaṃ ca tatsāraṃ pāyasaṃ ca khagaṃ mṛgam /
GP12nardp1_u:12560: haviṣyaṃ kṛśarānnaṃ ca mudgānnaṃ yavapiṣṭikam // NarP_1,56.683 //
GP12nardp1_u:12576: prāṇināṃ prāṇarūpaṃ taṃ dvibāhuṃ daṇḍapāṇikam // NarP_1,56.691 //
GP12nardp1_u:12582: aprayāṇe svayaṃ kāryā prekṣayā bhūbhujastathā // NarP_1,56.694 //
GP12nardp1_u:12586: dinānyekatra na vasetsaptaṣṭ vā paro janaḥ // NarP_1,56.696 //
GP12nardp1_u:12589: utpāteṣu trividheṣu saptarātraṃ tu na vrajet /
GP12nardp1_u:12594: kṛṣṇaṃ tyaktvā prayāṇe tu kṛkalāsena vīkṣitaḥ // NarP_1,56.700 //
GP12nardp1_u:12598: dṛṣṭamātreṇa yātrāyāṃ vyastaṃ sarvaṃ praveśane // NarP_1,56.702 //
GP12nardp1_u:12612: vedamaṅgalaghoṣāḥ syuḥ yā yināṃ kāryasiddhidāḥ // NarP_1,56.709 //
GP12nardp1_u:12614: smṛtvā dvitīye viprāṇāṃ kṛtvā pūjāṃ nivartayet // NarP_1,56.710 //
GP12nardp1_u:12626: divā vā yadi vā rātrau praveśo maṅgalapradaḥ // NarP_1,56.716 //
GP12nardp1_u:12628: sthiralagne sthirāṃśe ca naidhane śuddhisaṃyute // NarP_1,56.717 //
GP12nardp1_u:12634: kṛtvārkaṃ vāmato vidvānbhṛṅgāraṃ cāgrato viśet // NarP_1,56.720 //
GP12nardp1_u:12636: kendrage vā śuklapakṣe cātivṛṣṭiḥ śubhekṣite // NarP_1,56.721 //
GP12nardp1_u:12644: pravarṣaṇaṃ bhṛguḥ kuryādviparīte na varṣaṇam // NarP_1,56.725 //
GP12nardp1_u:12646: tadā vṛṣṭiṃ prakurvanti na te cetpratilomagāḥ // NarP_1,56.726 //
GP12nardp1_u:12652: candrejye jñetha vā śukre kendrenbītirvinaśyati // NarP_1,56.729 //
GP12nardp1_u:12656: siṃhe bhinne kujo vṛṣṭirabhinne karkaṭe tathā // NarP_1,56.731 //
GP12nardp1_u:12658: ahirbudhnyaṃ pūrvaśasyaṃ paraśasyā ca revatī // NarP_1,56.732 //
GP12nardp1_u:12660: guroḥ saptamarā tisthaḥ pratyaggo bhṛgujo yadā // NarP_1,56.733 //
GP12nardp1_u:12670: udayāstamaye kāle vivarṇor'ketha vā śaśī // NarP_1,56.738 //
GP12nardp1_u:12672: prāṅmukhasya tu kūrmasya navāṅgeṣu dharāmimām // NarP_1,56.739 //
GP12nardp1_u:12684: nābhyādiṣu navāṅgeṣu pāpairduṣṭaṃ śubhaiḥ śubham // NarP_1,56.745 //
GP12nardp1_u:12685: devatā yatra nṛtyanti patanti prajvalanti ca /
GP12nardp1_u:12686: muhū rudanti gāyanti prasvidyanti hasaṃti ca // NarP_1,56.746 //
GP12nardp1_u:12687: vamantyagniṃ tathā dhūmaṃ snehaṃ raktaṃ payo jalam /
GP12nardp1_u:12689: evamādyā hi dṛśyante vikārāḥ pratimāsu ca /
GP12nardp1_u:12692: gāndharvaṃ dehadigdhūmaṃ bhūmikaṃpaṃ divā niśi // NarP_1,56.749 //
GP12nardp1_u:12693: anagnau ca sphuliṅgāśca jvalanaṃ ca vinendhanam /
GP12nardp1_u:12696: jantavo dvitriśiraso jāyante vāpi yoniṣu // NarP_1,56.751 //
GP12nardp1_u:12700: akāle puṣpitā vṛkṣā dṛśyante phalitā yadi // NarP_1,56.753 //
GP12nardp1_u:12704: madhyādbhayaṃ yaśo mṛtyuḥ kṣayaḥ kīrtiḥ sukhāsukham // NarP_1,56.755 //
GP12nardp1_u:12705: aisvaryaṃ dhanahāniṃ ca madhucchannaṃ ca vālmikam /
GP12nardp1_u:12708: ityetatkathitaṃ vipra jyautiṣaṃ te samāsataḥ // NarP_1,56.757 //
GP12nardp1_u:12709: ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi cchandaḥ śāstramanuttamam // NarP_1,56.758 //
GP12nardp1_u:12716: sarvago magaṇaḥ prokto mukhalo yagaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12717: madhyalo ragaṇaśvaiva prāntyagaḥ sagaṇo mataḥ // NarP_1,57.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:12727: lakṣma bhinnaṃ yasya pādacatuṣke viṣamaṃ hi tat // NarP_1,57.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:12731: tribhiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ padairgāthāḥ śṛṇu saṃjñā yathottaram // NarP_1,57.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:12735: śakkarī sātipūrvā ca aṣṭyatyaṣṭī tataḥ smṛte // NarP_1,57.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:12739: pāde sarvagurau pūrvīllaghuṃ sthāpya guroradhaḥ // NarP_1,57.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:12742: naṣṭāṅkārddhe same laḥ syādvipam saiva sorddhagaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12754: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne dvitīyapāde saṅkṣiptacchandovarṇanaṃ nāma saptapañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:12767: vīryeṇa saṃmataḥ putro mama bhūyāditi sma ha /
GP12nardp1_u:12770: atiṣṭanmārutāhāraḥ śataṃ kila samāḥ prabhuḥ // NarP_1,58.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:12776: tatra rudro mahādevaḥ karṇikāramayīṃ śubhām // NarP_1,58.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:12778: tasnin divye vane ramye devadevarṣisaṃkule // NarP_1,58.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:12780: na cāsya hīyate varṇo na glānirupajāyate // NarP_1,58.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:12784: evaṃ vidhena tapasā tasya bhaktyā ca nārada // NarP_1,58.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:12788: yathā khe ca tathā śuddho bhaviṣyati sutastaṃva // NarP_1,58.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:12790: tejasā tasya lokāṃstrīnyaśaḥ prāpsyati kevalam // NarP_1,58.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:12791: evaṃ labdhvā varaṃ devo vyāsaḥ satyavatīsutaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12793: atha rūpaṃ paraṃ vipra bibhratīṃ svena tejasā /
GP12nardp1_u:12797: sā tu kṛtvā tadā vyāsaṃ kāmasaṃvignamānasam /
GP12nardp1_u:12801: sa tu mahatā nigṛhṇan hṛcchayaṃ muniḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12802: na śaśāka niyantuṃ taṃ vyāsaḥ pravisṛtaṃ manaḥ // NarP_1,58.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:12806: śukre nirmathyamāne 'syāṃ śuko jajñe mahātapāḥ // NarP_1,58.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:12809: tathā rūpaḥ śuko jajñe prajvalanniva tejasā /
GP12nardp1_u:12811: taṃ gaṅgāṃ saritāṃ śreṣṭhāṃ merupṛṣṭhe svarūpiṇīm /
GP12nardp1_u:12812: abhyetya snāpayāmāsa vāriṇā svena nārada // NarP_1,58.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:12820: divyāni sarvapuṣpāṇi pravavarṣa ca mārutaḥ // NarP_1,58.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:12822: taṃ mahātmā svayaṃ prītyā devyā saha mahādyutiḥ // NarP_1,58.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:12825: dadau kamaṇḍaluṃ prītyā devā vāsāṃsi cābhitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12828: āraṇe yastadā divyaṃ prāpya janma mahāmuniḥ // NarP_1,58.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:12830: utpannamātraṃ taṃ vedāḥ sarahasyāḥ sasaṃgrahāḥ // NarP_1,58.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:12832: bṛhaspatiṃ sa vavre ca vedavedāṅgabhāṣyavit // NarP_1,58.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:12836: gurave dakṣiṇāṃ dattvā samāvṛtto mahāmuniḥ // NarP_1,58.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:12840: na tvasya ramate buddhi rāśrameṣu munīśvara // NarP_1,58.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:12844: mokṣadharmeṣu kuśalo bhagavān prabravītu me // NarP_1,58.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:12846: śṛtvā putrasya vacanaṃ paramarṣiruvāca tam // NarP_1,58.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:12849: yogaśāstraṃ ca nikhilaṃ kāpilaṃ caiva nārada /
GP12nardp1_u:12850: śataṃ brāhmyā śriyā yuktaṃ brahmatulyaparākramam // NarP_1,58.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:12852: uvāca gaccheti tadā janakaṃ mithileśvaram // NarP_1,58.48 //
GP12nardp1_u:12853: sa te vakṣyati mokṣārthaṃ nikhilena narādhipaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12855: praṣṭuṃ dharmasya niṣṭāṃ vai mokṣasya ca parāyaṇam /
GP12nardp1_u:12856: uktaśca mānuṣeṇa tvaṃ tathā gacchetyavismitaḥ // NarP_1,58.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:12858: ārjavenaiva gantavyaṃ na sukhāya kṣaṇāttvayā // NarP_1,58.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:12859: na draṣṭavyā viśeṣā hi viśeṣā hi prasaṃginaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12860: ahṝṅkāro na kartavyo yājye tasminnarādhipe // NarP_1,58.52 //
GP12nardp1_u:12861: sthātavyaṃ vasathe tasya sa te chetsyati saṃśayam /
GP12nardp1_u:12864: evamuktaḥ sa dharmātmā jagāma mithilāṃ muniḥ // NarP_1,58.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:12878: darśayitvāsane sthāpya rājānaṃ ca vyajijñapat // NarP_1,58.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:12879: śrutvā rājā śukaṃ prāptaṃ vārastrīḥ sa nyayuṅkta ca /
GP12nardp1_u:12880: sevāyai tasya bhāvasya jñānāya munisatama // NarP_1,58.62 //
GP12nardp1_u:12888: krīḍantyaśca hasaṃtyaśca gāyantyaścaiva tāḥ śukam // NarP_1,58.66 //
GP12nardp1_u:12891: dhyānastha eva satataṃ na hṛṣyati na kupyati /
GP12nardp1_u:12892: pādaśaucaṃ tu kṛtvā vai śukaḥ saṃdhyāmupāsya ca // NarP_1,58.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:12894: pūrvarātre tu tatrāsau bhūtvā dhyānaparāyaṇaḥ // NarP_1,58.69 //
GP12nardp1_u:12896: tataḥ prātaḥ samutthāya kṛtvā śaucamanantaram // NarP_1,58.70 //
GP12nardp1_u:12899: tāṃ ca rātriṃ nṛpakule vartayāmāsa nārada // NarP_1,58.72 //
GP12nardp1_u:12900: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne dvitīyabhāge śukapralobhanaṃ nāmāṣṭañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:12903: puraḥ purohitaṃ kṛtvā sarvāṇyantaḥ purāṇi ca // NarP_1,59.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:12908: pādyaṃ nivedya prathamaṃ sārghyaṃ gāṃ ca nyavedayat /
GP12nardp1_u:12909: sa ca tāṃmantrataḥ pūjāṃ pratigṛhya dvijottamaḥ // NarP_1,59.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:12918: tatra tvaṃ gaccha tūrṇaṃ vai sa te hṛdayasaṃśayam /
GP12nardp1_u:12919: pravṛttau ca nivṛttau ca sarvaṃ chetsyatyasaṃśayam // NarP_1,59.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:12923: kathaṃ ca mokṣaḥ kartavyo jñānena tapasāpi vā // NarP_1,59.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:12940: kimavaśyaṃ tu vastavyamāśrameṣu na vā nṛpa /
GP12nardp1_u:12945: ācāryaḥ plāvitā tasya jñānaṃ plava ihocyate /
GP12nardp1_u:12948: kṛtvā śubhāśubhaṃ karma mokṣo nāmeha labhyate // NarP_1,59.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:12950: āsādayati śuddhātmā mokṣaṃ hi prathamāśrame // NarP_1,59.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:12956: saṃpaśyannaiva lipyeta jale vāricarago yathā // NarP_1,59.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:12958: vihāya dehaṃ nirmukto nirdvandvaḥ śubhasaṃgataḥ // NarP_1,59.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:12959: atra gāthāḥ purā gītāḥ śṛṇu rājñā yayātinā /
GP12nardp1_u:12961: jyotiścātmani nānyatra ratnaṃ tatraiva caiva tat /
GP12nardp1_u:12962: svayaṃ ca śakyaṃ taddraṣṭuṃ susamāhitarcatasā // NarP_1,59.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:12963: na bibheti paro yasmānna bibheti parācca yaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:12964: yaśca necchati na dveṣṭi brahma saṃpadyate sa tu // NarP_1,59.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:12965: yadā bhāvaṃ na kurute sarvabhūteṣu pāpakam /
GP12nardp1_u:12968: karmaṇā manasā vācā brahma saṃpadyate tadā // NarP_1,59.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:12970: tyaktva kāmaṃ ca lobhaṃ ca tato brahmatvamaśnute // NarP_1,59.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:12971: yadā śrāvye ca dṛśye ca sarvabhūteṣu cāvyayam /
GP12nardp1_u:12972: samo bhavati nirdvudvo brahma saṃpadyate tadā // NarP_1,59.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:12973: yadā stuti ca rnidāṃ ca samatvena ca paśyati /
GP12nardp1_u:12974: kāñcanaṃ cāyasaṃ caiva sukhaduḥkhe tathaiva ca // NarP_1,59.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:12976: jīvitaṃ maraṇaṃ caiva brahma saṃpadyate tadā // NarP_1,59.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:12979: tamaḥ parigataṃ veśya yathā dīpena dṛśyate /
GP12nardp1_u:12980: tathā buddhipradīpena śakya ātmā nirīkṣitum // NarP_1,59.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:12982: yañcānyadapi vettavyaṃ tattvato vetti tadbhavān // NarP_1,59.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:12986: jñānaṃ divyaṃ samādīptaṃ tenāsi vidito vidito mama // NarP_1,59.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:12988: adhikaṃ ca tavaiśvaryaṃ tañca tvaṃ nāvabudhyase // NarP_1,59.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:12990: utpanne cāpi vijñā ne nādhigacchanti tāṅgatim // NarP_1,59.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:12995: nāsti te sukhaduḥkheṣu viśeṣo nāsti vastuṣu /
GP12nardp1_u:12996: nautsukyaṃ nṛtyagīteṣu na rāga upajāyate // NarP_1,59.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:12997: na bandhuṣu nibandhaste na bhayeṣvasti te bhayam /
GP12nardp1_u:12999: ahaṃ ca tvānupaśyāmi ye cānye 'pi manīṣiṇaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13000: āsthitaṃ paramaṃ mārge akṣayaṃ cāpyanāmayam // NarP_1,59.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:13007: śaiśiraṃ girimāsādya pārāśaryaṃ dadarśa ca // NarP_1,59.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:13014: samāliṅgya sutaṃ vyāsaḥ svapārśvasthaṃ cakāra ca // NarP_1,59.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:13015: tataḥ pailādayo viprā vedān vyāsādadhītya ca /
GP12nardp1_u:13022: bho bho maharṣe bāsiṣṭha brahmaghoṣo na vartate // NarP_1,60.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:13037: divyaṃ te cakṣurutpannaṃ svasthaṃ te niścalaṃ manaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13038: tamasā rajasā cāpi tyaktaḥ satye vyavasthitaḥ // NarP_1,60.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:13041: dvāvetau pratyayaṃ yātau divaṃ cādhaśca gacchataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13042: pithivyāmantarikṣe ca yataḥ saṃyānti vāyavaḥ // NarP_1,60.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:13047: apānaśca tato jajñe prāṇaścāpi tataḥ param /
GP12nardp1_u:13049: pṛtharkkṃmāṇi teṣāṃ tu pravakṣyāmi yathā tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:13050: prāṇināṃ sarvato vāyuśceṣṭā vartayate pṛthak // NarP_1,60.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:13053: prathamaḥ prathame mārge pravaho nāma so 'nilaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13055: āvaho nāma so 'bhyeti dvitīyaḥ śvasano nadan /
GP12nardp1_u:13056: udayaṃ jyotiṣāṃ śaśvatsomādīnāṃ karoti yaḥ // NarP_1,60.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:13062: saṃnīyamānā bahudhā yena nīlā mahāghanāḥ // NarP_1,60.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:13064: yo 'sau vahati devānāṃ vimānāni vihāyasā // NarP_1,60.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:13065: caturthaḥ saṃvaho nāma vāyuḥ sa girimardanaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13066: yena vegavatā rugṇāḥ kriyante tarujā rasāḥ // NarP_1,60.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:13067: pañcamaḥ sa mahāvego vivaho nāma mārutaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13073: ṣaṣṭhaḥ parivaho nāma sa vāyurjīvatāṃ varaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13078: yaṃ samāsādya vegena diśāmantaṃ prapedire // NarP_1,60.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:13081: parīvaho nāma varo vāyuḥ sa duratikramaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13082: evamete diteḥ putrā marutaḥ paramādbhutāḥ // NarP_1,60.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:13092: tato vyāse gate snātuṃ śuko brahmavidāṃ varaḥ // NarP_1,60.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:13094: tatra svādhyāyasaṃsaktaṃ śukaṃ vyāsasutaṃ mune // NarP_1,60.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:13096: utthāya satkṛtastena brahmaputro hi kārṣṇinā // NarP_1,60.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:13097: tataḥ provāca viprendra śukaṃ vidāṃ varaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13098: kiṃ karoṣi mahābhāga vyāsaputra mahādyute // NarP_1,60.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:13103: tadvadasva mahābhāga yathā ta jjñānamāpnuyām // NarP_1,60.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:13106: nāsti rāgasamaṃ duḥkhaṃ nāsti tyāgasamaṃ sukham // NarP_1,60.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:13109: mānuṣyamasukhaṃ prāpya yaḥ sajjati sa muhyati /
GP12nardp1_u:13110: nālaṃ sa duḥkhamokṣāya saṃgo vai duḥkhalakṣaṇaḥ // NarP_1,60.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:13114: kāryaḥ śreyorthinā tau hi śreyoghātārthamudyatau // NarP_1,60.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:13117: ānṛśaṃsyaṃ paro dharmaḥ kṣamā ca paramaṃ balam /
GP12nardp1_u:13118: ātmajñānaṃ paraṃ jñānaṃ satyaṃ hi paramaṃ hitam // NarP_1,60.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:13119: yena sarvaṃ parityaktaṃ sa vidvānsa ca paṇḍitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13122: ātmabhūtairatadbhūtaḥ saha caiva vinaiva ca // NarP_1,60.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:13123: sa vimuktaḥ paraṃ śreyo na cireṇādhigacchati /
GP12nardp1_u:13125: yasya bhūtaiḥ saha mune sa śreyo vindate mahat /
GP12nardp1_u:13127: nedaṃ janma samāsādya vairaṃ kurvīta kena cit /
GP12nardp1_u:13138: dvandvārāmeṣu bhūteṣu varāko ramate muniḥ // NarP_1,60.59 //
GP12nardp1_u:13148: alaṃ parigraheṇeha doṣavān hi parigrahaḥ // NarP_1,60.64 //
GP12nardp1_u:13154: pārakyamadhruvaṃ sarvaṃ kiṃ svaṃ sukṛtaduṣkṛte // NarP_1,60.67 //
GP12nardp1_u:13156: anarthe kiṃ prasaktastvaṃ svamarthaṃ nānutiṣṭasi // NarP_1,60.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:13160: sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ ca tvāṃ gacchantamanuyāsyataḥ // NarP_1,60.70 //
GP12nardp1_u:13161: vidyā karma ca śauryaṃ ca jñānaṃ ca bahuvistaram /
GP12nardp1_u:13163: nibandhinī rajjureṣā yā grāme vasato ratiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13164: chitvaināṃ sukṛto yānti naināṃ chindanti duṣkṛtaḥ // NarP_1,60.72 //
GP12nardp1_u:13166: na ca nāmāsti nirvedo lohaṃ hi hṛdayaṃ tava // NarP_1,60.73 //
GP12nardp1_u:13170: tyāgavātādhvagāṃ śīghrāṃ buddhināvaṃ nadīṃ taret // NarP_1,60.75 //
GP12nardp1_u:13171: tyaktvā dharmamadharmaṃ ca hyubhe satyānṛte tyaja /
GP12nardp1_u:13180: indriyāṇi ca pañcaiva tamaḥ sattvaṃ rajastathā // NarP_1,60.80 //
GP12nardp1_u:13185: trivargo 'tra sukhaṃ duḥkha jīvitaṃ maraṇaṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:13186: ya idaṃ veda tattvena sasa veda prabhavāpyayau // NarP_1,60.83 //
GP12nardp1_u:13190: loke vihitamātmānaṃ lokaṃ cātmani paśyati // NarP_1,60.85 //
GP12nardp1_u:13200: tataḥ karma samādatte punaranyannavaṃ bahu // NarP_1,60.90 //
GP12nardp1_u:13206: saṃyamena ca saṃbandhānnivṛttyā tapaso balāt // NarP_1,60.93 //
GP12nardp1_u:13207: samprāptā bahavaḥ siddhiṃ avyābādhāṃ sukhodayām // NarP_1,60.94 //
GP12nardp1_u:13208: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge dvitīyapāde bṛhadupākhyāne ṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:13213: divase divase mūḍhamāviśanti na paṇḍitam // NarP_1,61.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:13220: nārtho na dharmo na yaśo yo 'tītamanuśocati /
GP12nardp1_u:13221: asyābhāvena yujyetaṃ tañcāsya tu nivartate // NarP_1,61.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:13222: guṇairbhūtāni yujyante tathaiva ca na yujyate /
GP12nardp1_u:13223: sarvāṇi naitadekasya śokasthānaṃ hi vidyate // NarP_1,61.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:13224: mṛtaṃ vā yadi vā naṣṭaṃ yo 'tītamanuśocati /
GP12nardp1_u:13225: duḥkhena labhate duḥkhaṃ mahānarthe prapadyate // NarP_1,61.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:13229: cintyamānaṃ hi na vyeti bhūyaścābhipravarddhate // NarP_1,61.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:13231: etadvijñāya sāmarthyaṃ na vānyaiḥ samatāmiyāt // NarP_1,61.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:13233: ārogyaṃ priyasaṃvāsaṃ na mṛdhyetpaṇḍitaḥ kvacit // NarP_1,61.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:13239: sāyakā iva tīkṣṇāgrāḥ prayuktā dṛḍhadhanvibhiḥ // NarP_1,61.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:13245: jātaṃ martyaṃ jarayati nimiṣaṃ nāvatiṣṭate // NarP_1,61.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:13247: ādityo hyastamabhyeti punaḥ punarudeti ca // NarP_1,61.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:13249: iṣṭāniṣṭā manuṣyāṇāṃ mataṃ gacchanti rātrayaḥ // NarP_1,61.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:13251: yadi syānna parādhīnaṃ puruṣasya kriyāphalam // NarP_1,61.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:13253: dṛśyante niṣphalāḥ saṃtaḥ prahīnāśca svakarmabhiḥ // NarP_1,61.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:13257: vañcanāyāṃ ca lokeṣu sasukheṣveva jīyate // NarP_1,61.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:13262: tasya yonau prasaktasya garbho bhavati mānavaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13267: āyuṣmān jāyate putraḥ kathaṃ pretaḥ piteva saḥ // NarP_1,61.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:13275: parityajati yo duḥkhaṃ sukhamapyubhayaṃ naraḥ // NarP_1,61.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:13277: duḥkhamarthā hi tyajyante pālane ca na te sukhāḥ // NarP_1,61.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:13279: anyāmanyāṃ dhanāvasthāṃ prāpya vaiśeṣikā narāḥ // NarP_1,61.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:13280: atṛptā yānti vidhvaṃsaṃ santoṣaṃ yānti paṇḍitāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13281: sarve kṣayāntā nicayāḥ patanāntāḥ samucchrayāḥ // NarP_1,61.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:13283: anto nāsti pipāsāyāstuṣṭistu paramaṃ sukham // NarP_1,61.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:13287: bhūteṣu bhāvaṃ saṃcintya ye buddhyā tamasaḥ param // NarP_1,61.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:13288: na śocanti gatādhvānaḥ paśyanti paramāṃ gatim /
GP12nardp1_u:13293: śabde sparśe rase rūpe gandhe ca paramaṃ tathā // NarP_1,61.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:13296: viprayogaśca sarvasya na vācā na ca vidyayā /
GP12nardp1_u:13298: vicaredasamunnaddhaḥ sa sukhī sa ca paṇḍitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13302: nainaṃ prajñā suniyataṃ trāyate nāpi pauruṣam /
GP12nardp1_u:13310: kena yatnena jīvantaṃ garbhaṃ tvamiha paśyasi /
GP12nardp1_u:13311: annapānāni jīryante yatra bhakṣyāśca bhakṣitāḥ // NarP_1,61.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:13314: dhāraṇe vā visarge ca na kartuṃ vidyate 'vaśaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13319: garbhasya saha jātasya saptamīmīdṛśīṃ daśām // NarP_1,61.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:13320: prāpnuvanti tataḥ pañca na bhavanti śatāyuṣaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13321: nābhyutthāne manuṣyāṇāṃ yogāḥ syurnātra saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,61.56 //
GP12nardp1_u:13325: te cāpi vividhā vaidyāḥ kuśalā saṃmatauṣadhāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13327: te pibanti kaṣāyāṃśca sarpīṣi vividhāni ca /
GP12nardp1_u:13328: dṛśyante jarayā bhagnā nāgairnāgā ivottamāḥ // NarP_1,61.60 //
GP12nardp1_u:13330: śvāpadāśca daridrāśca prāyo nārtā bhavanti te // NarP_1,61.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:13332: ākramya roga ādatte paśūnpaśupaco yathā // NarP_1,61.62 //
GP12nardp1_u:13334: srotasā mahasā kṣipraṃ hriyamāṇaṃ balīyasā // NarP_1,61.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:13335: na dhanena na rājyena nogreṇa tapasā tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:13336: svabhāvā hyativartante ye nirmuktāḥ śarīriṣu // NarP_1,61.64 //
GP12nardp1_u:13338: yatate ca yathāśakti na ca tadvartate tathā // NarP_1,61.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:13342: apramattāḥ śaṭhāḥ krūrā vikrāntāḥ paryupāsate // NarP_1,61.67 //
GP12nardp1_u:13344: svaṃ svaṃ ca punaranyeṣāṃ na kañcidatigacchati // NarP_1,61.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:13348: manujāśca gataśrīkāḥ śataśo vividhāḥ striyāḥ // NarP_1,61.70 //
GP12nardp1_u:13350: idamanyatparaṃ paśya nātra mohaṃ kariṣyasi // NarP_1,61.71 //
GP12nardp1_u:13351: dharmaṃ cāpi tyajā dharmaṃ tyaja satyānṛtāṃ dhiyam /
GP12nardp1_u:13352: sarvaṃ tyaktvā svarūpasthaḥ sukhī bhava nirāmayaḥ // NarP_1,61.72 //
GP12nardp1_u:13354: yena devāḥ parityajya bhartyalokaṃ divaṃ gatāḥ // NarP_1,61.73 //
GP12nardp1_u:13360: tataḥ pitrā samāgamya praṇamya ca mahāmuniḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13363: kṣaṇaikaṃ sthīyatāṃ putra iti ca krośa durmanāḥ // NarP_1,61.77 //
GP12nardp1_u:13365: mokṣamevānusaṃcitya gata eva paraṃ padam // NarP_1,61.78 //
GP12nardp1_u:13366: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne dvitīyapāde ekaṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:13369: punaḥ papraccha taṃ vipra śukābhipatanaṃ munim // NarP_1,62.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:13376: kutra te nivasaṃtīha saṃśayo me mahānayam // NarP_1,62.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:13381: tataḥ sa prāṅmukho vidvānādityena virocite // NarP_1,62.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:13383: na tatra pakṣisaṃghāto na śabdo na ca darśanam // NarP_1,62.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:13386: prajahāsa tato hāsaṃ śukaḥ samprekṣya bhāskaram /
GP12nardp1_u:13394: taṃ dṛṣṭvā vismitāḥ sarve gandharvāpsarasāṃ gaṇāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13401: tamo hyaṣṭavidhaṃ tyaktvā jahau pañcavidhaṃ rajaḥ // NarP_1,62.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:13405: saṃśliṣṭe śvetapīte ca rukmarūpyamaye śubhe // NarP_1,62.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:13411: na ca pratijaghānāsya sa gatiṃ parvatottamaḥ // NarP_1,62.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:13422: sa dadarśa dvidhā kṛtvā parvatāgraṃ gataṃ śukam /
GP12nardp1_u:13423: śaśaṃsurmunayaḥ siddhā gatiṃ tasmai sutasya tām // NarP_1,62.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:13435: so 'nunīto bhagavatā vyāso rudreṇa nārada // NarP_1,62.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:13436: kimu tvaṃ tāmyasi mune putraṃ prati samākulaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13437: paśyasi vipra nāyāntaṃ brahmabhūtaṃ nijāntire // NarP_1,62.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:13439: śvāśramaṃ sa śuko brahmabhūto lokāṃścacāra ha // NarP_1,62.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:13442: tatra dṛṣṭvā tu tau devau tapyamāno mahattapaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13443: svayaṃ ca tatra tapasi sthitaḥ śukamanusmaran // NarP_1,62.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:13445: śvetadvīpaṃ gatastāta yatra tvamagamaḥ purā // NarP_1,62.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:13447: dṛṣṭaḥ śrutivimṛgyo hi devadevo janārdanaḥ // NarP_1,62.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:13456: yaṃ bhāntamanubhāntyete lokāḥ sarve 'pi nārada // NarP_1,62.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:13483: ṛbhave suvratākhyāya sudhāmne cājitāya ca // NarP_1,62.56 //
GP12nardp1_u:13495: ghṛtārciṣe viṣṇave te 'nantāya kapilāyaya ca // NarP_1,62.62 //
GP12nardp1_u:13506: vidyāmāpnuhi bhaktiṃ ca jñānī tvaṃ mama rūpadhṛk // NarP_1,62.67 //
GP12nardp1_u:13507: yadrūpaṃ mama dṛṣṭaṃ prāk śvetadvīpe tvayā dvija /
GP12nardp1_u:13510: varalokānyathā vāyuryathā ravaṃ savitā tathā // NarP_1,62.69 //
GP12nardp1_u:13512: bhaktirhi durlabhā loke mayi sarvaparāyaṇe // NarP_1,62.70 //
GP12nardp1_u:13516: kartā bhāgavataṃ śāstraṃ tadadhīṣva bhuvaṃ vraja // NarP_1,62.72 //
GP12nardp1_u:13518: tvadviyogena khinnātmā taṃ prasādaya matpriyam // NarP_1,62.73 //
GP12nardp1_u:13521: atha taṃ svantike dṛṣṭvā pārāśaryyaḥ pratāpavān /
GP12nardp1_u:13522: putraṃ prāpya prahṛṣṭātmā tapaso nivavarta ha // NarP_1,62.75 //
GP12nardp1_u:13533: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge dvitīyapāde bṛhadupākhyāne mokṣadharṃmanirūpaṇaṃ nāma dviṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:13543: teṣāṃ samāgame bhadrā kā kathā lokapāvanī // NarP_1,63.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:13548: nārado bhārgavaśreṣṭha punaḥ papraccha tānmunīn // NarP_1,63.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:13551: samārādhyaḥ sa evātra sarvaiḥ sarvārthakāṅkṣibhiḥ // NarP_1,63.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:13555: dīkṣaṇaṃ prātarādyaṃ ca kṛtyaṃ syādyattaducyatām // NarP_1,63.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:13557: prīyeta paramātmā vai tadbrūta mama mānadāḥ // NarP_1,63.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:13562: śṛṇu nārada vakṣyāmi tantraṃ bhāgavataṃ tava /
GP12nardp1_u:13567: patistatra śivohyeko jīvāstu paśavaḥ smṛtāḥ // NarP_1,63.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:13581: pāśāḥ pañca tathā tatra prathamau malakarmajau // NarP_1,63.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:13587: ityetau prathamau cātha māyeyādyān śṛṇudvija // NarP_1,63.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:13589: patirjayati sarveṣāmeko bījaṃ vibhuḥ param // NarP_1,63.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:13590: manasyati na codeti nivṛttiṃ ca prayacchati /
GP12nardp1_u:13591: varvarti dṛkkriyārūpaṃ tattejaḥ śāṃbhavaṃ param // NarP_1,63.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:13592: śakto mayā harau bhukto paśugaṇasya hi /
GP12nardp1_u:13597: kṛtyaṃ kurvanti tenedaṃ sarvānugrāhakaṃ mune // NarP_1,63.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:13605: yatra kriyā hi nyagbhūtā jñānākhyodrekamaśnute // NarP_1,63.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:13607: nādo binduśca sakalaḥ sadākhyaṃ tattvamāśritau // NarP_1,63.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:13608: vidyeśāḥ punaraiśaṃ tu mantrā vidyābhidhaṃ punaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13609: imāni caiva tattvāni śuddhādhveti prakīrtitam // NarP_1,63.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:13613: tattvaṃ vastuta ekaṃ tu śivākhyaṃ citraśaktikam // NarP_1,63.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:13615: cijjaḍānugrahārthāya kṛtvā rūpāṇi vai prabhuḥ // NarP_1,63.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:13617: muktiṃ ca viśveṣāṃ svavyāpāre samarthetām // NarP_1,63.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:13625: nityaikā ca śivā śaktyā hyanādinidhanā satī // NarP_1,63.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:13626: sādhāraṇī narāṇāṃ vai bhuvanānāṃ ca kāraṇam /
GP12nardp1_u:13628: viśvī sūkṣmā parā māyā vikṛtaiḥ parattu sā /
GP12nardp1_u:13629: karmāṇyāvekṣya vidyeśo māyāṃ vikṣobhya śaktibhiḥ // NarP_1,63.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:13631: sṛjatyādo kālatattvaṃ nānāśaktimayī ca sā // NarP_1,63.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:13633: sūte hyanantaraṃ māyā śaktiṃ niyamanātmikām // NarP_1,63.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:13635: anantaraṃ ca sā māyā nityā viśvavimohinī // NarP_1,63.48 //
GP12nardp1_u:13637: ekatastu nṛṇāṃ yena kalayitvā malaṃ tataḥ // NarP_1,63.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:13641: pradarśanātha vai puṃso viṣayāṇāṃ ca sā punaḥ // NarP_1,63.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:13642: prakāśarūpaṃ vidyākhyaṃ tattvaṃ sūte kalaiva hi /
GP12nardp1_u:13643: vidyā tvāvaraṇaṃ bhitvā jñānaśakteḥ svakarmaṇā // NarP_1,63.52 //
GP12nardp1_u:13645: karoti bhogyaṃ yānāsau karaṇena pareṇa vai // NarP_1,63.53 //
GP12nardp1_u:13647: bhogye bhogaṃ ca bhoktāraṃ tatparaṃ karaṇaṃ tu sā // NarP_1,63.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:13650: bhogyaṃ bhoktuśca svenaiva vidyākhyaṃ karaṇaṃ tu tat /
GP12nardp1_u:13651: yadyarkavatprakāśā dhīḥ karmatvāñca tathāpi hi // NarP_1,63.56 //
GP12nardp1_u:13656: kiṃ ca pradhānacaritaṃ vyarthaṃ sarvaṃ bhavettataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13661: yena bhogyāya janitā bhidyaṅge puruṣe punaḥ // NarP_1,63.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:13665: kalaiva praścādavyaktaṃ sūte bhogyāya cāsya tu // NarP_1,63.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:13668: ādhāro 'pi ca yasteṣāṃ tadavyaktaṃ ca gīyate /
GP12nardp1_u:13669: traya eva guṇā hyaṣāmavyaktādeva saṃbhavaḥ // NarP_1,63.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:13675: sattvā dviguṇabhedena sa punastrividho bhavet // NarP_1,63.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:13677: tatra taijasato jñānendriyāṇi manasā saha // NarP_1,63.69 //
GP12nardp1_u:13681: icchārūpaṃ ca saṃkalpavyāpāraṃ tatra vai manaḥ // NarP_1,63.71 //
GP12nardp1_u:13683: bahiḥ karaṇabhāvena svocitena yataḥ sadā // NarP_1,63.72 //
GP12nardp1_u:13688: jñānendriyāṇi śrotraṃ tvak cakṣurjihvā ca nāsikā /
GP12nardp1_u:13689: grāhyāśca viṣayā hyeṣāṃ jñeyāḥ śabdādayo mune // NarP_1,63.75 //
GP12nardp1_u:13693: karaṇāni ca siddhinā na kṛtiḥ karaṇairvinā // NarP_1,63.77 //
GP12nardp1_u:13696: tanmātrāṇi tu khavāyustejo 'mbhaḥ kṣmeti pañca vai /
GP12nardp1_u:13699: rūpaṃ triṣu rasaścaiva dvayorgandhaḥ kṣitau tathā // NarP_1,63.80 //
GP12nardp1_u:13701: pākaśca saṃgrahaścaiva dhāraṇaṃ ceti kathyate // NarP_1,63.81 //
GP12nardp1_u:13703: bhāsvadagnau jale śuklaṃ kṣitau śuklādyanekadhā // NarP_1,63.82 //
GP12nardp1_u:13704: rūpaṃ triṣu rasoṃ'bhaḥ su madhuraḥ ṣaḍidhaḥ kṣitau /
GP12nardp1_u:13707: bhūtasya tu viśeṣo 'yaṃ viśeṣarahitaṃ tu tat // NarP_1,63.84 //
GP12nardp1_u:13713: hṛdi paṅktau dṛśoḥ pitte tejastaddharmadarśanāt // NarP_1,63.87 //
GP12nardp1_u:13719: deheṣu karmavaśataḥ sarveṣu vicaranti hi // NarP_1,63.90 //
GP12nardp1_u:13731: bindurekaḥ praviśati yadā garbhe dvayātmakaḥ // NarP_1,63.96 //
GP12nardp1_u:13738: evaṃ tatra sthito garbhe prāgjanmotthaṃ śubhāśubham /
GP12nardp1_u:13743: tataḥ krameṇa sa śiśurvardhamāno dinedine // NarP_1,63.102 //
GP12nardp1_u:13748: āhāraścaiva nidrā ca bhayaṃ maithunameva ca /
GP12nardp1_u:13749: paśvādīnāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ sādhāraṇamitīritam // NarP_1,63.105 //
GP12nardp1_u:13757: yajate śivaṃ mantraiśca ravapareṣāṃ hitāya saḥ // NarP_1,63.109 //
GP12nardp1_u:13767: yo yasminnāśrame tiṣṭandīkṣāṃ prāpnoti mānavaḥ // NarP_1,63.114 //
GP12nardp1_u:13769: kṛtānyapi na karmāṇi bandhanāya bhavanti hi // NarP_1,63.115 //
GP12nardp1_u:13773: nityaṃ naimittikaṃ dīkṣāṃ prāpya yo nācarennaraḥ // NarP_1,63.117 //
GP12nardp1_u:13782: kṛte 'pi viphalaṃ tasya prāyaścittaṃ pade pade /
GP12nardp1_u:13783: kāyena manasā vācā gurubhaktiparasya ca // NarP_1,63.122 //
GP12nardp1_u:13787: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne tṛtīyapāde triṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:13791: divyaṃ bhāvaṃ yato dadyātkṣiṇuyā dduritāni ca /
GP12nardp1_u:13792: ato dīkṣeti sā proktā sarvāgamaviśāradaiḥ // NarP_1,64.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:13796: strīmantrāstu dviṭhāntāḥ syuḥ puṃmantrā huṃphaḍantakāḥ // NarP_1,64.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:13798: pundaivatāstu mantrā syurvidyāḥ strīdaivatā matāḥ // NarP_1,64.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:13802: agnīṣomātmakā hyevaṃ mantrā jñeyā manīṣibhiḥ // NarP_1,64.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:13804: saumayāścaiva prabudhyante vāme vahati māruteḥ // NarP_1,64.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:13809: japto yadi sa vai devaṃ prabuddhaḥ kṣiprasiddhidaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13810: anayā mālayā japto duṣṭamantro 'pi siddhyati // NarP_1,64.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:13811: krūre karmāṇi cāgneyāḥ saumyāḥ saumya phalapradāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13820: kumāro 'tha yuvā prauḍho vṛddho nistriṃśakastathā // NarP_1,64.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:13827: doṣā hyete samākhyātā vakṣyāmyeṣāṃ ca lakṣaṇam /
GP12nardp1_u:13828: saṃyuktaṃ vā viyuktaṃ vā tridhā vā svarasaṃyutam // NarP_1,64.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:13830: caturddhā pañcadhā vāpi sa mantraśchinnasaṃjñakaḥ // NarP_1,64.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:13832: sa tu ruddho manujñeyo hyatiklaśena siddhidaḥ // NarP_1,64.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:13836: asau parāṅmukho jñeyo bhajatāṃ cirasiddhidaḥ // NarP_1,64.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:13838: sa mantro badhiraḥ proktaḥ kaṣṭenālpaphalapradaḥ // NarP_1,64.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:13840: netrahīnastu vijñeyaḥ kleśenāpi na siddhidaḥ // NarP_1,64.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:13842: haṃseṃdurvā sakāro vā phakāro varma vā puna // NarP_1,64.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:13843: māprā namāmi ca padaṃ nāsti yasminsa kīlitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13844: evaṃ madhye dvayaṃ mūrghni yasminnasralakārakau // NarP_1,64.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:13845: na vidyete sa mantrastu staṃbhitaḥ siddhirodhakṛt /
GP12nardp1_u:13846: agniḥ pavanasaṃyukto manoryasya tu mūrddhani // NarP_1,64.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:13847: sa sārṇo dṛśyate yastu sa mantro dagdhasaṃjñakaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13849: trastaḥ sa mantro vijñeyo mukhe tāravivarjitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13850: hakāraḥ śaktirathavā bhīto mantraḥ sa eva hi // NarP_1,64.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:13852: malinastu sa vijñeyo hyatikleśena siddhidaḥ // NarP_1,64.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:13853: dārṇo yasya manormadhye mūrdhni krodhayugaṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:13854: asraṃ cāsti sa mantrastu tiraskṛta udīritaḥ // NarP_1,64.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:13857: tryakṣaro haṃsahīno yaḥ suṣuptaḥ kīrtitastu saḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13860: yasya madhye sthitaṃ cāsraṃ sa mantro mūrcchitaḥ smṛtaḥ // NarP_1,64.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:13862: mantrasyādau ca madhye ca mūrdhni cāsracatuṣṭayam // NarP_1,64.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:13863: jñātavyo bhrānta ityeṣa yaḥ syādaṣṭā daśākṣaraḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13864: punarviśativarṇo vā yo mantraḥ smarasaṃyutaḥ // NarP_1,64.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:13872: śikhā varma ca yasyānte netramasraṃ ca dṛśyate // NarP_1,64.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:13873: śiva śaktyārṇahīno vā nirbījaḥ sa manuḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13875: sa manuḥ siddhihīnaḥ syānmandaḥ paṅktyakṣaro manuḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13876: kūṭa ekākṣaro mantraḥ sa evokto niraṃśakaḥ // NarP_1,64.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:13878: ṣaḍvarṇo bījahīno vā sārddhasaptākṣaro 'pi vā // NarP_1,64.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:13882: yo mantro dantavarṇastu mohitaḥ sa tu kīrtitaḥ // NarP_1,64.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:13884: kṣudhārtaḥ sa tu vijñeyo mantrasiddhivivarjitaḥ // NarP_1,64.48 //
GP12nardp1_u:13888: ekona triṃśadarṇo vā mantro hīnāṅgakaḥ smṛtaḥ // NarP_1,64.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:13892: vrīḍitaḥ sa tu vijñeyaḥ sarvakarmasu na kṣamaḥ // NarP_1,64.52 //
GP12nardp1_u:13895: ye mantrāste tu vijñeyāḥ sthānabhraṣṭā munīśvara /
GP12nardp1_u:13896: trayodaśārṇā ye mantrāstithyarṇāśca tathā punaḥ // NarP_1,64.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:13898: śataṃ sārddhaśataṃ vāpi śatadvayamathāpi vā // NarP_1,64.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:13900: ye mantrā varṇasaṃkhyākā niḥsnehāste prakīrtitāḥ // NarP_1,64.56 //
GP12nardp1_u:13904: tadvarddhvaṃ caiva ye mantrāḥ stotrarūpāstu te smṛtāḥ // NarP_1,64.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:13905: evaṃ vidhāḥ samākhyātā manavo doṣa saṃyutāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13910: yaṃ kañcidapi vā mantraṃ tasya syuḥ sarvasiddhayaḥ // NarP_1,64.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:13911: savyapāṣṇi gude sthāpya dakṣiṇaṃ ca dhvajopari /
GP12nardp1_u:13914: tadagre sarahasyaṃ te kathayiṣyāmi nārada // NarP_1,64.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:13917: suṃdaraḥ sumukhaḥ śāntaḥ kulīnaḥ sulabho vaśī /
GP12nardp1_u:13920: tattvaniṣkāsane dakṣo vinayī ca suveṣavān // NarP_1,64.66 //
GP12nardp1_u:13929: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne tṛtīyapāde catuḥṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:13946: catuṣke cettadā pūrvaṃ yatra nāmākṣaraṃ sthitam // NarP_1,65.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:13950: tadā pūrvoktarītyā tu kramāddveyaṃ manīṣibhiḥ // NarP_1,65.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:13952: turīye ceñcatuṣke tu tadaivaṃ gaṇayetsudhīḥ // NarP_1,65.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:13962: anye 'pyatra prakārā hi saṃti vai bahavoṃ mune // NarP_1,65.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:13964: evaṃ saṃśodhya mantraṃ tu śuddhe kāle sthale tathā // NarP_1,65.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:13969: kṛtvā svasti vidhānaṃ tu maṇḍalādi ca tuṣṭimān /
GP12nardp1_u:13970: guruḥ śiṣyeṇa sahitaḥ śuciryāgagṛhaṃ viśet // NarP_1,65.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:13977: tatra saṃsthāpya vidhivattatra bhānoḥ kalāṃ yajet /
GP12nardp1_u:13982: vahnerdaśa kalāḥ proktāḥ procyante 'tha raveḥ kalāḥ // NarP_1,65.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:13984: suṣumṇā bhogadā viśvā bodhinī dhāriṇī kṣamā // NarP_1,65.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:13985: athendrośca kalā jñeyā hyamṛtā mānadā punaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:13986: pūṣā tuṣṭiśca puṣṭiśca ratiśca dhṛtisaṃjñikāḥ // NarP_1,65.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:13996: vedyāṃ saṃveśya saṃprokṣya prokṣaṇīsthena vāriṇā // NarP_1,65.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:13998: nyāsajālena saṃśodhya mūrdhni vinyasya pallavān // NarP_1,65.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:14003: atha śiṣyasya śirasi hastaṃ datvā gurustataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:14006: tataḥ sacandanaṃ hastaṃ datvā śiṣyasya mastake // NarP_1,65.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:14018: raviṃ śivāṃ śivaṃ caiva yadā madhye tu śaṅkaram // NarP_1,65.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:14019: raviṃ gaṇeśamaṃbāṃ ca hariṃ cātha yadā śivām /
GP12nardp1_u:14021: śivaṃ śivāṃ raviṃ viṣṇuṃ ravau madhyagate punaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:14022: gaṇeṣaṃ viṣṇumaṃbāṃ ca śivaṃ ceti yathākramam // NarP_1,65.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:14024: brāhme muhūrtte hyutthāya kṛtvācā vaśyakaṃ budhaḥ // NarP_1,65.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:14040: tatpadaṃ darśitaṃ yena tasmai śrīgurave namaḥ // NarP_1,65.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:14042: cakṣurunmīlitaṃ yena tasmai śrīgurave namaḥ // NarP_1,65.56 //
GP12nardp1_u:14044: yasya vāgamṛtaṃ hṝnti viṣaṃ saṃsārasaṃjñakam // NarP_1,65.57 //
GP12nardp1_u:14046: oṃ namaste nātha bhagavān śivāya gururūpiṇe // NarP_1,65.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:14058: iti stutvā tataḥ sarva gurave vinivedayet // NarP_1,65.64 //
GP12nardp1_u:14060: yatkaromi jagannātha tadastu tava pūjanam // NarP_1,65.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:14078: prātaḥ samutthāya tava priyārthaṃ saṃsārayātrāṃ tvanuvartayiṣye // NarP_1,65.74 //
GP12nardp1_u:14082: ajapākhyāṃ tu gāyatrīṃ jīvojapati sarvadā // NarP_1,65.76 //
GP12nardp1_u:14086: nirābhāsaśca dharmaśca jñānaṃ ceti tathā punaḥ // NarP_1,65.78 //
GP12nardp1_u:14102: saśriye ṣaṭsahasraṃ ca viṣṇave vinivedayet // NarP_1,65.86 //
GP12nardp1_u:14114: praramādye ca gurave sahasraṃ vinivedayet // NarP_1,65.92 //
GP12nardp1_u:14120: brahmaivāhaṃ na saṃsārī nityamukto na śokabhāk // NarP_1,65.95 //
GP12nardp1_u:14124: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne tṛtīyapāde pañcaṣaṣṭimo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:14129: iti bhūmiṃ tu saṃprārthya vihareñca yathāvidhi // NarP_1,66.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:14131: gacchantu ṛṣayo devāḥ piśācā ye ca guhyakāḥ // NarP_1,66.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:14133: iti tālatrayaṃ datvā śiraḥ prāvṛtya vāsasā // NarP_1,66.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:14135: malaṃ visṛjya saucaṃ tu mṛdādbhiḥ samupācaret // NarP_1,66.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:14136: ekā liṅge gude tisro daśa vāmakare mṛdaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:14137: karayoḥ sapta vai dadyātritrivaraṃ ca pādayoḥ // NarP_1,66.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:14140: āyurbalaṃ yaśo varcaḥ prajāḥ paśuvasūni ca /
GP12nardp1_u:14141: śriyaṃ prajñāṃ ca medhāṃ ca tvaṃ no dehi vanaspate // NarP_1,66.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:14147: devāgāraṃ tato gatvā nirmālyamapasārya ca // NarP_1,66.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:14149: asreṇa pātraṃ saṃprokṣya mūlena jvālayeñca tam // NarP_1,66.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:14153: iti nīrājanaṃ kṛtvā prārthayitvā nijeśvaram // NarP_1,66.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:14155: gatvā tīrthaṃ namaskṛtya snānīyaṃ ca nidhāya vai // NarP_1,66.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:14159: praviśya nābhimātre tu mṛdaṃ vāmakarasya ca // NarP_1,66.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:14160: maṇibandhe hastatale tadagre ca tathā punaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:14163: talasthāṃ ca ṣaḍaṅgeṣu tanmantraiḥ pravilepayet // NarP_1,66.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:14168: dhārāṃ ca brahmarandhreṇa praviśantīṃ nijāṃ tanum /
GP12nardp1_u:14171: tataḥ śrautoktavidhinā snātvā mantrī samāhitaḥ // NarP_1,66.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:14175: brahmāṇḍodaratīrthāni karaiḥ spṛṣṭāni te raveḥ // NarP_1,66.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:14176: tena satyena me deva dehi tīrthaṃ divākara // NarP_1,66.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:14177: gaṅge ca yamune caiva godāvari sarasvati /
GP12nardp1_u:14184: mūlena caikādaśadhā tatra saṃmantrya bhāvayet // NarP_1,66.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:14190: iti natvā samārundhya saptacchidrāṇi sādhakaḥ // NarP_1,66.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:14194: catvāro manavaste 'tra kathyante tāntrikā mune // NarP_1,66.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:14196: mātaraḥ sarvabhūtānāmāpo devyaḥ punantu mām // NarP_1,66.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:14198: kṣālayanti ca tāṃ sparśādāpo devyaḥ punantu mām // NarP_1,66.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:14199: yanme keśeṣu daurbhāgyaṃ sīmante yañca mūrddhani /
GP12nardp1_u:14202: santoṣaḥ kṣāntirāstikyaṃ vidyā bhavatu vo namaḥ // NarP_1,66.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:14204: pibeddhiruddhaṃ no kuryādeṣāṃ tu niyato vidhiḥ // NarP_1,66.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:14205: pṛthivyāṃ yāni tīrthāni dakṣāṅghrau tāni bhūsure /
GP12nardp1_u:14210: athavā bhasmanā snāto rajobhiścaiva vākṣamaḥ // NarP_1,66.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:14211: atha sandhyādikaṃ kuryān sthitvā caivāsane śubhe /
GP12nardp1_u:14212: keśavena tathā nārāyaṇena mādhavena ca // NarP_1,66.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:14222: hariṇā viṣṇunāṃsau ca vaiṣṇavācamanaṃ tvidam // NarP_1,66.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:14231: tilakaṃ ca tataḥ kuryādbhāle suṣṭhu gadākṛti /
GP12nardp1_u:14232: nandakaṃ hṛdaye śaṅkhacakre caiva bhujadvaye // NarP_1,66.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:14234: karṇamūle pārśvayośca pṛṣṭe nābhau kakudyapi // NarP_1,66.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:14236: agnihotrodbhavaṃ bhasma gṛhītvā tryaṃbakeṇa tu // NarP_1,66.56 //
GP12nardp1_u:14240: śaivaṃ śāktastrikoṇā bhaṃ nārīvadvā samācaret // NarP_1,66.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:14241: kṛtvā tu vaidikīṃ saṃdhyāṃ tāntrikīṃ ca samācaret /
GP12nardp1_u:14252: prakṣālyāntargataṃ tena kalmaṣaṃ tajjalaṃ punaḥ // NarP_1,66.64 //
GP12nardp1_u:14256: tataśca hastau prakṣālya prāgvadācamya mantravit // NarP_1,66.66 //
GP12nardp1_u:14260: dattvārghaṃ triranenātha devaṃ ravigataṃ smaret // NarP_1,66.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:14267: varaṃ pāśaṃ ca śūlaṃ ca dadhānāṃ nṛkaroṭikām /
GP12nardp1_u:14273: gurupaṅktiṃ ca saṃtarpyaṃ sāṃgaṃ sāvaraṇaṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:14276: viṣvaksena ca śaileyaṃ vaiṣṇavaḥ paritarpayet // NarP_1,66.76 //
GP12nardp1_u:14277: evaṃ saṃtarpya viprendra dattvārdhyaṃ ca vivasvate /
GP12nardp1_u:14282: sarasvatīṃ vāmabhāge dakṣe vighneśvaraṃ punaḥ // NarP_1,66.79 //
GP12nardp1_u:14283: kṣetrapālaṃ tathā vāme dakṣe gaṅgāṃ prapūjayet /
GP12nardp1_u:14284: vāme ca yamunāṃ dakṣe dhātāraṃ vāmatastathā // NarP_1,66.80 //
GP12nardp1_u:14290: vṛṣabhaśca mahākālaḥ śaivā vai dvārapālakāḥ // NarP_1,66.83 //
GP12nardp1_u:14291: brāhmayādyā mātaro 'ṣṭau tu śaktyo dvāḥsthitāḥ svayam /
GP12nardp1_u:14292: seṃduḥ svanāmāgharṇādyā ṅenamoṃtā ime smṛtāḥ // NarP_1,66.84 //
GP12nardp1_u:14300: śrīdharo medhayā yukto hṛṣīkiśaśca harṣayā // NarP_1,66.88 //
GP12nardp1_u:14305: śārṅgī tu prabhayā yuktaḥ khaḍgī yuktastu satyayā /
GP12nardp1_u:14308: pāśī virajayā yukto kuśī viśvāsamanvitaḥ // NarP_1,66.92 //
GP12nardp1_u:14310: nindī smṛtyā samāyukto naro vṛddhyā samanvitaḥ // NarP_1,66.93 //
GP12nardp1_u:14312: kṛṣṇo buddhyā yutaḥ satyo bhuktyā muktyātha sātvataḥ // NarP_1,66.94 //
GP12nardp1_u:14316: balī tu parayā yukto balānujaparāyaṇe // NarP_1,66.96 //
GP12nardp1_u:14318: haṃsaḥ prabhāsamāyukto varāho niśayā yutaḥ // NarP_1,66.97 //
GP12nardp1_u:14319: vimalo dhārayā yukto nṛsiṃho vidyutā yutaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:14321: amṛtādyā ca gāyatrī chando viṣṇuśca devatā /
GP12nardp1_u:14328: eka maulau mukhe caika dvika netre dvikaṃ śrutau // NarP_1,66.102 //
GP12nardp1_u:14329: nasordvayaṃ kapole ca dvayaṃ dve dviradacchade /
GP12nardp1_u:14330: ekaṃ tu rasanāmūle grīvāyāmekameva ca // NarP_1,66.103 //
GP12nardp1_u:14332: ṭatavargauṃ pādayostu paphau kuṅkṣidvaye nyaset // NarP_1,66.104 //
GP12nardp1_u:14333: pṛṣṭhavaṃśe vamityuktaṃ nābhau bhaṃ hṛdaye tu mam /
GP12nardp1_u:14334: yādisaptāpi dhātusthā haṃ prāṇe laṃ tathātmani // NarP_1,66.105 //
GP12nardp1_u:14335: kṣaṃ krodhe kramato nyasya viṣṇu pūjākṣamo bhavet /
GP12nardp1_u:14336: pūrṇodaryā tu śrīkaṇṭho hyananto vijarānvitaḥ // NarP_1,66.106 //
GP12nardp1_u:14343: akrūra āsyayā yukto mahāseno vidyayā yutaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:14360: śvetorasko vidāriṇyā bhṛguḥ sahajayā yutaḥ // NarP_1,66.118 //
GP12nardp1_u:14363: yatra svīśapadaṃ noktaṃ tatra sarvatra yojayet /
GP12nardp1_u:14366: halo bījāni coktāni svarāḥ śaktaya īritāḥ // NarP_1,66.121 //
GP12nardp1_u:14372: vighneśaśca hriyā yukto vighnarājaḥ śriyā yutaḥ // NarP_1,66.124 //
GP12nardp1_u:14376: kāntyā yukto dvidantastu kāminyā gajavakrakaḥ // NarP_1,66.126 //
GP12nardp1_u:14393: muṃhī subhagayā yuktaḥ khaḍgī durbhagayā yutaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:14400: ṣaḍdīrghāḍhyena bījena kṛtvāṅgāni tataḥ smaret // NarP_1,66.138 //
GP12nardp1_u:14402: patnyāśliṣṭaṃ raktatanuṃ trinetraṃ gaṇape bhavet // NarP_1,66.139 //
GP12nardp1_u:14404: nivṛttiśca pratiṣṭhā ca vidyā śāntistatedhikāḥ // NarP_1,66.140 //
GP12nardp1_u:14405: dīpikā recikā cāpi mocikā ca parābhidhā /
GP12nardp1_u:14408: smṛtirmedhā tataḥ kāntirlakṣmīrddhṛtiḥ sthirā sthitiḥ // NarP_1,66.142 //
GP12nardp1_u:14410: kāmiko varadā vātha hlādinī prītisaṃyutā // NarP_1,66.143 //
GP12nardp1_u:14411: dīrghā tīkṣṇā tathā raudrā proktā nidrā ca tandrikā /
GP12nardp1_u:14412: kṣudhā ca krodhinī paścākriyākārī samṛtyukā // NarP_1,66.144 //
GP12nardp1_u:14423: namaḥ svāhā vaṣaṭ huṃ vauṣaṭ phaṭ jātaya īritāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:14426: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge buhadupākhyāne tṛtīyapāde saṃdhyādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣaṭṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:14429: trikoṇaṃ caturasraṃ vā vāmabhāge prakalpya ca // NarP_1,67.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:14430: sampūjyā sreṇa saṃkṣālya hṛdādhāraṃ nidhāya ca /
GP12nardp1_u:14431: tatrāgnimaṇḍalaṃ cedvā pātraṃ saṃkṣālya cāsrataḥ // NarP_1,67.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:14444: netraṃ madhye dikṣu cāsraṃ trikoṇe pūjayettataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:14452: tāraḥ kārṃmamahāṃste tu tato jalacarāya ca /
GP12nardp1_u:14453: varma phaṭ hṛdayaṃ pāñcajanyāya hṛdayaṃ maneḥ // NarP_1,67.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:14465: cintayitveṣṭadevaṃ ca tato mudrāḥ pradarśayet // NarP_1,67.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:14468: gāruḍī gālinī caiva mukhye mudre prakīrtite /
GP12nardp1_u:14482: jātīphalaṃ ca kaṅkolaṃ lavaṅgaṃ ca jalānvitam /
GP12nardp1_u:14489: vidhinā sthāpitāyāṃ vā pratimāyāṃ prapūjayet // NarP_1,67.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:14491: nirmitā śubhadā gehe pūjanāya dine dine // NarP_1,67.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:14492: vakrāṃ dagdhāṃ khaṇḍitāṃ ca bhinnamūrddhadṛśaṃ punanaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:14493: spaṣṭāṃ vāpya ntyajādyaiśca pratimāṃ naiva pūjayet // NarP_1,67.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:14495: mūlena mūrtiṃ saṃkalpya dhyātvā devaṃ yathoditam // NarP_1,67.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:14501: taveyaṃ hi mahāmūrtistasyāṃ tvāṃ sarvagaṃ prabho /
GP12nardp1_u:14506: sāṃnidhyaṃ kuru tasyāṃ tvaṃ bhaktānugrāhakāraka // NarP_1,67.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:14510: mūrtauṃ vā yajñasaṃpūrtyai sthito bhava maheśvara // NarP_1,67.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:14512: svatejaḥ pañjareṇāśu veṣṭito bhava sarvataḥ // NarP_1,67.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:14514: tasmai te parameśāya svāgataṃ svāgataṃ ca me // NarP_1,67.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:14518: tasmai me paraṇābjāya pādyaṃ śuddhāya kalpyate // NarP_1,67.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:14524: madhuparkamidaṃ deva kalpayāmi prasīda me // NarP_1,67.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:14531: sahasraṃ vā śataṃ vāpi yathāśaktyādareṇa ca // NarP_1,67.52 //
GP12nardp1_u:14538: tailādidūṣitaṃ jīrṇaṃ sacchidraṃ malinaṃ tyajet // NarP_1,67.56 //
GP12nardp1_u:14540: yajñasūtrāya tasmai te yajñasūtraṃ prakalpaye // NarP_1,67.57 //
GP12nardp1_u:14544: gṛhāṇa parama gandha kṛpayā parameśvara // NarP_1,67.59 //
GP12nardp1_u:14548: ketakīṃ kuṭajaṃ kundaṃ bandhūkaṃ kesaraṃ japām /
GP12nardp1_u:14551: śaktau dūrvārkamandārān gaṇeśe tulasīṃ tyajet // NarP_1,67.62 //
GP12nardp1_u:14555: kadalī badarī dhātrī tintiṇī bījapūrakam // NarP_1,67.64 //
GP12nardp1_u:14557: eteṣāṃ tu phalaiḥ kuryāddevatāpūjanaṃ budhaḥ // NarP_1,67.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:14558: śuṣkaistu nārcayeddevaṃ patraiḥ puṣpaiḥ phalairapi // NarP_1,67.66 //
GP12nardp1_u:14560: chinnabhinnānyapi mune na dūṣyāṇi jagurbudhāḥ // NarP_1,67.67 //
GP12nardp1_u:14562: sarvadā tulasī śuddhā bilvapatrāṇi vai tathā // NarP_1,67.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:14568: āghreyaṃ devadeveśa dhūpaṃ bhaktyā gṛhāma me // NarP_1,67.71 //
GP12nardp1_u:14571: annaṃ caturvidhaṃ svādu rasaiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ samanvitam /
GP12nardp1_u:14572: bhaktyā gṛhāṇa me deva naivedyantuṣṭidaṃsadā // NarP_1,67.73 //
GP12nardp1_u:14577: saiva prācī tu vijñeyā tato 'nyā vidiśo daśa // NarP_1,67.76 //
GP12nardp1_u:14592: idro vahniryamo rakṣo varuṇaḥ pavano vidhuḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:14595: vājī vṛṣo haṃsakūrmauṃ vāhanāni vidurbudhāḥ // NarP_1,67.85 //
GP12nardp1_u:14596: vajraṃ śaktiṃ daṇḍakhaḍgau pāśāṃ kuśagadā api /
GP12nardp1_u:14601: dakṣiṇe sthaṇḍilaṃ kṛtvā tatra saṃskāramācaret // NarP_1,67.88 //
GP12nardp1_u:14609: devaṃ saṃyojayenmūrtauṃ tato vahniṃ visarjayet // NarP_1,67.92 //
GP12nardp1_u:14611: karmāntare 'pi saṃprāpte sānnidhyaṃ kuru sādaram // NarP_1,67.93 //
GP12nardp1_u:14619: ityaṣṭadikṣu datvā ca punarbhūtabaliṃ caret // NarP_1,67.97 //
GP12nardp1_u:14628: japtvā mantraṃ yathāśakti devatāyai nivedayet // NarP_1,67.101 //
GP12nardp1_u:14630: siddhirbhavatu me deva tvatprasādāttvayi sthitā // NarP_1,67.102 //
GP12nardp1_u:14631: tataḥ parāṅmukhaṃ cārghaṃ kṛtvā puṣpaiḥ prapūjayet /
GP12nardp1_u:14633: manasā vacasā ceti praṇāmo 'ṣṭāṅga īritaḥ // NarP_1,67.103 //
GP12nardp1_u:14634: bāhubhyāṃ ca sajānubhyāṃ śirasā vacasāpi vā /
GP12nardp1_u:14641: vācā hastābhyāṃ ca padbhyā mudareṇa tataḥ param // NarP_1,67.107 //
GP12nardp1_u:14643: tatsarvaṃ ca tato brahmarpaṇaṃ bhavatu ṭhadvayam // NarP_1,67.108 //
GP12nardp1_u:14644: māṃ madīyaṃ ca sakalaṃ viṣṇave ca samarpaye /
GP12nardp1_u:14652: tatsarvaṃ tāvakī pūjā bhūyādbhūtyai ca me prabho /
GP12nardp1_u:14655: anyathā śaraṇaṃ nāsti tvameva śaraṇaṃ mama // NarP_1,67.114 //
GP12nardp1_u:14658: dāso 'yamiti māṃ matvā kṣamasva jagatāṃ pate /
GP12nardp1_u:14659: āvāhanaṃ na jānāmi na jānāmi visarjanam // NarP_1,67.116 //
GP12nardp1_u:14660: pūjāṃ caiva na jānāmi tvaṃ gatiḥ parameśvara /
GP12nardp1_u:14661: saṃprārthyaivaṃ tato mantrī mūlānte ślokamuñcaret // NarP_1,67.117 //
GP12nardp1_u:14662: gaccha gaccha paraṃ sthānaṃ jagadīśa jaganmaya /
GP12nardp1_u:14663: yanna brahmādayo devā jānanti ca sadāśivaḥ // NarP_1,67.118 //
GP12nardp1_u:14665: nidhāya devaṃ sāṃgaṃ ca svīyadṛtsarasīruhe // NarP_1,67.119 //
GP12nardp1_u:14672: agrāhyaṃ śivanirmālyaṃ patraṃ puṣpaṃ phalaṃ jalam // NarP_1,67.123 //
GP12nardp1_u:14674: pūjā pañcavidhā tatra kathitā nāradākhilaiḥ // NarP_1,67.124 //
GP12nardp1_u:14675: āturī sautikī trāsī sādhanā bhāvinī tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:14676: daurbodhī ca kramādāsāṃ lakṣaṇāni śṛṇuṣaava me // NarP_1,67.125 //
GP12nardp1_u:14677: rogādiyukto na srāyānna japenna ca pūjayet /
GP12nardp1_u:14678: vilokya pūjāṃ devasya mūrtiṃ vā sūryyamaṇḍalam // NarP_1,67.126 //
GP12nardp1_u:14680: roge nivṛtte snātvātha natvā saṃpūñcedgurum // NarP_1,67.127 //
GP12nardp1_u:14682: pūjāvicchedadoṣo me māstviti prārthayecca tam // NarP_1,67.128 //
GP12nardp1_u:14683: dvijānapi ca saṃpūjya yathāśaktyā pratoṣya ca /
GP12nardp1_u:14686: sūtakaṃ dvividhaṃ proktaṃ jātākhyaṃ mṛtasaṃjñakam // NarP_1,67.130 //
GP12nardp1_u:14687: tatra snātvā mānasīṃ tu kṛtvā saṃdhyāṃ samāhitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:14689: nivṛtte sūtake prāgvatsaṃpūjya ca guruṃ dvijān /
GP12nardp1_u:14691: eṣā tu sautikī proktā trāsī cātha nigadyate /
GP12nardp1_u:14695: puṣpaiḥ patraiḥ phalairvāpi manasā vā yajedvibhum /
GP12nardp1_u:14696: sādhanābhāvinī hyeṣā daurbodhīṃ śṛṇu nārada // NarP_1,67.135 //
GP12nardp1_u:14697: striyo vṛddhā stathā bālā mūrkhāstaistu yathākramam /
GP12nardp1_u:14698: yathājñānakṛtā sā tu daurbodhīti prakīrtitā // NarP_1,67.136 //
GP12nardp1_u:14700: devapūjāvihīno yaḥ sa gacchennarakaṃ dhruvam // NarP_1,67.137 //
GP12nardp1_u:14702: deve niveditaṃ paścādbhuñjīta svagaṇaiḥ svayam // NarP_1,67.138 //
GP12nardp1_u:14706: na sāṃgaśayikaṃ tasya durmaterjāyate phalam // NarP_1,67.140 //

GP12nardp1_u:14825: bījaṃ varāho binddhāḍhyau manvindvānnau kalau tataḥ /

GP12nardp1_u:14841: nāmau liṅge pade nyasyākhilena vyāpakaṃ caret /

GP12nardp1_u:14848: yajedvidyāṃ vidhātrīṃ ca bhogadāṃ vipraghātinīm // NarP_1,68.70 //

GP12nardp1_u:14960: uṣāṃ prajñāṃ prabhāṃ saṃdhyāṃ tato brahmādikānyajet // NarP_1,69.31 //

GP12nardp1_u:15074: aṅgārakaṃ śikhāyāṃ ca sarvāṅge ca mahīsutam // NarP_1,69.88 //

GP12nardp1_u:15099: kumāraṃ śaktihastaṃ ca maṅgalaṃ praṇamāmyaham // NarP_1,69.100 //
GP12nardp1_u:15109: saubhāgyasukhado nityaṃ bhava me dharaṇīsuta // NarP_1,69.105 //
GP12nardp1_u:15115: āpnuvanti śivaṃ sarve sadā pūrṇamanorathāḥ // NarP_1,69.108 //
GP12nardp1_u:15117: prāpnuvanti sukhaṃ tasmai namo dharaṇisūnave // NarP_1,69.109 //
GP12nardp1_u:15119: pūjitaḥ sukhasaubhāgyaṃ tasmai kṣmāsūnave namaḥ // NarP_1,69.110 //

GP12nardp1_u:15144: vande budhaṃ sadā bhaktyā pītāmbaravibhūṣaṇam // NarP_1,69.123 //

GP12nardp1_u:15162: evaṃ siddhe manau mantrī sādhayediṣṭamātmanaḥ // NarP_1,69.132 //
GP12nardp1_u:15166: sa viṃśatiśataṃ śīghraṃ vāsāṃsi labhate mahīm // NarP_1,69.134 //
GP12nardp1_u:15168: vasraṃ me dehi śukrāya ṭhadvayānto dhruvādikaḥ // NarP_1,69.135 //
GP12nardp1_u:15170: daityejyo devatā bījaṃ dhruvaḥ śaktirvasupriyā // NarP_1,69.136 //

GP12nardp1_u:15201: gale nābhau hṛdi kucapārśvapṛṣṭeṣu tatparāḥ // NarP_1,70.10 //

GP12nardp1_u:15216: pāde liṅge hṛdi mukhe mūrdhni vakṣasi hṛtsthale /

GP12nardp1_u:15228: dhātrā tu keśavaṃ nyasyāryamṇa nārāyaṇaṃ punaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:15229: mitreṇa mādhavaṃ nyasya govindaṃ varuṇena ca // NarP_1,70.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:15232: vāmanaṃ ca tathādraṇa pūṣṇā śrīdharameva ca /
GP12nardp1_u:15234: tvaṣṭrā yutaṃ padmanābhaṃ dāmodaraṃ ca viṣṇunā /
GP12nardp1_u:15235: dvādasārṇaṃ tato mantraṃ samaste śirasi nyaset // NarP_1,70.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:15239: pītāṃbarānte śrīvatsāṃ kitavakṣaḥ sthaleti ca // NarP_1,70.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:15243: evaṃ nyāsavidhiṃ kṛtvā dhyāyennārāyaṇaṃ vibhum // NarP_1,70.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:15249: prathamena tu lakṣeṇa svātmaśuddhirbhaved dhruvam // NarP_1,70.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:15253: tathā ca nirmalaṃ jñānaṃ pañcalakṣajapādbhavet // NarP_1,70.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:15257: evaṃ japtvā tataḥ prājño daśāṃśaṃ sarasīruhaiḥ // NarP_1,70.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:15260: vimalotkarṣiṇī jñānā kriyā yogā tataḥ parā /
GP12nardp1_u:15261: prahvī satyā tatheśānanugrahā navamī matā // NarP_1,70.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:15262: tāro namano bhagavate viṣṇave sarvabhū tataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:15263: tātmane vāsudevāya sarvātmeti padaṃ vadet // NarP_1,70.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:15267: ādau cāṅgāni saṃpūjya mantrāṇāṃ keśareṣu ca // NarP_1,70.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:15280: raktaṃ vighnaṃ tathāgneye śyāmamāryaṃ ca rākṣase /
GP12nardp1_u:15281: durgāṃ śyāmāṃ vāyukoṇe senānyaṃ pītamaiśvare // NarP_1,70.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:15290: bhāratyā sahitaṃ yo vai dhyāyeddvevaṃ parātparam /
GP12nardp1_u:15293: śaśtraṃ saṃmantrya mantreṇa śabrūnhatvā nivartate // NarP_1,70.56 //
GP12nardp1_u:15297: gāruḍena ca saṃyojya pañcārṇena japettadā // NarP_1,70.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:15309: śanaiśvara dine samyak spṛṣṭvā śvatthaṃ ca pāṇinā // NarP_1,70.64 //
GP12nardp1_u:15311: pañcaviṃśatidhā japtvā nityaṃ prātaḥ pibejjalam // NarP_1,70.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:15317: medhāṃ kavitvaṃ vāksiddhiṃ labhate nātra saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,70.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:15325: tāro hṛdbhagavān ṅeṃto vāsudevāya kīrtitaḥ // NarP_1,70.72 //
GP12nardp1_u:15329: devatā vāsudevastu bījaṃ śaktirdhruvaśca hṛt // NarP_1,70.74 //
GP12nardp1_u:15331: mūrdhni bhāle dṛśorāsye gale dorhṛdaye punaḥ // NarP_1,70.75 //
GP12nardp1_u:15332: kukṣau nābhau dhvaje jānudvaye pādadvaye tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:15335: pādādārabhya mūrddhānaṃ nyāsaṃ saṃhārakaṃ viduḥ // NarP_1,70.77 //
GP12nardp1_u:15337: bīvaṃ prāṇaṃ tathā cittaṃ hṛtpadmaṃ sūryamaṇḍalam // NarP_1,70.78 //
GP12nardp1_u:15339: saṃkarṣaṇaṃ ca pradyumnamaniruddhaṃ tataḥ param // NarP_1,70.79 //
GP12nardp1_u:15345: pīṭhe pūrvodite mantrī mūrti saṃkalpya mūlataḥ // NarP_1,70.82 //
GP12nardp1_u:15349: tṛtīyāvaraṇe pūjyāḥ proktā dvādaśa mūrtayaḥ // NarP_1,70.84 //
GP12nardp1_u:15356: tāraḥ kāmo ramā paścān ṅeṃtaḥ syātpuruṣottamaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:15358: brahmā muniḥ syādgāyatrī chandaḥ prokto 'tha devatā /
GP12nardp1_u:15371: evamārādhya deveśaṃ prāpnoti mahatīṃ śriyam // NarP_1,70.95 //
GP12nardp1_u:15372: putrānpautrānyaśaḥ kāntiṃ bhuktiṃ muktiṃ ca vindati /
GP12nardp1_u:15375: śrīkārākhyo hariḥ prokto devatā sakaleṣṭadaḥ // NarP_1,70.97 //
GP12nardp1_u:15383: bāhuyugme tathā bāhūṃrājanya iti vinyaset // NarP_1,70.101 //
GP12nardp1_u:15385: nyasetpādadvaye mantrī padbhyāṃ śūdro ajāyata // NarP_1,70.102 //
GP12nardp1_u:15386: cakraṃ śaṅkhaṃ gadāṃ padmaṃ karāgreṣvatha vinyaset /
GP12nardp1_u:15397: tāro hṛdbhagavān ṅeṃto varāheti tataḥ param // NarP_1,70.108 //
GP12nardp1_u:15398: rūpāya bhūrbhuvaḥ svaḥ syāllohitakāmikā ca ye /
GP12nardp1_u:15399: bhūpatitvaṃ ca me dehi dadāpaya śucipriyā // NarP_1,70.109 //
GP12nardp1_u:15403: śikhā tejo 'dhipataye viśvarūpāya varma ca // NarP_1,70.111 //
GP12nardp1_u:15408: āṃ hrīṃ svarṇanibhaṃ jānvoradho nābheḥ sitaprabham /
GP12nardp1_u:15411: evaṃ dhyātvā japellakṣaṃ daśāṃśaṃ sarasīruhaiḥ // NarP_1,70.115 //
GP12nardp1_u:15413: mūlena mūrtiṃ saṅkalpya tasyāṃ sampūjayedvibhum // NarP_1,70.116 //
GP12nardp1_u:15415: japādevāvarni dadyāddhanaṃ dhānyaṃ mahīṃ śriyam // NarP_1,70.117 //
GP12nardp1_u:15417: śilāṃ śuddhāṃ vinikṣipya spṛṣṭvā tāmayutaṃ japet // NarP_1,70.118 //

GP12nardp1_u:16003: niviṣṭavahnijāyānte svadhā caiva tato vaṣaṭ // NarP_1,71.192 //

GP12nardp1_u:16013: māyāviśvātmane ṣaṭ ca tāraḥ saucaṃ turātmane // NarP_1,71.197 //

GP12nardp1_u:16037: tāraḥ kṣāṃ ca sahasrānte kṣaraśabdādvijṛṃbhitam // NarP_1,71.209 //
GP12nardp1_u:16039: māraḥ kṣīṃ ca mahātenuṃ prabhānte vikareti ca // NarP_1,71.210 //

GP12nardp1_u:16045: anena ca śikhā proktā kavacaṃ tadanantaram // NarP_1,71.213 //

GP12nardp1_u:16055: evaṃ dhyātvā japenmantrī sahasraṃ pāyena caga // NarP_1,71.218 //
GP12nardp1_u:16057: prāgukte vaiṣṇave pīṭhe mūrtiṃ saṃkalpya mūlataḥ // NarP_1,71.219 //
GP12nardp1_u:16059: cakra śaṅkhaṃ ca pāśaṃ vāṅkuśaṃ kuliśameva ca // NarP_1,71.220 //
GP12nardp1_u:16071: tenābhiṣikto manujaḥ sarvāpattiṃ tared dhruvam // NarP_1,71.226 //

GP12nardp1_u:16823: prakāśitaṃ rahasyaṃ vai devānāmapi durlabham // NarP_1,74.142 //
GP12nardp1_u:16827: munyādikaṃ ca pūrvoktaṃ ṣaḍaṅgānyapi pūrvavat // NarP_1,74.144 //
GP12nardp1_u:16829: dhāvantaṃ rāvaṇaṃ jetuṃ dṛṣṭvā satvaramutthitam // NarP_1,74.145 //
GP12nardp1_u:16831: guruṃ ca krodhamutpādya grahotuṃ guruparvatam // NarP_1,74.146 //
GP12nardp1_u:16833: ābrahmāṇḍaṃ samākhyāpya kṛtvā bhīmaṃ kalevaram // NarP_1,74.147 //
GP12nardp1_u:16835: pūrvavatpūjanaṃ proktaṃ mantra syāsya vidhānataḥ // NarP_1,74.148 //
GP12nardp1_u:16836: evaṃ siddhe manau mantrī sādhayedātmano hitam /
GP12nardp1_u:16837: asyāpi mantravaryasya rahasyaṃ sādhanaṃ tu vai // NarP_1,74.149 //

GP12nardp1_u:16840: gatvā nadīṃ taḥ snātvā tīrthamāvāhya cāṣṭadhā /
GP12nardp1_u:16843: parvate vā vane vāpi bhūmigrahaṇapūrvakam // NarP_1,74.152 //
GP12nardp1_u:16845: recakaṃ ca punaryādyairevaṃ prāṇānniyanya ca // NarP_1,74.153 //
GP12nardp1_u:16847: dhyātvā pūrvoktavidhinā saṃpūjya ca kapīśvaram // NarP_1,74.154 //
GP12nardp1_u:16849: saptame divase prāpte kuryāñca pūjanaṃ mahat // NarP_1,74.155 //
GP12nardp1_u:16854: vidyāṃ vāpi dhanaṃ vāpi rājyaṃ vā śatrunigraham /
GP12nardp1_u:16855: tatkṣaṇādeva cāpnoti satyaṃ satyaṃ na saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,74.158 //
GP12nardp1_u:16859: dhaggante dhagitetyuktvā āyurāsva padaṃ tataḥ // NarP_1,74.160 //
GP12nardp1_u:16861: munyādikaṃ tu pūrvoktaṃ plīharogaharo hariḥ // NarP_1,74.161 //
GP12nardp1_u:16865: śakalaṃ vaṃśajaṃ tasyopari muñcetkapiṃ smaret // NarP_1,74.163 //
GP12nardp1_u:16875: haṃ bījaṃ ṭhadvayaṃ śaktirbandhamokṣe niyogatā // NarP_1,74.168 //
GP12nardp1_u:16877: vāme śailaṃ vairibhidaṃ viśuddhaṃ ṭaṅkamanyataḥ // NarP_1,74.169 //
GP12nardp1_u:16883: yantraṃ cāsya pravakṣyāmi bandhamokṣakaraṃ śubham // NarP_1,74.172 //
GP12nardp1_u:16892: gaganaṃ jvalanaḥ sākṣī markaṭeti dvayaṃ tataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:16893: toyaṃ śaśeṣe makare parimuñcati muñcati // NarP_1,74.177 //
GP12nardp1_u:16895: imaṃ mantraṃ dakṣakare likhitvā vāmahastataḥ // NarP_1,74.178 //
GP12nardp1_u:16899: lakṣaṃ japo daśāṃśena śubhairdravyaiśca homayet // NarP_1,74.180 //
GP12nardp1_u:16909: gaje dhvajaṃ samāropya gacchedyuddhvāya bhūpatiḥ // NarP_1,74.185 //
GP12nardp1_u:16910: gajasthaṃ taṃ dhvajaṃ dṛṣṭvā palāyante 'rayo dhruvam /
GP12nardp1_u:16917: sampātasādhitaṃ yantraṃ bhuje vā mūrdhni dhārayet // NarP_1,74.189 //
GP12nardp1_u:16918: raṇe durodare vāde vyavahāre jayaṃ labhet /
GP12nardp1_u:16925: balaraktamukhānte tu taḍijjihva mahā tataḥ // NarP_1,74.193 //
GP12nardp1_u:16937: evaṃ yo bhajate mantrī vāyuputraṃ kapīśvaram // NarP_1,74.199 //
GP12nardp1_u:16940: medhāṃ vidyāṃ prabhāṃ rājyaṃ vivāde vijayaṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:16941: vaśyādyāni ca karmāṇi saṃgare vijayaṃ tathā // NarP_1,74.201 //
GP12nardp1_u:16943: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne sanatkumāravibhāge tṛtīyapāde hanumanmantrakathanaṃnāma catuḥsaptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:16946: yasya vijñānamātreṇa siddho bhavati sādhakaḥ // NarP_1,75.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:16948: dravyasya ca pramāṇaṃ vai tattu mānamanukramāt // NarP_1,75.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:16949: sthānabhedaṃ ca mantraṃ ca dīpadānamanuṃ pṛthak /
GP12nardp1_u:16957: godhūmāśca tilā māṣā mudgā vai taṇḍulāḥ kramāt /
GP12nardp1_u:16958: pañcadhānyamidaṃ proktaṃ nityadīpaṃ tu māruteḥ // NarP_1,75.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:16964: mohane tvāḍhakījāta vidveṣe ca kulatthajam // NarP_1,75.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:16965: saṃgrāme kevalā māṣāḥ proktā dīpasya pātrake /
GP12nardp1_u:16968: kanyāprāptyai tathā rājavaṃśye sakhye tathaiva ca // NarP_1,75.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:16975: paladvayaṃ tu prasṛtaṃ dviguṇaṃ kuḍavaṃ matam /
GP12nardp1_u:16978: krameṇaitena te jñeyāḥ pātre ṣaṭkarmasaṃbhave // NarP_1,75.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:16979: pañca sapta nava tathā pramāṇāste yathākramam /
GP12nardp1_u:16980: saugandhe naiva mānaṃ syāttadyathāruci saṃmatam // NarP_1,75.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:16984: tatpiṣṭaṃ śuddhapātre tu nadītoyena piṇḍitam // NarP_1,75.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:16986: dīpapātre jvālyamāne māruteḥ kavacaṃ paṭhet // NarP_1,75.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:16992: rudrāḥ kūṭagaṇāḥ proktā na pātre niyamo mataḥ // NarP_1,75.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:16997: nitye pañcapalaṃ proktamathavā mānasī ruciḥ // NarP_1,75.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:17000: viśeṣo 'styatra yaḥ kaścinmārute rucyate mayā // NarP_1,75.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:17002: catuṣpathe tathā proktaṃ ṣaṭsu dīpapradāpanam // NarP_1,75.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:17008: catuṣpathe vyādhinaṣṭau duṣṭadṛṣṭau tathaiva ca // NarP_1,75.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:17012: dyūte dṛṣṭistaṃbhane ca vidveṣe māraṇe tathā // NarP_1,75.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:17014: viṣe vyādhau jvare bhūtagrahe krṛtyāvimocane // NarP_1,75.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:17018: āgame nirgame caiva rājadvāre prakīrtitam // NarP_1,75.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:17019: dīpadānaṃ hanumato nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // NarP_1,75.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:17021: laghumānaṃ smṛtaṃ pañca sapta vā nava vā tathā // NarP_1,75.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:17022: kṣīreṇa navanūtena dadhnā vā gomayena ca /
GP12nardp1_u:17026: likhedbhittau paṭe vāpi pīṭhe vā māruteḥ śubhe // NarP_1,75.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:17032: kūṭādau nityadīpe ca mantraṃ sūryākṣaraṃ vadet // NarP_1,75.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:17036: kamalaṃ ca likhedbhadraṃ tatra dīpaṃ nidhāpayet // NarP_1,75.48 //
GP12nardp1_u:17038: kūṭaṣaṭkaṃ ca ṣaṭkoṇe antarāle paralikhet // NarP_1,75.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:17040: saumyaṃ madhyagataṃ lekhyaṃ tatra saṃpūjya mārutim // NarP_1,75.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:17042: vasupatre kramātpūjyā aṣṭāvete ca vānarāḥ // NarP_1,75.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:17044: nīlāyātho jāṃbavate prahastāya tathaiva ca // NarP_1,75.52 //
GP12nardp1_u:17052: taṃ mantraṃ kūṭadhā japtvā jalaṃ bhūmau vinikṣipet // NarP_1,75.56 //
GP12nardp1_u:17056: trayodaśaivaṃ dravyāṇi gomayaṃ mṛttikā masī // NarP_1,75.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:17058: kastūrikā dadhi kṣīraṃ navanītaṃ ghaṛtaṃ tathā // NarP_1,75.59 //
GP12nardp1_u:17066: tatra gopīcandanaṃ tu haritālaṃ ca gaurikam // NarP_1,75.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:17068: kṛtvā gopīcadaṃnena caturasraṃ gṛhaṃ sudhīḥ // NarP_1,75.64 //
GP12nardp1_u:17070: bījaṃ krodhāñca tatpucchaṃ likhenmantrī samāhitaḥ // NarP_1,75.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:17076: evaṃ kṛte tu naṣṭānāṃ mahiṣīṇāṃ gavāmapi // NarP_1,75.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:17079: tālena ca caturdvāraṃ gṛhaṃ kṛtvā suśobhanam /
GP12nardp1_u:17080: pūrvadvāre gajaḥ sthāpyo dakṣiṇe mahiṣastathā // NarP_1,75.70 //
GP12nardp1_u:17082: evaṃ krameṇa khaḍgaṃ ca kṣurikādaṇḍamudgarān // NarP_1,75.71 //
GP12nardp1_u:17083: vilikhya madhye mūrtiṃ ca mahiṣīgomayena vai /
GP12nardp1_u:17084: kṛtvā ḍamaruhastāṃ ca cakitākṣīṃ prayatnataḥ // NarP_1,75.72 //
GP12nardp1_u:17088: gaganaṃ dīpikendvāḍhyāṃ śāstraṃ ca purato japet // NarP_1,75.74 //
GP12nardp1_u:17089: evaṃ saptadinaṃ kṛtvā mucyate mahato bhayāt /
GP12nardp1_u:17099: kṛśārānnaṃ ca naivedyaṃ sājyaṃ tasyai nivedayet /
GP12nardp1_u:17100: kilidvayaṃ japaṃ proktamevaṃ kuryāddine dine // NarP_1,75.80 //
GP12nardp1_u:17103: prākāraṃ tu caturdvārayuktaṃ dvāreṣu tatra vai /
GP12nardp1_u:17113: rakṣā bhavati durgāṇāṃ satyaṃ satya na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:17116: tasyāsādhyaṃ na vai kiñcidvidyate bhuvanatraye // NarP_1,75.88 //
GP12nardp1_u:17119: kṛtaghnāya na dātavyaṃ dātavyaṃ ca parīkṣite /
GP12nardp1_u:17126: vasiṣṭho 'sya muniśchando 'nuṣṭup ca devatāḥ punaḥ // NarP_1,75.93 //
GP12nardp1_u:17136: atha mantrātaraṃ vākṣye bhūtavidrāvaṇaṃ param // NarP_1,75.98 //
GP12nardp1_u:17140: brahmā muniḥ syādgāyatrī chando 'tra devatā punaḥ // NarP_1,75.100 //
GP12nardp1_u:17148: ākrandaṃstaṃ vimucyātha grahaḥ śīghraṃ palāyate // NarP_1,75.104 //
GP12nardp1_u:17150: parīkṣitāya śiṣyāya deyā vā nijasūnave // NarP_1,75.105 //
