GP12nardp1_u:23194: mahatpuṇyapradaṃ nṝṇāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ paṭhatāṃ mudā // NarP_1,93.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:23201: dānānāṃ kīrtanaṃ yatra vratānāṃ ca pṛthakpṛthak /
GP12nardp1_u:23208: suvratasya kathā paścādvṛtrasya ca vadhastathā // NarP_1,93.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:23210: sukalākhyānakaṃ caiva dharmākhyānaṃ tataḥ param // NarP_1,93.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:23224: gayāyāścaiva māhātmyaṃ prayāgasya ca puṇyakam // NarP_1,93.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:23242: gautamākhyānakaṃ caiva śivagītā tataḥ smṛtā // NarP_1,93.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:23246: parvatākhyānakaṃ pūrvaṃ gaurthai proktaṃ śivena vai // NarP_1,93.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:23248: sagarasya kathā puṇyā tataḥ paramudīritam // NarP_1,93.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:23262: parīkṣaṇaṃ ca bhṛguṇā śrīviṣṇorvaibhavasya ca // NarP_1,93.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:23264: pañcakhaṇḍayutaṃ pādmaṃ yaḥ śṛṇoti narottamaḥ // NarP_1,93.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:23272: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde padmapurāṇānukramaṇikāvarṇanaṃ nāma trinavatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:23274: śṛṇu vatsa pravakṣyāmi purāṇaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ mahat /
GP12nardp1_u:23289: narakoddhārakaṃ karma gaditaṃ ca tataḥ param // NarP_1,94.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:23299: tatastu yauvane proktā līlā dvāravatībhavā // NarP_1,94.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:23304: kalijaṃ caritaṃ proktaṃ cāturvidhyaṃ layasya ca /
GP12nardp1_u:23307: ataḥ paraṃ tu sūtena śaunakādibhirādarāt // NarP_1,94.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:23309: nānādharmakathāḥ puṇyā vratāni niyamā yamāḥ // NarP_1,94.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:23315: yo naraḥ paṭhate bhaktyā yaḥ śṛṇoti ca sādaram // NarP_1,94.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:23317: tallikhitvā ca yo dadyādāṣāḍhyāṃ ghṛtadhenunā // NarP_1,94.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:23319: sa yāti vaiṣṇavaṃ dhāma vimānenārkavarcasā // NarP_1,94.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:23322: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde viṣṇupurāṇānukramaṇīnirūpaṇaṃ nāma caturnavatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:23329: sargādilakṣaṇaṃ yatra proktaṃ vipra savistaram // NarP_1,95.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:23330: manvantareṣu vaṃśāśca rājñāṃ ye yatra kīrtitāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:23335: vratādīnāṃ ca pūrvo 'yaṃ vibhāgaḥ samudāhṛtaḥ // NarP_1,95.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:23337: śivasya saṃhitoktā vai vistareṇa munīśvara // NarP_1,95.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:23339: sa tu sarvātmanā yasyāstīre tiṣṭhati saṃtatam // NarP_1,95.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:23340: idaṃ brahmā hārīridaṃ sākṣāccedaṃ paro haraḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:23341: idaṃ brahma nirākāraṃ kaivalyaṃ narmadājalam // NarP_1,95.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:23344: ye vasaṃtyuttare kūle rudrasyānucarā hi te /
GP12nardp1_u:23345: vasaṃti yāmyatīre ye lokaṃ te yānti vaiṣṇavam // NarP_1,95.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:23347: saṃgamāḥ pañca ca triṃśannadīnāṃ pāpanāśanī // NarP_1,95.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:23351: catuḥśatāni tīrthāni prasiddhāni ca saṃti hi // NarP_1,95.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:23353: saṃti cānyāni revāyāstīrayugme pade pade // NarP_1,95.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:23357: śrāvaṇyāṃ yo dadedbhaktyā brāhmaṇāya kuṭuṃbine // NarP_1,95.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:23360: niyamena haviṣyāśī sa rudro nātra saṃśayaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:23362: so 'pi sarvapurāṇasya phalaṃ śravaṇajaṃ labhet // NarP_1,95.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:23363: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde vāyupurāṇānukramaṇīnirūpaṇaṃ nāma pañcanavatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:23370: tatra tu prathamaskandhe sūtarṣīṇāṃ samāgame // NarP_1,96.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:23371: vyāsasya caritaṃ puṇyaṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ tathaiva ca /
GP12nardp1_u:23376: dvitīyo 'yaṃ samuditaḥ skandho vyāsena dhīmatā // NarP_1,96.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:23380: satyāścaritamādau tu dhruvasya caritaṃ tataḥ // NarP_1,96.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:23382: ityeṣa turyo gadito visarge skandha uttamaḥ // NarP_1,96.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:23384: brahmāṇḍāntargatānāṃ ca lokānāṃ varṇanaṃ tataḥ // NarP_1,96.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:23396: kṛṣṇasya bālacaritaṃ kaumāraṃ ca vrajasthitiḥ // NarP_1,96.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:23398: bhūbhāraharaṇaṃ cātra nirodhe daśamaḥ smṛtaḥ // NarP_1,96.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:23404: saurī vibhūtiruditā sātvatī ca tataḥ param // NarP_1,96.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:23406: ityevaṃ kathitaṃ vatsa śrīmadbhāgavataṃ tava // NarP_1,96.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:23414: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde śrīmadbhāgavatānukramaṇīnirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣaṇṇavatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:23429: purāṇalakṣaṇaṃ caiva pramāṇaṃ dānameva ca // NarP_1,97.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:23435: asyottare vibhāge tu praśna ekādaśīvrate // NarP_1,97.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:23445: prabhāsasya ca māhātmyaṃ puṣkarākhyānakaṃ tataḥ // NarP_1,97.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:23451: mohinīcaritaṃ paścādevaṃ paścādevaṃ vai nāradīyakam // NarP_1,97.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:23453: sa yāti brahmaṇo dhāma nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // NarP_1,97.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:23458: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde nāradīyapurāṇānukramaṇīkathanaṃ nāma saptanavatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:23461: purāṇaṃ sumahatpuṇyaṃ paṭhatāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ sadā // NarP_1,98.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:23475: manūnāṃ ca kathā nānākīrtitāḥ pāpahārikāḥ // NarP_1,98.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:23480: khanitrasya tataḥ proktā kathā puṇyā mahātmanaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:23485: pururavaḥ kathā puṇyā nahuṣasya kathādbhutā // NarP_1,98.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:23491: yaḥ śṛṇoti naro bhaktyā purāṇamidamādarāt // NarP_1,98.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:23493: yastu vyākurute caitacchaivaṃ sa labhate padam // NarP_1,98.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:23495: kārtikyāṃ dvijavaryāya sa labhendbrahmaṇaḥ padam // NarP_1,98.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:23498: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde mārkaṇḍeyapurāṇānukramaṇīnirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭanavatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:23503: paṭhatāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ caiva sarvapāpaharaṃ nṛṇām // NarP_1,99.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:23511: nyāsādīnāṃ vidhānaṃ ca pratiṣṭhāpūrtakaṃ tataḥ // NarP_1,99.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:23516: jyotiṣaṃ ca tataḥ proktaṃ śāstraṃ yuddhajayārṇavam /
GP12nardp1_u:23517: ṣaṭkarma ca tataḥ proktaṃ mantramantrauṣadhīgaṇaḥ // NarP_1,99.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:23535: gajādīnāṃ cikitsā ca teṣāṃ śāntistataḥ param // NarP_1,99.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:23541: varṇanaṃ narakāṇāṃ ca yogāśtramataḥ param // NarP_1,99.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:23545: tiladhenu yutaṃ cāpi mārgaśīrṣyāṃ vidhānataḥ // NarP_1,99.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:23548: śṛṇvatāṃ paṭhatāṃ caiva nṛṇāṃ ceha paratra ca // NarP_1,99.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:23549: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde 'gnipurāṇānukramaṇīnirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikonaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:23554: sṛṣṭyarthaṃ tatra saṃjāto manuḥ svāryabhuvaḥ purā // NarP_1,100.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:23555: sa māṃ praṇamya papraccha dharmaṃ sarvāthasādhakam /
GP12nardp1_u:23556: ahaṃ tasmai tadā prītaḥ prāvocaṃ dharmasaṃhitām // NarP_1,100.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:23557: purāṇānāṃ yadā vyāso vyāsaṃ caktre mahāmatiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:23558: tadā tāṃ saṃhitāṃ sarvāṃ pañcadhā vyabhajanmuniḥ // NarP_1,100.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:23560: tatrādimaṃ smṛtaṃ parvaṃ brāhmaṃ yatrāstyupakramaḥ // NarP_1,100.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:23564: pustalekhakalekhānāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ ca tataḥ param // NarP_1,100.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:23565: saṃskārāṇāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ cātra kīrtitam /
GP12nardp1_u:23566: pakṣasyāditithīnāṃ ca kalpāḥ sapta ca kīrtitāḥ // NarP_1,100.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:23568: śaive ca kāyato bhinnāḥ saure cāntyakathānvayaḥ // NarP_1,100.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:23572: dharme kāme ca mokṣe tu viṣṇoścāpi śivasya ca // NarP_1,100.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:23573: dvitīyaṃ ca tṛtīye ca saure vargacatuṣṭaye /
GP12nardp1_u:23578: guṇānāṃ tāratamyena samaṃ brahmeti hi śrutiḥ // NarP_1,100.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:23579: taṃ likhitvā tu yo dadyātpauṣyāṃ vidvānvimatsaraḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:23583: yo vai jitendriyo bhūtvā sopavāsaḥ samāhitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:23585: sa muktaḥ pātakairghoraiḥ prayāti brahmaṇaḥ padam /
GP12nardp1_u:23587: paṭhedvā śṛṇuyāccaitāṃ bhuktiṃ muktiṃ ca vindati // NarP_1,100.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:23588: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde bhaviṣyapurāṇānukramaṇī nirūpaṇaṃ nāma śatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:23590: śṛṇu vatsa pravakṣyāmi purāṇaṃ daśamaṃ tava /
GP12nardp1_u:23623: rahasye rādhayā krīḍā varṇitā bahuvistarā // NarP_1,101.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:23625: kaṃsādīnāṃ vadhe vṛtte kṛṣṇasya dvijasaṃskṛtiḥ // NarP_1,101.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:23630: paṭhitaṃ ca śrutaṃ dhyātaṃ pūjitaṃ cābhivanditam /
GP12nardp1_u:23637: so 'pi kṛṣṇaprasādena labhate vāñchitaṃ phalam // NarP_1,101.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:23638: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne brahmavaivartapurāṇānukramaṇīnirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyāḥ // 101 //
GP12nardp1_u:23649: yogākhyānaṃ tataḥ proktaṃ kalpākhyānaṃ tataḥ param // NarP_1,102.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:23650: liṅgodbhavastadaṃbā ca kīrtitā hi tataḥ param /
GP12nardp1_u:23671: tryaṃbakasya ca māhātmyaṃ purāṇaśravaṇasya ca // NarP_1,102.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:23675: phaālgunyāṃ pūrṇimāyāṃ yo dadyādbhaktyā dvijātaye // NarP_1,102.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:23677: yaḥ paṭecchṛṇuyādvāpi laiṅgaṃ pāpāpahaṃ naraḥ // NarP_1,102.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:23682: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde liṅgapurāṇānukramaṇīnirūpaṇaṃ nāma dvyuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:23684: śṛṇu vatsa pravakṣyāmi vārāhaṃ vai purāṇakam /
GP12nardp1_u:23686: mānavasya tu kalpasya prasaṃgaṃ matkṛtaṃ purā /
GP12nardp1_u:23688: vyāso hi viduṣāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ sākṣānnārāyaṇo bhuvi /
GP12nardp1_u:23694: gaṇānāṃ ca tathā devyā dhanadasya vṛṣasya ca /
GP12nardp1_u:23699: ityādi kṛtavṛttāntaṃ prathame darśitaṃ mayā // NarP_1,103.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:23711: ityevaṃ tava vārāhaṃ proktaṃ pāpavināśanam // NarP_1,103.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:23718: iti śrībṛhannāradīya purāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde vārāhapurāṇānukramaṇīvarṇanaṃ nāma tryuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:23722: purāṇe śatakoṭo tu yacchaivaṃ varṇitaṃ mayā /
GP12nardp1_u:23723: lakṣaṃ tasyārthaṃ jātasya sāro vyāsena kīrtitaḥ // NarP_1,104.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:23726: yaḥ śṛṇoti paṭhedvāpi sa tu sākṣācchivaḥ sthitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:23727: yatra māheśvarā dharmāḥ ṣaṇmukhena prakāśitāḥ // NarP_1,104.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:23749: vāsudevasya māhātmyaṃ koṭitīrthaṃ tataḥ param // NarP_1,104.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:23757: ityeṣa kathitaḥ skānde khaṇḍo māheśvaro 'dbhutaḥ // NarP_1,104.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:23786: tato mārgasya māhātmye vidhānaṃ snānajaṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:23795: vanānāṃ dvādaśānāṃ ca māhātmyaṃ kīrtitaṃ tataḥ // NarP_1,104.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:23810: somārkā dīni tīrthāni trayodaśa tataḥ param /
GP12nardp1_u:23815: ataḥ paraṃ brahmakhaṇḍaṃ marīce śṛṇu puṇyadam // NarP_1,104.48 //
GP12nardp1_u:23816: yatra vai setumāhātmye phalaṃ snāne kṣaṇodbhavam /
GP12nardp1_u:23835: chatrānandā tathā śāntā śrīmātā ca mataṅginī // NarP_1,104.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:23836: puṇyadā ca samākhyātā yatra devyaḥ samāsthitāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:23855: śravaṇādikapuṇyaṃ ca kīrtitaṃ śarmadaṃ nṛṇām // NarP_1,104.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:23902: ataḥ paraṃ tvavantyākhyaṃ śṛṇu khaṇḍa ca pañcamam ///
GP12nardp1_u:23915: śukre ca pañcame cākhye kuśasthalyāḥ pradakṣiṇāḥ // NarP_1,104.98 //
GP12nardp1_u:23939: kalpe kalpe pṛthaṅ nāma narmadāyāḥ prakīrtitam // NarP_1,104.110 //
GP12nardp1_u:23957: lokeśaṃ dhanadeśaṃ ca maṅgaleśaṃ ca kāmajam // NarP_1,104.119 //
GP12nardp1_u:23963: caṇḍārkaṃ yamatīrthaṃ ca kālhoḍīśaṃ vanādike // NarP_1,104.122 //
GP12nardp1_u:23967: karañjaṃ kāmahaṃ tīrthaṃ bhāṇḍīro rohiṇībhavam // NarP_1,104.124 //
GP12nardp1_u:23970: indreśaṃ kaṃbukeśaṃ ca someśaṃ kohanaṃ śakam /
GP12nardp1_u:23974: śākraṃ saumyaṃ ca nādeśaṃ toyeśaṃ rukmiṇībhavam /
GP12nardp1_u:23988: ṛṇamokṣaṃ bhārabhūti puṅkhāṃ muḍiṃ ca ḍiṇḍimam // NarP_1,104.134 //
GP12nardp1_u:23998: rudrāvartaṃ ca markaṇḍaṃ tīrthaṃ pāpapraṇāśanam // NarP_1,104.139 //
GP12nardp1_u:24002: ataḥ paraṃ nāgarākhyaḥ khaṇḍaḥ ṣaṣṭho 'bhidhīyate // NarP_1,104.141 //
GP12nardp1_u:24014: rāmahradaṃ nāgapuraṃ ṣaāḍliṅgaṃ caiva yajñabhūḥ // NarP_1,104.147 //
GP12nardp1_u:24016: rudraśīrṣaṃ ca yāgeśaṃ vālakhilyaṃ ca gāruḍam // NarP_1,104.148 //
GP12nardp1_u:24026: aṭeśvaraṃ yājñavalkya gauryaṃ gāṇeśameva ca // NarP_1,104.153 //
GP12nardp1_u:24033: bhārgavaṃ caritaṃ caiva vaiśvāmaitraṃ tataḥ param /
GP12nardp1_u:24034: sārasvataṃ paippalādaṃ kaṃsārīśaṃ ca paiṇḍakam // NarP_1,104.157 //
GP12nardp1_u:24038: pauṣkaraṃ naimiṣaṃ dhārmamaraṇya tritayaṃ smṛtam // NarP_1,104.159 //
GP12nardp1_u:24044: nadīnāṃ tritayaṃ gaṅgā narmadā ca sarasvatī // NarP_1,104.162 //
GP12nardp1_u:24056: someśo yatra viśveśor'kasthalaṃ puṇyadaṃ mahat // NarP_1,104.168 //
GP12nardp1_u:24062: varārohā hyajā pālā maṅgalā laliteśvarī // NarP_1,104.171 //
GP12nardp1_u:24094: kapileśasya ca kathā jaradgavaśivasya ca // NarP_1,104.187 //
GP12nardp1_u:24102: mṛgīkuṇḍaṃ ca sarvasvaṃ kṣetre vastrāpathe smṛtam // NarP_1,104.191 //
GP12nardp1_u:24106: bhadrakarṇasya māhātmyaṃ trinetrasya tataḥ param // NarP_1,104.193 //
GP12nardp1_u:24112: kātyāyanyāśca māhātmyaṃ tataḥ piṇḍārakasya ca // NarP_1,104.196 //
GP12nardp1_u:24142: ityeṣa saptamaḥ proktaḥ khaṇḍaḥ prābhāsiko dvijāḥ // NarP_1,104.211 //
GP12nardp1_u:24145: mādhyāṃ satkṛtya viprāya sa śaive modate pade // NarP_1,104.213 //
GP12nardp1_u:24146: iti śrībṛhannāradīya purāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde skandapurāṇānukramaṇīvarṇanaṃ nāma caturadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:24165: marutāṃ janmakathanaṃ baleśca caritaṃ tataḥ // NarP_1,105.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:24176: māheśvaryāṃ tu kṛṣṇasya tadbhaktānāṃ ca kīrtanam /
GP12nardp1_u:24179: gāṇeśvaryāṃ gaṇeśasya caritaṃ ca maheśituḥ // NarP_1,105.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:24184: sa cākhyāsyati viprebhyo naimiṣīyebhya eva ca /
GP12nardp1_u:24185: evaṃ paraṃparāprāptaṃ purāṇaṃ vāmanaṃ śubham // NarP_1,105.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:24186: ye paṭhanti ca śṛṇvanti te 'pi yānti parāṃ gatim /
GP12nardp1_u:24190: dehānte bhuktabhogo 'sau yāti viṣṇoḥ paraṃ padam // NarP_1,105.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:24191: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde vāmanapurāṇānukramaṇīvarṇanaṃ nāma pañcādhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:24193: śṛṇu vatsa marīce tvaṃ purāṇaṃ kūrmasaṃjñakam /
GP12nardp1_u:24198: yatra brāhmāḥ purā proktā dharmā nānāvidhā mune // NarP_1,106.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:24200: tatra pūrvavibhāge tu purāṇopakramaḥ purā // NarP_1,106.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:24204: tataḥ saṃkṣepataḥ sargaḥ śāṅkaraṃ caritaṃ tathā // NarP_1,106.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:24212: vārāṇasyāśca māhātmyaṃ prayāgasya tataḥ param // NarP_1,106.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:24214: uttare 'syā vibhāge tu purā gītaiśvarī tataḥ // NarP_1,106.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:24216: nānāvidhānāṃ tīrthānāṃ māhātmyaṃ ca pṛthak tataḥ // NarP_1,106.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:24220: pāda'syāḥ prathame proktā brāhmaṇānāṃ vyavasthitiḥ // NarP_1,106.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:24222: dvitīye kṣattriyāṇāṃ tu vṛttiḥ samyakprakīrtitā // NarP_1,106.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:24230: ityeṣā pañcapadyuktā dvitīyā saṃhitā mune // NarP_1,106.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:24232: ṣoḍhā ṣaṭkarmasirddhi bodhayantī ca kāminām // NarP_1,106.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:24239: brāhmaṇāyā yane dadyātsa yāti paramāṃ gatim // NarP_1,106.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:24240: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde kūrmaparāṇānukramaṇīkathanaṃ nāma ṣaḍuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:24242: atha mātsyaṃ purāṇaṃ te pravakṣye dvijasattama /
GP12nardp1_u:24243: yatroktaṃ saptakalpānāṃ vṛttaṃ saṃkṣipya bhūtale // NarP_1,107.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:24263: tathaivānaṃ dakaryāśca vrataṃ sārasvataṃ punaḥ // NarP_1,107.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:24293: vāmanasya tu māhātmyaṃ vārāhasya tataḥ param // NarP_1,107.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:24301: yaḥ paṭhecchṛṇuyādvāpi sa yāti bhavanaṃ hareḥ // NarP_1,107.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:24303: viprāyābhyarcya viṣuve sa yāti paramaṃ padam // NarP_1,107.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:24304: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde matsyapurāṇānukramaṇīkathanaṃ nāma saptottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:24306: marīce śṛṇu vakṣyābhi purāṇaṃ gāruḍaṃ śubham /
GP12nardp1_u:24312: pūjāvidhānaṃ ca tathā vaiṣṇavaṃ pañjaraṃ tataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:24315: mālāmantraḥ śivārcātha gaṇapūjā tataḥ param // NarP_1,108.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:24333: rogaghnaṃ kavacaṃ viṣṇorgāruḍaṃ traipuro manuḥ // NarP_1,108.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:24337: tarpaṇaṃ vaiśvadevaṃ ca saṃdhyā pārvaṇakarma ca // NarP_1,108.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:24339: pratisaṃkrama uktāḥ sma yugadharmāḥ kṛteḥ phalam // NarP_1,108.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:24349: yamalokasthamārgasya varṇana ca taḥ param // NarP_1,108.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:24353: pretānāṃ caritākhyānaṃ kāraṇaṃ pretatāṃ prati // NarP_1,108.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:24371: kīrtitaṃ pāpaśamanaṃ paṭhatāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ nṛṇām // NarP_1,108.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:24373: sauvarṇahaṃsayugmāḍhyaṃ viprāya sa divaṃ vrajet // NarP_1,108.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:24374: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde gāruḍānukramaṇīvarṇanaṃ nāmāṣṭottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:24379: caturtha upasaṃhāraḥ pādāścatvāra eva hi // NarP_1,109.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:24384: eṣa vai prathamaḥ pādo dvitīyaṃ śṛṇu mānada /
GP12nardp1_u:24411: kārtavīryasya caritaṃ jāmadagnyaṃ tataḥ param // NarP_1,109.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:24416: indrasya tu stavaḥ puṇyaḥ śukreṇa parikīrtitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:24423: bhaviṣyāṇāṃ manūnāṃ ca caritaṃ hi tataḥ param // NarP_1,109.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:24428: śaivasyātha purasyāpi varṇanaṃ ca tataḥ param /
GP12nardp1_u:24431: anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ varṇanaṃ hi tataḥ param // NarP_1,109.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:24433: catuṣpādaṃ purāṇaṃ te brahmāṇḍaṃ samudāhṛtakam // NarP_1,109.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:24435: brahmāṇḍaṃ yaccaturlakṣaṃ purāṇaṃ yena vaṭhyate // NarP_1,109.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:24439: mattaḥ śrutvā purāṇāni lokebhyaḥ pracakāśire // NarP_1,109.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:24441: mayācedaṃ purāṇaṃ tu vasiṣṭāya puroditam // NarP_1,109.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:24445: ya idaṃ kīrtayedvatsa śṛṇoti ca samāhitaḥ // NarP_1,109.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:24449: sa yādi brahmaṇo lokaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // NarP_1,109.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:24451: purāṇāni tu saṃkṣepācchrotavyāni ca vistarāt // NarP_1,109.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:24453: kathayedvā vidhānena neha bhūyaḥ sa jāyate // NarP_1,109.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:24457: deyaṃ kadāpi sādhūnāṃ dveṣiṇe na śaṭhāya ca // NarP_1,109.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:24459: nirmatsarāya śucaye deyaṃ sadvaiṣṇavāya ca // NarP_1,109.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:24460: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde brahmāṇḍapurāṇānukramaṇīnirūpaṇaṃ nāma navottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:24463: marūcaye yathā proktaṃ brahmaṇā parameṣṭhinā // NarP_1,110.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:24464: adhunā tu mahābhāga tithīnāṃ vai kathānakam /
GP12nardp1_u:24466: yasminmāse tu yā puṇyā tithiryena uvāsitā /
GP12nardp1_u:24467: yadvidhānaṃ ca pūjādestatsarvaṃ vada sāṃpratam // NarP_1,110.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:24469: śṛṇu nārada vakṣyāmi tithīnāṃ te vrataṃ pṛthak /
GP12nardp1_u:24472: śuklapakṣe samagraṃ vai tadā sūryodaye sati // NarP_1,110.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:24478: maṅgalyā ca pavitrā ca lokadvayamukhāvahā // NarP_1,110.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:24482: tataḥ krameṇa devebhyaḥ pūjā kāryā pṛthakpṛthak // NarP_1,110.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:24484: savastraṃ sahiraṇyaṃ ca tato dadyāddijātaye // NarP_1,110.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:24487: ārogyadaṃ nṛṇāṃ vipra tasminneva dine mune /
GP12nardp1_u:24490: atha jyeṣṭhe site pakṣe pakṣatyāṃ divasodaye // NarP_1,110.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:24498: evaṃ bhaktyā samabhyacya dattvā viprāya dakṣiṇām // NarP_1,110.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:24514: idaṃ kṛtvā vrataṃ vipra deva devasya śūlinaḥ // NarP_1,110.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:24520: samarpya gurave bhaktyā śivaloke mahīyate // NarP_1,110.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:24529: itthaṃ kṛtvā vrataṃ vipra sarvasiddhyālayo naraḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:24530: jāyate bhuvi durgāyāḥ prasādānnātra saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,110.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:24538: naktaṃ viṣṇvarcanaṃ homaiḥ sauvarṇīṃ hutabhuktanum // NarP_1,110.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:24540: evaṃ kṛtvā dhanairdhānyaiḥ samṛddho jāyate bhuvi // NarP_1,110.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:24548: karmaṇā laukikenāpi saṃtuṣṭo hi maheśvaraḥ // NarP_1,110.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:24550: vaiśākhe tu sitādyāyāṃ viṣṇuṃ viśvavihāriṇam // NarP_1,110.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:24552: evaṃ śucisitādyāyāṃ brahmāṇaṃ jagatāṃ gurum // NarP_1,110.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:24556: vratāni tubhyaṃ proktāni bhuktimuktipradāni ca // NarP_1,110.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:24558: bhojane tu haviṣyānnaṃ sāmānyata udāhṛtam // NarP_1,110.48 //
GP12nardp1_u:24559: iti śrībṛhannanāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde dvādaśamāsapratipadvratanirūpaṇaṃ nāma daśottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:24561: śṛṇu vipra pravakṣyāmi dvitīyāyā vratāni te /
GP12nardp1_u:24562: yāni kṛtvā naro bhaktyā brahmaloke mahīyate // NarP_1,111.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:24566: asminneva dine vipra bālendumuditaṃ pare // NarP_1,111.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:24568: atha vāsmindine bhaktyā dasrāvabhyarcya yatnataḥ // NarP_1,111.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:24570: pūrṇayātrāvrate hyasmindadhnā vāpi ghṛtena ca // NarP_1,111.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:24578: bhojayitvā dvijān bhaktyā bhāskaraṃ lokamāpnuyāt // NarP_1,111.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:24580: tasyāṃ rathaṃ samāropya rāmaṃ saha subhadrayā // NarP_1,111.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:24590: gārhasthyaṃ mā praṇāśaṃ me yātu dharmārthakāmada // NarP_1,111.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:24594: āśvine māsi vai puṇyā dvitīyā śuklapakṣagā // NarP_1,111.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:24598: puṣṭipravarddhanaṃ cātra bhaginyā bhojanaṃ gṛhe // NarP_1,111.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:24599: vastrālaṅkārapūrvaṃ tu tasmai deyamataḥ param // NarP_1,111.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:24600: yasyāṃ tithau yamunayā yamarājadevaḥ saṃbhojito nijakarātsvasṛsauhṛdena /
GP12nardp1_u:24601: tasyāṃ svasuḥ karatalādiha yo bhunakti prāpnoti ratnadhanadhānyamanuttamaṃ saḥ // NarP_1,111.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:24612: samarpya deve bhaktyaiva sa mūrtiṃ pradadeddvije /
GP12nardp1_u:24613: evaṃ kṛte vrate vipra sākṣātsūrya ivoditaḥ // NarP_1,111.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:24615: iha kāmānvarāmbhuktvā yātyante brahmaṇaḥ padam // NarP_1,111.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:24621: prasādya praṇameccaiva sāṣṭāṅgaṃ patito bhuvi // NarP_1,111.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:24625: proktaṃ tadeva kṛṣṇāsu karttavyaṃ vidhikovidaiḥ // NarP_1,111.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:24627: pūjyate hi dvitīyāsu brahmacaryyādi pūrvavat // NarP_1,111.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:24628: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde dvādaśamāsadvitīyāvratanirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikādaśādhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:24630: śṛṇu nārada vakṣyāmi tṛtīyāyā vratāni te /
GP12nardp1_u:24633: sauvarṇā rājatīṃ vāpi tāmnīṃ vā mṛṇyayīṃ dvija // NarP_1,112.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:24637: dvijabhāryā bhartṛmatīḥ kanyakāṃ vā sulakṣaṇāḥ // NarP_1,112.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:24641: dhātujāṃ mṛnmayīṃ vā tu nikṣipecca jalāśaye // NarP_1,112.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:24645: strīṇāṃ yathā tathā nānyā vidyate bhuvanatraye // NarP_1,112.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:24650: dve śukle dve tathā kṛṣṇe yugādī kavayo viduḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:24651: śukle pūrvāhnike grāhye kṛṣṇe caiva tapastatha // NarP_1,112.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:24652: dvāparaṃ hi kalirbhādre pravṛttāni yugāni vai /
GP12nardp1_u:24655: yadvā gaṅgāṃbhasi snāto mucyate sarvakilbiṣaiḥ // NarP_1,112.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:24660: atha jyeṣṭhatṛtīyā tu śuklā raṃbheti nāmataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:24664: dadāti vittaṃ putrāṃśca matiṃ dharme śubhāvahām /
GP12nardp1_u:24666: keśavaṃ tu salakṣmīkaṃ sastrīke tu dvijer'cayet /
GP12nardp1_u:24673: putrāndehi dhanaṃ dehi saubhāgyaṃ dehi suvrate // NarP_1,112.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:24674: anyāṃśca sarvakāmānme dehi dehi namo 'stu te /
GP12nardp1_u:24675: evaṃ saṃprārthya deveśīṃ bhavānīṃ bhavasaṃyutām // NarP_1,112.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:24677: evaṃ ṣoḍaśavarṣāṇi kṛtvā nārī vrataṃ śubham // NarP_1,112.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:24681: sauvarṇīṃ pratimāṃ tatra bhavānyāḥ pratipūjayet // NarP_1,112.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:24686: pratimāṃ gurave dattvā dvijebhyo dakṣiṇāṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:24690: tatastu kāñcane pātre rājate cāpi tāmrake /
GP12nardp1_u:24691: vaiṇave mṛnmaye vāpi vinyasyānnaṃ sadakṣiṇam // NarP_1,112.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:24692: saphalaṃ ca savastraṃ ca dvijāya pratipādayet /
GP12nardp1_u:24699: bhūyasīṃ ca tato dadyādviprebhyo devituṣṭaye // NarP_1,112.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:24700: evaṃ yā kurute nārī vrataṃ saubhāgyavarddhanam /
GP12nardp1_u:24701: sā tu devīprasādena saubhāgyaṃ labhate dhruvam // NarP_1,112.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:24702: yadā tṛtīyā bhādre tu hastarkṣasahitā bhavet /
GP12nardp1_u:24703: hastagaurīvrataṃ nāma taduddiṣṭaṃ hi śauriṇā // NarP_1,112.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:24704: tathā koṭīśvarī nāma vrataṃ proktaṃ pinākinā /
GP12nardp1_u:24707: upavāsena kartavyaṃ varṣe varṣe tu nārada // NarP_1,112.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:24710: tatpakkena tu nirmāya devyā mūrtiṃ suśomanām /
GP12nardp1_u:24717: iti te kathitaṃ vipra koṭilakṣeśvarīvratam // NarP_1,112.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:24727: vāyanāni ca pañcaiva tābhyo dadyācca bhojayet // NarP_1,112.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:24731: gītavādyayutā nadyāṃ gaurīṃ tāṃ tu visarjayet // NarP_1,112.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:24732: āhūtāsi mayābhadre pūjitā ca yathā vidhi /
GP12nardp1_u:24733: mama saubhāgyadānāya yatheṣṭaṃ gamyatāṃ tvayā // NarP_1,112.52 //
GP12nardp1_u:24734: evaṃ kṛtvā vrataṃ bhaktyā dvija devīprasādataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:24743: devīlokaṃ samāsādya modate ca tayā saha // NarP_1,112.57 //
GP12nardp1_u:24749: prasannā diśati svīyaṃ lokaṃ tu vratatoṣitā // NarP_1,112.60 //
GP12nardp1_u:24752: sarvāsu ca tṛtīyāsu vidhiḥ sādhāraṇo mune /
GP12nardp1_u:24753: devīpūjā viprapūjā dānaṃ homo visarjanam // NarP_1,112.62 //
GP12nardp1_u:24756: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde dvādaśamāsatṛtīyāvratakathanaṃ nāma dvādaśādhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:24763: vaiśākhasya caturthyāṃ tu prārthyaṃ saṃkarṣaṇāhvayam // NarP_1,113.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:24765: prāpya saṃkarṣaṇaṃ lokaṃ modate bahukalpakam // NarP_1,113.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:24767: phalaṃ mūlaṃ ca yuthebhyo dattvā svargaṃ labhennaraḥ // NarP_1,113.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:24778: śrāvaṇasya caturthyāṃ tu jāti candrodaye mune // NarP_1,113.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:24784: evaṃ vrataṃ vidhāyātha bhuktvā modakameva ca // NarP_1,113.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:24792: haimaṃ nirmāya gaṇapaṃ tāmrapātropari sthitam // NarP_1,113.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:24799: tataḥ saṃprārathya vighneśamūrtiṃ sopaskarāṃ mune // NarP_1,113.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:24801: kṛtvaivaṃ pañca varṣāṇi samupāsya yathāvidhi // NarP_1,113.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:24807: pañcābdaṃ vādaśābdaṃ vā ṣoḍaśābdamathāpi vā // NarP_1,113.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:24811: atha śukla caturthyāṃ tu siddhavaināyakavratam // NarP_1,113.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:24819: umāputrāya bailvaṃ tu dūrvāṃ gajamukhāya ca // NarP_1,113.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:24823: herambāya tu siṃdūraṃ catirhetre ca patrajam // NarP_1,113.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:24827: ācamayya namaskṛtya saṃprārthya ca visarjjayet // NarP_1,113.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:24829: nivedayecca gurave dvijebhyo dakṣiṇāṃ dadet // NarP_1,113.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:24830: evaṃ kṛtārcano bhaktyā pañca varṣāṇi nārada /
GP12nardp1_u:24832: asyāṃ caturthyāṃ śaśinaṃ na paśyecca kadācana /
GP12nardp1_u:24833: paśyan mithyābhiśāpa tu labhate nātra saṃśayaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:24834: atha taddoṣanāśāya mantraṃ paurāṇikaṃ paṭhet // NarP_1,113.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:24836: sakumāraka mā rodīstava hyeṣa syamantakaḥ // NarP_1,113.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:24843: caturthyāṃ kārtike kṛṣṇe karakākhyaṃ vrataṃ smṛtam // NarP_1,113.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:24849: suvāsinībhyo viprebhyo yathākāmaṃ ca sādaram // NarP_1,113.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:24851: bhuñjīta miṣṭamannaṃ ca vratasya paripūrtaye // NarP_1,113.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:24852: yadvā kṣīreṇa karakaṃ pūrṇaṃ toyena vā mune /
GP12nardp1_u:24856: yāvajjīvaṃ tu vā nāryā kāryyaṃ saubhāgyavāñchayā /
GP12nardp1_u:24865: viṣāṇi naśyantyacirānna daśanti ca pannagāḥ // NarP_1,113.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:24873: tasyopari ghaṭaṃ sthāpya tāmrapātreṇa saṃyutam // NarP_1,113.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:24878: prabhāte vimale snātvā homaṃ kṛtvā vidhānataḥ /'
GP12nardp1_u:24886: tato vyāhṛtibhiḥ śaktyā hutvā pūrṇāhutiṃ caret /
GP12nardp1_u:24889: savatsāṃ gāṃ tato dadyādācāryāya sadakṣiṇām // NarP_1,113.66 //
GP12nardp1_u:24890: anyobhyo 'pi yathāśakti bhūyasīṃ ca tato dadet /
GP12nardp1_u:24892: bandhubhiḥ saha bhuñjīta svayaṃ ca prītamānasaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:24893: etadvrataṃ naraḥ kṛtvā bhuktvā bhogānihottamān // NarP_1,113.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:24897: pauṣamāsacaturthyāṃ tu vighneśaṃ prārthya bhaktitaḥ // NarP_1,113.70 //
GP12nardp1_u:24899: evaṃ kṛte mune bhūyādvratī saṃpattibhājanam // NarP_1,113.71 //
GP12nardp1_u:24909: saśamīpatradadhi ca kṛtvā candrāya dāpayet // NarP_1,113.76 //
GP12nardp1_u:24913: śaktyā saṃbhojya viprāgryānsvayaṃ bhuñjīta cājñayā // NarP_1,113.78 //
GP12nardp1_u:24914: evaṃ kṛtvā vrataṃ vipra saṃkaṣṭākhyaṃ śūbhāvaham /
GP12nardp1_u:24915: samṛddho dhanadhānyaiḥ syānna ca saṃkaṣṭamāpnuyāt // NarP_1,113.79 //
GP12nardp1_u:24917: tasyāṃ tu gaurī saṃpūjyā saṃyuktā yoginīgaṇaiḥ // NarP_1,113.80 //
GP12nardp1_u:24921: payasā pāyasenāpi lavaṇena ca pālakaiḥ // NarP_1,113.82 //
GP12nardp1_u:24923: saubhāgyavṛddhaye deyo bhoktavyaṃ bandhubhiḥ saha // NarP_1,113.83 //
GP12nardp1_u:24928: snānaṃ dānaṃ japo homaḥ sarvamasyāṃ kṛtaṃ mune /

GP12nardp1_u:24934: sauvarṇaṃ gajavaktraṃ ca kṛtvā saṃpūjya yatnataḥ /

GP12nardp1_u:24939: vighneśa eva deveśaḥ saṃpūjyo bhaktitatparaiḥ // NarP_1,113.91 //
GP12nardp1_u:24940: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde dvādśanāsa caturthīvratānirūpaṇaṃ nāma trayodaśādhikasatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:24945: asyāṃ matsyāvatārārcā bhaktaiḥ kāryā mahotsavā // NarP_1,114.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:24948: yo lakṣmīṃ pūjayeccātra taṃ vai lakṣmīrna muñcati /
GP12nardp1_u:24949: pṛthvīvrataṃ tathā cāndraṃ hayagarīvavrataṃ tathā // NarP_1,114.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:24951: atha vaiśākhapañcamyāṃ śeṣaṃ cābhyarcya mānavaḥ // NarP_1,114.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:24955: athāṣāḍhasya pañcamyāṃ vāyuṃ sarvagataṃ mune // NarP_1,114.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:24957: dhvajaṃ ca pañcavarṇaṃ tu vaṃśadaṇḍāgrasaṃsthitam // NarP_1,114.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:24959: tatastanmūladeśe tu dikṣu sarvāsu nārada // NarP_1,114.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:24961: prathamādiṣu yāmeṣu yo yo vāyuḥ pravartate // NarP_1,114.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:24962: tasmai tasmai digīśāya pūjāṃ samyak prakalpayet /
GP12nardp1_u:24964: sāyamāgatya gehaṃ svaṃ bhuktvā svalpaṃ samāhitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:24966: yaḥ svapno jāyate tasyāṃ rātrau yāme caturthake /
GP12nardp1_u:24967: sa eva bhavitā nūnaṃ svapna ityāha vai śivaḥ // NarP_1,114.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:24977: prātarbhānau samudite pitṝṃścaiva tathā ṛṣīn // NarP_1,114.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:24980: sarvaṃ dinaṃ kṣipedevaṃ pradoṣe tu śivālaye /
GP12nardp1_u:24983: japetpañcākṣarī vidyāṃ śataṃ cāpi sahasrakam // NarP_1,114.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:24988: yāni syustaiḥ samṛddho 'haṃ bhūyāṃ janmani janmani /
GP12nardp1_u:24989: evaṃ saṃprārthya deveśaṃ gṛhamāgatya vai svakam // NarP_1,114.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:25006: bhādre tu kṛṣṇapañcamyāṃ nāgān kṣīreṇa tarpayet // NarP_1,114.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:25016: etaibhyo 'ghya ca vidhivatkalpayitvā pradāya ca // NarP_1,114.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:25020: kṛtvā vratānte varayedācāryān sapta vaidikān // NarP_1,114.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:25026: arghyaṃ datvā tato homaṃ tilavrīhiyavādibhiḥ // NarP_1,114.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:25032: bhojayitvā tu tānbhaktyā praṇipatya visarjayet // NarP_1,114.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:25034: bhuṅktvā vai ṣaḍrasopetaṃ pramudyātsaha bandhubhiḥ // NarP_1,114.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:25038: tasyāḥ svarṇamayīṃ mūrtiṃ śaktyā nirmāya nārada /
GP12nardp1_u:25048: vipraikaṃ bhojayeccāpi tasmai dattvā ca dakṣiṇām /
GP12nardp1_u:25050: yastu vai bhaktisaṃyuktaḥ snānaṃ kuryāj jayādine /
GP12nardp1_u:25051: naśyanti tasya pāpāni siṃhākrāntā mṛgā yathā // NarP_1,114.56 //
GP12nardp1_u:25054: aputro labhate putraṃ vandhyā gabha ca vindati /
GP12nardp1_u:25055: rogī rogātpramucyeta baddho mucyeta bandhanāt // NarP_1,114.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:25057: nāgebhyo hyabhayaṃ labdhvā modate saha bāndhavaiḥ // NarP_1,114.59 //
GP12nardp1_u:25060: pañcamyāṃ pratimāse tu śukle kṛṣṇe ca nārada /
GP12nardp1_u:25061: pitṝṇāṃ pūjanaṃ śastaṃ nāgānāṃ cāpi sarvathā // NarP_1,114.61 //

GP12nardp1_u:25064: śṛṇu vipra pravakṣyāmi ṣaṣṭhyāścaiva vratāni te /
GP12nardp1_u:25067: tatreṣṭvā ṣaṇmukhaṃ devaṃ nānāpūjā vidhānataḥ // NarP_1,115.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:25069: vaiśākhaśuklaṣaṣṭhyāṃ ca pūjayitvā ca kārtikam // NarP_1,115.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:25070: labhate mātṛjaṃ saukhyaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā /
GP12nardp1_u:25082: gṛhītvā vaṃśapātre tu dhṛtvā piṇḍākṛtiṃ ca tām /
GP12nardp1_u:25084: paṅkajaṃ karavīraṃ ca nepālīṃ mālatīṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:25085: nīlotpalaṃ ketakīṃ ca saṃgṛhya tagaraṃ tathā // NarP_1,115.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:25087: akṣatāḥ kalikā gṛhya tābhirdevīṃ prapūjayet // NarP_1,115.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:25090: snātvā kanakhale devi harariṃ labdhavatī patim /
GP12nardp1_u:25104: sakhībhiḥ sahitā sādhvī tāṃ rātriṃ prasabhaṃ nayet /
GP12nardp1_u:25107: evaṃ jāgaraṇaṃ kṛtvā saptamyāṃ saritaṃ nayet // NarP_1,115.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:25110: snātvā gṛhaṃ samāgatya hutvā vaiśvānaraṃ tataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:25116: naro vā yadi vā nārī tasya puṇyaphalaṃ śṛṇu /
GP12nardp1_u:25121: nabhasye māsi yā śuklā ṣaṣṭhī sā candanāhvayā // NarP_1,115.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:25123: rohiṇī pātabhaumaistu saṃyutā kapilā bhavet // NarP_1,115.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:25133: pūjyātra saikatī mūrtiryadvā dvijasatī mudā // NarP_1,115.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:25135: kanyā varaṃ prāpnuyācca vāñcitaṃ putramaṅganā // NarP_1,115.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:25137: kārtike śuklaṣaṣṭhyāṃ tu ṣaṇmukhena mahātmanā // NarP_1,115.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:25139: atastasyāṃ suraśreṣṭhāṃ devasenāṃ ca ṣaṇmukham // NarP_1,115.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:25145: skandena satkṛtiḥ prāptā brahamādyaiḥ parikalpitā // NarP_1,115.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:25149: yadi cetsā samuddiṣṭā caṃpāhvā munisattama // NarP_1,115.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:25157: māghamāse sitā ṣaṣṭhī varuṇāhvā smṛtā tu sā /
GP12nardp1_u:25162: phaālgune śuklaṣaṣṭhyāṃ tu devaṃ paśupatiṃ dvija // NarP_1,115.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:25169: evaṃ kṛta śivārcastu naro nāryathavā mune /
GP12nardp1_u:25170: iha bhuktvā varānbhogānante śivagatiṃ labhet // NarP_1,115.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:25171: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde dvādaśamāsasthitaṣaṣṭhīvratanirūpaṇaṃ nāma pañcadaśādhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:25174: yāni kṛtvā naro bhaktyā sūryasāyujyamāpnuyāt // NarP_1,116.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:25175: caitre tu śuklasaptamyāṃ bahiḥ snānaṃ samācaret /
GP12nardp1_u:25178: vinyasetpūrvapatre tu devau dvau kṛtadhātukau // NarP_1,116.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:25180: dakṣiṇe ca nyasetpatre tathaiva rākṣasadvayam // NarP_1,116.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:25183: vāyavya yātudhānau dvau uttare ca ṛṣidvayam /
GP12nardp1_u:25187: evaṃ saṃpūjya homaṃ tu ghṛtenāṣṭaśataṃ caret /
GP12nardp1_u:25189: nāmamantreṇa vedyāṃ vā tataḥ pūrṇāhutiṃ dadet /
GP12nardp1_u:25190: dakṣiṇā ca tato deyā dvijebhyaḥ śaktito dvija // NarP_1,116.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:25192: dehānte maṇḍalaṃ bhānorbhattvā gacchetparaṃ padam // NarP_1,116.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:25195: tāṃ tatra pūjayetsnātvā pratyūṣe vimale jale /
GP12nardp1_u:25197: tato ghaṭasahasraṃ tu deyaṃ gaṅgāvrate tvidam /
GP12nardp1_u:25200: tilamātraṃ tu sauvarṇaṃ vidhāya kamalaṃ śubham // NarP_1,116.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:25204: iti saṃprārthya deveśaṃ sūrye cāstamupāgate // NarP_1,116.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:25205: sodakuṃbhaṃ tu tatpadmaṃ kapilāṃ ca dvijer'payet /
GP12nardp1_u:25206: taddine tūpavastavyaṃ bhoktavyaṃ ca pare 'hani // NarP_1,116.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:25208: nibavrataṃ ca tatreva tadvidhānaṃ śṛṇuṣva me // NarP_1,116.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:25212: dvijānpare 'hni saṃbhojya svayaṃ bhuñjīta bandhubhiḥ // NarP_1,116.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:25214: saptamī śarkarākhyaiṣā proktā taccāpi me śṛṇu // NarP_1,116.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:25218: iṣṭā raverataḥ puṇyā śarkarā havyakavyayoḥ // NarP_1,116.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:25222: kartavyaṃ hi prayatnena vratame tadravipriyam // NarP_1,116.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:25223: yaḥ kuryātparāyā bhaktyā sa vai sadgatimāpnuyāt /
GP12nardp1_u:25224: jyeṣṭhe tu śuklasaptamyāṃ jāta indro raviḥ svayam // NarP_1,116.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:25226: svargatiṃ labhate vipra devendrasya prasādataḥ // NarP_1,116.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:25228: jātastaṃ tatra saṃprārcya gandhapuṣpādibhiḥ pṛthak // NarP_1,116.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:25231: kārpāsaṃ tu caturhastaṃ sārddha vastraṃ hi gopateḥ ///
GP12nardp1_u:25234: asyāṃ dānaṃ japo homaḥ sarvaṃ cākṣayyatāṃ vrajet // NarP_1,116.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:25236: somasya tu maheśasya pūjanaṃ cātra kīrtitam // NarP_1,116.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:25240: nālikeraṃ ca vṛntākaṃ nāraṅgaṃ bījapūrakam // NarP_1,116.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:25244: saṃpūjya parayā bhaktyā dhārayedvāmake kare // NarP_1,116.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:25245: strī naro dakṣiṇe caiva yāvadvarṣaṃ samāpyate /
GP12nardp1_u:25246: saṃbhojya viprānsaptaiva pāyasena visṛjyasa tān // NarP_1,116.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:25248: phalāni tāni deyāni saptasvapi dvijeṣu ca // NarP_1,116.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:25249: evaṃ tu sapta varṣāṇi kṛtvopāsya yathāvidhi /
GP12nardp1_u:25250: sāyujyaṃ labhate vipra mahādevasya tadvratī // NarP_1,116.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:25254: tvāmahaṃ dadmi kalyāṇi prīyatāmaryamā svayam // NarP_1,116.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:25256: ityuktvā vedaviduṣe dattvā kṛtvā ca dakṣiṇām // NarP_1,116.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:25258: pacagavyaṃ vrataṃ cetthaṃ vidhāya śvo dvijottamān // NarP_1,116.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:25260: kṛtaṃ hyetadgataṃ vipra subhāṣyaṃ śraddhayānvitaḥ // NarP_1,116.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:25266: visṛjya bandhubhiḥ sārddhaṃ svayaṃ bhuñjīta vāgyataḥ // NarP_1,116.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:25270: ato 'syāṃ pūjanaṃ tasya yathoktavidhinā dvija // NarP_1,116.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:25272: suvarṇadakṣiṇāṃ datvā visṛjyāśnīta ca svayam // NarP_1,116.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:25274: dvijobrāhmaṃ tathā śūdraḥ satkulejanma cāpnuyāt // NarP_1,116.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:25276: upoṣya bhānuṃ triḥsandhyaṃ samabhyarcya dharāsthitaḥ // NarP_1,116.52 //
GP12nardp1_u:25279: pṛthavī vā suvarṇaṃ vā visṛjyāśnīta ca svayam /
GP12nardp1_u:25281: mārtaṇḍākhyaṃ vrataṃ nāma kathayanti dvijāḥ pare /
GP12nardp1_u:25285: sauvarṇaṃ gandhapuṣpādyaiḥ kṛtvā rātrau ca jāgaram /
GP12nardp1_u:25286: pare 'hni viprānsambhojya pāyasena tu sapta vai // NarP_1,116.57 //
GP12nardp1_u:25287: dakṣiṇāṃ nālikerāṇi tebhyo datvā guruṃ tataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:25288: sauvarṇaṃ tu raverbimbaṃ yuktaṃ dakṣiṇayā nyayā // NarP_1,116.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:25289: samarpya ca bhṛśaṃ prārthya visṛjyādyātsvayaṃ tataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:25295: asyāṃ samarcya savituḥ pratimāṃ tu haimīṃ haimāśvayuktarathagāṃ tu dadetsahebhām /
GP12nardp1_u:25296: yo bhāvabhaktisahitaḥ sa gato hi lokaṃ śambhoḥ sa modata ihāpi ca bhuktabhogaḥ // NarP_1,116.62 //
GP12nardp1_u:25299: arkasya ca badaryāśca sapta sapta dalāni vai /
GP12nardp1_u:25301: putrapradaṃ vrataṃ cātra prāhādityaḥ svayaṃ prabhuḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:25305: pūjayedapare cāhni homaṃ kṛtvā dvijāṃ stataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:25306: dadhyodanena payasā pāyasena ca bhojayet // NarP_1,116.67 //
GP12nardp1_u:25308: labhate sa tu satputraṃ cirāyuṣamanāmayam // NarP_1,116.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:25317: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde dvādaśamāsasthitasappamīvratanirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣoḍaśādhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:25324: caitre māsi sitāṣṭamyāṃ na te śokamavāpnuyuḥ // NarP_1,117.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:25334: jyeṣṭhaśukle tathāṣṭamyāṃ yo devīṃ pūjayennaraḥ // NarP_1,117.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:25336: śuklāṣṭamyāṃ tathā'ṣāḍhe snātvā caiva niśāṃbunā // NarP_1,117.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:25340: bhojayitvā tato viprāndatvā svarṇaṃ ca dakṣiṇām // NarP_1,117.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:25341: visṛjya ca tataḥ paścātsvayaṃ bhuñjīta vāgyataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:25344: kṣīreṇa snāpayitvā ca miṣṭānnaṃ vinivedayet // NarP_1,117.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:25348: upavāsaṃ tu saṃkalpya snātvā kṛtvā ca naityikam // NarP_1,117.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:25350: kṛṣṇaṃ viṣṇuṃ tathānantaṃ govindaṃ garuḍadhvajam // NarP_1,117.16 //
GP12nardp1_u:25355: ādau madhye tathā cānte homaṃ kuryādvidhānataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:25358: sauvarṇe tāmrapātre vā mṛnmaye veṇupātrake // NarP_1,117.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:25360: haimīṃ ca pratimāṃ kṛtvā pūjayitvā vidhānataḥ // NarP_1,117.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:25362: dātavyā gauḥ savatsā ca vastrālaṅkārabhūṣitā // NarP_1,117.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:25364: tāśca dadyādvidhijñāya svayaṃ vā bhakṣayedvratī // NarP_1,117.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:25366: daśame 'hni tato mūrtiṃ sadravyāṃ guraver'payet // NarP_1,117.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:25368: dadyādeva daśābdaṃ tu kṛtvā vratamanuttamam // NarP_1,117.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:25370: ante kṛṣṇasya sāyujyaṃ labhate nātra saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,117.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:25374: upavāsī tilaiḥ snāto nadyādau vimale jale // NarP_1,117.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:25376: tanmadhye kalaśaṃ sthāpya tāmrajaṃ vāpi mṛnmayam // NarP_1,117.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:25378: haimīṃ vastrayugācchannāṃ kṛṣṇasya pratimāṃ śubham // NarP_1,117.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:25380: devakīṃ vasudevaṃ ca yaśodāṃ nandameva ca // NarP_1,117.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:25382: tata ārārtikaṃ kṛtvā kṣamāpyānamya bhaktitaḥ // NarP_1,117.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:25385: dhānyākaṃ ca yavānīṃ ca śuṇṭhīṃ khaṇḍaṃ ca nārada /
GP12nardp1_u:25386: sājyaṃ raupye dhṛtaṃ pātre naivedyaṃ vinivedayet // NarP_1,117.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:25392: datvā ca dakṣiṇāṃ tebhyo visṛjettuṣṭamānasaḥ // NarP_1,117.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:25394: gurave dakṣiṇāṃ datvā visṛjyāśrīta ca svayam // NarP_1,117.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:25398: kṛtena yena labhyeta koṭyaikādaśakaṃ phalam // NarP_1,117.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:25402: śakto bhaktaścopavāsaṃ pare 'hni vidhinā tataḥ // NarP_1,117.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:25404: kṛtvā svayaṃ ca bhuñjītaṃ vratamevaṃ samāpayet // NarP_1,117.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:25406: rahasyaṃ goṣṭhajaṃ labdhvā rādhāparikare vaset // NarP_1,117.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:25407: dūrvāṣṭamīvrataṃ cātra kathitaṃ tacca me śṛṇu /
GP12nardp1_u:25408: śucau deśe prajātāyāṃ dvarvāyāṃ dvijasattama // NarP_1,117.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:25409: sthāpya liṅgaṃ tato gandhaiḥ puṣpairdhūpaiśca dīpakaiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:25416: tataḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya viprānsaṃbhojya tatra vai // NarP_1,117.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:25417: bhuktvā svayaṃ gṛhaṃ gacchedatvā vipreṣu dakṣiṇām /
GP12nardp1_u:25418: phalāni ca praśastāni miṣṭāni surabhīṇi ca // NarP_1,117.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:25419: evaṃ puṇyā pāpaharā nṛṇā dūrvāṣṭamī dvija /

GP12nardp1_u:25506: śītale tvaṃ jaganmātā śītale tvaṃ jagatpitā /
GP12nardp1_u:25507: śītale tvaṃ jagadvātrī śītalāyai namonamaḥ // NarP_1,117.95 //
GP12nardp1_u:25510: śītale śītale cetthaṃ ye japanti jale lthitāḥ //ṭha

GP12nardp1_u:25518: atha vakṣyāmi viprendra navamyāste vratāni vai /

GP12nardp1_u:25526: vidhūya cehapāpāni vraje dviṣṇoḥ paraṃ padam /

GP12nardp1_u:25529: atraiva bhadrakālo tu yoginīnāṃ mahābalā // NarP_1,118.6 //

GP12nardp1_u:25541: sa bhavedvai valoke tu bhogabhāragdevayānagaḥ // NarP_1,118.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:25543: pakṣayorupavāsaṃ vā kaumārīṃ caṇḍikāṃ yajet // NarP_1,118.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:25547: sa vimānena gacchedvai devīlokaṃ sanātanam // NarP_1,118.15 //

GP12nardp1_u:25553: tato niśāyāṃ prāgyāme khaḍgaṃ dhanuriṣūngadām // NarP_1,118.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:25554: śūlaṃ śaktiṃ ca paraśuṃ chirikāṃ carma kheṭakam /
GP12nardp1_u:25555: chatraṃ dhvajaṃ gajaṃ cāśva govṛṣaṃ pustakaṃ tulām // NarP_1,118.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:25557: saṃpūjya mahiṣaṃ tatra bhadrakālyai samālabhet // NarP_1,118.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:25558: evaṃ baliṃ vidhāyātha bhuktvā pakkānna meva ca /

GP12nardp1_u:25564: devānāṃ ca ṛṣīṇāṃ ca pitṝṇāṃ cāpi nārada /
GP12nardp1_u:25567: svayaṃ bhuktvā ca vihareddvijebhyo dattadakṣiṇaḥ // NarP_1,118.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:25568: evaṃ yaḥ kurute bhaktyā japadānaṃ dvijārcanam /

GP12nardp1_u:25573: pauṣe śuklanavamyāṃ tu mahāmāyāṃ prapūjayet // NarP_1,118.28 //

GP12nardp1_u:25577: tasyāṃ snānaṃ tathā dānaṃ japo homa upoṣaṇam // NarP_1,118.30 //

GP12nardp1_u:25585: atha te 'haṃ pravakṣyāmi daśamyā vai vratāni ca /

GP12nardp1_u:25603: asyāṃ yo jāhnavīṃ prāpya snāti saṃprītamānasaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:25604: vidhinā jāhnavītoye sa yāti harimandiram // NarP_1,119.10 //

GP12nardp1_u:25609: tatropavāso naktaṃ vā dvijānāṃ bhojanaṃ japaḥ /

GP12nardp1_u:25615: matsyaṃ kūrmaṃ varāhaṃ ca narasiṃhaṃ trivikramam /

GP12nardp1_u:25620: visṛjya paścādbhuñjīta svayaṃ sveṣṭaiḥ samāhitaḥ // NarP_1,119.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:25628: kinnaṃ dhānyaṃ saraupyaṃ tu dhṛtvā dhautāṃśukāvṛtam // NarP_1,119.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:25632: evaṃ kṛtvā vidhānaṃ tu naro varṣaṃ suravānvitaḥ // NarP_1,119.24 //

GP12nardp1_u:25637: saṃpūjya tāṃ vidhānena sajjīkṛtya svakaṃ balam /

GP12nardp1_u:25656: taṃ yamaḥ pretarājo vai nāśayatvakhileṣṭadaḥ // NarP_1,119.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:25657: yo me nairṛtigaḥ pāpmā pāpakeneha karmaṇā /
GP12nardp1_u:25661: yo me vāyugataḥ pāpmā pāpakeneha karmaṇā /
GP12nardp1_u:25663: yo me saumyagataḥ pāpmā pāpakeneha karmaṇā /
GP12nardp1_u:25665: yo ma īśagataḥ pāpmā pāpakeneha karmaṇā /
GP12nardp1_u:25667: yo maṃ ūrddhvagataḥ pāpmā pāpakeneha karmaṇā /
GP12nardp1_u:25671: ityevaṃ dikṣu daśasu baliṃ datvā samāhitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:25676: dvādaśābhyarcya saṃbhojya śaktito dakṣiṇāṃ dadet // NarP_1,119.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:25678: yugaṃ svargasukhaṃ bhuktvā sārvabhaumo nṛpo bhavet // NarP_1,119.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:25682: etatkṛtvā vrataṃ vipra hyārogyaṃ prāpya bhūtale // NarP_1,119.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:25684: pauṣe daśamyāṃ śuklāyāṃ viśvedevān samarcayet // NarP_1,119.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:25685: ṛtuṃ dakṣaṃ vasū6nsatyaṃ kālaṃ kāmaṃ muniṃ gurum /
GP12nardp1_u:25686: vipraṃ rāmaṃ ca daśadhā keśavastānsamāsthitaḥ // NarP_1,119.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:25690: dakṣiṇāṃ tāṃ dvijāgryebhyo gurave vā samarpayet // NarP_1,119.53 //
GP12nardp1_u:25691: evaṃ kṛtavidhi ścaikabhakto bhogī vratī bhavet /
GP12nardp1_u:25692: lokadvayasya viprarṣe nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // NarP_1,119.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:25696: ātmā hyāyurmano dakṣo madaḥ prāṇastathaiva ca // NarP_1,119.56 //
GP12nardp1_u:25697: barhiṣmāṃśca gaviṣṭhaśca dattaḥ satyaśca te daśa /
GP12nardp1_u:25710: gṛhāṇārghyaṃ mayā dattaṃ bhaktyā māmanukaṃpaya // NarP_1,119.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:25712: raupyāṃ sudakṣiṇāṃ datvā visṛjyāśnīta ca svayam // NarP_1,119.64 //
GP12nardp1_u:25716: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde dvādaśamāsasthitadaśamīvratanirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikonaviṃśatyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:25719: nānāpuṣpairmune kṛtvā vicitraṃ maṇḍapaṃ śubham // NarP_1,120.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:25725: rātrau jāgaraṇaṃ kṛtvā yāti viṣṇoḥ paraṃ padam // NarP_1,120.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:25730: datvā ca dakṣiṇāṃ tebhyo visṛjyāśnīta ca svayam ///
GP12nardp1_u:25731: iyaṃ tu kāmadā nāma sarvapātakanāśinī // NarP_1,120.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:25737: sarvapāpa vinirmukto vaiṣṇavaṃ labhate padvam // NarP_1,120.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:25739: snātvā pare 'hni saṃpūjya gandhādyaiḥ puruṣottamam // NarP_1,120.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:25741: jeṣṭhasya kṛṣṇakādaśyāṃ samupoṣya parāṃ nṛpa // NarP_1,120.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:25743: tato dvijāgryānsaṃbhojya datvā tebhyaśca dakṣiṇām // NarP_1,120.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:25745: jyeṣṭhasya śuklaikādaśyāṃ nirjalāṃ samupoṣya tu // NarP_1,120.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:25755: upoṣya tasmin divase vidhivanmaṇḍape śubhe // NarP_1,120.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:25759: tataḥ pañcāmṛtaiḥ snāpya mantraiḥ śuddhajalena ca // NarP_1,120.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:25763: vibuddhe tvayi buddhaṃ ca jagatsarvaṃ carācaram // NarP_1,120.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:25769: tataḥ prabhṛti viprendra gandhādyaiḥ pratyahaṃ yajet // NarP_1,120.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:25775: upacāraiḥ ṣoḍaśa bhistataḥ saṃbhojya vai dvijān // NarP_1,120.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:25776: datvā ca dakṣiṇāṃ tebhyo visṛjyāśnīta bāndhavaiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:25778: sa sarvakāmāṃllabdhveha yāti viṣṇoḥ paraṃ padam /
GP12nardp1_u:25779: ekādaśyāṃ nabhaḥśukle pavitrāṃ samupoṣya vai // NarP_1,120.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:25782: datvā ca dakṣiṇāṃ tebhyaḥ putraṃ prāpyeha sadguṇam /
GP12nardp1_u:25795: tataḥ prabhāpte dvādaśyāṃ gandhādyairarcya vāmanam // NarP_1,120.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:25797: evaṃ yaḥ kurute vipra padmāvratamanuttamam // NarP_1,120.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:25798: bhuktiṃ prāpyeha muktiṃ tu labhateṃ'te prapañcataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:25799: iṣasya kṛṣṇaikā daśyāmindirāṃ samupoṣya vai // NarP_1,120.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:25801: viṣṇoḥ prītikaraṃ vipra tataḥ prātarharerdine // NarP_1,120.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:25803: visṛjya dakṣiṇāṃ datvā tāṃstato 'śnīta ca svayam // NarP_1,120.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:25805: pitṝṇāṃ koṭimuddhṛtya yātyante vaiṣṇavaṃ gṛham // NarP_1,120.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:25809: bhaktyā praṇamya visṛjedaśnīyācca svayaṃ tataḥ // NarP_1,120.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:25810: evaṃ yaḥ kurute bhaktyā naraḥ pāśāṅkuśāvratam /
GP12nardp1_u:25811: sa bhuktveha varānbhogānyāti viṣṇoḥ salokatām // NarP_1,120.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:25817: vyomayānena sāṃnidhyaṃ labhate ca ramāpateḥ // NarP_1,120.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:25823: snātvā nityakriyāṃ kṛtvā gadādāmodaraṃ yajet // NarP_1,120.53 //
GP12nardp1_u:25827: evaṃ yaḥ kurute bhaktyā bodhinīvratamādṛtaḥ // NarP_1,120.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:25831: tataḥ saṃbhojya viprāgryāndatvā tebhyaśca dakṣiṇām // NarP_1,120.57 //
GP12nardp1_u:25834: sa vimānaṃ samāruhya yātyante vaiṣṇavaṃ padam /
GP12nardp1_u:25835: mārgasya śuklaikādaśyāṃ mokṣākhyāṃ samupoṣya vai // NarP_1,120.59 //
GP12nardp1_u:25838: visṛjya dakṣiṇāṃ datvā svayaṃ bhuñjīta bāndhavaiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:25839: evaṃ kṛtvā vrataṃ vipra bhuktvā bhogānihepsitān // NarP_1,120.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:25844: evaṃ kṛtvā vrataṃ vipra saphalāyā vidhānataḥ // NarP_1,120.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:25846: pauṣasya śuklaikādaśyāṃ putradāṃ samupoṣya vai // NarP_1,120.64 //
GP12nardp1_u:25848: tataḥ saṃbhojya viprāgryāndatvā tebhyastu dakṣiṇām // NarP_1,120.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:25850: evaṃ kṛtavrato vipra bhukvā bhogānihepsitān // NarP_1,120.66 //
GP12nardp1_u:25852: māghamya kṛṣṇaikādaśyāṃ ṣaṭtilāṃ samupoṣya vai // NarP_1,120.67 //
GP12nardp1_u:25853: snātvā datvā tarpayitvā hutvā bhuktvā samarcya ca /
GP12nardp1_u:25854: tilaireva dvijaśreṣṭha dvādaśyāṃ prātareva hi // NarP_1,120.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:25857: evaṃ kṛtvā vrataṃ vipra vidhinā susamāhitaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:25861: bhojayitvā dakṣiṇāṃ ca datvā viprānvisṛjya ca /
GP12nardp1_u:25862: svayaṃ bhuñjīta taccheṣaṃ prayato nijabāndhavaiḥ // NarP_1,120.72 //
GP12nardp1_u:25863: ya evaṃ kurute vipra vrataṃ keśavatoṣaṇam /
GP12nardp1_u:25864: sa bhuktveha varānbhogānante viṣṇoḥ padaṃ vrajet // NarP_1,120.73 //
GP12nardp1_u:25868: visṛjya bāndhavaiḥ sārddhaṃ svayamaśnīta vāgyataḥ // NarP_1,120.75 //
GP12nardp1_u:25870: dehānte vaiṣṇavaṃ lokaṃ yāti devaiḥ susatkṛtaḥ // NarP_1,120.76 //
GP12nardp1_u:25876: sitaikādaśyāṃ tapasye vrajedviṣṇoḥ paraṃ padam // NarP_1,120.79 //
GP12nardp1_u:25880: datvā tebhyo visṛjyātha svayaṃ bhuñjīta bāndhavaiḥ // NarP_1,120.81 //
GP12nardp1_u:25882: sa yāti vaiṣṇavaṃ lokaṃ vimānena tu bhāsvatā // NarP_1,120.82 //
GP12nardp1_u:25883: itthaṃ kṛṣṇo tathā śukle vrataṃ caikādaśībhavam /
GP12nardp1_u:25884: mokṣadaṃ kīrtitaṃ vipra nāstyasminsaṃśayaḥ kvacit // NarP_1,120.83 //
GP12nardp1_u:25886: sarvavratottamaṃ vipra tato jñeyaṃ mahāphalam // NarP_1,120.84 //
GP12nardp1_u:25892: daśamyāṃ daśa vastūni varjayedvaiṣṇavaṛ sadā // NarP_1,120.87 //
GP12nardp1_u:25893: dyūtakrīḍāṃ ca nidrāṃ ca tāṃbūlaṃ dantadhāvanam /
GP12nardp1_u:25894: parāpavādaṃ paiśunyaṃ steyaṃ hiṃsāṃ tathā ratim // NarP_1,120.88 //
GP12nardp1_u:25896: kāṃsyaṃ māṃsaṃ surāṃ kṣaudraṃ tailaṃ viṇmlecchabhāṣaṇam // NarP_1,120.89 //
GP12nardp1_u:25902: iti śrībṛhannāradīya purāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthabhāge dvādaśamāsastitaikādaśīvratakathanaṃ nāma viṃśatyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:25905: yāni kṛtvā naro loke viṣṇoḥ priyataro bhavet // NarP_1,121.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:25918: kāñcanaṃ kāmadevaṃ ca śuktāṃ gāṃ ca payasvinīm /
GP12nardp1_u:25924: svāstṛtāṃ tatra śayyāṃ tu kṛtvātra śrīyutaṃ harim /
GP12nardp1_u:25931: saptajanmasu bhuṅkte ca bhogān lokadvayepsitān // NarP_1,121.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:25943: tabhyo vāsāṃsi daṇḍāṃśca brahmasūtrāṇi mudrikāḥ // NarP_1,121.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:25945: dvādaśyāṃ tu nabhaḥśukle śrīdharaṃ pūjayedvratī // NarP_1,121.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:25947: saṃbhojya dakṣiṇā raupyāṃ datvā natvā visarjjayet // NarP_1,121.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:25949: dvādaśyāṃ nabhasyaśukle vratī saṃpūjya vāmanam // NarP_1,121.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:25951: sauvarṇī dakṣiṇāṃ datvā viṣṇuprītikaro bhavet // NarP_1,121.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:25958: tatra vatsayutāṃ gāṃ tu samālikhya sugandhibhiḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:25967: surabhi tvaṃ jaganmātā nityaṃ viṣṇupade sthitā // NarP_1,121.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:25971: taddine tailapakvaṃ ca sthālīpakvaṃ dvijottama // NarP_1,121.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:25972: gokṣīraṃ goghṛtaṃ caiva dadhi takraṃ ca varjayet /
GP12nardp1_u:25979: dehānte viṣṇusāyujyaṃ labhate nātra saṃśayaḥ // NarP_1,121.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:25983: hutvā tatra samuddīpte raupya dīpikayā mune // NarP_1,121.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:25985: tatraivānugatāṃ lakṣmīṃ brahmāṇīṃ caṇḍikāṃ tathā // NarP_1,121.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:25986: ādityaṃ śaṅkaraṃ gaurīṃ yakṣaṃ gaṇapatiṃ grahān /
GP12nardp1_u:25989: namo jayeti śabdaiśca ghaṇṭāśaṅkhā diniḥsvanaiḥ // NarP_1,121.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:25993: rājacihnāni sarvāṇi cchatrādīni ca nārada // NarP_1,121.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:26002: yeṣāṃ rāṣṭre pure grāme kriyate śāntiruttamā /
GP12nardp1_u:26003: nīrājanābhidhā vipra tadrogā yānti saṃkṣayam // NarP_1,121.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:26005: manobhavastathā prāṇo naro yātaśca vīryavān // NarP_1,121.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:26007: vibhuścāpi prabhuścaiva sādhyā dvādaśa kīrtitāḥ // NarP_1,121.52 //
GP12nardp1_u:26013: dhātāmitror'yamā pūṣā śakroṃ'śo varuṇo bhagaḥ // NarP_1,121.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:26015: pratimāsaṃ tu śuklāyāṃ dvādaśyāmarcya yatnataḥ // NarP_1,121.56 //
GP12nardp1_u:26016: varṣaṃ nayedvratānte tu pratimā dvādaśāpi ca /
GP12nardp1_u:26017: haimīḥ saṃpūjya vidhinā bhojayitvā dvijottamān // NarP_1,121.57 //
GP12nardp1_u:26019: eva vrataṃ naraḥ kṛtvā dvādaśādityasaṃjñakam // NarP_1,121.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:26021: jāyate bhuvi dharmātmā mānuṣye rogavarjitaḥ // NarP_1,121.59 //
GP12nardp1_u:26024: nirañjanaṃ nirā kāraṃ nirdvandvaṃ brahma cāpnuyāt /
GP12nardp1_u:26029: tataḥ samānte tāṃ mūrtiṃ samabhyarcya vidhānataḥ // NarP_1,121.63 //
GP12nardp1_u:26035: iti kṛtvā vrataṃ vipra prīṇayitvā janārdanam // NarP_1,121.66 //
GP12nardp1_u:26036: sauvarṇena vimānena yāti viṣṇoḥ paraṃ padam /
GP12nardp1_u:26041: śoṣayedātape dhṛtvā pātre tāmre 'tha mṛnmaye // NarP_1,121.69 //
GP12nardp1_u:26043: sauvarṇīṃ pratimāṃ viṣṇorniśāyāṃ jāgaraṃ caret // NarP_1,121.70 //
GP12nardp1_u:26045: tataḥ prabhāte dvādaśyāṃ tilapātropari sthitām // NarP_1,121.71 //
GP12nardp1_u:26050: vaiṣṇavyātha ca pūraṇāṃ ca śatamaṣṭottara tataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:26053: viprebhyo dakṣiṇāṃ śaktyā datvā natvā visarjayet /
GP12nardp1_u:26054: naro vā yadi vā nārī vrataṃ kṛtvaivamādarāt // NarP_1,121.75 //
GP12nardp1_u:26058: pītvā gaśṛṅgavāryādau tāṃ ca kṛtvā pradakṣiṇam // NarP_1,121.77 //
GP12nardp1_u:26064: candanaṃ palikaṃ vastraṃ pañcahastonmitaṃ tanum // NarP_1,121.80 //
GP12nardp1_u:26065: evaṃ tu māsikaṃ dānaṃ kṛtvā prāśya yathākramam /
GP12nardp1_u:26066: gomūtraṃ jalamājyaṃ vā paktvā śākaṃ caturvidham // NarP_1,121.81 //
GP12nardp1_u:26069: evaṃ kṛtavrato varṣaṃ sauvarṇīṃ pratimāṃ raveḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:26070: kṛtvā vai tāmrapātrasthāṃ nyasyābhyarcya vidhānataḥ // NarP_1,121.83 //
GP12nardp1_u:26072: viprāndrādaśa saṃbhojya tebhyo dadyācca dakṣiṇām // NarP_1,121.84 //
GP12nardp1_u:26076: abhyacya vidhivadbhaktyā suvarṇaṃ tanmukhe nyaset // NarP_1,121.86 //
GP12nardp1_u:26082: antye sitāyāṃ dvādaśyāṃ sauvarṇīṃ pratimāṃ hareḥ // NarP_1,121.89 //
GP12nardp1_u:26087: jayā ca vijayā caiva jayantī cāparājitā /
GP12nardp1_u:26088: etā aṣṭau sadopoṣyā dvādaśyaḥ pāpahārikāḥ // NarP_1,121.92 //
GP12nardp1_u:26090: kīdṛśaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ brahmannetāsāṃ kiṃ phalaṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:26091: tatsarvaṃ me samācakṣva yāścanyāḥ puṇyadāyukāḥ // NarP_1,121.93 //
GP12nardp1_u:26094: praśasya bhrātaraṃ prāha mahābhāgavataṃ muniḥ // NarP_1,121.94 //
GP12nardp1_u:26096: sādhu pṛṣṭaṃ tvayā bhrātaḥ sādhūnāṃ saṃśayacchidā /
GP12nardp1_u:26097: vakṣye mahādvādaśīnāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ ca phalaṃ pṛthak // NarP_1,121.95 //
GP12nardp1_u:26099: tadā tu trispṛśā nāma dvādaśī sā mahāphalā // NarP_1,121.96 //
GP12nardp1_u:26103: tadā tāṃ saṃparityajya dvādaśīṃ samupoṣayet // NarP_1,121.98 //
GP12nardp1_u:26107: tadā vañjulikākhyāṃ tu tāṃ tyaktvopoṣayetsadā // NarP_1,121.100 //
GP12nardp1_u:26112: kuhūrāke yadā vṛddhe syātāṃ vipra yadā tadā /
GP12nardp1_u:26113: pakṣavarddhanikā nāma dvādaśī sā mahāphalā // NarP_1,121.103 //
GP12nardp1_u:26116: yadā tu dhavale pakṣe dvādaśī syānmadhānvitā //ṭha
GP12nardp1_u:26117: tadā proktā jayā nāma sarvaśatruvināśinī // NarP_1,121.105 //
GP12nardp1_u:26121: tadā sā vijayā nāma tasyāmacedgadādharam // NarP_1,121.107 //
GP12nardp1_u:26125: dvādaśī sā mahāpuṇyā jayantī nāmataḥ smṛtā // NarP_1,121.109 //
GP12nardp1_u:26129: yadā tu syātsite pakṣe dvādaśī jīvabhānvitā // NarP_1,121.111 //
GP12nardp1_u:26135: tadā vratadvayaṃ kāryyaṃ na doṣo 'traikadaivatam // NarP_1,121.114 //
GP12nardp1_u:26137: ūrjje sitāyāṃ dvādaśyāmantyabhe ca vratadvayam // NarP_1,121.115 //
GP12nardp1_u:26140: ekādaśyā vrataṃ nityaṃ dvādaśyāḥ sahitaṃ yataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:26142: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe bṛhadupākhyāne pūrvabhāge caturthapāde dvādaśamāsasya dvādaśīvratanirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikaviṃśatyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:26145: yāni kṛtvā naro bhaktyā subhago jāyate bhuvi // NarP_1,122.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:26147: kṛtvā saṃpūjya yatnena vījeyavdyajanena ca // NarP_1,122.2 //
GP12nardp1_u:26155: namo mārāya kāmāya kāmadevasya mūrttaye // NarP_1,122.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:26160: evaṃ yaḥ kurute vipra varṣe varṣe mahotsavam /
GP12nardp1_u:26161: vasaṃtasamaye prāpte hṛṣṭaḥ puṣṭaḥ sadaiva saḥ // NarP_1,122.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:26163: madanaṃ hṛdbhavaṃ kāmaṃ manmathaṃ ca ratipriyam // NarP_1,122.10 //
GP12nardp1_u:26167: ajāyā dānamapyuktaṃ snātvā nadyā vidhānataḥ // NarP_1,122.12 //
GP12nardp1_u:26169: bhūyastvanena dānena sa loke naiva jāyate // NarP_1,122.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:26170: yadīyaṃ śaninā yuktā sā mahāvāruṇī smṛtā /
GP12nardp1_u:26172: śubhayogaḥ śatarkṣaṃ ca śanau kāme madhau site /
GP12nardp1_u:26177: evameva vrataṃ kāryaṃ varṣānte gāmalaṅkṛtām // NarP_1,122.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:26181: śvetamandāramarkaṃ vā karavīraṃ ca raktakam // NarP_1,122.19 //
GP12nardp1_u:26184: pūjitā mama daurbhāgyaṃ nāśayantu namo 'stu vaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:26185: itthaṃ yor'cayate bhaktyā varṣe varṣe drumatrayam // NarP_1,122.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:26186: naśyate tasya daurbhāgyaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā /
GP12nardp1_u:26189: haimyau raupyau ca mṛnmapyau yathāśaktyā vidhāya ca // NarP_1,122.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:26192: tataḥ pañcadinaṃ pūjā caikabhaktaṃ vrataṃ tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:26193: tṛtīyadivase prātaḥ snātvā saṃpūjya tau punaḥ // NarP_1,122.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:26195: varṣe varṣe tataḥ paścādvidheyaṃ varṣapañcakam // NarP_1,122.26 //
GP12nardp1_u:26197: itthaṃ naro vā nārī vā kṛtvā vratamidaṃ śubham // NarP_1,122.27 //
GP12nardp1_u:26201: kṛtopavāsā kanyaiva nārī vā dvijasattama // NarP_1,122.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:26202: tāmre vā mṛnmaye vāpi sauvarṇe rājate tathā /
GP12nardp1_u:26205: satakṛtya bhojya pratime dadyāttābhyāṃ sadakṣiṇe // NarP_1,122.31 //
GP12nardp1_u:26209: lakṣmīnārāyaṇaṃ kṛtvā sauvarṇaṃ vāpi rājatam // NarP_1,122.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:26211: pīṭhe vinyasya vastrāḍhyaṃ gandhādyaiḥ paripūjayet // NarP_1,122.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:26213: evaṃ dinatrayaṃ kṛtvā vratānte māsamarcya ca // NarP_1,122.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:26216: tāsāṃ madhye tu yā nandā tasyai dhenvai namo namaḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:26218: gāvo mamāgrataḥ santu gāvo me saṃtu pṛṣṭhataḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:26219: gāvo me pārśvataḥ saṃtu gavāṃ madhye vasāmyaham // NarP_1,122.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:26225: haimaṃ hyaśokaṃ nirmāya pūjayitvā vidhānataḥ // NarP_1,122.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:26231: samabhyarcya vidhānena dvijaṃ saṃbhojya dāpayet // NarP_1,122.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:26235: pradoṣe tailadīpaṃ tu prajvālyābhyarcya yatnataḥ // NarP_1,122.46 //
GP12nardp1_u:26237: evaṃ kṛte tu viprendra yamapīḍā na jāyate // NarP_1,122.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:26239: punaḥ snātvā pradoṣe tu vāgyataḥ susamāhitaḥ // NarP_1,122.48 //
GP12nardp1_u:26244: tataḥ stuvīta deveśaṃ śivaṃ nāmnāṃ śatena ca /
GP12nardp1_u:26245: tāni nāmāni kīrtyante sarvābhīṣṭapradāni vai // NarP_1,122.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:26247: kaparddine sureśāya vyomakeśāya vai namaḥ // NarP_1,122.52 //
GP12nardp1_u:26251: vyālapriyāya vyālāya vyālānāṃ pataye namaḥ // NarP_1,122.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:26255: vedagītāya guptāya vedaguhyāya vai namaḥ // NarP_1,122.56 //
GP12nardp1_u:26257: namo jagatpratiṣṭhāya vyomarūpāya vai namaḥ // NarP_1,122.57 //
GP12nardp1_u:26263: trinetrāya trivedāya vedāṅgāya namo namaḥ // NarP_1,122.60 //
GP12nardp1_u:26265: viśvarūpāya viśvāya viśvanāthāya vai namaḥ // NarP_1,122.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:26267: arūpāya virūpāya sūkṣmasūkṣmāya vai namaḥ // NarP_1,122.62 //
GP12nardp1_u:26272: namaḥ prabhāvarūpāya prabhāvārthāya vai namaḥ // NarP_1,122.65 //
GP12nardp1_u:26274: triyaṃbakāya śitikaṇṭhabhārgiṇe gaurīyuje maṅgalahetave namaḥ // NarP_1,122.66 //
GP12nardp1_u:26284: evaṃ kṛte tu vidhivadvratī saubhāgyabhājanaḥ // NarP_1,122.71 //
GP12nardp1_u:26290: prayāge māghamāse tu tryahaṃ snātasya yatphalam /
GP12nardp1_u:26292: tatra snānaṃ japo homo dānaṃ cānantyamaśnute /
GP12nardp1_u:26293: phaālgune tu site pakṣe trayodaśyāmupoṣitaḥ // NarP_1,122.75 //
GP12nardp1_u:26299: tato vratānte tu punaḥ sauvarṇaṃ dhananāyakam // NarP_1,122.78 //
GP12nardp1_u:26306: guruṃ samarcya vastrādyaiḥ pratimāṃ tāṃ nivedayet /
GP12nardp1_u:26307: dvijebhyo dakṣaṇāṃ śaktyā datvā natvā visṛjya ca // NarP_1,122.82 //
GP12nardp1_u:26309: evaṃ kṛte vrate vipra nirdhanaḥ prāpya vaibhavam // NarP_1,122.83 //
GP12nardp1_u:26310: modate bhuvi vikhyāto rājarāja ivāparaḥ // NarP_1,122.84 //
GP12nardp1_u:26311: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne dvādaśamāsasthitatrayodaśīvratakathanaṃ nāma dvāviṃśadadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:26313: śṛṇu nārada vakṣyāmi caturdaśyā vratāni te /
GP12nardp1_u:26314: yāni kṛtvā naro loke sarvānkāmānavāpnuyāt // NarP_1,123.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:26325: datvā mantraṃ dvijāgryāya bhuñjīta ca pare 'hani /
GP12nardp1_u:26326: evameva tu kṛṣṇāsu sarvāsu dvijasattama // NarP_1,123.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:26330: niśāgame tu saṃpūjya nṛsiṃhaṃ daityasūdanam // NarP_1,123.9 //
GP12nardp1_u:26338: varṣe varṣe sa labhate bhuktabhogo hareḥ padam // NarP_1,123.13 //
GP12nardp1_u:26340: durlabhaṃ vārcanaṃ tatra darśanaṃ pāpanāśanam // NarP_1,123.14 //
GP12nardp1_u:26346: evaṃ yaḥ pūjayetpaiṣṭaṃ liṅgaṃ sarvārthasiddhidam // NarP_1,123.17 //
GP12nardp1_u:26354: śatābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā tato devyai nivedayet // NarP_1,123.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:26360: gandhādyaiḥ prāk samabhyarcyaḥ kārpāsaṃ paṭṭajaṃ tu vā // NarP_1,123.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:26362: tataḥ purāṇamuttārya sūtraṃ kṣiptvā jalāśayeṃ // NarP_1,123.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:26368: suśobhane nyasettatra kalaśaṃ tāmrajaṃ mune // NarP_1,123.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:26370: pītapaṭṭāṃśukācchannāṃ tatra tāṃ vidhinā yajet // NarP_1,123.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:26372: tato homaṃ haviṣyeṇa kṛtvā pūrṇāhutiṃ caret // NarP_1,123.30 //
GP12nardp1_u:26373: śayyāṃ sopaskarāṃ dhenuṃ pratimāṃ ca dvijottama /
GP12nardp1_u:26378: kadalīvratamapyatra tadvidhānaṃ ca me śṛṇu // NarP_1,123.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:26379: naro vā yadi vā nārī raṃbhāmupavanasthitām /
GP12nardp1_u:26382: evaṃ saṃpūjya mantreṇa tataḥ saṃprārthayerdvatī // NarP_1,123.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:26384: śarīrārogyalāvaṇyaṃ dehi devi namo 'stu te // NarP_1,123.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:26385: iti saṃprārthyaṃ kanyāstu catasro vā suvāsinīḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:26387: namaskṛtya nijaṃ gehaṃ samāpya niyamaṃ vrajet /
GP12nardp1_u:26388: evaṃ kṛte vrate vipra labdhvā saubhāgyamuttamam // NarP_1,123.38 //
GP12nardp1_u:26394: tarpaṇaṃ ca gavāṃ grāsaṃ baliṃ caiva śvakākayoḥ // NarP_1,123.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:26396: evaṃ yaḥ kurute vipra śrāddhaṃ saṃpannadakṣiṇam // NarP_1,123.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:26402: sa bhuktveha varānbhogāndivaṃ dharmājñayā vrajet // NarP_1,123.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:26409: snātvā viśveśvaro devo devaiḥ saha munīśvara /
GP12nardp1_u:26410: maṇikarṇika tīrthe ca tripuṇḍraṃ bhasmanā dadhat // NarP_1,123.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:26420: śvetāyāḥ kṣīramuditaṃ raktāyāśca tathā dadhi // NarP_1,123.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:26422: kuśāṃ bunā tataḥ prātaḥ snātvā santarpyaṃ devatāḥ // NarP_1,123.55 //
GP12nardp1_u:26425: yacca bālye kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ kaumāre vārddhake 'pi yat /
GP12nardp1_u:26434: pare 'hni prātarutthāya snātvā somaṃ maheśvaram // NarP_1,123.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:26443: tatsthaṃ dvijātaye dattvā modate divi devavat /
GP12nardp1_u:26448: kṛśarānnaṃ svayaṃ cāpi tadevāśnīta vāgyataḥ // NarP_1,123.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:26456: evaṃ kṛtvā vrataṃ martyo mahādevaprasādataḥ // NarP_1,123.72 //
GP12nardp1_u:26460: evaṃ kṛtvā vrataṃ vipra durgāyāścaikabhojanaḥ // NarP_1,123.74 //
GP12nardp1_u:26464: udyāpane tu sarvāṃsāṃ sāmānyo vidhirucyate // NarP_1,123.76 //
GP12nardp1_u:26468: pātrāṇi yajñasūtrāṇi tāvatyeva hi kalpayet // NarP_1,123.78 //
GP12nardp1_u:26470: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthabhāge dvādaśamāsasthitacaturdaśīvratavarṇanaṃ nāma trayoviṃśatyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12nardp1_u:26472: atha nārada vakṣyāmi śṛṇu pūrṇāvratāni te /
GP12nardp1_u:26473: yāni kṛtvā naro nārī prāpnuyātsukhasaṃtatim // NarP_1,124.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:26479: śṛtānnamudakuṃbhaṃ ca vaiśākhyāṃ vai dvijottame // NarP_1,124.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:26481: atra kṛṣṇājinaṃ dadyātsakhuraṃ ca saśṛṅgakam // NarP_1,124.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:26485: modate viṣṇu loke hi yāvaccandrārkatārakam // NarP_1,124.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:26487: yaḥ pradadyāddvijāgryebhyaḥ sa na śocati karhicit // NarP_1,124.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:26493: patyā sahāviyogaṃ me vaṭasthe kuru te namaḥ // NarP_1,124.11 //
GP12nardp1_u:26494: iti saprārthya yā nārī bhojayitvā pare 'hani /
GP12nardp1_u:26500: evaṃvidhaṃ hariṃ tatra snātvā pūjāṃ samācaret /
GP12nardp1_u:26508: pūrṇāntaṃ śrāvaṇe māsi gaurīrūpāṃ ca kokilām /
GP12nardp1_u:26513: gandhādyaiḥ pratyahaṃ prārccellikhitāṃ varṇakaiḥ paṭe // NarP_1,124.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:26514: tato vratānte haimīṃ vā tilapiṣṭamayīṃ dvija /
GP12nardp1_u:26517: saṃpūjya dattā viprāya sarvasaukhyakarī bhava // NarP_1,124.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:26519: vastrādidakṣiṇāṃ śaktyā datvā natvā visarjayet // NarP_1,124.24 //
GP12nardp1_u:26526: rakṣāvidhānaṃ ca tathā kartavyaṃ vidhipūrvakam // NarP_1,124.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:26527: siddhārthākṣatarājikāśca vidhṛtā raktāṃśukāṃśe sitāḥ kausuṃbhena ca tantunātha salilaiḥ prakṣālya kāṃsye dhṛtāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:26528: gandhādyairabhipūjya devanikarānsaṃprārthya viṣṇvādikānbadhnīyāddvijahastataḥ pramudito natvā prakoṣṭhe svake // NarP_1,124.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:26533: kṛte hyasminvrate vipra vārṣikaṃ karmaṃ vaidikam /
GP12nardp1_u:26534: vismṛtaṃ vidhihīnaṃ ca na kṛtaṃ sukṛtaṃ bhavet // NarP_1,124.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:26536: ekabhuktaśca yastāṃ tu śivaṃ saṃpūjya yatnataḥ // NarP_1,124.33 //
GP12nardp1_u:26537: kṛtāñjaliḥ prārthayecchvaḥ kariṣye ca vrataṃ prabho /
GP12nardp1_u:26538: evaṃ vijñāpya devaṃ tu gṛhṇīyādvratamuttamam // NarP_1,124.34 //
GP12nardp1_u:26544: punaḥ saṃpūjya tatraiva rātrau jāgaraṇaṃ caret // NarP_1,124.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:26548: haimā raupyā mṛnmayāśca ghaṭāḥ pañcadaśottamāḥ // NarP_1,124.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:26554: evaṃ kṛtvā vrataṃ caiva umāmāheśvarābhidham // NarP_1,124.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:26564: tena snātvā vidhānena sopavāso jitendriyaḥ // NarP_1,124.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:26572: yāmamātre gate rātryā lakṣmyai tadvinivedayet // NarP_1,124.51 //
GP12nardp1_u:26577: niśīthe carate loke ko jāgartiṃ dharātale /
GP12nardp1_u:26578: tasmai vittaṃ prayacchāmi jāgrate pūjakāya me // NarP_1,124.54 //
GP12nardp1_u:26585: kīṭāḥ pataṅgā maśakāśca vṛkṣā jale sthale ye vicaranti jīvāḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:26586: dṛṣṭvā pradīpānnahi te 'pi janminaḥ punaśca muktiṃ hi labhanta eva ca // NarP_1,124.58 //
GP12nardp1_u:26587: atra candrodaye vipra saṃpūjyāḥ kṛttikāśca ṣaṭ // NarP_1,124.59 //
GP12nardp1_u:26591: evaṃ devānsamabhyarcya dīpo deyo gṛhādbahiḥ // NarP_1,124.61 //
GP12nardp1_u:26594: gavāṃ kṣīreṇa saṃpūrya haimaṃ tatra vinikṣipet /
GP12nardp1_u:26596: mahāmatsyāya ca nama iti mantraṃ samuccaran /
GP12nardp1_u:26600: atra kṛttvā vṛṣotsargaṃ vrataṃ naktaṃ ca nārada /
GP12nardp1_u:26605: purandaraśca somaśca tathā tiṣyo bṛhaspatiḥ // NarP_1,124.68 //
GP12nardp1_u:26611: dṛṣṭvā ca maṅgalaṃ dravyaṃ spṛṣṭvā natvā tator'cayet // NarP_1,124.71 //
GP12nardp1_u:26615: alakṣmīnāśanaṃ caiva modateha paratra ca // NarP_1,124.73 //
GP12nardp1_u:26621: phaālgune pūrṇimāyāṃ tu holikāpūjanaṃ matam // NarP_1,124.76 //
GP12nardp1_u:26625: atastvāṃ pūjayiṣyāmi bhūte bhūtipradā bhava” // NarP_1,124.78 //
GP12nardp1_u:26631: iti jānīhi viprendra loke sthitiranekadhā // NarP_1,124.81 //
GP12nardp1_u:26638: jyeṣṭhāmāyāṃ vrataṃ proktaṃ sāvitryāḥ kasya nārada /
GP12nardp1_u:26640: śucau nabhasi bhādre ca māse pūrṇāntike dvija /
GP12nardp1_u:26647: ūrjjāmāyāṃ dīpadānaṃ devā gāragṛheṣu ca // NarP_1,124.89 //
GP12nardp1_u:26649: samarcanaṃ tathā lakṣmyāḥ svarṇaraupye kṛtākṛte // NarP_1,124.90 //
GP12nardp1_u:26655: pauṣe māghe ca viprendra pitṛśrāddhaṃ phalādhikam // NarP_1,124.93 //
GP12nardp1_u:26657: phaālgune kevalaṃ śrāddhaṃ dvijānāṃ bhojanaṃ tathā // NarP_1,124.94 //
GP12nardp1_u:26659: itthaṃ saṃkṣepataḥ proktaṃ tithikṛtyaṃ mune tava // NarP_1,124.95 //
GP12nardp1_u:26660: sarvatrāpi viśeṣo 'sti sa purāṇāntare sthitaḥ // NarP_1,124.96 //
GP12nardp1_u:26661: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe pūrvabhāge bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde dvādaśamāsasthitapaurṇamāsya māvāsyāvratakathanaṃ nāma caturviṃśatyadhikaśatamo
GP12nardp1_u:26663: ityevamuktvā muninā hi pṛṣṭāste vai kumārāḥ kila nāradena /
GP12nardp1_u:26664: saṃpūjitāḥ śāstravidāṃ variṣṭhāḥ kṛtāhnikā jagmurumeśalokam // NarP_1,125.1 //
GP12nardp1_u:26668: jagmustato jñānaghanasvarūpā natvā purāriṃ svapiturnikāśam // NarP_1,125.3 //
GP12nardp1_u:26669: tatpādapadme praṇatiṃ vidhāya pitrāpi satkṛtya sabhājitāste /
GP12nardp1_u:26670: labdhvāśiṣo 'dyāpi caranti śaśvallokeṣu tīrthāni ca tīrthabhūtāḥ // NarP_1,125.4 //
GP12nardp1_u:26672: dadhyuściraṃ viṣṇupadābjamavyayaṃ dhyāyanti yadyatayo vītarāgāḥ // NarP_1,125.5 //
GP12nardp1_u:26674: labdhvā jñānaṃ savijñānaṃ bhṛśaṃ prītamanā hyabhūt // NarP_1,125.6 //
GP12nardp1_u:26676: praṇamya satkṛtaḥ pitrā brahmaṇā niṣasāda ca // NarP_1,125.7 //
GP12nardp1_u:26678: varṇayāmāsa tattvena so 'pi śrutvā mumoda ca // NarP_1,125.8 //
GP12nardp1_u:26692: atha śvetābhrasadṛśe śṛṅge tasya ca bhūbhṛtaḥ // NarP_1,125.15 //
GP12nardp1_u:26698: taṃ dṛṣṭvā nārado viprā bhaktinamrātmakandharaḥ // NarP_1,125.18 //
GP12nardp1_u:26702: athāpṛcchacca kuśalaṃ nāradaṃ jagatāṃ guruḥ // NarP_1,125.20 //
GP12nardp1_u:26703: sa ca prāha prasādena bhavataḥ sarvamasti me /
GP12nardp1_u:26704: sarveṣāṃ yogivaryāṇāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ tatra vāḍavāḥ // NarP_1,125.21 //
GP12nardp1_u:26706: sa śivaḥ sādaraṃ tasya bhaktyā saṃtuṣṭamānasaḥ // NarP_1,125.22 //
GP12nardp1_u:26708: sa labdhvā śāṃbhavaṃ jñānaṃ śaṅkarāllokaśaṅkarāt // NarP_1,125.23 //
GP12nardp1_u:26712: etadvaḥ kīrtitaṃ viprā nāradīyaṃ mahanmayā // NarP_1,125.25 //
GP12nardp1_u:26718: setau kāñcyāṃ kuśasthalyāṃ gaṅgādvāre kuśasthale // NarP_1,125.28 //
GP12nardp1_u:26720: sa labhetsarvaya jñānāṃ tīrthānāṃ ca phalaṃ mahat // NarP_1,125.29 //
GP12nardp1_u:26726: kathitaḥ sarvapāpaghnaḥ paṭhatāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ sadā // NarP_1,125.32 //
GP12nardp1_u:26731: tapasāṃ ca vratānāṃ ca phalānāṃ saṃprakāśakam /
GP12nardp1_u:26732: mantrāṇāṃ caiva yantrāṇāṃ vedāṅgānāṃ vibhāgaśaḥ // NarP_1,125.35 //
GP12nardp1_u:26734: ya etatpaṭhate bhaktyā śṛṇuyādvā samāhitaḥ // NarP_1,125.36 //
GP12nardp1_u:26736: śrutvedaṃ nāradīyaṃ tu purāṇaṃ vedasaṃmitam // NarP_1,125.37 //
GP12nardp1_u:26740: yastu vyākurute viprāḥ purāṇaṃ dharmasaṃgraham // NarP_1,125.39 //
GP12nardp1_u:26742: kāyena manasā vācā dhanādyairapi saṃtatam // NarP_1,125.40 //
GP12nardp1_u:26744: śrutvā purāṇaṃ vidhivaddhomaṃ kṛtvā surārcanam // NarP_1,125.41 //
GP12nardp1_u:26746: dakṣiṇāṃ pradadecchaktyā bhaktyā prīyeta mādhavaḥ // NarP_1,125.42 //
GP12nardp1_u:26747: yathā śreṣṭhā nadī gaṅgā puṣkaraṃ ca saro yathā /
GP12nardp1_u:26748: kāśī purī nago merurdevo nārāyaṇo hariḥ // NarP_1,125.43 //
GP12nardp1_u:26750: mārgo mṛgendraḥ puruṣo 'śvatthaḥ prahlāda ānanam // NarP_1,125.44 //
GP12nardp1_u:26751: uccaiḥ śravā vasaṃtaśca japaḥ śeṣor'yamā dhanuḥ /
GP12nardp1_u:26752: pāvako viṣṇurindraśca kapilo vākpatiḥ kaviḥ // NarP_1,125.45 //
GP12nardp1_u:26756: śāntirastu śivaṃ cāstu sarveṣāṃ vo dvijottamāḥ // NarP_1,125.47 //
GP12nardp1_u:26761: śrutaṃ samyaganuṣṭhāya tatra tasthuśca satriṇaḥ // NarP_1,125.49 //
GP12nardp1_u:26763: sa tu nirviṣamanasā sametya yāgaṃ labhate satamabhīpsitaṃ hi lokam // NarP_1,125.50 //
GP12nardp1_u:26764: iti śrībṛhannāradīyapurāṇe bṛhadupākhyāne caturthapāde purāṇamahimāvarṇanaṃ nāma pañcaviṃśottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
